column1: Traditional headphones tend to focus in on the quality of the headphone, while trendy headphones look for ways to reinvent design. We did both. Our sleek, sexy design combined with top-notch technology make FIIL Diva Pro the most desirable wireless headphones on the market.
column2:
>

 

GO CELLPHONE-FREE

FIIL Diva Pro makes your life easier. Never again will you have to worry about going on a walk to the store, on a run or a bike ride and dropping your phone because, with FIIL Diva Pro, you can go cellphone-free.
column3:
>

Save 4G of music, or around 1,000 songs, within your FIIL Diva Pro headphones.

column1: • To store your tunes with an Android, use a USB cable and PC or you can use a USB OTG cable if you have a compatible phone.
• To store your tunes with an iOS device, use a USB cable with PC.
(FIIL Diva Pro supports FLAC, WAV and APE file types and of course other compressed formats like mp3 and AAC.)
column2:
>

Slide your finger on the cover of your headset to easily switch between songs, adjust the volume and complete other operations with a touch of your finger.

Volume Control:

column1: • Volume Up: Swipe finger from bottom to top
• Volume Down: Swipe finger from top to bottom
• Next Song: Swipe finger from left to right
• Previous Song: Swipe finger from right to left

column2:
>

 

GO HANDS-FREE
column3:
>

Talk to FIIL Diva Pro to control what you listen to, hands-free. 

When you say, ""hello FIIL,"" the function is awakened. Then say, ""search Michael Jackson's ‘We Are The World’,"" and the song begins to play. 

This function works by sending your command to your phone to then run a search within the FIIL+ app.
column4:
>

Diva Pro can detect when you take off your headphones and pause your music. When you put the headphones back on, your music starts again.

This function is perfect for when you run into someone you know on the street or want to order your cup of coffee on the way to work since there is no need to press pause.

Take a look at FIIL Diva in action.

>

FIIL Diva Pro's 3D sound is baked into the headphone firmware and is created after traditional 2.0 stereo audio source material is transmitted to your headphones. 

The lost spatial acoustic cues are re-established to create a virtual 3D sound field, all with Eilex's advanced technologies, namely, the VIR Filter and MaxWide. 

For now, MaxWide is exclusive on FIIL Diva Pro. By processing the space information of source material, MaxWide increases the width, height and depth of sound.
column6:
>

My AudioFiilter (MAF) is our original patented technology. With this feature, you can choose from four audio modes to maximize your listening experience. The modes include: Active Noise Canceling, Monitor, Open and Wind.
column7:
>

With My AudioFiilter you can listen to what you want and shield what you don't.
column9:
>

3D Audio: Choose from Living Room, Theater or Hall 3D audio modes to change the way your music is heard. With these modes, you’ll forget you have FIIL Diva Pro on and get lost in the incredible sound.

Battery Monitoring: Keep track of your Diva Pro headphones’ battery life while on the go so you’re never stuck without your favorite songs. 

Equalizer: Easily turn on the Bass and Treble that is stored in your headphone’s memory.
column10:
>

My AudioFiilter (MAF): Access Open, Monitor, Active Noise Canceling or Windy MAF modes. 

Music Management: The FIIL+ app can remotely control the music you are playing within the headphone’s storage. It can also manage the music files as well as create and push a music list into the music player embedded within the headphone.

OTA Firmware Upgrade: The FIIL+ app supports over-the-air Firmware upgrade so that our customers get the best experiences.
column11:
>

Other Configurations: Configure the FIIL logo light on the outside of the headphones, change the auto-powering-off time, select the language of voice features and more.
column14:
>

FIIL Diva Pro uses Bluetooth V4.1 technology that normally extends up to approximately 33 feet. However, with our technology, you can travel up to 330 feet without losing your connection.
column16:
>

FIIL Diva Pro headphones have a standby time of 40 days and playtime of 30 continuous hours on a single charge.
column18:
>

We tested the shapes of more than 10,000 heads and were able to find a fit that is so comfortable, you might forget you have them on. Our headband is made of super tough nylon and a force of 4N. The ear pads are made of silk protein leather and have memory foam technology inside. FIIL comes in white, black and red color options, with more color options in the works.
column21:
>

Our design is sleek and beautiful, but also convenient. Our headphones are able to fold into each other for easy traveling and storage. Additionally, one set of headphones weighs less than half a pound (.47lbs to be exact).
column22:
>

In your Diva Pro box, you will receive a 3.5mm four pole inline control so the headphones can also work as a wired headset with or without power. We will also provide you with a leatherette carry case and buckle and a USB cable.
column23:
>

FIIL Diva Pro headphones are engineered with 32-ohm impedance and a 32mm coil unit. Our patented technology has a TDDC bass boost tube plus a double-dampening cavity for a headset acoustic system. The combination of low, medium and high-frequency music our headphones give you restores the essence of sound.
column25:
>

In addition to FIIL Diva Pro, we created FIIL Diva. FIIL Diva headphones are still packed with amazing features that make your life easier, but they come at a cheaper price. Don’t worry, they still have many of the same features and look identical to FIIL Diva Pro.

Take a look at how FIIL Diva and FIIL Diva Pro compare to choose the best headphones for your lifestyle.
column27:
>

If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you have the option to return your FIIL Diva Pro or FIIL Diva within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.

column1: • CODEC: aptX®/ AAC / SBC for music modes, mSBC/CVSD for telephony modes
• Speaker Frequency Response: 15kHz~22kHz in wireless music modes, 10Hz~40kHz in wired modes
• Active Noise Canceling: Low frequency band up to 96%
• Passive Noise Reduction: High frequency band up to 98%
• Standby time: 40 days (on a single charge) OTG function and OTG data line support
","THE WORLD’S FIRST 3D AUDIO WIRELESS HEADPHONES WITH VOICE SEARCH & MORE.It is time to bring the music industry to the 21st century.
IN THE MEDIA  Check out a review on DailyTekk: Check out a review from Mr. Mobile: Check out a review from Real World Tech:

Traditional headphones tend to focus in on the quality of the headphone, while trendy headphones look for ways to reinvent design. We did both. Our sleek, sexy design combined with top-notch technology make FIIL Diva Pro the most desirable wireless headphones on the market.  GO CELLPHONE-FREEFIIL Diva Pro makes your life easier. Never again will you have to worry about going on a walk to the store, on a run or a bike ride and dropping your phone because, with FIIL Diva Pro, you can go cellphone-free.Save 4G of music, or around 1,000 songs, within your FIIL Diva Pro headphones.
To store your tunes with an Android, use a USB cable and PC or you can use a USB OTG cable if you have a compatible phone.
To store your tunes with an iOS device, use a USB cable with PC.

(FIIL Diva Pro supports FLAC, WAV and APE file types and of course other compressed formats like mp3 and AAC.)Slide your finger on the cover of your headset to easily switch between songs, adjust the volume and complete other operations with a touch of your finger.Volume Control:
Volume Up: Swipe finger from bottom to top
Volume Down: Swipe finger from top to bottom
Next Song: Swipe finger from left to right
Previous Song: Swipe finger from right to left

GO HANDS-FREETalk to FIIL Diva Pro to control what you listen to, hands-free. When you say, ""hello FIIL,"" the function is awakened. Then say, ""search Michael Jackson's ‘We Are The World’,"" and the song begins to play. This function works by sending your command to your phone to then run a search within the FIIL+ app.Diva Pro can detect when you take off your headphones and pause your music. When you put the headphones back on, your music starts again.This function is perfect for when you run into someone you know on the street or want to order your cup of coffee on the way to work since there is no need to press pause.Take a look at FIIL Diva in action.

FIIL Diva Pro's 3D sound is baked into the headphone firmware and is created after traditional 2.0 stereo audio source material is transmitted to your headphones. The lost spatial acoustic cues are re-established to create a virtual 3D sound field, all with Eilex's advanced technologies, namely, the VIR Filter and MaxWide. For now, MaxWide is exclusive on FIIL Diva Pro. By processing the space information of source material, MaxWide increases the width, height and depth of sound. My AudioFiilter (MAF) is our original patented technology. With this feature, you can choose from four audio modes to maximize your listening experience. The modes include: Active Noise Canceling, Monitor, Open and Wind. With My AudioFiilter you can listen to what you want and shield what you don't.  3D Audio: Choose from Living Room, Theater or Hall 3D audio modes to change the way your music is heard. With these modes, you’ll forget you have FIIL Diva Pro on and get lost in the incredible sound.Battery Monitoring: Keep track of your Diva Pro headphones’ battery life while on the go so you’re never stuck without your favorite songs. Equalizer: Easily turn on the Bass and Treble that is stored in your headphone’s memory.My AudioFiilter (MAF): Access Open, Monitor, Active Noise Canceling or Windy MAF modes. Music Management: The FIIL+ app can remotely control the music you are playing within the headphone’s storage. It can also manage the music files as well as create and push a music list into the music player embedded within the headphone.OTA Firmware Upgrade: The FIIL+ app supports over-the-air Firmware upgrade so that our customers get the best experiences.Other Configurations: Configure the FIIL logo light on the outside of the headphones, change the auto-powering-off time, select the language of voice features and more.  FIIL Diva Pro uses Bluetooth V4.1 technology that normally extends up to approximately 33 feet. However, with our technology, you can travel up to 330 feet without losing your connection.  FIIL Diva Pro headphones have a standby time of 40 days and playtime of 30 continuous hours on a single charge.  We tested the shapes of more than 10,000 heads and were able to find a fit that is so comfortable, you might forget you have them on. Our headband is made of super tough nylon and a force of 4N. The ear pads are made of silk protein leather and have memory foam technology inside. FIIL comes in white, black and red color options, with more color options in the works.   Our design is sleek and beautiful, but also convenient. Our headphones are able to fold into each other for easy traveling and storage. Additionally, one set of headphones weighs less than half a pound (.47lbs to be exact).In your Diva Pro box, you will receive a 3.5mm four pole inline control so the headphones can also work as a wired headset with or without power. We will also provide you with a leatherette carry case and buckle and a USB cable.FIIL Diva Pro headphones are engineered with 32-ohm impedance and a 32mm coil unit. Our patented technology has a TDDC bass boost tube plus a double-dampening cavity for a headset acoustic system. The combination of low, medium and high-frequency music our headphones give you restores the essence of sound.   In addition to FIIL Diva Pro, we created FIIL Diva. FIIL Diva headphones are still packed with amazing features that make your life easier, but they come at a cheaper price. Don’t worry, they still have many of the same features and look identical to FIIL Diva Pro.Take a look at how FIIL Diva and FIIL Diva Pro compare to choose the best headphones for your lifestyle.  If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you have the option to return your FIIL Diva Pro or FIIL Diva within 30 days for a full refund, no questions asked.

column2: >Introducing the Blipblox Audio Exploration Module. Not your typical music toy, but a fully functional synthesizer that has been safety tested for children as young as 3 years old.
column4: >The Blipblox's kid-friendly design features colorful knobs and buttons plus an interactive LED light show, while the professional synthesis engine and other studio features promote music-making on a whole new level.
column5: >No need to connect a phone.  No software to download.  No music experience necessary.
column6: >Just turn it on and start exploring electronic music in a completely new way.
column10: >The Blipblox is production ready.  We have completed two rounds of prototypes using tooled injected molded plastic at our factory.  These prototypes have allowed us to fine-tune the look, feel and sound of the Blipblox, so we move into mass production with confidence.  The Blipblox is already electrically certified to FCC (US) and CE (European) consumer product standards.  Full safety compliance will be completed by the end of June.
column14: >The Playtime Engineering Team's skill set and background make it fully qualified to bring the Blipblox to market.
column16: >Troy Sheets has a 20 year track record of delivering advanced data center products for some of largest companies in the Silicon Valley.  As a Distinguished Engineer who leads teams producing billion dollar product lines, Troy has a complete understanding of the electronic product design, qualification, manufacturing and support process.  These skills combined with his lifelong passion for music production and synthesizer design, mean Troy is uniquely qualified to lead Playtime Engineering and deliver the Blipblox to market.
column18: >For 15 years, Kate Sheets lead sales, customer relationship management, product development, marketing, strategic planning and recruiting as Director of Operations for an independent software firm.  Most recently, Kate co-founded a home decor company where she expanded her product development skills into manufacturing, from the design stage to bringing a finished product to the online market.
column20: >What do kids think of the Blipblox?
column21: >The Blipblox has been tested by hundreds of kids from a variety of backgrounds and ages.  Starting with its debut at the NAMM Show (National Association of Music Merchants), and continuing through Maker’s Faire just last month, as well as many smaller events in between, we’ve witnessed first hand the number of kids who love playing with the Blipblox.  Many kids, even those with no music experience, take to the Blipblox quickly and continue a focused play for an extended period of time.
column22:
>What age group is the Blipblox target market?
While every kid is different, these are our general observations for what aspects of the Blipblox will attract which age groups:
column25: >The Blipblox will come safety certified for kids 3 years and older.  While some children under 3 may enjoy the Blipblox with close parental participation, we have found that the device is a little advanced for them and many tend to lose interest quickly.
column27: >Younger kids are attracted to the Blipblox light show and its brightly colored knobs and buttons.  But the most popular controllers are the vibrant red levers.  Many kids love to incorporate the Blipblox into imagination play, so it becomes a spaceship controller or lava flow meter.  We have seen some more musically-oriented kids at this age start to twist the knobs in a more deliberate way and able to get some really cool sounds from the Blipblox.
column29: >Kids at this age still like the lights and levers, but many are also starting to understand that they are controlling and creating sound.  As kids start to use the Blipblox more, they develop the skills to follow the signal flow lines and connect them to the sound they are hearing. They also love the kick and snare drum beatbox controls.
column31: >While the kids at the older end of this age range may at first think the Blipblox looks like a little kid’s toy, it doesn’t take much for them to realize it is a real musical instrument.  This is also the age where you can think about breathing new life into that old MIDI keyboard so kids can start playing their own melodies.  Kids who already have experience with a DAW will soon realize that the Blipblox is a fully functional synthesizer that can be used for music production.
column33: >Teens and adults that are into electronic music or music production are attracted to the Blipblox because it looks fun but they also see it as a legitimate tool.  The Blipblox becomes a studio device used to create new synthesized sounds that can be incorporated into a more layered song.  MIDI In means you can connect the Blipblox to any studio setup.  And Audio Out means kids can record, layer and manipulate the sounds into their next hit track.
column35: >The Blipblox is currently being reviewed by early childhood development and special needs professionals to see what possible use it could have as a teaching tool.  The Blipblox was the winner of the SBO Best Teaching Tool for Pre-School students. We look forward to partnering with academic and non-profit groups as the Blipblox goes into mass production.
column37: >Learning a musical instrument is an opportunity that provides a lifetime of enjoyment.  While today’s music increasingly relies on synthesizers to create new and exciting sounds, the complexity of these tools makes them hard to get into the hands of children.  The Blipblox aims to change that by making synthesizers fun, easy and safe for all ages. We feel that if intrigued and entertained, children have the ability to understand the complexity of synthesis, inspiring them to create the music of tomorrow.
column38: >Can you really make a song with the Blipblox?
column39: >Yes!  Below you'll find two examples of tracks made with the Blipblox.  Both by professional producer Ben Messelbeck.

column2:
>Is the Blipblox shipping outside the US?  Am I responsible for taxes and duties?
Yes!  The Blipblox is shipping worldwide.  We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT but cannot assure you 100% that you won't have to pay additional duties if your country requires it.
column3: >Is the Blipblox really safe for children as young as 3 years old?
column4: >The Blipblox will ship in compliance with toy safety standards set forth by the USA, Canada and the European Union, including: ASTM F963 (USA), EN 71 (EU) and SOR/2011-17 (Canada).
column5:
>Can I interface the Blipblox with my phone?
The Blipblox was designed to give kids and adults time away from a screen and can be thoroughly enjoyed as a stand alone product.  More experienced users will utilize the MIDI interface to connect to a computer for music production.
column7: >Playtime Engineering does not sell development platforms.  Our products are full featured and fully tested on the day your receive it.  However, it is possible to upgrade the Blipblox firmware over the MIDI port with a sysex file if ever necessary.
column8:
>How long do the batteries last?
The Blipblox is designed to play for at least 12 hours on three fresh AA batteries.  The Blipblox automatically powers off if untouched for 30 minutes.
column9:
>Don't synthesizers usually have keyboards?
The Blipblox has a sequencer that plays hundreds of built-in melodies, so the user can focus on exploring the tone and textures of the sound, not just play individual notes.  You can use the MIDI Input port to connect an external keyboard.
column10: >Why aren’t the buttons or knobs labeled?
column11: >The Blipblox was designed to be inviting and accessible to people of all ages.  Those interested in learning more can refer to our in-depth Learning Toolbox Instruction Manual that outlines the Blipblox controls and signal flow for each of the buttons, knobs and levers.
column12: >Can I program or load my own sequences into the Blipblox?
column13: >The Blipblox comes pre-loaded with hundreds of fun melodies.  The MIDI input port allows an external sequencer or keyboard to play the sounds instead of the internal sequencer.
column14: >Are samples used to make the sounds?
column15: >All sounds in the Blipblox come from synthesized algorithms instead of samples.  This allows for an unlimited range of sounds to be explored and is the primary difference between the Blipblox and other music toys.
column16: >Does the Blipblox time-sync to other MIDI gear?
column17: >Yes.  The Blipblox responds to MIDI start, stop and time sync commands.
column18:
>Can I play the drums via MIDI?
Yes.  The synthesizer is played using Channel 1, the drums with Channel 2.
column19: >Can I control sound parameters via MIDI?
column20: >No, only note on/off/pitch and MIDI sync are supported.
column21: >Is the Blipblox in tune?  When I play it from a keyboard, are the notes matched to the correct frequency?
column22: >Yes.  As crazy as some of the sounds can get, they are still frequency matched and in tune.  You can incorporate almost any Blipblox sound into a music track.
column23: >Where are all the controls for the two envelope generators?
column24: >The Amplifier Envelope has only a Release control knob.  The Modulation Envelope has only an Attack control knob. The envelopes automatically adjust some parameters based on tempo and other factors to keep them fun and usable.
column25: >How do I select the LFO waveform?​
column26: >The two LFO waveforms are automatically randomized.
column28:
>How does the Blipblox select modes such as Oscillator Sync, or Pulse Width Modulation, or De-tune?  How does it select oscillator waves?
There are 8 Oscillator Modulation Schemes.  Each scheme takes two Modulation inputs. Different Modulation schemes automatically assign the Modulation inputs to parameters such as Sync, PWM, Detune, etc.  Some modulation inputs use non-traditional sound warping to insure a there is a wide range of sounds to explore. Different waveforms are hard-wired into the different Oscillator Schemes.
column30: >How can this work like a real synthesizer with so few buttons?
column31: >There are several special modes accessed by pressing multiple combinations of buttons.  These include turning off the sequencer, changing the LED mode and editing drum sounds. The manual describes these in detail.
column33:
>How do the control signals work?
There 3 modulation sources: LFO1, LFO2 and Modulation Envelope.  Any 3 of these can be routed to Oscillator Modulation 1, Oscillator Modulation 2, and Low Pass Filter Modulation.  This forms a 3x3 modulation matrix. There is also the Amplifier Envelope dedicated to controlling the release time of each note.

","Introducing the Blipblox Audio Exploration Module. Not your typical music toy, but a fully functional synthesizer that has been safety tested for children as young as 3 years old.The Blipblox's kid-friendly design features colorful knobs and buttons plus an interactive LED light show, while the professional synthesis engine and other studio features promote music-making on a whole new level.No need to connect a phone.  No software to download.  No music experience necessary.  Just turn it on and start exploring electronic music in a completely new way.The Blipblox is production ready.  We have completed two rounds of prototypes using tooled injected molded plastic at our factory.  These prototypes have allowed us to fine-tune the look, feel and sound of the Blipblox, so we move into mass production with confidence.  The Blipblox is already electrically certified to FCC (US) and CE (European) consumer product standards.  Full safety compliance will be completed by the end of June.The Playtime Engineering Team's skill set and background make it fully qualified to bring the Blipblox to market.  Troy Sheets has a 20 year track record of delivering advanced data center products for some of largest companies in the Silicon Valley.  As a Distinguished Engineer who leads teams producing billion dollar product lines, Troy has a complete understanding of the electronic product design, qualification, manufacturing and support process.  These skills combined with his lifelong passion for music production and synthesizer design, mean Troy is uniquely qualified to lead Playtime Engineering and deliver the Blipblox to market.For 15 years, Kate Sheets lead sales, customer relationship management, product development, marketing, strategic planning and recruiting as Director of Operations for an independent software firm.  Most recently, Kate co-founded a home decor company where she expanded her product development skills into manufacturing, from the design stage to bringing a finished product to the online market.What do kids think of the Blipblox?  The Blipblox has been tested by hundreds of kids from a variety of backgrounds and ages.  Starting with its debut at the NAMM Show (National Association of Music Merchants), and continuing through Maker’s Faire just last month, as well as many smaller events in between, we’ve witnessed first hand the number of kids who love playing with the Blipblox.  Many kids, even those with no music experience, take to the Blipblox quickly and continue a focused play for an extended period of time.What age group is the Blipblox target market?While every kid is different, these are our general observations for what aspects of the Blipblox will attract which age groups:Under 3The Blipblox will come safety certified for kids 3 years and older.  While some children under 3 may enjoy the Blipblox with close parental participation, we have found that the device is a little advanced for them and many tend to lose interest quickly.3-4 yearsYounger kids are attracted to the Blipblox light show and its brightly colored knobs and buttons.  But the most popular controllers are the vibrant red levers.  Many kids love to incorporate the Blipblox into imagination play, so it becomes a spaceship controller or lava flow meter.  We have seen some more musically-oriented kids at this age start to twist the knobs in a more deliberate way and able to get some really cool sounds from the Blipblox.5-8 yearsKids at this age still like the lights and levers, but many are also starting to understand that they are controlling and creating sound.  As kids start to use the Blipblox more, they develop the skills to follow the signal flow lines and connect them to the sound they are hearing. They also love the kick and snare drum beatbox controls.9-12 yearsWhile the kids at the older end of this age range may at first think the Blipblox looks like a little kid’s toy, it doesn’t take much for them to realize it is a real musical instrument.  This is also the age where you can think about breathing new life into that old MIDI keyboard so kids can start playing their own melodies.  Kids who already have experience with a DAW will soon realize that the Blipblox is a fully functional synthesizer that can be used for music production.  13 years-AdultTeens and adults that are into electronic music or music production are attracted to the Blipblox because it looks fun but they also see it as a legitimate tool.  The Blipblox becomes a studio device used to create new synthesized sounds that can be incorporated into a more layered song.  MIDI In means you can connect the Blipblox to any studio setup.  And Audio Out means kids can record, layer and manipulate the sounds into their next hit track.Educational opportunitiesThe Blipblox is currently being reviewed by early childhood development and special needs professionals to see what possible use it could have as a teaching tool.  The Blipblox was the winner of the SBO Best Teaching Tool for Pre-School students. We look forward to partnering with academic and non-profit groups as the Blipblox goes into mass production.Why the Blipblox?Learning a musical instrument is an opportunity that provides a lifetime of enjoyment.  While today’s music increasingly relies on synthesizers to create new and exciting sounds, the complexity of these tools makes them hard to get into the hands of children.  The Blipblox aims to change that by making synthesizers fun, easy and safe for all ages. We feel that if intrigued and entertained, children have the ability to understand the complexity of synthesis, inspiring them to create the music of tomorrow.Can you really make a song with the Blipblox?Yes!  Below you'll find two examples of tracks made with the Blipblox.  Both by professional producer Ben Messelbeck.

column2: >What if.. you could record your whole band at once, anywhere.. with just one single microphone and then mix your songs afterwards - with the flexibility of a multi-track recording setup!

>ZYLIA is the world’s first Portable Recording Studio that allows you to record entire sound scenes with only one microphone and then separate the individual sound sources from the recording.  By combining advanced digital signal processing algorithms and microphone array technology we have created a truly unique and innovative product.

column1: Record entire music scene with only one microphone and flexibility of multi-track recording. Use AUTOMIX feature in ZYLIA Studio software to automatically mix your tracks.
• Multi-track record your whole band with one-mic-only!
• Separate individual instrument tracks from your recordings
• Easily mix your tracks in ZYLIA Studio or export to DAW
ZYLIA STANDARD Set includes: ZYLIA ZM-1 microphone array and ZYLIA Studio software.
Capture 360 audio scene in the way you hear it in the real world. Select sound pieces in post-processing ​and apply them in your work-flow.
• Capture immersive 3D audio (360/VR/AR) with high definition quality (3rd order Ambisonics)
• Use 'Virtual Microphones' to get ultimate control over the recorded sound-field
• Use ready presets for surround or ambient recordings, such as 5.1, 7.1, 5.1.4 up to 22.2
ZYLIA PRO Set includes: ZYLIA ZM-1 microphone array, ZYLIA Studio, ZYLIA Studio PRO, ZYLIA Ambisonics Converter and ZYLIA Ambisonics Converter Plugin.

column1: Music recording and production is an art that involves a lot of skills

In order to create a perfect mix of your song you have to involve different skills such as setting up a whole band, putting microphones in the right positions and distances, adjusting gains, adding effects and mixing all the tracks.
Traditional music recording setup does not allow to capture your creativity

With traditional microphone and recording systems musicians have to spend a lot of time setting up microphones and repeating every take in order to get good quality and balanced final mix. This leads to:
• Focusing on microphone setup rather than music performing
• Moving a recording session to time consuming recording studios

The ZYLIA Portable Recording Studio is a combination of a physical microphone ‘ZM-1’ and advanced software processing tools included in ‘ZYLIA Studio’, ‘ZYLIA Studio PRO’ and ‘ZYLIA Ambisonics Converter’.

column2: >ZYLIA Portable Recording Studio is very straightforward to use. Please, check the videos below.
>Guitar Interactive Mag product review - Calibration process, recording , sound source separation effect, quality of recording and comparison of ZYLIA ZM-1, Zoom recorder and AKG mic.

>Years of expertise in audio processing, music recording and hardware design have been combined into the ZYLIA 'Portable Recording Studio' and throughout the development process we've paid the utmost attention to every single detail product. Our goal was always to unify cutting-edge technology with simplicity and elegant product design.
>Read more in our Technology White Paper ...

column1: ‘Virtual Microphones’ is a spatial audio filtering technique based on advanced ‘beamforming’ and sound source separation algorithms.

A virtual microphone can have different spatial characteristics, width or shape depending on recording use case and user needs and is defined in software taking into account both phase and amplitude differences between signals captured by the 19 capsules in the ZM-1.

ZM-1 is built using omnidirectional condenser microphone capsules based on MEMS technology. All capsules have very tight and constant in time tolerances, so that the sound is consistent from mic to mic.

ZYLIA ZM-1 is a special type of microphone array that was designed for high quality multi-track recording. In order to capture selected sound sources on specified directions and distances the ZM-1 microphone uses 19 omnidirectional capsules (based on state-of-the-art MEMS technology).
• Size: height 155 mm (6.1 inches), length 103 mm (4 inches)

ZYLIA Studio is a dedicated application acting as the “Control Center” for the ZYLIA ZM-1 hardware and enables musicians/bands to record songs and extract recorded instruments to individual tracks, allowing for fine-tuning of the mix with gain level and pan controls or exporting of tracks to an external DAW.
• Desktop application for Mac OS, Linux and Windows
• Produce and export tracks in WAVE (24 bits PCM, 48 kHz)
• Presets for surround or ambient recordings (5.1, 7.1 and more)
Try ZYLIA Studio Demo today!

ZYLIA Studio PRO is a VST/AU plugin which gives you access to spatial filtering and signal separation directly within a DAW. ZYLIA Studio PRO transforms a single 19 capsule microphone ZYLIA ZM-1 into an unlimited number of virtual microphones.
• Possibility to set and monitor virtual microphones of multiple polar patterns or characteristics -  live or during post production!
• Presets for surround or ambient recordings (5.1, 7.1, 5.4.1, 22.2 and more)
• Automatically detects the positions of sound sources

ZYLIA Ambisonics Converter (ZAC) converts the ZM-1 multi-channel recordings to Higher Order Ambisonics (HOA) and enables you to prepare 3D audio recordings for playback on the 'Facebook 360' and 'Youtube 360’ platforms.
• Correction of microphone position in the post-production stage

Now, we ask for your continued support so we can revolutionize the future of recording together.

column1: ZYLIA was founded in 2012 by Piotr Szczechowiak (COO) and Tomasz Zernicki (CTO) - both remarkable PhDs with extensive experience from academia and the industry. ZYLIA is determined to develop innovative world-class technologies and turn these into products capable of improving the lives of musicians and audio creatives. Today, the ZYLIA team consists of more than 20+ dedicated and passionate team players with a great combination of expertise in audio research, software, business and product development.
Read more about ZYLIA Team ...
Our production line is running so microphones will be delivered in batches (Indiegogo InDemand option).

Our team has more than 15 years of experience in audio product development and has successfully contributed to numerous audio projects, helping other companies bring their innovative products to market.

One of the main challenges during the entire product development process was to continually ensure proper testing of both our hardware and software. Lab tests are important but nothing beats true 'market testing’. All the feedback we have received from our beta-testers (worldwide) has been invaluable to us and we are extremely grateful for their passionate and dedicated contributions.

Just recently, we have finalized the hardware design and manufactured a production prototype successfully. Now, we are ready to start high volume production and make our product available for everyone.

As with any hardware and software project, there are always scheduled risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics. Therefore, a lot of attention has been put into the process of selecting the best manufacturing partners in both Europe and Asia - partners that we already have a strong collaboration with.

WHAT IS THE TYPICAL USE CASE?
ZYLIA ZM-1 was designed first and foremost for recording music artists and bands. It drastically simplifies the multitrack recording process and with just a single microphone you can record a performance and afterwards extract/separate the individual instruments/vocals/audio sources from the stereo mix. In addition you can use it for 3D audio production.
ZYLIA ZM-1 is an excellent companion for:
• 3D / Virtual Reality / Augmented Reality and Mixed Reality creators

CAN I USE ZYLIA PORTABLE RECORDING STUDIO TOGETHER WITH MY DAW?
Yes, ZYLIA ZM-1 is compatible with all DAWs currently on the market. The microphone is visible as a 19 channel source input device. In addition, separated tracks of audio sources and instruments can be exported directly into any DAW of your choice.

DO I GET A WARRANTY?
ZYLIA's hardware products are covered with warranty against defects in materials and workmanship - under normal use - for a period of ONE (1) YEAR from the date of purchase by the original end-user / purchaser.

WOULD THE ZYLIA ZM-1 WORK WITHIN LARGE VENUES?
ZYLIA ZM-1 was designed to work in a huge variety of environments - from living rooms and home studios to rehearsal rooms and larger venues.

COULD IT BE USED FOR RECORDING MULTIPLE VOICES IN VIDEO PRODUCTION?Absolutely! the ZM-1 can be used for recording many speakers/voice actors simultaneously. At the output you would get a stereo, binaural or 19 channels recording and after processing, a separate audio track of each speaker/voice actor.
CAN I USE ZYLIA AS A REGULAR MICROPHONE WITHOUT ZYLIA STUDIO SOFTWARE?

Yes, you can. From operating system point of view, ZYLIA ZM-1 is visible as a 19 track audio interface. Therefore. you can treat it as a typical USB microphone with additional benefit of high quality microphone capsules.
MAY I USE ZYLIA FOR AS A LIVE SOUND MICROPHONE?

Yes, you can. During the live performance you have several options. First, use ZYLIA as a USB microphone. Second, you can record a 3D audio in a binaural way. Third, by using a ZYLIA Studio PRO you can use a virtual microphone technology and pass only selected sounds to PA system.
CAN I USE ZYLIA FOR LIVE RECORDING?

Yes, you can output from virtual microphones to create a surround sound, binaural or just a stereo recording. The beuty of ZYLIA is that you can make this decision AFTER the recording due to 360 format that we use - you can separate or filter sounds using ZYLIA Studio or ZYLIA Studio PRO software.

HOW DOES ZYLIA STUDIO EXTRACT MULTIPLE INSTRUMENTS FROM A SINGLE MIC REC?
The technology behind 'extraction of sound sources' is a technique developed by our internal R&
column2: D department. We use a combination of spatial filtering (beamforming) and blind sound source separation.

column1:
CAN I CONTROL THE LEVEL OF SEPARATION?
Yes, you have two options included in 'ZYLIA Studio' related to virtual microphones.
Preset no.1 : filters and cut a specific section of the 3D sound preserving the ambience and room acoustic.
Preset no.2 : takes into account the localization of interfered sources which leads to removing unwanted noises and ambience.

CAN YOU DO LIVE MONITORING OF THE RECORDING?
Sure, we found this a must-have in order to achieve an optimal work-flow.

WHAT ARE THE RECORDING SPECIFICATIONS?
The current version of ZYLIA ZM-1 has 19 built-in microphones - or microphone capsules to be exact. The system records 19 tracks from these physical microphone capsules + an arbitrary number of 'virtual microphones' defined in the ZYLIA Studio software by the user. Each virtual microphone is recorded as a separate track. Audio is recorded in 48 kHz/24 bit quality.

WHAT ARE VIRTUAL MICROPHONES?
These are software defined microphone beams that can be directed in any position in the 3D space. ZYLIA ZM-1 can detect audio sources within 3D space and steer appropriate virtual microphone beams towards them.

HOW MANY TRACKS OF SEPARATED AUDIO CAN BE EXTRACTED FROM A RECORDING?
To obtain a decent separation of sound sources there should be 6-8 of them located around a microphone.

CAN YOU DO 5.1/7.1/22.2 AUDIO RECORDINGS WITH ZYLIA?
Thanks to our 'virtual microphone technology' it is possible to set microphone beams in many directions simultaneously! In this way you can record in mono, stereo, 5.1, 7.1 or any other arrangement you might need. You can also define your own setups. Moreover, it is possible to do a binaural recording.

CAN I USE ZYLIA WITHOUT INTERNET CONNECTION?
Yes, it does its magic perfectly without being online.

column1: ","What if.. you could record your whole band at once, anywhere.. with just one single microphone and then mix your songs afterwards - with the flexibility of a multi-track recording setup!

ZYLIA is the world’s first Portable Recording Studio that allows you to record entire sound scenes with only one microphone and then separate the individual sound sources from the recording.  By combining advanced digital signal processing algorithms and microphone array technology we have created a truly unique and innovative product.
ZYLIA STANDARS SET FOR MUSIC BANDS
Record entire music scene with only one microphone and flexibility of multi-track recording. Use AUTOMIX feature in ZYLIA Studio software to automatically mix your tracks.
Multi-track record your whole band with one-mic-only!
Separate individual instrument tracks from your recordings
Easily mix your tracks in ZYLIA Studio or export to DAW
Casual rehearsal recording with ZYLIA ZM-1.
ZYLIA STANDARD Set includes: ZYLIA ZM-1 microphone array and ZYLIA Studio software.
ZYLIA PRO SET FOR SOUND DESIGNERS
Capture 360 audio scene in the way you hear it in the real world. Select sound pieces in post-processing ​and apply them in your work-flow.
Capture immersive 3D audio (360/VR/AR) with high definition quality (3rd order Ambisonics)
Use 'Virtual Microphones' to get ultimate control over the recorded sound-field
Use ready presets for surround or ambient recordings, such as 5.1, 7.1, 5.1.4 up to 22.2
ZYLIA PRO Set includes: ZYLIA ZM-1 microphone array, ZYLIA Studio, ZYLIA Studio PRO, ZYLIA Ambisonics Converter and ZYLIA Ambisonics Converter Plugin.

column2:
>

Hidizs DH1000 is designed for music enthusiasts. The dual DACs are embedded in a balanced op-amp circuit to maximize the stereo separation. With its dual-channel headphone amplifiers, the stereo flows across both the left and right side of your headphones to deliver world-class performance and a sense of balance to ensuring your music will come through as pure as it can ever be.
column3:
>

 Bad Guy Good Audio Review on Hidizs DH1000
column4:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

Click here to read the whole DH1000 review by Headfonics.

Click here to read the whole DH1000 review by Headfonia.
column6:
>

You spend an average of 3-5 hours per day listening to music on mobile devices or laptops. Unfortunately, the quality of the built-in DAC and headphone amp in your mobile devices or laptop are not good enough to get the full experience of your music. With the Hidizs DH1000, you could play High-Resolution Audio up to 24-Bit/192KHz (6.5x more data transmitted than CD), which has higher sampling rates than the standards used in CDs. You can enjoy music like never before.
column8:
>

Most of the other amplifiers use only one DAC for both the left and right channels. Hidizs DH1000 uses two top-level ES9018K2M DACs for each channel to make sure the signals will not interference with each other. Not only this, but we also designed two LPF and OPA modules (both integrated into the ES9601K AMPs) for each of the left and right channels to ensures the best channel separation (120dB for both 2.5mm and 3.5mm headphone jacks) and SRN (122dB). This means that DH1000 can provide you a clearer and purer sound than any other amplifiers.
column9:
>

Hidizs DH-1000 is perfectly compatible with iPhone, Android phones, iPad, PC, MAC and most DAPs. It can turn your all devices into a luxury stereo system.
column10:
>

A carefully optimized circuit with a high-standard PCB immersion gold finish, DH100 can overcome interfering signals between different modules. With high performance (122 dB SNR) analogue output, it allows you to hear every drumbeat and breath.
column11:
>

Hidizs DH1000 is designed from the perception of a conductor, it's known as the soul of auditory perception in a concert. With a frequency response of 0Hz ~ 50 KHz and 120dB stereo separation, Hidizs DH1000 can faithfully deliver every detail of the hi-res audio by accurately separating the bands of high, mid and low. It will make you feel like you’re in the middle of a concert

Quartz crystal resonators whereof three for signal transmission and one for measurement
column14: equipped with the high-precision, ultra-low noise clock source which flawlessly controls the delay time and equates to a faithful reproduction of the original sound. Experience sound like never before.
column15:
>

Found out your mobile devices or laptop can’t drive your expensive headphone sets? The Hidizs DH1000 provides enough power to drive headphones from 8 to 600Ω impedance through both 2.5/3.5mm headphone jacks. Power enough to drive any high-impedance headphones on the market. This means you can finally take your power-hungry studio cans on-the-go and enjoy its full potential without having to carry a big and heavy amplifier.
column16:

DH1000 has two separate data and charge USB ports. This independent design allows users to charge DH1000 on the go from a portable power bank, while continuing to enjoy DH1000 in action at the same time
column18:

CNC aluminium alloy body with comfort grip-ergonomic design, 2.5D sided tempered glass, it’s as aesthetically pleasing as it is functional.
column19:

column20: with HiBy player, your phone can stream most high resolution format including APE, FLAC, WAV, MP3, DSD.
column22:
>

With unbeatable decoding capabilities, DH1000 supports Flac, APE, WAV, ALAC, APPLE LOSSLESS, DSF, DSDIFF and other Hi-Res audio files including PCM 24-Bit/192kHz, native DSD64/128, and more. The cross-platform functionality of DH 1000 allows you to use it as a decoder on Android, iPhone, PC, MAC, iPad and other devices. It can instantly upgrade your existing music to high-resolution sound quality.
column23:
>

Comparative Measurements  

To understand the sound quality difference between DH1000 and smartphone, it is useful to compare the objective performance between DH1000 and the iPhone 7 directly. We used professional equipment Audio Precision APX515 to measure all of the acoustic data below.
column24:
>

 Channel Separation

For the audio system, lower crosstalk brings better stereo image and channel separation. DH1000's channel separation data is almost twice lower as much as the iPhone 7 which means it can provide much clearer sound that’s more crisp.

Frequency Response

The DH1000 can reach beyond the Hi-Res standard 40kHz, while the iPhone 7 can only reach the 20kHz, this means DH1000 contains much more detail of the original track.
column25:
>

 SRN

The signal-to-noise ratio is defined as the ratio of the power of a signal (meaningful information) and the power of background noise (unwanted signal). The DH1000 has a higher SRN than the iPhone 7, which means that DH1000 can provide a purer sound. Some high-end supra-aural headphones require the source to have a certain SRN to be able to maximize the headphone’s capabilities.

Level Output

DH1000's level output is eight times stronger than the iPhone 7. It means DH1000 has much bigger power to drive headphones.

column13: >deepblue2 redefines the quality and quantity of sound possible from a Bluetooth speaker. It combines the convenience of a single box design with the full-range powerful sound of a big HiFi stereo system. With deepblue2 you'll experience irresistible sound that you can easily move from room to room.
column17: >In 2013 Peachtree Audio launched the original deepblue. It received rave reviews from the media and customers alike and quickly established itself as the answer to the question ""What's the best sounding Bluetooth speaker I can buy today?""
column19: >Scot Hull theabsolutesound.com ""...the little deepblue system suddenly pounded out some shockingly deep bass... I’m still flabbergasted.""
column21: >Chris Connaker computeraudiophile.com ""No matter what music I put through deepblue I was impressed by the sound quality. deepblue produces sound that's far larger than its physical size...""
column23: >Michael Mercer thedailyswarm.com ""I don't know how Peachtree got this bass, but its damn impressive. If all of my friends who own crappy Bose systems bought one of these I'd actually enjoy music at their house!""
column25: >Brent Butterworth thewirecutter.com ""The Peachtree deepblue is a pretty amazing creation. It plays loud enough to fill my entire 2,220 square-foot house with sound. It hits 102dB at one meter with my usual ""Kickstart My Heart"" test - that's 5 to 10dB more than usual, which is a lot.""
column28: >Raising the performance bar
column34: >With deepblue2 our design team has committed to raise the performance bar even higher. The technical challenge is to get controlled, deep and loud bass extension out of a small cabinet - and to do that without a wallet devastating price tag.
column38: >Most wireless speakers use two or three small speaker drivers operating at their maximum potential to try to achieve full range sound. The result is thin and compressed sound that is fatiguing to listen to at high volumes. They simply run out of gas.
column42: >For truly life-like sound you need a speaker capable of producing deep bass and the only way to do that is to move lots of air. You need to have the right combination of power, surface area, driver excursion and correct enclosure all working together. We're not breaking the laws of physics. We're exploiting them to make the biggest sounding Bluetooth speaker ever made.
column47: >deepblue2 uses a custom developed 440-watt amplifier that is 5X more powerful than the home Bluetooth speakers currently on the market.
column51: >A massive long excursion 6.5-inch woofer moves a serious amount of air and creates deep impactful bass. You not only hear full bass, you feel it.
column53: >deepblue2 uses a total of five speakers in a three-way configuration to create a powerful balanced sound so every instrument and voice can be easily heard. Two 3"" mid-range drivers and two 1"" soft-dome tweeters flank deepblue2's woofer to create a wide natural sound that fills an entire room.
column59: >A very carefully designed acoustic suspension enclosure separates deepblue2 from everything else on the market. Our sealed box approach outperforms the typical ported box and passive radiator designs by creating clean deep bass that doesn't distort at high volume.
column60: >aptX® Bluetooth audio streaming
column61: >
column63:
>Stream all of your favorite music and apps to deepblue using its built-in aptX® Bluetooth audio receiver. You can pair your Android, iPhone, iPod touch, Macbook and most PCs for high quality wireless audio streaming. 

With Bluetooth you don’t need any proprietary apps - you can use the ones you already love and are familiar with. iTunes, Windows Media, Pandora, Spotify, LastFM, just to mention a few, are easily streamed wirelessly.
column64: >Digital and analog inputs
column66: >
column76: >deepblue2 features two wired inputs: one optical and one 3.5mm analog. Want to connect an Apple TV or Amazon Fire TV? No problem. Sonos Connect? Ditto. Dig vinyl? You can do that too by using a turntable with a built-in or external phono preamp.
column80: >deepblue2's optical digital input even accepts high-resolution 24/96 digital audio for better-than-CD-quality sound. If your HDTV has an optical digital output (most do) you can even use deepblue2 to listen to TV, movies and games! Awesome.
column83: >Play in any room at any volume
column87:
/>

 

Play it low or play it loud
column91: >The human ear is less senstive to bass frequencies at low volume. Smart Volume automatically adjusts frequency response at the low end of the volume range to compensate for the ear's lower sensitivity. This means you get full and clear sound even at very low volumes.
column95:
>For those times you need to let loose and turn up the volume to party level, Smart Volume will lower peak signals when playing at high volume to ensure great distortion-free sound and the long lasting performance of your deepblue2.

Perfect sound in any room
column99:
>deepblue2 is voiced out of the box to produce the most balanced bass response in the places where it'll be most commonly placed. However, it's impossible to predict every situation where a speaker is going to be located. You may also prefer more or less bass. Using the included IR remote control you'll be able to toggle between five different bass levels to fine tune deepblue2 to your environment and personal taste.

Easy to move
column103: >An easy-to-grab recessed handle on the back panel makes it easy to move deepblue2 throughout your home.
column105: >Why we're launching deepblue2 on Indiegogo
column109: >Shortly after shipping our first production run of the original deepblue, our OEM factory partner unexpectedly went out of business. We not only lost our deposit on the second mass production run, we completely lost the ability to build more units and the expected revenue generated from those sales.
column113: >Most companies would probably retool and ship the same product again. Instead we took this unfortunate circumstance and decided that this was our opportunity to make something even better.
column124: >Our goal of $63,000 is based on the remaining costs for new tooling and the deposit needed for the first mass production run. Our project timeline has deepblue2 going into mass production in early October for delivery to our First and Early backers in November.
column128: >The design team and engineers on deepblue2 are the same people that created the original deepblue and we have partnered with an outstanding new OEM factory that has been fully inspected by our own team as well as a third-party Quality Assurance company.
column132: >With your support we can complete the final steps of bringing deepblue2 to market. We've already paid for the engineering and the majority of tooling costs and have built working prototypes to use for measurements, programming, and voicing.
column138: >Peachtree Audio has an established track record of producing high quality and high value audio components and speakers. We've merged old-school audiophile thinking, where sound quality always comes first, with a decidedly new-school digital/computer audio savvy mindset.
column142: >The result has been over twenty award-winning products and distribution in over 30 countries. Peachtree products have been featured in the New York Times, Rolling Stone, GQ magazine and many other great publications.
column148: >We're simply crazy about music and high performance audio. Our headquarters is located in Bellevue, Washington with members of our team spread throughout the US from North Carolina to California and all spaces in between.

column187:
>deepblue2 is compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices including Android phones/tablets, iOS devices like iPod touch, iPhone, iPad and most Mac or PC computers.

Why Bluetooth? Why not Airplay/DLNA etc.?
column191: >Bluetooth is a mature wireless technology that works with the widest variety of devices. Its benefits outweigh its limitations. With other wireless technology you're typically locked into a particular ecosystem. We wanted the broadest device support possible today. Bluetooth works with iOS, Android, Windows and Mac OS X.
column195: >We also chose it for its simplicity. Bluetooth is a point A to point B connection. That means no router or proprietary network with complex setup is needed.
column199: >We also considered the cost and go-to-market timeline. Bluetooth itself is relatively easy and affordable to implement which allowed us to spend more money and time on the sound quality of deepblue2.
column203:
>If you'd like to add Airplay capability we suggest connecting either an Apple TV or Airport Express to one of deepblue2's optical or analog inputs.

What is its wireless range?
column207:
>Bluetooth has a range of 10 meters (33 feet) open air. Distance will vary with walls and your device’s capability.

Can I connect to more than one deepblue2 at a time - for example, stream from one phone to multiple deepblue2s?
column211:
>You can connect to one deepblue2 at a time.

 

","deepblue2The Ultimate Bluetooth Speaker.  deepblue2 redefines the quality and quantity of sound possible from a Bluetooth speaker. It combines the convenience of a single box design with the full-range powerful sound of a big HiFi stereo system. With deepblue2 you'll experience irresistible sound that you can easily move from room to room.In 2013 Peachtree Audio launched the original deepblue. It received rave reviews from the media and customers alike and quickly established itself as the answer to the question ""What's the best sounding Bluetooth speaker I can buy today?"" Scot Hull theabsolutesound.com ""...the little deepblue system suddenly pounded out some shockingly deep bass... I’m still flabbergasted.""Chris Connaker computeraudiophile.com ""No matter what music I put through deepblue I was impressed by the sound quality. deepblue produces sound that's far larger than its physical size...""Michael Mercer thedailyswarm.com ""I don't know how Peachtree got this bass, but its damn impressive. If all of my friends who own crappy Bose systems bought one of these I'd actually enjoy music at their house!""Brent Butterworth thewirecutter.com ""The Peachtree deepblue is a pretty amazing creation. It plays loud enough to fill my entire 2,220 square-foot house with sound. It hits 102dB at one meter with my usual ""Kickstart My Heart"" test - that's 5 to 10dB more than usual, which is a lot.""  Raising the performance bar  With deepblue2 our design team has committed to raise the performance bar even higher. The technical challenge is to get controlled, deep and loud bass extension out of a small cabinet - and to do that without a wallet devastating price tag. Most wireless speakers use two or three small speaker drivers operating at their maximum potential to try to achieve full range sound. The result is thin and compressed sound that is fatiguing to listen to at high volumes. They simply run out of gas. For truly life-like sound you need a speaker capable of producing deep bass and the only way to do that is to move lots of air. You need to have the right combination of power, surface area, driver excursion and correct enclosure all working together. We're not breaking the laws of physics. We're exploiting them to make the biggest sounding Bluetooth speaker ever made.  deepblue2 uses a custom developed 440-watt amplifier that is 5X more powerful than the home Bluetooth speakers currently on the market.A massive long excursion 6.5-inch woofer moves a serious amount of air and creates deep impactful bass. You not only hear full bass, you feel it. deepblue2 uses a total of five speakers in a three-way configuration to create a powerful balanced sound so every instrument and voice can be easily heard. Two 3"" mid-range drivers and two 1"" soft-dome tweeters flank deepblue2's woofer to create a wide natural sound that fills an entire room.   A very carefully designed acoustic suspension enclosure separates deepblue2 from everything else on the market. Our sealed box approach outperforms the typical ported box and passive radiator designs by creating clean deep bass that doesn't distort at high volume.  aptX® Bluetooth audio streaming    Stream all of your favorite music and apps to deepblue using its built-in aptX® Bluetooth audio receiver. You can pair your Android, iPhone, iPod touch, Macbook and most PCs for high quality wireless audio streaming. With Bluetooth you don’t need any proprietary apps - you can use the ones you already love and are familiar with. iTunes, Windows Media, Pandora, Spotify, LastFM, just to mention a few, are easily streamed wirelessly.  Digital and analog inputs deepblue2 features two wired inputs: one optical and one 3.5mm analog. Want to connect an Apple TV or Amazon Fire TV? No problem. Sonos Connect? Ditto. Dig vinyl? You can do that too by using a turntable with a built-in or external phono preamp. deepblue2's optical digital input even accepts high-resolution 24/96 digital audio for better-than-CD-quality sound. If your HDTV has an optical digital output (most do) you can even use deepblue2 to listen to TV, movies and games! Awesome.  Play in any room at any volume Play it low or play it loudThe human ear is less senstive to bass frequencies at low volume. Smart Volume automatically adjusts frequency response at the low end of the volume range to compensate for the ear's lower sensitivity. This means you get full and clear sound even at very low volumes.For those times you need to let loose and turn up the volume to party level, Smart Volume will lower peak signals when playing at high volume to ensure great distortion-free sound and the long lasting performance of your deepblue2.Perfect sound in any roomdeepblue2 is voiced out of the box to produce the most balanced bass response in the places where it'll be most commonly placed. However, it's impossible to predict every situation where a speaker is going to be located. You may also prefer more or less bass. Using the included IR remote control you'll be able to toggle between five different bass levels to fine tune deepblue2 to your environment and personal taste.Easy to moveAn easy-to-grab recessed handle on the back panel makes it easy to move deepblue2 throughout your home.  Why we're launching deepblue2 on IndiegogoShortly after shipping our first production run of the original deepblue, our OEM factory partner unexpectedly went out of business. We've already paid for the engineering and the majority of tooling costs and have built working prototypes to use for measurements, programming, and voicing.  About Peachtree AudioPeachtree Audio has an established track record of producing high quality and high value audio components and speakers. column1: I have moved the active campaign to kickstarter, please use that campaign to support the project -- https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lightshowspeaker/boxie-a-speaker-with-a-built-in-light-show -- the current backers on here will still have their perks honored (and if anyone else decides to contribute here, but I highly suggest you use the kickstarter page)
This project arose from the frustration that came with trying to find
a speaker which lit up the room with music.  Few exist on the market
today, and all have poor light synchronization with the audio.  Boxie
changes this by providing the best digital processing available, in an
elegant package, and at an affordable price.
genres of music, and gives you the illusion that the speaker is feeling
the emotion behind the song.  Boxie reacts to tempo, cadence, and
patterns the same way that your ears and brain do.
needed to get going is the Boxie speaker, any audio source with a
standard 3.5mm aux cable, and power.  Boxie was designed to be a desktop
or bookshelf speaker, not a portable speaker, so there are no batteries
or Bluetooth connections to deal with.

For Boxie to become available to the general consumer, funding needs to be raised so that components can be bought in bulk orders to keep costs low (each LED can be acquired for less than a 1/4th of the price if they are all purchased at once for many orders).  The prototype Boxie can be replicated and distributed at just shy of $200, but with crowdfunding, Boxie can be refined and distributed for less than 75% of that.

The construction and assembly of the prototype was all done by hand with 1/2"" MDF, a table-saw, router-table, lots of sanding and sweat.  The heart of Boxie is an ARM Cortex M4 microcontroller coupled to a high quality audio codec.  All of the audio information retrieval was programmed to bring home to you a dance of lights that makes you feel like you are at an expensive production.

column2: Challenges    With the functional prototype completed, the next stage in bringing Boxie to you is to prepare and combine all the circuitry for custom manufacture.  Instead of being built from off-the-shelf components, Boxie will have tailored internals to keep costs low.  The project designer is a hardware engineer by profession, with a master's degree in electrical and computer engineering and many years of experience designing custom circuit boards and firmware.  The production Boxie will have CNC cut enclosure so that high volumes can be accommodated with ease.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

    Hopefully you've enjoyed the demos, Boxie can be enjoyed by anyone who listens to music, but if you can't contribute to the project, please share the campaign with someone who may be able to.

Thank you so very much,
    Michael K.
    Designer

I have moved the active campaign to kickstarter, please use that campaign to support the project -- https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/lightshowspeaker/boxie-a-speaker-with-a-built-in-light-show -- the current backers on here will still have their perks honored (and if anyone else decides to contribute here, but I highly suggest you use the kickstarter page)
This project arose from the frustration that came with trying to find
a speaker which lit up the room with music.  Few exist on the market
today, and all have poor light synchronization with the audio.  Boxie
changes this by providing the best digital processing available, in an
elegant package, and at an affordable price.
genres of music, and gives you the illusion that the speaker is feeling
the emotion behind the song.  Boxie reacts to tempo, cadence, and
patterns the same way that your ears and brain do.
needed to get going is the Boxie speaker, any audio source with a
standard 3.5mm aux cable, and power.  Boxie was designed to be a desktop
or bookshelf speaker, not a portable speaker, so there are no batteries
or Bluetooth connections to deal with.

For Boxie to become available to the general consumer, funding needs to be raised so that components can be bought in bulk orders to keep costs low (each LED can be acquired for less than a 1/4th of the price if they are all purchased at once for many orders).  The prototype Boxie can be replicated and distributed at just shy of $200, but with crowdfunding, Boxie can be refined and distributed for less than 75% of that.

The construction and assembly of the prototype was all done by hand with 1/2"" MDF, a table-saw, router-table, lots of sanding and sweat.  The heart of Boxie is an ARM Cortex M4 microcontroller coupled to a high quality audio codec.  All of the audio information retrieval was programmed to bring home to you a dance of lights that makes you feel like you are at an expensive production.

Risks & Challenges    With the functional prototype completed, the next stage in bringing Boxie to you is to prepare and combine all the circuitry for custom manufacture.  Instead of being built from off-the-shelf components, Boxie will have tailored internals to keep costs low.  The project designer is a hardware engineer by profession, with a master's degree in electrical and computer engineering and many years of experience designing custom circuit boards and firmware.  The production Boxie will have CNC cut enclosure so that high volumes can be accommodated with ease.

Other Ways You Can Help    Hopefully you've enjoyed the demos, Boxie can be enjoyed by anyone who listens to music, but if you can't contribute to the project, please share the campaign with someone who may be able to.Thank you so very much,     Michael K.    Designer",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Many of our team had been involved with true wireless earbuds in the past, but we were always struck by how impractical they are for real-world use. Despite the name ""true wireless"", in actual fact they are tethered with an invisible wire to their bulky cases. Even the latest AirPods and Galaxy Buds haven't thought outside the ""case"" and are still plagued by the same old issues.

Wearbuds™ are designed to change the game. A revolutionary milestone of true wireless stereo that frees you from inconvenient charging, easy-to-lose buds, monstrous charging cases, and other headaches.

We are immensely proud of the final result and have patented our unique design.

And we didn't let the radical design get in the way of the most important aspect of any earphones: the sound. With Bluetooth® 5, a Qualcomm® audio chipset and graphene-augmented drivers, our tiny Wearbuds™ deliver the kind of sound you would expect from much larger wired headphones.  

We have gone the extra mile in all directions to bring true innovation to a stagnant corner of the tech industry. Wearbuds™ is an entirely new kind of product and significantly raises the bar in wearable audio tech. We see ourselves as trendsetters, and we hope you can join us in growing this exciting new trend.

Most true wireless earbuds have very limited battery life and can't be taken too far from their bulky charging case. No matter how compact the buds are, your pocket is always going to be bulging with the case.

With Wearbuds™, everything you need is right on your wrist, and you can charge your earbuds even while jogging, cycling, or hiking. When you want to listen to music there's no need to dig around in your pocket or backpack, the buds are already at your fingertips.

column1: Wearbuds will be manufactured in the dynamic tech hub of Shenzhen.

We have gone the extra mile in all directions to bring true innovation to a stagnant corner of the tech industry. Wearbuds™ is an entirely new kind of product and significantly raises the bar in wearable audio tech. We see ourselves as trendsetters, and we hope you can join us in growing this exciting new trend.

Support us on Indiegogo and join the revolution.

We will be working with DHL and other reliable couriers to deliver your Wearbuds™ quickly and securely to your door. The courier companies we have chosen provide a high standard of service and they all ship globally. Wearbuds™ will be shipped in order of purchase starting December 2019.

Aipower® was founded to create fresh and original consumer electronics that take the industry to new places. Drawn from industry giants such as Samsung, Huawei, and Alcatel, our team of experts has a broad range of experiences and specialisms. Our designs are practical as well as innovative, and we know what it takes to translate them into ultra-reliable products.

Many of our team had been involved with true wireless earbuds in the past, but we were always struck by how impractical they are for real-world use. Despite the name ""true wireless"", in actual fact they are tethered with an invisible wire to their bulky cases. Even the latest AirPods and Galaxy Buds haven't thought outside the ""case"" and are still plagued by the same old issues.

Wearbuds™ are designed to change the game. As impressive as a wristband that stores and charges wireless earbuds is, we felt that wasn't enough. Therefore, we made the extra effort to create a band that not only acts as a charger and carry case, but is also a fully-functional fitness tracker.

In order to perfect the popping out motion, we built a total of 68 prototypes and experimented with a number of different solutions. We are immensely proud of the final result and have patented our unique design.

And we didn't let the radical design get in the way of the most important aspect of any earphones: the sound. With Bluetooth® 5, a Qualcomm® audio chipset and graphene-augmented drivers, our tiny Wearbuds™ deliver the kind of sound you would expect from much larger wired headphones.

We added a display and a number of sensors to make the fitness band as practical as possible. We spent considerable effort on trying to maximize battery life while keeping the design as compact as possible, and by combining the very latest battery management technology, a power-efficient chipset, we think we have achieved that.
