column3: >The World's First Portable 3D Recording Device for Your iPhone.

column1:
Anyone and everyone can record great sound.

 

With Lolly, anyone and everyone can easily create and share immersive, high-quality experiences. This compact and portable microphone records HD audio to your iPhone using any iOS app and our immersive 3D playback makes listeners feel the sensation of being in the space in which audio was originally recorded.  

 

 

 

 

Perfect for social content &
column2:
band demos.

It's perfect for capturing live shows, band practice, vlogging, podcasting, life events, and more. Best of all? You can use Lolly with Facebook, Garageband, Voice Memos, Instagram, and Snapchat among other iOS apps. 

  

 

  

 

We have specs that compete with top audio brands for a fraction of the price.

Curious how Lolly stacks up? We can promise the same pro-audio quality for a fraction of the price. Check out the specs below to find out more.

 

  

 

LOLLY VS. THE COMPETITION

  

 

  

 

 

 

Reverb is your friend.

Lolly has two easy-to-use, optional reverb effects to make your voice warmer, sweeter, and clearer. Simply press the 'R' button on Lolly to activate. 

 

 

 

Pro audio quality, but easy to use. 

 

Lolly records in 44.1kHz. The response frequency ranges from 20Hz to 20,000kHz. &
column3:
sensitivity is -46dBFS/Pa at 1kHz. It can record in both Mono and Stereo mode to meet all your recording needs. All in all, you don't have to be a pro audio engineer to create pro audio recordings - just plug Lolly in, open your app of choice, and begin recording. It's really that simple. 

 

 

Real Artists Use Lolly
column5:
showinfo=0"">

 

     

   

 

Lolly works seamlessly with GarageBand and other audio/video software and is compatible with their plug-in effects. Implement Delay, Distortion, Reverb, and more when you use Lolly with GarageBand or another iOS audio/video app! 

 

  

 

 

Immerse your listeners in sound. 

The integrated 3D recording system of Lolly gives the listener the sensation of being in the space in which the audio was originally recorded.

 

  

  

 

 

Our Adaptive Recording Orientation Technology dynamically adjusts the sound stage orientation to match the natural listening style of human ears.  

 

  

 

Record your demos &
column6:
performances. 

We designed Lolly to realize high quality audio recording in a simple and portable way. Lolly can help you record your demos, performances, and the exciting moments in your life with professional grade 3D sound.

 

 

Listen the the difference in quality and clarity of the vocals when a band uses Lolly to record instead of the built-in microphone on the iPhone! We recommend using your headphones so you can hear the full effect!
column8:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

 

Lolly connects with your iOS smartphone or tablet using digital interface technology. Compared with microphones that adopt 3.5mm audio jack interface, this achieves anti-noise, better SNR, and better self-excitation control. 

 

 

Because it's literally the size of a lollipop and is incredibly compact, portable, and user friendly.

Lolly is powered by your  iOS device so there's no battery or charging required! 

There's no need for an additional app for parameter settings. Lolly has great compatibility with all the audio/video iOS apps making for seamless integration. 

 

Lolly can be used with any iOS device that has a lightning port. Plug Lolly in, open your app, and you're ready to record!

 

 

Step up your social media game and leave your friends in audio-awe. Lolly is compatible with any audio of video oriented app. Use it with Facebook, Garageband, Voice Memos, Instagram, Snapchat, and more. 

 

 

We wanted to show you just how easy it is to use Lolly with GarageBand! Check out the video below to see step-by-step instructions.

column1:
We are music fans and electrical engineers with a passion for bringing innovative listening experiences to the world. We design and create digital audio products using our team's extensive experience in audio product design and algorithm development. Our products include Tone Shifter, the world's first smart guitar audio interface, and Lolly, the world's first portable 3D recording device for your iPhone. Melo Audio's goal is simple: 

 

To change the way people enjoy music and life. 

 

 

Can I use my iPad or iPod Touch with the Lolly? 

Yes, you can use all iPad, iPod touch and iPhone with lightning interface. Include: iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone SE, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5, iPad Pro, iPad Air2, iPad mini 4, iPad mini 2, iPad Air, iPad mini, iPod touch (5th &
column2:
6th generation).

 

How many colors can I choose?

Lolly has 5 colors: Gold, Pink, Silver, Black and Blue.

 

Does Lolly work for Skype calls?

Yes. If you make Skype calls on your mobile iOS device with Lolly you can enjoy high audio quality.

 

How will I know if Lolly is ready to be used?

Connect Lolly to your mobile phone and open the App you want to use. Lolly gets ready to work when the light turns on.

 

Is Lolly compatible with Android devices?

At this point in time Lolly is only compatible with iOS devices. We hope to have an Android version of Lolly in the future.
 

What is 3D recording?

3D Recording not only records the sound but also the sound stage info. When people hear the recording, the recording gives the listener strong immersive feeling just like the listener being in the space where the sound was recorded.
 

Why is 3D recording better than regular recording?

Lolly’s 3D Recording not only realizes high quality recording but also provides a strong immersive feeling to listener. Additionally, Lolly can record in Mono mode. By using this mode, you can record audio like any other microphone product.

 

What apps does Lolly work with?

Lolly can work with all kinds of Apps which have audio recording and video recording functions. Such as GarageBand, FiLMiC Pro, musical.ly, Skype, Instagram, Facebook, Youtube, Periscope, Snapchat, Google Hangout , VoiceJam, Acapella,The iPhone Voice Memos application, AudioCopy, Hook - Live DJ, Mashup Workstation and so on.



What is Adaptive Recording Orienting technology and why do I need it? 

When you are making 3D recording with Lolly the sound stage info is very sensitive to the angle of your device.

In order to guarantee the sound stage to be horizontal, we developed Adaptive Recording Orienting technology. No matter how you hold your smartphone, vertical or horizontal, Lolly automatically adjusts the sound stage to be horizontal, that’s most nature way for human ears. There are no additional settings or apps needed – Lolly is very easy to use for anyone and everyone.


Does Lolly have built-in audio effects? For example: Reverb, Echo, Delay, etc. 

Yes, Lolly’s has two level optional high-quality reverb effects: room reverberation and hall reverberation. With this built-in algorithm, a natural sound stage enhancement can be added to the recording in real time. It is very easy to use. Just press ‘R’ button of Lolly and select the level.
 

Does Lolly have gain control? 

Yes, Lolly has 8 levels of gain controls that go up to +47.5dB and its default setting is level 6. You can change the levels by ""+"" and ""-"" buttons.

 

Can I use Lolly to record a demo?

Yes, you can use Lolly to record a demo by corresponding apps.
 

Can I use Lolly to record my Podcast? 

Yes, you can use Lolly to record your podcast by corresponding apps.
 

Will Lolly work with Facebook Live? 

Yes, Lolly works with Facebook Live well. 
 

Will Lolly work with Snapchat? 

Yes, Lolly works with Snapchat well.

Will Lolly work with Garage Band? 

Yes, Lolly works with Garage Band well.
 

Will Lolly work with Voice Memos on my Apple device? 

Yes, Lolly works with Voice Memos on your Apple device well.
 

Can Lolly connect with any other audio gear?

No, Lolly can only connect with the phone or pad devices which have Lightning/Type-C interface.

 

Does Lolly need batteries？

No, Lolly is powered by mobile phone.Lolly‘s working current is about 10mA, so the battery consumption of Lolly microphone is very little.

 

What will be included in the packaging for Lolly?

In the box you'll find the Lolly, windshield, carrying case and a set of instructions.

 

What is the Warranty? 

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you'll receive your Lolly microphone free of manufacturing defects. We have 100% AQL inspection levels.

 

How is shipping handled? 

We will ship Lolly via the UPS, DHL and SF Express.


How much is shipping and handling? 

Ships anywhere in the world and the shipping is free for US and China, $7 for Canada, and $10 Rest-of-World.


When will the Lolly ship to backers?

If our project reaches its goal, we will receive the Lolly sometime in May and begin shipping them to the backers.


What happens if I change my address before your ship?

We'll make an announcement 2 weeks before we ship. You'll then be able to update your address on your profile. You can also mail to us in case of emergency: contact@meloaudio.com

","The World's First Portable 3D Recording Device for Your iPhone.

THE COMPETITION        Reverb is your friend.Lolly has two easy-to-use, optional reverb effects to make your voice warmer, sweeter, and clearer. Simply press the 'R' button on Lolly to activate.    Pro audio quality, but easy to use.  Lolly records in 44.1kHz. The response frequency ranges from 20Hz to 20,000kHz. & sensitivity is -46dBFS/Pa at 1kHz. It can record in both Mono and Stereo mode to meet all your recording needs. All in all, you don't have to be a pro audio engineer to create pro audio recordings - just plug Lolly in, open your app of choice, and begin recording. It's really that simple.   Real Artists Use Lolly           Lolly works seamlessly with GarageBand and other audio/video software and is compatible with their plug-in effects. Implement Delay, Distortion, Reverb, and more when you use Lolly with GarageBand or another iOS audio/video app!      Immerse your listeners in sound. The integrated 3D recording system of Lolly gives the listener the sensation of being in the space in which the audio was originally recorded.       Our Adaptive Recording Orientation Technology dynamically adjusts the sound stage orientation to match the natural listening style of human ears.      Record your demos & performances. We designed Lolly to realize high quality audio recording in a simple and portable way. Lolly can help you record your demos, performances, and the exciting moments in your life with professional grade 3D sound.  Listen the the difference in quality and clarity of the vocals when a band uses Lolly to record instead of the built-in microphone on the iPhone! We recommend using your headphones so you can hear the full effect!       Lolly connects with your iOS smartphone or tablet using digital interface technology. Compared with microphones that adopt 3.5mm audio jack interface, this achieves anti-noise, better SNR, and better self-excitation control.   Because it's literally the size of a lollipop and is incredibly compact, portable, and user friendly.Lolly is powered by your  iOS device so there's no battery or charging required! There's no need for an additional app for parameter settings. Lolly has great compatibility with all the audio/video iOS apps making for seamless integration.  Lolly can be used with any iOS device that has a lightning port. Plug Lolly in, open your app, and you're ready to record!  Step up your social media game and leave your friends in audio-awe. Lolly is compatible with any audio of video oriented app. Use it with Facebook, Garageband, Voice Memos, Instagram, Snapchat, and more.   We wanted to show you just how easy it is to use Lolly with GarageBand! Check out the video below to see step-by-step instructions.

We are music fans and electrical engineers with a passion for bringing innovative listening experiences to the world. We design and create digital audio products using our team's extensive experience in audio product design and algorithm development. Our products include Tone Shifter, the world's first smart guitar audio interface, and Lolly, the world's first portable 3D recording device for your iPhone. Melo Audio's goal is simple:  To change the way people enjoy music and life.   Can I use my iPad or iPod Touch with the Lolly? Yes, you can use all iPad, iPod touch and iPhone with lightning interface. Include: iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone SE, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5, iPad Pro, iPad Air2, iPad mini 4, iPad mini 2, iPad Air, iPad mini, iPod touch (5th & 6th generation). How many colors can I choose?Lolly has 5 colors: Gold, Pink, Silver, Black and Blue. Does Lolly work for Skype calls?Yes. If you make Skype calls on your mobile iOS device with Lolly you can enjoy high audio quality. How will I know if Lolly is ready to be used?Connect Lolly to your mobile phone and open the App you want to use. Lolly gets ready to work when the light turns on. Is Lolly compatible with Android devices?At this point in time Lolly is only compatible with iOS devices. We hope to have an Android version of Lolly in the future. What is 3D recording?3D Recording not only records the sound but also the sound stage info. When people hear the recording, the recording gives the listener strong immersive feeling just like the listener being in the space where the sound was recorded. Why is 3D recording better than regular recording?Lolly’s 3D Recording not only realizes high quality recording but also provides a strong immersive feeling to listener. Additionally, Lolly can record in Mono mode. By using this mode, you can record audio like any other microphone product. What apps does Lolly work with?Lolly can work with all kinds of Apps which have audio recording and video recording functions. Such as GarageBand, FiLMiC Pro, musical.ly, Skype, Instagram, Facebook, Youtube, Periscope, Snapchat, Google Hangout , VoiceJam, Acapella,The iPhone Voice Memos application, AudioCopy, Hook - Live DJ, Mashup Workstation and so on.What is Adaptive Recording Orienting technology and why do I need it? When you are making 3D recording with Lolly the sound stage info is very sensitive to the angle of your device.In order to guarantee the sound stage to be horizontal, we developed Adaptive Recording Orienting technology. No matter how you hold your smartphone, vertical or horizontal, Lolly automatically adjusts the sound stage to be horizontal, that’s most nature way for human ears. There are no additional settings or apps needed – Lolly is very easy to use for anyone and everyone.Does Lolly have built-in audio effects? For example: Reverb, Echo, Delay, etc. Yes, Lolly’s has two level optional high-quality reverb effects: room reverberation and hall reverberation. With this built-in algorithm, a natural sound stage enhancement can be added to the recording in real time. It is very easy to use. Just press ‘R’ button of Lolly and select the level. Does Lolly have gain control? Yes, Lolly has 8 levels of gain controls that go up to +47.5dB and its default setting is level 6. You can change the levels by ""+"" and ""-"" buttons. Can I use Lolly to record a demo?Yes, you can use Lolly to record a demo by corresponding apps. Can I use Lolly to record my Podcast? Yes, you can use Lolly to record your podcast by corresponding apps. Will Lolly work with Facebook Live? Yes, Lolly works with Facebook Live well.  Will Lolly work with Snapchat? Yes, Lolly works with Snapchat well.Will Lolly work with Garage Band? Yes, Lolly works with Garage Band well. Will Lolly work with Voice Memos on my Apple device? Yes, Lolly works with Voice Memos on your Apple device well. Can Lolly connect with any other audio gear?No, Lolly can only connect with the phone or pad devices which have Lightning/Type-C interface. Does Lolly need batteries？No, Lolly is powered by mobile phone.Lolly‘s working current is about 10mA, so the battery consumption of Lolly microphone is very little. What will be included in the packaging for Lolly?In the box you'll find the Lolly, windshield, carrying case and a set of instructions. What is the Warranty? We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. We guarantee you'll receive your Lolly microphone free of manufacturing defects. We have 100% AQL inspection levels. How is shipping handled? We will ship Lolly via the UPS, DHL and SF Express.How much is shipping and handling? Ships anywhere in the world and the shipping is free for US and China, $7 for Canada, and $10 Rest-of-World.When will the Lolly ship to backers?If our project reaches its goal, we will receive the Lolly sometime in May and begin shipping them to the backers.What happens if I change my address before your ship?We'll make an announcement 2 weeks before we ship. You'll then be able to update your address on your profile. You can also mail to us in case of emergency: contact@meloaudio.com",39.0,3,"1 Campaign
Our vision was to develop a headphone that was not only outstanding in sound and fashion, but to create a headphone that would allow consumers to enjoy music and convenience in more comfortable ways.
We wanted to develop a headphone that would separate our company from the many other companies in the market today. To do so, we had to think outside of the box.
STADIUM EDITION HD WIRELESS HEADPHONES - Features like NO other headphones on the market:

Stadium HD  Wireless Edition headphones are designed to take you on the ultimate musical experience. With brilliant state of the art technology, these headphones are on the cutting-edge of excellence in industry standard. These features are only found in Stadium headphones. They are truly one of a kind headphones and a must have for any musical consumer, from the fan to the professional.

1. Advanced Noise Reduction: Stadium Headphones, exclusively from Stadium Audio Group has heightened advancements in full-spectrum noise reduction technology, making them our quietest yet. Microphones inside each ear cup sense the sounds around you, and then reduce the noise. Our proprietary ear cushion technology creates a acoustical seal to block some of the noise before it even reaches your ears.

2. Premium Sound Quality: With the Stadium HD Wireless Edition Headphones, you are able to hear an intensely rich, dynamic sound stage in a wide range of frequencies within your music. They feature proprietary signal processing and the headphone structure for more lifelike sound. These headphones deliver crisp, pure audio integrity for crystal clear highs, booming signature bass and sonically true mids. The first time you wear them, you may be surprised to hear nuances in your favorite songs that you missed before. So plug in and let your music shine.
We took our time providing you the BEST SOUND POSSIBLE

3. Fit for All Occasions: Stadium HD Wireless Edition headphones offer a long-lasting and luxuriously comfortable fit to your ears. The ear-cup is made from a plush material that easily rests on your ears without causing discomfort. They’re conveniently designed for all occasions including stationary projects or travel. The light weight, comfortable fit and easy folding feature make them a perfect musical companion.

1. Wireless: A great advantage in the Stadium HD Wireless Edition headphones is that they are able to function completely wireless. This means that no matter where you are or where you go, they are compatible and useful for all of your music needs. However, for those who wish to use a wire with their headphones, the Stadium Headphones package automatically comes with an optional wire that fits the set.
2. Memory Card: This amazing Mp3 download feature allows you to store a lifetime of music right into the built in micro SD memory card of your headphones.
Store all the music you'll ever need on your Micro SD Card

3. Remote Control: Within the Stadium HD Wireless Edition headphones is a compartment accessible by button that holds an eject-able remote control for the headphones. With the push of a button, your remote will drop down and you will have the ability to control everything on your headphones including song selection, volume, and more. The remote control contains wireless technology making signal searching easy and making it effortless to connect your remote control.
4. Blue Tooth Compatible: To cater to today’s digital convenience
column2: Stadium Headphones are able to be used with any Bluetooth Device or system including video game consoles, phones, or electronic devices that are Bluetooth ready.

column1: Remote Control
5. Built-In Microphone: The built-in microphone feature allows you to talk hands free from your headphone set while connected with the Bluetooth device.

6. Custom Charger and Battery: Our Lithium Ion battery is rechargeable so there’s no need for any third party battery company. This saves time and money and makes using our headphones more convenient.

7. Durability: The ultra-rugged durability of Stadium Headphones is unmatched. The folding feature and durable materials that they are made with allow you to bend, twist, and even drop the headphones without breaking them.

8. Pro Image and Color Option: Along with the vibrant sound integrity of Stadium Headphones, we created them with a professional look in the industrial colors of black, white, and a black and white combo. We have 10 show-stopping colors we plan on manufacturing the headphones in to offer a range to our consumers. With the help of the KickStarter funding, we’ll be able to produce the Stadium brand in a multi-faceted stylish and fun way that everyone will enjoy. Also on the horizon is our Arena Edition Headphones which will offer a sleeker look with sexy lines and stylish colors, designed with our more feminine market in mind.

9. Cost and Price: Stadium Headphones differs in a greatly unique way in the cost and price of our headphones. Our integrity and care for customers has lead us to put twice the amount of cost quality into manufacturing our headphones and yet keep the price of our headphones at a more reasonable price than you see in other headphone companies.
Stadium Audio Group wants to show you our very first prototype and how far along we have come. Below is a picture of our first prototype in 2010 next to our current kick starter prototype 2013.
2010 prototype vs 2013 prototype

Stadium Headphones is making tremendous progress, we have already began manufacturing but can not finish  without your help. We hope with your support you can make our dream a reality. Thank you for your support Kick Starter !
What will the funds be used for ?
Stadium Audio Group will be using the contribution from backers for manufacturing. Here is a basic list of the manufacturing process that your funds will help us achieve.

Stadium Audio Group is proud to be implementing the idea of launching various Artist Edition headphones in honor of performing artists. We believe that branding artists with their own personal named headphone will be of great benefit to the company and the artist. We have sparked a lot of interest with performing artist and are proud to be offering a artist edition headphone soon. Visit our website for updated information. Check us out on our company facebook page

Unlike other headphone companies who lack emotion, Stadium Audio Group has created a product with heart and respect for artistry as well as a unique technology. This ultimately captures the essence of how each song is heard on Stadium HD headphones.

STADIUM HEADPHONES - ""Experiencing Sound Like Never Before""

column2: >Can your headphones handle your workout? Are you tired of having to choose between HiFi music and your active lifestyle? The solution is here! LIFE Headphones combine an innovative, patented shape and top of the line audio components to give you the ultimate listening experience whether you are on a run, lifting weights, or doing parkour in the rain.
>- Mikhail, reviewer and blogger, theHeadphoneList.com
column3:
>

LIFE headphones are an ideal workout companion because they feature:

column1: • Audiophile fidelity sound from dual armature drivers
• Patented shape providing an innovatively comfortable and secure fit
• Optional: 3.0 bluetooth connectivity with five button control and sport clip
• Optional: in-line microphone with one button control

We want LIFE to do more than just enhance your relationship with music, so we paired our headphones with a purpose: to change the lives of deaf children living in poverty by giving them solar powered hearing aids. This campaign will help us launch our first product, the LIFE headphone, graduating our company from a startup to a full fledged social business! Read more below.
So far! More to come. Links to articles and reviews.

column31: mc_eid=0385569dd7#.VZQ3y3qUzGc"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">-David Freeburg, avid runner and blogger for MinneapolisRunning.com
column36:
mc_eid=0385569dd7#.VZQ3y3qUzGc"" rel=""noopener nofollow""> 

Using a patented design shaped like the crevices in your ear, LIFE anchors itself comfortably for long term active use. Four parts of your ear are harnessed to varying degrees, based on the size and shape of your ear, to hold LIFE in place:
column42:
s=34414d5e3de9bde785c0dec7f8b52557"" src="""" style=""""/>


1 - The Top of your ear holds the custom shaped cord end and directs cord tension so that the earpiece is pulled forwards rather than out.

2 - The Helix hooks around the tail of the earpiece and keeps it from twisting

3 - The Crevice hugs the body of the earpiece and holds it close to your head

4 - The Canal holds the ear bud firmly

The LIFE headphone replaces the need for a custom earpiece and fits so securely and comfortably that it is perfect for use in all activities, including running, dancing, or lifting weights.
column49: >
column55: >-Dave Ford, audiophile and LIFE beta tester
column56:
>

LIFE headphones do what other headphones don't:

Most headphones aren't capable of producing your music's nuances. 

LIFE's sound technology is normally reserved for the in-ear monitors professional musicians wear on stage. We believe everyone with ears to hear should listen to their music at its best. So, each of our earpieces contains two balanced armature drivers, one dedicated and tuned as a tweeter and one as a woofer. The drivers are fed your music through a device called a crossover that separates the high and low sounds in your music allowing the earphone to produce both spectrums of sound to you in perfect cohesion.
column58: >Most headphones are tuned to highlight the bass or to sound flat.
column63:
> 

What if your music could come alive? 

LIFE headphones are precision tuned to present your music dynamically, highlighting the parts of music your ears crave the most. With a slightly U-shaped tuning, LIFE places a slight emphasis on the bass and treble. The result is a warm, lively sound that energizes your music. With a slight de-emphasis on the mid range, LIFE can be listened to for extended periods of time (like running a marathon) without the listener fatigue you would experience from other headphones.

Most headphones don't create a realistic soundstage.

 LIFE's sensitive audio technology, curved construction, and sound isolation combine to create a listening experience that transports you into an authentic sonic environment, giving extra dimension to your music.
column64: >
column70: >-Keanex, headphone reviewer and blogger, Reddit and Headfi.com

column1: As a social business, LIFE Acoustics is on a mission to help the 100,000+ deaf children living in poverty. Without hearing aids, many of these children can't hear well enough to go to school, much less enjoy the simple pleasures of music. By partnering with organizations like Ayúdame a Escuchar (Help Me Hear), we want to give hearing to as many deaf children living in poverty as we can.

Through our relationship with Help Me Hear, we have learned that many charitable organizations who donate hearing aids ignore the fact that the recipients of those hearing aids often cannot afford to buy the batteries needed to continue to power them.

Our solution to this problem lies in harnessing the sun to charge the batteries hearing aids run on. We can give children a long term, environmentally sustainable solution to their hearing impairment by sourcing solar chargers from an award winning social business called Solar Ears and donating them along with hearing aids to deaf children living in poverty.
To learn more about our social mission, visit our website.

column8:
>

column1: • Sweat and Weather Resistant: LIFE thrives no matter your lifestyle
• Ultra Durable, Replaceable Cord: in case your dog gets hungry
The LIFE Headphones package comes with:
• Premium molded silicone tips: S, M, and L
• Welcome packet with instructions and warranty info

>Five buttons control music and phone calls

As a social business, LIFE Acoustics is on a mission to help the 100,000+ deaf children living in poverty. Without hearing aids, many of these children can't hear well enough to go to school, much less enjoy the simple pleasures of music. By partnering with organizations like Ayúdame a Escuchar (Help Me Hear), we want to give hearing to as many deaf children living in poverty as we can.

Through our relationship with Help Me Hear, we have learned that many charitable organizations who donate hearing aids ignore the fact that the recipients of those hearing aids often cannot afford to buy the batteries needed to continue to power them.

Our solution to this problem lies in harnessing the sun to charge the batteries hearing aids run on. We can give children a long term, environmentally sustainable solution to their hearing impairment by sourcing solar chargers from an award winning social business called Solar Ears and donating them along with hearing aids to deaf children living in poverty.
To learn more about our social mission, visit our website.
20+ dB Sound Isolation: LIFE protects the sensitivity of your ears
Sweat and Weather Resistant: LIFE thrives no matter your lifestyle
Ultra Durable, Replaceable Cord: in case your dog gets hungry
Final product will ship with LIFE engraved on the hook. The LIFE Headphones package comes with:
Premium molded silicone tips: S, M, and L
Welcome packet with instructions and warranty info
Optional: 3.0 bluetooth connectivity with five button control and sport clip
Optional: in-line microphone with one button control

By adding the LIFE bluetooth module to LIFE Headphones, you can enjoy high fidelity music wirelessly while you run or exercise. LIFE Bluetooth connects to your phone through a Bluetooth 3.0 signal capable of transferring up to 24Mb/s. LIFE Bluetooth also features:
Five buttons control music and phone calls
Battery life: 8 hours of music play

Because we are a social business, Indiegogo is a perfect tool for launching our first product. Crowdfunding allows us to stay focused on our mission (without having to answer to outside investors) and at the same time promote awareness and gain supporters for our cause.
We currently have a fully tuned and beautiful product that we would love to ship out to you and the ability to produce it on a small scale.
The funds raised by our project will help us to set up a production line capable of greater quantities so that we can begin selling LIFE Headphones through retailers.

We want LIFE Headphones to be the last headphones you ever buy. Every pair of our headphones includes a LIFEtime warranty that covers any manufacturing defects and most accidental breakages. For more information, click here.
Your rewards will arrive before Christmas!",17.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>

Listening to music should always be a fun, engaging and magical experience. Our aim is to provide you with the best possible sound quality on an affordable and portable device. 

The amazing clarity and nuanced sound of hi-end audio equipment captures music as it was meant to be heard, at its fullest potential, but this level of sound quality is not available on current portable music players. 

We think that this kind of musical experience should be accessible and affordable to everyone. We believe that with your support Uamp could change the way we listen to and appreciate music, and allow all music lovers to enjoy a higher standard of audio quality.

column1:
Uamp is a link between your music player and your headphones. It’s a tiny amplifier which can produce the kind of premium quality audio that you expect from hi-end audio equipment used by audiophiles and sound producers. 

An amplifier magnifies an audio signal which is then emitted by a loudspeaker, or in this case, your headphones. An amplifier can be built into a device, such as an iPhone, or it can be an external unit. If you’re using a weak amplifier, as you turn the volume up the sound will become more distorted, but a good quality amplifier can produce clean, beautiful sound at the same high volume. 

This is the high-fidelity sound that Uamp provides.
column2:
>

PROBLEM: Sound quality has actually trended down, taking a back seat to convenience.

column1:
Our smartphones and other portable music devices are great at storing thousands of songs, but great quality audio has been abandoned in favor of cheap, inferior output. 

Unfortunately, the manufacturers of portable music players are restricted by size and cost limitations, so built-in amps in portable devices are usually the smallest and cheapest units available, whilst still meeting minimum requirements. 

However, if you've listened to music through hi-fi audio equipment, you’ll know that it is clearer, louder, richer-sounding music with a superior bass – a rewarding auditory experience which is unfortunately expensive, too large to be portable, and not readily available to the average music listener.
column2:
>

That’s where Uamp comes in. We wanted to capture that premium sound you get from hi-end audio equipment and make it available on every device, without the complications, terrible interfaces, or exorbitant costs. Uamp provides the same hi-fi sound for a fraction of the price and size of standard amplifiers. 

The Uamp unit measures 43 x 43 x 9mm and weighs just 26 grams – we’ve crammed all the electronics of a hi-end amp into one tiny device. Its nano design means it can easily fit into the smallest of pockets, allowing you to carry it with you anywhere – walking, jogging and cycling, or travelling on the bus, train and plane. Combined with its ten hour battery life, Uamp is truly a portable device.
column3:
>

Simply plug it into your iPod, iPad, iPhone, Android device, laptop, or any device with a 3.5mm headphone output and experience turbocharged sound!
column5: >
column6:
>

Uamp is for everyone. It works with all headphones on the market. If you use expensive headphones, you’ll know that they need a more powerful amp to work well. The headphone output in mobiles simply doesn’t have enough clout, making it hard to hear your music in crowded places, like when you’re travelling on the bus. 

Luckily, Uamp has five times more power than the amp in an iPhone, enabling you to get the most out of those costly headphones. But what if, like me, you use those standard white ear buds that come with your iPhone? You’ll be glad to know that Uamp improves sound quality on cheaper headphones as well – Uamp delivers a louder bass sound and less distortion.
column7:
>

We made UAMP really easy to use:

1. Plug your headphones into Uamp. 
2. Plug Uamp into your music player.
3. Enjoy great quality sound!
column8: >
column9:
>

How to operate the EQ settings

Uamp is designed with EQ in order for you to customise your audio and find the sound that suits you best. EQ, or equalizer, allows you to adjust the levels of frequency bands such as bass and treble in your audio.

column1: Custom EQ = PURPLE (Yes, you can set your own EQ!)
*Streaming EQ is designed to specifically to enhance the sound of music streaming services like Pandora, Spotify, Youtube, iTunes Radio, iHearts Radio and many more.
• Log into your Indiegogo account, or create one in minutes.
• Hover over the reward you want and click select this perk""
• Enter your pledge amount and desired reward.
• Submit your payment information and you're done.

column5:
>

Design:

Many hours of work has gone into designing Uamp, our main focus was always on sound quality and user experience.
column6: >
column7:
> 

If you have any questions or feedback we would love to hear it, contact us at hello@uamp.co

 

","Listening to music should always be a fun, engaging and magical experience. Our aim is to provide you with the best possible sound quality on an affordable and portable device. The amazing clarity and nuanced sound of hi-end audio equipment captures music as it was meant to be heard, at its fullest potential, but this level of sound quality is not available on current portable music players. We think that this kind of musical experience should be accessible and affordable to everyone. We believe that with your support Uamp could change the way we listen to and appreciate music, and allow all music lovers to enjoy a higher standard of audio quality.

column1: Uamp is a link between your music player and your headphones. It’s a tiny amplifier which can produce the kind of premium quality audio that you expect from hi-end audio equipment used by audiophiles and sound producers. An amplifier magnifies an audio signal which is then emitted by a loudspeaker, or in this case, your headphones. An amplifier can be built into a device, such as an iPhone, or it can be an external unit. If you’re using a weak amplifier, as you turn the volume up the sound will become more distorted, but a good quality amplifier can produce clean, beautiful sound at the same high volume. This is the high-fidelity sound that Uamp provides.Use Uamp on the go or on your deskPROBLEM: Sound quality has actually trended down, taking a back seat to convenience.

https://soundcloud.com/jack_lax

I'll never forget the first song I wrote. It had no chords, no real chorus, and honestly the lyrics were just ok, but from the first word to the very last note of the song it created a feeling I had never felt before. Before then, I had started writing poetry as a way to deal with my hardships
column2:
I was starting to get more into music and I was looking for artists like me. Artists that had grown up in a broken home, artists who were able to rise from it and openly speak about their pasts. In the dark hours of the night, those were the people who got me through it. Now, I want to be that artist for someone else. I have written 5 tracks that I feel combine strong melodies, interesting chord progressions, potent lyrics, and most importantly have a message of empowerment but I need your help to make them sound as great as possible.

 

I am currently a student at the University of Miami's Frost School of Music with a major in Musicianship, Artistry Development, and Entrepreneurship and a minor in both Music Business and Creative American Music (fancy name for songwriting).  While I do work part-time at school, it's not enough to cover all the finances that go into creating an EP. In order to pay the musicians, the producer, the sound engineer, and the cover art artist, I need all the help I can get. 

 

By donating to this project, you are not only supporting independent artists but students as well. I met Andrew Novoa (the producer) during my Freshman year of college (we're both now Juniors) and we have been working together ever since. He was one of the first people who not only supported my sound, but understood everything I was trying to convey in my music. 

 

Every aspect of this EP from the production to the instrumentation to the cover art will be created by students. The entire team I have for the album are students at the Frost School of Music: Chris Schrek (drums, Creative American Music program), Koa Ho (bass, Jazz program), Dalton Yoder (guitar, Jazz program), Alice Kim (cover art, Creative American Music program), and Sam Feinstein (mixing, Creative American Music program). 

 

We want to inspire those who feel alone, like no one understands, like there's no way out.  We want to show them that there is, and it's ok to not feel ok. Music will always be a friend, a safe place and a way out of the darkness.  

 

Art is a form of expression.  Music is art in all of its forms.  Please help us bring this message to life and support our project.  Any donation helps.

 

Please note, you will receive perks with your donation. If you want to donate an amount not listed, click the ""back it"" button and enter your donation amount and then shoot me an email at jacklaxmusic@gmail.com and I will provide you with the perks that reflect that donation. Thank you so much for being part of this process.

column1:
0,"

If music is an important part of your life you deserve to hear the real thing.

amplify is a powerhouse of a Hi-Fi Bluetooth headphone amplifier combined with an audiophile grade DAC that allows you to stream Hi-Res audio wirelessly from any smart mobile device to your existing favorite wired headphones.
column13:
>

amplify employs the most advanced and latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology along with AAC, LDAC, Qualcomm aptX Classic, aptX HD and aptX LOW LATENCY audio codecs to stream pure stereo wireless audio, delivering full-range dynamic sound with crystal clarity, from your mobile devices to your wired headphones.  

A unique antenna design and Bluetooth 5.0 technology synergize to offer incredible wireless connectivity and stability within a 10m range.
column18:
>

Amplify features Sony’s Hi-Res wireless audio coding technology LDAC™, that provides an enhanced wireless listening experience for all your music via Bluetooth. LDAC maintains maximum bit depth and a frequency range of 96kHz/24-bit during transmission and is capable of high compression efficiency and reproduction.

Unlike any other Bluetooth® compatible encoding technology, LDAC allows you to listen to high-resolution audio content in exceptional sound quality, transmitting at a maximum transfer rate of 990 kbps. This is approximately two times the data available with Qualcomm® aptX™ HD and three times the data available with Bluetooth® compatible audio technology (SBC).

LDAC supports different transmission frequencies, depending on the wireless environment, providing the optimized listening experience that music lovers seek and which artists want to produce. It is literally the best wireless sound you can get for your lossless high-resolution audio library and comes close to matching the capability of Tidal Hi-Fi MQA.

With Android Oreo 8.0, Sony's LDAC codec has been integrated into the Bluetooth stack and users can pick their preferred Bluetooth codec.
column19:
>

amplify uses the high-quality Qualcomm aptX HD technology, which is the high definition version of the original aptX classic audio codec.
column20:
>

aptX HD is an enhanced audio codec that allows you to receive 48KHz/24bit audio via Bluetooth and has been engineered to improve the signal-to-noise ratio, resulting in lower background noise. This improved technology helps listeners to hear even the smallest details in their music and is designed to provide realistic audio quality that is hard to distinguish from the actual live sound.
column21:
>

Featuring support for transmitting 24-bit audio over Bluetooth with aptX HD along with external Hi-Fi DAC with an amplifier that reproduces high-quality sound up to 384KHz/32bit, amplify has the capability of delivering high-res sound that is much closer to analog sound even through Bluetooth.
column24:
>

Designed to reproduce high-fidelity audio, amplify is equipped with the advanced 384KHz/32bit AKM AK4376 Digital-Analogue Converter (DAC) with an integrated headphone amplifier. With an impressively high 125dB signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and low distortion, amplify delivers sound quality generally heard only in more expensive DAC's.
column27:
>

The integrated high-performance headphone amplifier is designed for driving the most demanding of headphones and will satisfy even the most demanding headphone enthusiast with its high output and revealing sound.
column28:
>

amplify is designed with a “driving” concept that focuses on boosting weak signals, so it doesn’t get caught out when powering high-impedance headphones.
column32:
>

Designed for a seamless experience to complement the technology you use every day. 

amplify supports voice calls and features a built-in microphone that enables you to receive calls when using your normal wired headphones without a microphone.
column37:
>

Equipped with a 300mAh rechargeable lithium polymer battery, amplify will give you up to 12 hours of playtime so you can enjoy your music on the go for longer.   

With a micro USB charging cable, amplify can easily be connected to a power source and recharged in 3 hours – well in time for its next adventure.
column40:
>

Sync two amplify’s together and share your favorite song with your bestie. Enjoy the same music in hi-res audio with separate headphones/earphones.
column41:
>

amplify is the perfect way to get great-sounding wireless audio not only from your smartphone to headphones but also from your smartphone to any audio system.
column45:
> 

Encased in premium anodized aluminum housing, the compact and lightweight amplify is designed for optimum portability, comfort and durability.
column57: >
column58: >
column59: >
column62:
>

At Auris, our philosophy is about empowering our innovative creative streak to enhance user experience. 

Team Auris wouldn’t be here today if it weren’t for backers like you who not only kick-started our first product but have continued to support us through the years.
column63: >
column64: >
column65: >
column66:
>

We are a team of friends, designers, engineers, audio geeks, and operations experts bound together with one sole purpose in mind: creating audio solutions that simplify and enhance modern lifestyle.
column68: >
column69: >
column70: >
column71:
>

Our team at Auris has extensive experience in design, electronics, manufacturing and supply chain. Amplify is our fifth product after successfully developing and producing several products in the past.

With a working prototype developed and testing completed successfully, we feel prepared to enter the mass production stage and are confident of keeping to our shipping schedule.

We promise to keep our Indiegogo backers updated on all our progress. Please note that International backers will be responsible for paying any duties or taxes levied in their home country.

Thank you for your support!

showinfo=0"">

 

Shipping

All Shipping will be done using DHL E-Commerce. Through DHL E-Commerce, DHL is responsible for delivering the package to the destination country. From that point, the package is handed over to the local post for delivery.

Express Shipping

Some international backers may want to utilize the DHL Express option that will be available through Backerkit as an add on after the campaign for expedited delivery by DHL directly.

Shipping Exclusions

We are proud to have i10 fans in over 90 countries. We will ship Power Series Headphones worldwide with the exception of Argentina, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Chile and Yemen. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which in the past have ranged from 0% to 20% in the US and EU countries, to as much as 200% for certain South American countries.

Returned Packages

Returned packages due to invalid or changed address and/or unpaid duties and taxes can be reshipped but will require a reshipping fee.

It is the Backer’s sole responsibility to provide accurate and up to date address for shipping.

Customs Declarations

All pledges will be declared as merchandise and NOT a gift. To better ensure that all custom clearances transpire without complications will not be honoring request to change this declaration.

Tracking

You will be provided with a tracking number upon shipment, however, for some countries tracking updates are only supported up to the point of arrival in destination country.

Finally, a wireless sports headphone from a company that knows and appreciates audio.
We are music lovers and we know that music plays a critical role when you exercise. Listening to a good song helps you maintain focus and work out harder.

Upgrade your fitness experience with the ultra-lightweight Relays Sport Wireless and make your workouts work for you.

Don’t compromise. Train Hard. Feel the energy.
We were able to create a near weightless product and still deliver best in-class, 8+ hour battery life by placing the electronics and battery in ergonomic pods that sit naturally on the neck.
Our patented FreeFlex technology delivers an ultra-secure and comfortable fit so you can enjoy uninterrupted workouts during even the most intense training
Don’t worry about sweat impacting your workout. Relays Sport Wireless is IPX4 rated, built to last and won’t break down in wet environments.
Plug in Relays Sport Wireless for a quick charge while you put on your workout clothes and pack your gym bag. A 10 minute charge is all you need to power 60-minutes of exercise.
Bass from your music gives you energy to work out harder. Seamlessly switch from indoor to outdoor mode so that you can still hear the bass that gets lost in the noise outdoors.

SOL REPUBLIC and Michael Phelps share a common philosophy that for every great moment there is a song that goes with it. We have been working with Michael since the very early days of SOL and are very excited to announce that together we have created an awesome reward to add to our Indiegogo campaign. 100% of the proceeds of this reward will go to support The Michael Phelps Foundation and the reward includes one Relays Sport Wireless Headphone PLUS a Tracks Anthem headphone, signed by Michael Phelps. We are making a limited number of our Michael Phelps Foundation Reward available to the first 25 incredible supporters.

The Michael Phelps Foundation, a charitable, tax-exempt organization under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code, is focused on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthy and active lives, especially for children. Since being founded in 2008, the Foundation has provided learn to swim, healthy eating and goal setting curriculum to over 15,000 children around the world by partnering with the Special Olympics and Boys &
·  68% of participants never enrolled in a swim class prior to im safe. Two of the primary reasons were fear (child and/or parental) and lack of funding

column2: Girls Clubs (currently active in 33 clubs) in 29 states and one naval installation in Naples, Italy

column1: ·  Over 160 Special Olympic Teams in 35 countries on six continents
We are Music Lovers, committed to changing the world... one listener at a time.
We are Saviors of Sound, ready to rid the world of hollow sounding headphones and speakers.
We believe music has the Power to touch you, move you and inspire you.
We believe a Good Song can help you be happier, run faster, think clearer, and love better.
We believe for every great moment, there is a song that goes with it, we believe this is your Soundtrack Of Life.
We believe musicians are modern day storytellers. Their songs unite a nation, ignite a revolution and move mankind. Their Songs Deserve Respect. Their music deserves great sound.
We believe you don't just hear music... you feel it, and that if it sounds better, it feels better.

We are committed to incredible Music Experiences for Everyone.

*Steve Aoki Reward:
column5: >Must book 30-days in advance. Select any date during Steve Aoki’s residency at MGM. Flights from anywhere in continental US.

Low-profile Design              Mic and Music Controls

SOL REPUBLIC and Michael Phelps share a common philosophy that for every great moment there is a song that goes with it. We have been working with Michael since the very early days of SOL and are very excited to announce that together we have created an awesome reward to add to our Indiegogo campaign. 100% of the proceeds of this reward will go to support The Michael Phelps Foundation and the reward includes one Relays Sport Wireless Headphone PLUS a Tracks Anthem headphone, signed by Michael Phelps. We are making a limited number of our Michael Phelps Foundation Reward available to the first 25 incredible supporters.

The Michael Phelps Foundation, a charitable, tax-exempt organization under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code, is focused on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthy and active lives, especially for children. Since being founded in 2008, the Foundation has provided learn to swim, healthy eating and goal setting curriculum to over 15,000 children around the world by partnering with the Special Olympics and Boys & Girls Club of America.
·  68% of participants never enrolled in a swim class prior to im safe. Two of the primary reasons were fear (child and/or parental) and lack of funding
·  37 Boys & Girls Clubs (currently active in 33 clubs) in 29 states and one naval installation in Naples, Italy
·  Over 160 Special Olympic Teams in 35 countries on six continents
We are Music Lovers, committed to changing the world... one listener at a time.
We are Saviors of Sound, ready to rid the world of hollow sounding headphones and speakers.
We believe music has the Power to touch you, move you and inspire you.
We believe a Good Song can help you be happier, run faster, think clearer, and love better.
We believe for every great moment, there is a song that goes with it, we believe this is your Soundtrack Of Life.
We believe musicians are modern day storytellers. Their songs unite a nation, ignite a revolution and move mankind. Their Songs Deserve Respect. Their music deserves great sound.
We believe you don't just hear music... you feel it, and that if it sounds better, it feels better.

We are committed to incredible Music Experiences for Everyone.*Steve Aoki Reward: Must book 30-days in advance. Select any date during Steve Aoki’s residency at MGM. Flights from anywhere in continental US.

column1: TY TINDELL (right) lives in Austin Texas and has been passionate about music his entire life. He excelled in violin and piano lessons as a young child,  enjoyed tinkering with car audio systems in high school, and has been to countless concerts and music festivals. After earning a dual major in Chinese and International Business with a minor in Supply Chain Management from the University of Texas at Austin, Ty was prepared to start a career sourcing and manufacturing consumer products. He spent the last decade making multiple trips each year between the US and Asia, developing his Chinese language and sales skills that are helping bring Bassmaker Stereo to life. Then he met Stew.

STEWART ORR (left) is from Toronto but has been roaming China’s ""two shores, three places"" since 2012. After finishing his MBA in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, Stew moved to Dongguan, China to work at a roller coaster factory: preparing for Disney’s new Shanghai theme park. With the same company he then moved to Hong Kong, where the quick-paced lifestyle and its thirst for portable party accessories inevitably gave birth to Bassmaker Stereo. That’s where he met co-founder Ty. On his final relocation to Suzhou, China, Stew partnered with another trusted friend to bring Bassmaker to production, and now, Indiegogo. He currently lives at the airport.

","BASSMAKER STEREO™ is engineered to get the job done. Boasting hard-hitting bass and long-range projection, this briefcase inspired Bluetooth stereo is built FOR BUSINESS.... BUT LET's face it, MOSTLY PLEASURE.  BASSMAKER STEREO™ is a portable Bluetooth SOUND SYSTEM with  a BOOMING amplifier, 6.5"" Stereo Speakers, a SECOND audio channel for plugins (¼” Jack), and a mega-battery that holds a charge for up to 16 hours of playtime.Sound good? We know.

Sure, you can play your favorite music over the primary Bluetooth channel, but what if you want to JOIN IN? The second 1/4"" Jack allows things like microphones, guitars, and other instruments to play along the Bluetooth channel. Your party just got way more interesting. The reinforced wooden chest (you can stand on it), with a thoroughly insulated interior gives the stereo a clear, crisp, and resonant sound
column2: not to mention a sheen of consummate professionalism that'll give any song a big boost.Most importantly, your Bluetooth stereo shouldn't be about the pleasures of conformity or the importance of trends.  It should say something about you.  PATENT PENDING(1) Flick it on:  [Red = Searching](2) Look for ""BASSMAKER"" signal on your device.(3) Select & Pair [Blue = Paired](4) You're in. Party On.(5) Bluetooth is paired, but need more? Add a vocal track or guitar solo using the second amplifier channel. (Instruments connect easily, like any amplifier).

column1: (6) Sometimes you'll need some juice. Plug Bassmaker in for 8 hours for a full charge. The light on your charger will change from Red to Green when finished.

column2:
>""Most headphones are made with whats known as a 'flat frequency response'. We've re-written the rule book with PUMP MIX Wireless to create a sound that makes you smile...""
- Adam Blair, Founder, PUMP Audio

column1: In 2014 we came in to existence thanks to the power of Crowdfunding with ""PUMP In-Ear"".
They sounded like no other headphones on the planet, and were especially appreciated by people who love Electronic and Dance music, due to their incredible Bass Response.
Since then, we’ve gone from strength to strength, having received hundreds of official 5 star reviews, and thousands of unofficial ones from users in 59 countries around the world.
MIX Wireless is our latest in ear headphone design.
It gives you the revolutionary PUMP Audio sound signature, in Wireless Bluetooth.
Unlike many new headphone innovations that appear on crowdfunding sites, which often focus on a gimmic or new technological idea, PUMP Audio headphones are all about one thing:
At PUMP Audio, we truly believe that sound is by far the most important element in any set of headphones. So much so that it's our official company slogan.
After sound comes comfort, usability and style in that order, with manufacturing quality a given.
The sub-bass reproduction and unique sound signature of MIX Wireless is something that we’ve developed from the ground up over the course of over two years, and it’s something we’re very proud of.
The obvious difference between PUMP Audio headphones and other brands is the quality and depth of the bass and sub-bass reproduction.
There have been some other brands who have tried this approach, including a very famous one you are no doubt familiar with beginning with a ""b""...
However, the other big difference between PUMP Audio and those other brands is what we've done with the rest of the frequency range.
We haven't simply sacrificed the rest of the range so that all you hear is heavy bass.
Instead we've painstakingly created a totally unique sound signature that gives you immense bass, but with balance, clarity, and high fidelity Audiophile quality sound through the entire range.

PUMP Audio vs Beats:
74% preferred PUMP / 26% preferred Beats.
Models tested: PUMP IEM V1 vs Beats Tour

PUMP Audio vs BOSE:
89% preferred PUMP / 11% preferred BOSE.
Models tested: PUMP Zeus vs BOSE QC15 and BOSE QC25

PUMP Audio vs Sennheiser:
85% preferred PUMP / 15% preferred Sennheiser.
Models tested: PUMP Pure vs Sennheiser Momentum On-Ear

PUMP Audio vs SoundMAGIC:
95% preferred PUMP / 5% preferred SoundMAGIC.
Models tested: PUMP IEM V2 vs SoundMAGIC E50S

PUMP Audio vs SMS Audio:
96% preferred PUMP / 4% preferred SMS Audio.
Models tested: PUMP Zeus vs SMS Audio Street by 50 over ear

Full results and methodology at:
http://pump-audio.com/blindfold-test-results/

In fact we’re so confident in the immense sound they produce that we’ve decided to offer a 90 day trial to all Indiegogo Backers who order during the launch campaign (see the bottom of this campaign page for full offer and terms).

They sound just like ""PUMP V2"" -- our much loved wired in-ear headphones -- unless you have extremely sensitive ears, in which case you might notice the even wider frequency response range, which is now 12hz – 28Khz.
PUMP Audio headphones all have a sound signature that's totally unique.
No other headphones on the planet sound quite like them.
We started by creating Amazing Bass™, and then tuned the mids and highs to what we think is perfection.
With many top-end headphones, you have to turn the volume up very high to really get the bass you want, because they give the mid range a lot of priority.
And when you do that, the highs become too harsh (for Electronic music in particular).
We tuned PUMP specifically for lovers of Electronic and Dance music, although they sound pretty incredible with ALL genres according to our Artist and User reviews.

Many more Artist reviews can be seen at:
http://pump-audio.com/artist-endorsements/
Here's a video of our Founder Adam Blair talking about the PUMP Audio Sound Signature and what genres of music our Friends have been listening to on them...

column2: >The Bluetooth chip in MIX Wireless is is an all new exclusive chip we developed together with ISSC Technologies.

column1: We couldn't achieve perfect replication of the PUMP sound signature with the off the shelf CSR chipset we started out with, which led us early on in development to switch to developing a custom chip exclusively for MIX Wireless.

Our new chip (which we're calling the ""BR1"" chip) connects quickly, has extremely reliable connection and crucially, can handle the bass and sub bass reproduction we needed, as well as having perfect reproduction through the rest of the range.
We decided early on in development to go against the recent trend of ""true wireless"" headphones.
Indeed, back in April 2016 we had communication from Darren F (a DJ), who was a Bragi Dash ""true wireless"" backer on Kickstarter, and subsequently became an Investor in PUMP Audio.
(This email is from before Darren became an Investor)

""I am returning my Bragi Dash today of which I was part of the kick-starter Group due to their disappointing sound quality! It is the most important feature of any sound producing device with wireless being a close second now"". And I feel like you have nailed both I am eagerly awaiting your wireless launch""

""in my opinion they have overstretched sacrificing volume and sound quality for whistles and bells. True quality sound with sufficient volume seems to be lacking throughout the wireless market at present. The others all seem to be blaming a mixture of Bluetooth capabilities and regulatory restrictions for their failings. Your demo model at GSL"" (Gadget Show Live, April 2016) ""seemed to have overcome these issues.""


- Darren (PUMP User and Investor)
Darren accurately identified the issues of reproducing the ""PUMP Sound"" accurately via Bluetooth, which -- through months of development -- we were able to overcome.

The other main reason we decided to go with Wireless rather than ""true wireless"" was that we think that current ""true wireless"" headphones are too easy to lose and in some cases can also pose a choking hazard for small children.

In fact since the launch of Apples ""Airpods"" there has been something of a backlash on social media. There has even been at least one company spring up who offer to convert Airpods to ""Wireless"" from ""True Wireless"":

This trend appears to give validation to our view that Wireless earphones are the way to go, and indeed part of the reason for offering the 90 day trial is to prove this to Indiegogo backers who are tempted by the recent trend of pure wireless.
MIX Wireless comes with 2 sizes of silicone eartips, and 3 sizes of Memory Foam eartips:
Each set has been specifically designed to work with the internal architecture of MIX Wireless to ensure they sound the same, no matter what size ear canal you have.
It's not just a case of choosing any old eartips, as this can ruin the sound quality!
It's really important to choose the right eartips for your ears, otherwise your PUMPs won't sound quite right and you may start to wonder what all the fuss is about…
We suggest trying all five earbud sizes to see which ones best fit your ear size. Using the best size for your ear makes a BIG difference!
Answering or hanging up on a call is as simple as pressing the centre button.
Your music will automatically fade out when you receive a call and if you're not available to talk, just hold the Centre button down for a couple of seconds and your music will be instantly resumed!
To redial your last number, press the Centre button twice
To cancel a call, press the Centre button and that will cancel the call
To decline a call, hold the Centre button down for a couple of seconds.
It all becomes second nature after a very short time.

We’ve designed MIX Wireless to be perfect for the gym – no more cables waving around and unlike some so called “true wireless” headphones, they stay in your ears due to the seal they form in your ear when the correct earbud size is used, and the incredibly light weight.
The battery and control module are tiny, weighing at just 3.6g (making a total weight of just 11g!) but will last for 4 hours+ constant use (dependant on volume)between charges.
You can get your MIX Wireless in our signature PUMP Orange:
Or in the slightly more understated Jet Black:
Both colour options come with machined aluminium casing:
If you damage or break your PUMPs, fear not… We definitely don’t want to leave you in the lurch just because you had an accident or lent them to someone who’s a bit too heavy handed.

Just get in touch with a copy of your receipt and a picture of your damaged PUMPs and we’ll arrange another set for you (minus the packaging, accessories, manuals etc. that you already have) at a heavily subsidised price.
This price may change a little from time to time, but it will always be a fraction of the “new” price, so just ask us what it is currently.
Your 5 Year PUMPreplace Warranty does not effect your standard PUMP 2 Year full product warranty.
* you must register your Warranty on at pump-audio.com to be eligible (it’s free!).
We appreciate that there are some pretty major claims made about the sound quality of MIX Wireless in this Launch campaign.
If you are already a Friend of PUMP then you will know that these claims are no exaggeration.
However, if you're new to the PUMP Family we understand that there may be some scepticism
column2: after all, how different can one set of headphones sound from another?

column1: Well the answer is a LOT (as you will see from our Artist Reviews and User Reviews), and to prove that to you, we're offering all Indiegogo Launch Backers a 100% no quibble 90 Day Trial on MIX Wireless.
It means that you can back MIX Wireless with absolutely no risk.
If you don’t think they are as amazing as we do, just send them back for a complete refund, no questions asked and no hard feelings.
But fair warning… once you hear them, the last thing you are going to want to do is send them back to us.
We’re looking forward to welcoming you as a Friend of PUMP, and thank you in advance for your support from everyone here at PUMP HQ!
Import Duties may be payable in countries outside the UK and USA.

Darren accurately identified the issues of reproducing the ""PUMP Sound"" accurately via Bluetooth, which -- through months of development -- we were able to overcome.

The other main reason we decided to go with Wireless rather than ""true wireless"" was that we think that current ""true wireless"" headphones are too easy to lose and in some cases can also pose a choking hazard for small children.

In fact since the launch of Apples ""Airpods"" there has been something of a backlash on social media. There has even been at least one company spring up who offer to convert Airpods to ""Wireless"" from ""True Wireless"":

This trend appears to give validation to our view that Wireless earphones are the way to go, and indeed part of the reason for offering the 90 day trial is to prove this to Indiegogo backers who are tempted by the recent trend of pure wireless.
MIX Wireless comes with 2 sizes of silicone eartips, and 3 sizes of Memory Foam eartips:
Each set has been specifically designed to work with the internal architecture of MIX Wireless to ensure they sound the same, no matter what size ear canal you have.
It's not just a case of choosing any old eartips, as this can ruin the sound quality!
It's really important to choose the right eartips for your ears, otherwise your PUMPs won't sound quite right and you may start to wonder what all the fuss is about…
We suggest trying all five earbud sizes to see which ones best fit your ear size. Using the best size for your ear makes a BIG difference!
Answering or hanging up on a call is as simple as pressing the centre button.
Your music will automatically fade out when you receive a call and if you're not available to talk, just hold the Centre button down for a couple of seconds and your music will be instantly resumed!
To redial your last number, press the Centre button twice
To cancel a call, press the Centre button and that will cancel the call
To decline a call, hold the Centre button down for a couple of seconds.
It all becomes second nature after a very short time.

We’ve designed MIX Wireless to be perfect for the gym – no more cables waving around and unlike some so called “true wireless” headphones, they stay in your ears due to the seal they form in your ear when the correct earbud size is used, and the incredibly light weight.
The battery and control module are tiny, weighing at just 3.6g (making a total weight of just 11g!) but will last for 4 hours+ constant use (dependant on volume)between charges.
You can get your MIX Wireless in our signature PUMP Orange:
Or in the slightly more understated Jet Black:
Both colour options come with machined aluminium casing:
If you damage or break your PUMPs, fear not… We definitely don’t want to leave you in the lurch just because you had an accident or lent them to someone who’s a bit too heavy handed.

Just get in touch with a copy of your receipt and a picture of your damaged PUMPs and we’ll arrange another set for you (minus the packaging, accessories, manuals etc. that you already have) at a heavily subsidised price.
This price may change a little from time to time, but it will always be a fraction of the “new” price, so just ask us what it is currently.
Your 5 Year PUMPreplace Warranty does not effect your standard PUMP 2 Year full product warranty.
* you must register your Warranty on at pump-audio.com to be eligible (it’s free!).
We appreciate that there are some pretty major claims made about the sound quality of MIX Wireless in this Launch campaign.
If you are already a Friend of PUMP then you will know that these claims are no exaggeration.
However, if you're new to the PUMP Family we understand that there may be some scepticism
column2: after all, how different can one set of headphones sound from another?

column1: Well the answer is a LOT (as you will see from our Artist Reviews and User Reviews), and to prove that to you, we're offering all Indiegogo Launch Backers a 100% no quibble 90 Day Trial on MIX Wireless.
It means that you can back MIX Wireless with absolutely no risk.
If you don’t think they are as amazing as we do, just send them back for a complete refund, no questions asked and no hard feelings.
But fair warning… once you hear them, the last thing you are going to want to do is send them back to us.
We’re looking forward to welcoming you as a Friend of PUMP, and thank you in advance for your support from everyone here at PUMP HQ!
Import Duties may be payable in countries outside the UK and USA.",52.0,1,"5 Campaigns

column2: >Trex earphones were created so you can end the fight with cords, eliminate tangles, and enjoy music while doing the activities you love. The earphones were brought to life by the desire to deliver a full-bodied audio experience that features precision-tuned drivers, smart connectivity, and a streamlined design. The result is unlike any other.
column3: >Earphone evolution
column4:
>How does it work?

Trex connects by Bluetooth to your iPhone or Android device. Setting up Trex is as easy as pairing it with any Bluetooth enabled product.

Compatibility

column1: • All iPhones including the 6, 6 Plus or any iPod.
• All  Android devices. Works great with Android 5.1 (Lollipop).
""They’re a first mover with this design, and could grab a lead the way Pebble did with its smartwatch.""– Dean Takahashi VentureBeat

""At its base level the Trex earbud is all about ending the fight with cords. No doubt about it, this one has the potential to be one of Indiegogo's most well funded campaigns.""– Will Schmidt Tech Cocktail

column3: >Bring the music wherever you go. Trex noise-isolating earphones cover the full range of the audio spectrum and are ergonomically designed to comfortably fit the contour of your ear. They are soft and comfy and can be worn for hours at a time.

column1: are led by Carl Masters, a former senior engineer at Martin Logan. The team has reinvented
earphones from the ground up to revolutionize the way earphones are used. Creating a
sleek design while keeping comfort and superior sound in mind, Masters and his
team have refined and honed cordless technology, <span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >bringing your music to a whole new level.
>We have been working on wireless earphones for over two years. Your support will help turn our working prototype into a reality and bring Trex to ears worldwide. Backers will help fund:

column1: No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially Trex. Our team of experts has spent over two years in development to ensure that Trex is prepared for Indiegogo and subsequent timely full-scale production. Despite our best efforts, we lack a crystal ball to see into the future but have identified a few potential risks that we want you, as our loyal supporters, to be aware of:

Manufacturing: Creating an innovative electronic product is technically challenging, expensive and time intensive and we have made sure to apply the appropriate advanced skill sets, experience, and patience to do this right, including working with premier electronic manufacturers that also supply the largest consumer electronics brands.

Product Adjustments: In order to deliver you an optimal product, we anticipate some minor adjustments as we undergo extensive pre-production prototyping. We are highly sensitive to manufacturer and community feedback and are doing everything possible to deliver you an audio experience unlike any. Any improvements will always be done with user benefit front of mind and we will communicate exactly how and why they are made.

Fulfillment: Due to the complexities of manufacturing an advanced electronic product today, despite our best efforts, sometimes things can go awry. We are in the process of establishing secondary supplier relationships and plan on remaining in constant communication with our supply chain to ensure a smooth process. Our manufacturers have decades of experience delivering premium products to the biggest brands in the earphone market and are well-versed in meeting complex production specifications.

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Make Trex a success by spreading the word on Facebook and Twitter and by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page. We will try and do our best to deliver the product to all of our backers. Please note: WE CAN NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE PRODUCT WILL BE DELIVERED. We are a startup and sometimes with even the best planning, things do not always pan out.
To learn more visit our website at gettrex.com

Bring the music wherever you go. Trex noise-isolating earphones cover the full range of the audio spectrum and are ergonomically designed to comfortably fit the contour of your ear. They are soft and comfy and can be worn for hours at a time.
are led by Carl Masters, a former senior engineer at Martin Logan. The team has reinvented
earphones from the ground up to revolutionize the way earphones are used. Creating a
sleek design while keeping comfort and superior sound in mind, Masters and his
team have refined and honed cordless technology, bringing your music to a whole new level. *
We have been working on wireless earphones for over two years. Your support will help turn our working prototype into a reality and bring Trex to ears worldwide. Backers will help fund:
Production tooling and first production run
