column2:
>

Earth is just one floating planet in the solar system and one tiny dust in the boundless universe. The world is full of unknown. Have you ever been mesmerised by Sci-Fi and curious about what outer space and future might be like? Everytime you watch a movie or read a book on this topic, do you wander off a bit to another dimension, anywhere away from the current place and current time?

Gravastar speakers  all have a unique and futuristic design. They were born to infuse creativity and craziness to the speaker market. Gravastar family has two members so far: big brother Mars, and little brother Venus. Put Mars and Venus together, they are the coolest scenery in your room.

Mars and Venus serve different purposes. Mars is designed for desks and bookshelves, adding a futuristic touch to your room. Venus is designed to be portable to explore the world with you.

Unlike the big brother Mars, Venus is very small. But it inherits the futuristic design and crazy bass.

Gravastar Venus Bluetooth Speaker is a warrior from the future. It has traveled through time and space. And its crazy bass can also take you to musical expeditions. Moreover, telepathy in their tribe enables sounds to come out of two speakers at the same time, providing you an immersive theater experience at home. The size of Venus can allow you to hide it at any corner in your bag and is ready to explore the world with you at any time, and party from day to night.
column3:
>

Venus is a ballistic soldier from the future who wears a zinc alloy armour, which provides strength and toughness, adding a futuristic touch to your room. The armour provides Venus higher stability when playing crazy bass. Your windows might shake with the sound wave, but the speaker won’t.
column4:
>

Venus came from a city where cyberpunk is the mainstream. The never ending dark nights are illuminated by neon lights. Spaceships shuttle among skyscrapers. Venus embodies its home culture by adding 4 different shell colours and 6 RGB lights into its armour.
column7:
>

Never underestimate a speaker because of its size. Venus is small but it has dynamite inside. The bass comes from a movable diaphragm at the back of Venus, pumping a large volume of air to boost bass.

Turn it on, the dreadful thunderous bass will rock you to death.
column9:
/>

Therefore, it is essential to equip Venus with a metallic shell and rubber shock absorbers on tripods. With this support, Venus can show you the bass you’ve never experienced before.

Having Gravastar Venus in your room is like having an invincible robotic warrior with an AoE attack. It's super loud soundwave will hunt you down to every corner in the room, leaving you nowhere to hide.

The 1.75in 10W full-range speaker transfers the powerful sound from the cyber heart to your heart. Venus is adorable yet hardcore: its movable diaphragm produces the sound waves you can see.
column11:
showinfo=0"">

Gravastar Venus is full of mechanical charm. You can not only enjoy it in your room but carry it to parties. Connect two Venus together, the stereo sound will turn everywhere in the party to the center, and their loud volume will never let you down.
column13:
>

Venus has a long Bluetooth connectivity range of 15m. You can lip-sync in the shower room with Venus while leaving your phone in the bedroom.

The audio delay is only 60ms, which is so trivial that even skilled gamers wouldn’t notice. Venus helps you avoid the least thing you wanna see when playing games: lose a game because of the sound latency. And the stereo from two speakers can totally immerse you to the game world.

Venus can be connected easily with any bluetooth devices. Immerse yourself in the powerful sound in games, music, movies and parties.
column14:
>

The stereo experience of Venus is almost invincible. The only thing that can beat Venus is 2 Venus teaming up. The telepathy between two speakers provides you with an even more powerful and immersive stereo experience.
column16:
>

Venus is a stamina fighter. With the same amount of charging time, Venus can fight longer in the battlefield, up to 10 hours. You can bring Venus anywhere and party till whenever they want. It is never a party pooper.

Venus is tough and low maintenance. It won’t die from a few drops of water. You can be carefree when using it near water. Venus is splashproof and has a waterproof USB-C charging port. You can soak yourself in music when taking showers or going to a pool party without worrying about water leaking damages.
column17:
>

Weighing only 410g, the equivalent of two apples, Venus could be easily carried around, in the city, to the seaside, or take an excursion to the desert. 

Venus is a good companion. Bring it with you on a sunny day to a park or pack Venus in your backpack and go explore the world with music.
column18:
>

Mars was launched last year. It brings you the destroyer vibe when you first see it. The illuminating green light in the center looks like a fusion reactor. The solid zinc alloy shell is prepared for risky missions. And the foldable tripods are so neat and forceful that you know they can land on another planet precisely. It has been a great success. It is well received by YouTubers and users.

This time when we are launching Venus, we also bring back Space Gray Mars and introduce Sci-Fi Blue Mars for the first time. Tech Blue is a special offer to our backers and has limited numbers.

GravaStar Mars is more than just another Bluetooth speaker. We have reinvented how speakers are designed: tight, Zinc Alloy and sleek angles with built-in psychedelic lights, inspired by futuristic science fiction movies and games.  

The metal robot appearance doesn't just look cool, but its spherical body allows the sound waves to resonate, which enhances its audio on top of the tripod legs that forms its stable structure. With a weight of 1.6kg (3.53lbs), the GravaStar remains stable when playing music with heavy bass at high volume.
column20:
showinfo=0"">

We offer accessories including Mars charging base, Venus charging base and Venus storage bag. The charging bases have type-C charging port and have changeable lights. The Venus storage bag protects Venus and makes carrying it around even easier. You can travel with music by clipping it on your bag or storing it in your pocket.

As a way to show our appreciation to our backers, all purchases enjoy free shipping! There is no extra shipping fee for add-on accessories so we recommend that you purchase with add-ons. But please note that we don’t ship orders consist of only accessories.

Gravastar team includes engineers, designers, craftsmen, cartoonists, game lovers, music fans, explorers and etc., who worked together to create Gravastar. 

We are tired of with the similar design of the products in the market. We wanted to be different and create something crazy, cool and interesting for the global trendy players. We hope people can feel and experience totally different products.

Gravastar family was thus born.

column1: Gravastar products have entered the mass production stage. As a group of speaker lovers who want to change the speaker market, we honor our ideals and also cherish our relationship with customers. We promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. You will always have our back.

Are you ready to slow down, listen with an open heart, and find yourself in another form of awareness?

We are pioneering with the creation of “Nicholas The Voice”, a unique collection of deep and meaningful poems, spoken by the author himself while blended with the sacred sounds of Himalayan singing bowls, planetary gong Venus, koshi chimes and the vibrant sounds of nature. The sound is blended in a manner that gives a deeper experience for the listener.
This profound combination has helped us personally to understand more about ourselves, and the nature of life. We are beyond excited to now share it with you!

Passion and spirit driven writing and speaking emerges instantly, prolifically, without forethought. It comes directly from the very core of what I am. This is when I enter a zone of awareness where the creative material can then flow into the world, and perhaps change a bit of the world. This kind of inspired writing is what I wish to express from my core as a way of getting clarity out of what was otherwise hidden within.

I wrote most of the material used in the recordings when I lived in the in the wilderness. I lived there for six years. Often I reflect on the ""wilderness"" and what it means, again as a metaphor, for “the dark night of the soul” or, perhaps, the “rising of the sun”, or “transformation of the seasons”. There is a lot revealed in the quiet of the night where much was written. It was part of my communion with the Creator there in the wilderness of my life.

The writing reveals a lot of myself. In is my observation that to find a relationship, transparency reduces entropy. All relationships require transparency, whether friends, family or lovers, transparency is the core of repentance, forgiveness, and unconditional love.
I believe we meet the image and likeness of God in each person as we remember who we are
column2: we remember the divinity of others also. We also rise up into the essence of our created birthright as co-creators.

column1: For most people, the sacred instruments are mysterious. But they don’t have to be.

Himalayan singing bowls also known as Tibetan Singing Bowls are sacred instruments crafted from seven different metals.  Singing bowls are vessels that make a musical “singing” sound when struck or played with a mallet. In addition to a primary tone, singing bowls produce a complex series of subtle overtones that create a uniquely soothing sound. They are used for meditation and sound vibrational therapy.

Koshi chimes are authentic musical instrument. Eight chords are welded with silver into the metal plate at the base of the resonance tube. Precise tuning creates a play of clear tones that is rich in overtones. The overtones of the shorter chords gradually dominate and become fundamentals, thus forming a circular tone range.

The Gong is one of man’s most powerful tone producers on the planet and the oldest transformational and therapeutic instrument. The Gong sound is organic, deep and nurturing. The “living tones” build upon each other and evolve on their own, producing a sea of sound that is both timeless and alive. The Planetary Gongs are tuned in conformity with the natural harmonic series based in the orbital properties on the Earth, the Moon, the Sun, and the Planets according to calculations of Hans Cousto. Thus, they resonate in harmony with the cycles of the celestial bodies and communicate a distinct aspect of the “music of the spheres”

We are very excited about each of you joining together with us in this effort. The project grew organically out of the shared enthusiasm of our team, which includes myself, Nicholas Begich (Alaska, USA), Sabrina Miklavcic (Amsterdam, Nederland), Heikki Savolainen (Helsinki, Finland), and now each of you as our underwriters.
The ideas expressed in my words are the focal point of my current, and I believe, my most important writing and recording project ever, a project I was not intending. Yet, here we are.

I shared my writing with several friends over the years and they all encouraged me to keep writing. Then in early 2017, I sent several poems to Sabrina Miklavcic who I met at a conference in 2012. She immediately was touched by the words and, having also heard my actual voice thought that these verses should be read aloud and recorded. She suggested that the reading, if combined with the sounds of Tibetan singing bowls, gongs, and other unusual sounds, would amplify the depth of the thoughts within the words.

I considered the idea of frequency matching my voice with the sounds Sabrina would generate. The idea that a resonance effect might be created with the combination of the spoken words, emotional texture within them, and the sounds utilized in the compositions was exciting and interesting. The thought was that if they could be composed in such a way as to push the voice modulations into greater power and form. Through the power of resonance, a much greater effect might be realized in the combined word and sound compositions.

The idea of a frequency matched composition and the arrangement of the sounds with the spoken words required a much higher level of technical knowledge in the area of recording engineering. The resourceful Sabrina knew just such a person that could round out the team, Heikki Savolainen, a world recognized expert in sound recording and arrangement with thirty-seven years of experience.

In October 2017 I traveled to Amsterdam to record the first versions utilizing a Dutch recording studio located in the south of Holland. We completed the initial recording and sent them to Helsinki, Finland for Heikki’s. After listening to the recorded words, and being familiar with the sound work of Sabrina he too was hooked and the project team took form in January 2018.

As a collaboration of the three of us in this project our talents and skills are blended into something unique and very different for each of us in the way we approached this project together as a team.

I believe we are all that esoteric, that hidden thing, we are seeking. It was always there. It is in each of us forming our very essence. It is the created image, created in us and through us, and projected into the world to express something. They say a picture paints a thousand words, which is true indeed. At the same time the words paint a different picture. Those images are projected to the reader, by the composer, as “thought-forms” in words. Those words are tools for transfer with even greater emphasis when combined with sound. There is the art of it. So poetry and verse written can carry deeper information in the pulse of it, and through the flow of it, in the very vibration of it, when it is spoken authentically, from our core.
This crowdfunding effort is intended to help us cover the costs associated with the project. Your funds will help produce, print and ship our CD and Poetry book to you worldwide.

There are over sixty separate selections of original poetry from which ten to twelve are being chosen for the final mastered CD. The remainder of the poems will be used in future work. If we exceed our funding goals in this effort the balance of the funding will be used to produce the additional material into other CDs in the same way as the first one.
With the success of this crowdfunding effort we will produce two initial imprints of the CD one in Europe and one in the USA to facilitate distribution.

We have been busy on this project and have completed the recording of the voice work and the cover are for the CD we are producing. The sounds and pure tones that are used in the compositions have been recorded.

We still need to complete the musical overlays that match the words and vibration carried in them. The first sample recording fully blended has been completed to promote the work and is available here Nicholas The Voice. CD booklets and inserts need to also be completed.
The Poetry book is in its final stages requiring editing, then must be prepared for printing and the cover design completed.
The initial funding will allow us to take what is in our hearts into the world.
What can you do to help beyond helping with financing the project?
You can put us on your social media outlets, Facebook, Twitter and others. You can send the links to your contacts that may be inspired by this work.
Are you ready to slow down, listen with an open heart, and find yourself in another form of awareness?

We are pioneering with the creation of “Nicholas The Voice”, a unique collection of deep and meaningful poems, spoken by the author himself while blended with the sacred sounds of Himalayan singing bowls, planetary gong Venus, koshi chimes and the vibrant sounds of nature. The sound is blended in a manner that gives a deeper experience for the listener.
This profound combination has helped us personally to understand more about ourselves, and the nature of life. We are beyond excited to now share it with you!

Passion and spirit driven writing and speaking emerges instantly, prolifically, without forethought. It comes directly from the very core of what I am. This is when I enter a zone of awareness where the creative material can then flow into the world, and perhaps change a bit of the world. This kind of inspired writing is what I wish to express from my core as a way of getting clarity out of what was otherwise hidden within.

I wrote most of the material used in the recordings when I lived in the in the wilderness. I lived there for six years. Often I reflect on the ""wilderness"" and what it means, again as a metaphor, for “the dark night of the soul” or, perhaps, the “rising of the sun”, or “transformation of the seasons”. There is a lot revealed in the quiet of the night where much was written. It was part of my communion with the Creator there in the wilderness of my life.

The writing reveals a lot of myself. In is my observation that to find a relationship, transparency reduces entropy. All relationships require transparency, whether friends, family or lovers, transparency is the core of repentance, forgiveness, and unconditional love.
I believe we meet the image and likeness of God in each person as we remember who we are
column2: we remember the divinity of others also. We also rise up into the essence of our created birthright as co-creators.

Wasserstein proudly presents the next innovation in Alexa-compatible speakers - Aqua Dew - the world’s first splashproof Alexa speaker for the shower.
Now you can finally enjoy the benefits of Alexa in the shower.
Aqua Dew is the ultimate Alexa smart speaker. With its flawless sound, Bluetooth connectivity, and beautiful design, it will become your favorite electronic companion in the shower and on the go.
The battery can last for up to 7-8 hours of continuous playtime. To conserve battery, the speaker shuts off after 20 min of inactivity.
To back this project now - CLICK HERE -
Aqua Dew works just like your Echo or Echo Dot.
Simply say 'Alexa' to use all of Alexa's skills. Control your smart home from the shower, order an Uber or listen to your favorite morning jams, news flash or audiobooks - Aqua Dew does it all.
Now you can interact with Alexa in the shower, by the pool or anywhere else in your home.
Make Alexa your companion for camping, pool parties, summer BBQs, and all your favorite outdoor activities.
Aqua Dew comes with a powerful suction cup and mounting plate to allow for versatile placement in your bathroom, inside your shower, near your pool, or wherever you may need Alexa.
A smooth, enjoyable morning routine sets you up for a successful day and we hope that Aqua Dew can help you achieve just that.
We are thrilled to offer the Kickstarter community the first chance to get Aqua Dew at a great price.
We are very proud to bring you this product, hoping it will make everyday tasks easier than ever.
Over the past 3 years, Wasserstein has developed countless smart home accessories for Nest, Arlo, Echo, and Google Home. Now, we are excited to present our most ambitious product yet - Aqua Dew.
How did the idea turn into a Product?

We love Alexa and we also love spending time in the shower. I have had one of those cheap Bluetooth shower speakers for years and really liked it. However, after experiencing the seamless interactivity of Alexa - I found the Bluetooth shower speaker cumbersome (I had to choose the song BEFORE going into the shower) and had no way of changing them while I was in the shower - so we decided to make the world's first Alexa far-field speaker for the shower.
Since the eureka moment our team has been hard at work developing the world’s most versatile Alexa Smart Speaker.

A citizen of Germany, Chris moved to the UK at the age of 19 to attend university. After years of working in the financial sector in London and Zurich, he moved to Hong Kong 3 years ago and started Wasserstein. Aqua Dew is by far the company’s most ambitious product. And Chris is, of course, proud as punch.

With solid experience in engineering and product development, German has been working in the e-commerce sector for over five years now. Enthused by novel technology, he actively participated in the process of designing and engineering the Aqua Dew.

Jack never thought that he'd get a chance to participate in a Kickstarter campaign. Among friends, he's always the first to try new high-tech products. And this time, he's more than excited because he is a part of the people behind the world’s first ever waterproof Alexa speaker!
Ed has a diverse background in business development and sales. He is excited about the launch of the Aqua Dew campaign and can’t wait to bring this incredible product to big-box retail.

Loving them so far! Paired with my devices immediately, and great sound straight out of the box. I can actually notice the difference from the dual drivers, the clarity is amazing! Solid bass too, which is always important.
“35 years ago I bought a Nakamichi tape deck - it was one of the best available. When I saw the Edge headphones available on crowd-funding I decided to see how good Nakamichi was in this area.

After the initial 4 hour charge I wore them for a solid 3 hours, listening to a random play list on my iPhone via Bluetooth. They were super comfy for the whole period and blocked out much of the external noise.
The sound was clear and sharp and not heavy on the bass - they were a delight to use. I am looking forward to further testing but I am very pleased I made the purchase.
Nakamichi, not just a trusted name, also a great product.”

“When I found out about the Nakamichi EDGE Headphones on IndieGoGo, I grabbed the opportunity and have been using them for many hours now.  No fatigue, no discomfort.  For me, the over-ear comfort and weight of these headphones are ideal.

My music library ranges from A to Z (**A**madeus to **Z**eppelin).  Each of my several other headphones are favorites depending on the type of music.  These EDGE headphones faithfully reproduce ALL my favorite types of music.  Wow!  They incorporate the best of my other headphones, and more.
From build quality to AI enhancement to Noise canceling to Dual speaker drivers to Wired/wireless
column2: all the advertised specs and features combine perfectly and intelligently.  You know a good thing when you hear it!  The sound stage is smooth and linear.  The musical clarity is crisp and natural
column3: no noticeable coloration as with most headphones.  Using them is like sitting “front row center.”

column1: These are the ones that will be traveling on the road with me, competing sound-wise with my electrostat speakers at home.  I kid you not!”

“Ever been thrilled with a product because it actually made your life a little better? Well, I'm experiencing that after receiving my EDGE headphones. The agency I work just last week transitioned my team to an ""open office"" environment. For those of you that don't know what that means, you are stacked like cattle with almost ZERO consideration for privacy or noise levels. I was miserable. Now? I can focus. My neighbor can be talking to me and I don't hear a thing. I'm lost in my own world of music and comedy. My headache isn't here and I can focus again. Thank you, EDGE!

For sound quality, these headphones are easily among the best I've used, and I have used quite a few professional/studio level headphones. The dual drivers really do make a difference. The mid doesn't get muddy with even the bassiest music and the highs are nice and clear. And the music AI? I know, it sounds like marketing hype. It actually works. For the first time ever, I have the EQ on my phone turned off. I have no idea how it works, it just does.”

For 70 years, Nakamichi has been delivering top-quality audio products to consumers around the world. A passion for music combined with an unwavering commitment to quality and performance are the principles that have preserved Nakamichi's place as one of the most innovative electronic brands to date.

Combining Nakamichi's AI logic, dual speaker driver configuration, and new generation speaker drivers, the sound quality is clean, clear and dynamic. With the Nakamichi EDGE, we created a custom logic board with built-in intelligence that responds to both the environment and music to elevate your listening enjoyment. Experience sound enhancement tailored to each song in your playlist for more clarity, depth, and spaciousness.

The first of its kind, Nakamichi has incorporated new, patented distortion-free speakers into a dual driver configuration. The magnetic field confinement of the internal voice coil has been upgraded for more accurate audio reproduction, resulting in the clearest sound and cleanest bass.
Nakamichi speaker drivers have shown up to 3x less total harmonic distortion (THD) when compared to market-leading high-performance speaker drivers.
*Near-perfect conversion of electrical signal into sound results in greater accuracy.
*Delivers up to 3x less Total Harmonic Distortion (THD) when compared to similar, high-performance speaker drivers

Technology has changed the way we listen to music. Today, we listen to music longer, louder and from an earlier age than ever before. The AI logic not only enhances audio quality to new levels, it also intelligently monitors your audio exposure to protect your hearing without sacrificing enjoyment or quality.
column2:
>AI gives you complete listening freedom and a lifetime of healthy hearing! 

Up until now, headphones that help protect against noise-induced hearing loss host non-intelligent software that regulates and limits volume without user input. A simple analogy: How many people want to own a car that can only go up to 65mph? Answer: Not many.
column3: >The most recent US data shows:

column2: >Tune Out, So You Can Tune In

column1:
Using 4 synchronized noise-sensitive microphones, the EDGE's advanced noise cancellation actively harmonizes your surroundings by blocking out unwanted noise, setting you up with pure music enjoyment. We have chosen to combine both ""Feed Forward"" and ""Feedback"" methods for superior ANC performance. Each earcup has TWO noise-sensing microphones—one on the exterior and one inside.

 

 

We have chosen to utilize a ""Hybrid"" approach to noise cancellation, combining both ""Feed Forward"" and ""Feedback"" methods for superior ANC performance. Each earcup has TWO noise-sensing microphones, one on the exterior and one inside.

Benefits of our Advanced Noise Cancellation technology:
• Cancels noise at a broader range of frequencies
• Cancels even more noise (up to 30dB reduction)
• The Feedback microphone inside earcup provides an additional step of improving noise cancellation accuracy
• Not sensitive to how the listener wears the headphones

Earcups: Over-The-Ear

Ear cushions &
column2:
headband: Protein leather

Frequency response: 10Hz - 20 kHz

Sound pressure level: Passive - 1kHz.1Vrms

Impedance: 10Ω @ 1kHz

Advanced Noise Cancellation: 1 Feed-Forward &
column3:
1 Feed-Back microphone on each earcup

Battery life: 14 hours (when LED lights are off)

Charging time: Approx. 4 hours

Microphone: Directivity: Omni-directional, Sensitivity: -36dB ±3dB, Impedance: 2.2KΩ

Dimensions &
column4:
weight: Headphones: 7.5"" H x 6"" W x 0.9"" D (6.9 oz)

 

 

 

 

The founders of AEGIS Acoustics have been working to combat noise induced hearing loss for four years by engineering AI enhanced audio products. In a partnership with Nakamichi, an audio company with almost 70 years of acoustic and engineering experience, the EDGE was able to evolve from a concept to reality. Through this crowdfunding campaign, the EDGE team hopes to combat the ever growing threat of noise induced hearing loss by introducing technology that will result in a lifetime of healthy hearing.

column1:
A month ago, we started producing our first batch of EDGE Headphones. Being the 5th production run since the project's inception, we have already optimized many procedures that occur during production and assembly, ensuring top-quality construction and efficiency.

 

With a 70-year legacy of innovation and audio excellence, we at Nakamichi have successfully integrated Artificial Intelligence with cutting-edge, exclusive hardware technology. We have created a pair of smart headphones that elevate your listening experience and guards your ears from noise-induced hearing loss simultaneously, in real-time. Our many decades of experience in design, product development, engineering, manufacturing and international fulfillment makes us the best candidate to taking this new breed of headphones to your doorstep, in pristine quality and by the most efficient way possible.

Partners:

Marketing partner: Joe Johnston (Crowdlift), PR partner: PRserve, Videographer: Rumpus Creative, Photographer: Anthony Pontillas

 

  • What is the sound quality like?

Combining our proprietary AI logic, dual speaker driver configuration, and new generation speaker drivers, the sound quality is clean, clear and dynamic. However, we all know that sound quality is subjective. This is why we organized a Nakamichi demo event for blind-testers to try the headphones, as well as produced sample units for reviewers and journalists to test out. Please see our Nakamichi demo event and expert testimonial videos on the campaign page.

  • How are your dual speaker drivers superior to having only one?

Our dual speaker driver configuration has a 40mm driver and a 23mm driver. Their different sizes mean that each of them are better suited to reproduce audio from different spectrums of the entire frequency range. The larger (40mm) driver reproduces low-mid frequencies more accurately, while the smaller (23mm) driver excels at the high frequencies. After our AI logic aggregates the audio elements of your music, it channels each and every bit of output audio to the most suitable driver. This unlocks new and unheard-of details in your music.

  • What is the battery life?

14 hours (when LED lights are off).

  • Are these headphones comfortable?

The EDGE was designed and built with long term comfort in mind. The ear cushions and headband feature extra-soft durable protein leather, allowing you to wear it for extended listening sessions. The headband is adjustable, allowing the headphones to conform easily to your head.

  • What is the Bluetooth version?

4.0.

  • How many Bluetooth devices can be simultaneously connected to the headphones?

Two Bluetooth devices can be simultaneously connected to the headphones, but of these only one device can be used to listen to music or make phone calls at any time.

  • How many devices can the headphones remember?

The headphones' Bluetooth functionality will remember up to 8 devices. It will automatically connect to the last device it was paired to when it is powered on, provided that device's Bluetooth is switched on.

  • How long is the warranty?

Parts = 1 year. Labor = 90 days.

  • Do you accept returns? What is your return policy?

Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns here on IndieGoGo. We will, however, repair or replace a defective unit at no cost. Thanks for your understanding.

  • What does the cost of shipping cover?

Overseas shipping from China, thus the shipping cost was calculated based on the origin of manufacturing. For 90% of locations (USA, Europe, Canada, Australia, etc.), we have chosen to ship using DHL. Otherwise, we will use a shipper of similar standards to DHL.

  • Are the headphones firmware upgradeable?

No.

 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

With 2,700 units already produced, there is no other way to prove that this product will be a success. Furthermore, we have already gone through 5 production runs and optimized many procedures along the way prior to this. Assuming that all backers provide timely shipping info, we will be able to provide immediate fulfillment once the campaign ends. However, do note that after we have sent your headphones to our shipping partner for international fulfillment, there will always be a chance of short delays depending on shipping traffic to your location, storage capacity, etc. This is beyond our control.

A major advantage in creating the EDGE headphones was Nakamichi having a base in Shenzhen, China, labeled by many as the ""manufacturing capital of the world"". This has allowed us to be on the ground, close to the source of production, as well as be highly selective, working with only the best suppliers and manufacturers.

We are working with a top-tier manufacturing partner who owns 27 patents in their noise cancellation technologies. They also manufacture headphones for numerous top brands. Our team in Shenzhen works closely with them, overlooking all factory processes and operations, ensuring both quality and control over the manufacturing process and that every EDGE component is optimized.

Having said that, we cannot completely eliminate any risk of delays. After the campaign ends, we will place a new purchase order of headphones in addition to the 2,700 units with our manufacturing partner. Because factories, in general, are busy producing for the end-of-year shopping seasons (Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Christmas, etc.), and the fact that factories will only begin dedicating resources after receiving a new purchase order, there is a chance that our 2nd order will coincide with orders by other brands, and lead to a delay of 2-4 weeks.

My music library ranges from A to Z (**A**madeus to **Z**eppelin).  Each of my several other headphones are favorites depending on the type of music.  These EDGE headphones faithfully reproduce ALL my favorite types of music.  Wow!  They incorporate the best of my other headphones, and more.
From build quality to AI enhancement to Noise canceling to Dual speaker drivers to Wired/wireless
column2: all the advertised specs and features combine perfectly and intelligently.  You know a good thing when you hear it!  The sound stage is smooth and linear.  The musical clarity is crisp and natural
column3: no noticeable coloration as with most headphones.  Using them is like sitting “front row center.”

column1: These are the ones that will be traveling on the road with me, competing sound-wise with my electrostat speakers at home.  I kid you not!”

“Ever been thrilled with a product because it actually made your life a little better? Well, I'm experiencing that after receiving my EDGE headphones. The agency I work just last week transitioned my team to an ""open office"" environment. For those of you that don't know what that means, you are stacked like cattle with almost ZERO consideration for privacy or noise levels. I was miserable. Now? I can focus. My neighbor can be talking to me and I don't hear a thing. I'm lost in my own world of music and comedy. My headache isn't here and I can focus again. Thank you, EDGE!

For sound quality, these headphones are easily among the best I've used, and I have used quite a few professional/studio level headphones. The dual drivers really do make a difference. The mid doesn't get muddy with even the bassiest music and the highs are nice and clear. And the music AI? I know, it sounds like marketing hype. It actually works. For the first time ever, I have the EQ on my phone turned off. I have no idea how it works, it just does.”
The Proof is in the Sound

For 70 years, Nakamichi has been delivering top-quality audio products to consumers around the world. A passion for music combined with an unwavering commitment to quality and performance are the principles that have preserved Nakamichi's place as one of the most innovative electronic brands to date.

Combining Nakamichi's AI logic, dual speaker driver configuration, and new generation speaker drivers, the sound quality is clean, clear and dynamic. With the Nakamichi EDGE, we created a custom logic board with built-in intelligence that responds to both the environment and music to elevate your listening enjoyment. Experience sound enhancement tailored to each song in your playlist for more clarity, depth, and spaciousness.

The first of its kind, Nakamichi has incorporated new, patented distortion-free speakers into a dual driver configuration. The magnetic field confinement of the internal voice coil has been upgraded for more accurate audio reproduction, resulting in the clearest sound and cleanest bass.
Nakamichi speaker drivers have shown up to 3x less total harmonic distortion (THD) when compared to market-leading high-performance speaker drivers.
*Near-perfect conversion of electrical signal into sound results in greater accuracy.
*Delivers up to 3x less Total Harmonic Distortion (THD) when compared to similar, high-performance speaker drivers

Technology has changed the way we listen to music. Today, we listen to music longer, louder and from an earlier age than ever before. The AI logic not only enhances audio quality to new levels, it also intelligently monitors your audio exposure to protect your hearing without sacrificing enjoyment or quality.AI gives you complete listening freedom and a lifetime of healthy hearing! Up until now, headphones that help protect against noise-induced hearing loss host non-intelligent software that regulates and limits volume without user input. A simple analogy: How many people want to own a car that can only go up to 65mph? Answer: Not many.  The most recent US data shows:
Tune Out, So You Can Tune In

Using 4 synchronized noise-sensitive microphones, the EDGE's advanced noise cancellation actively harmonizes your surroundings by blocking out unwanted noise, setting you up with pure music enjoyment. We have chosen to combine both ""Feed Forward"" and ""Feedback"" methods for superior ANC performance. Each earcup has TWO noise-sensing microphones—one on the exterior and one inside.  We have chosen to utilize a ""Hybrid"" approach to noise cancellation, combining both ""Feed Forward"" and ""Feedback"" methods for superior ANC performance. Each earcup has TWO noise-sensing microphones, one on the exterior and one inside.Benefits of our Advanced Noise Cancellation technology:
Cancels noise at a broader range of frequencies
Cancels even more noise (up to 30dB reduction)
The Feedback microphone inside earcup provides an additional step of improving noise cancellation accuracy
Not sensitive to how the listener wears the headphones

Earcups: Over-The-EarEar cushions & headband: Protein leatherFrequency response: 10Hz - 20 kHzSound pressure level: Passive - 1kHz.1VrmsImpedance: 10Ω @ 1kHzAdvanced Noise Cancellation: 1 Feed-Forward & 1 Feed-Back microphone on each earcupBattery life: 14 hours (when LED lights are off)Charging time: Approx. 4 hoursMicrophone: Directivity: Omni-directional, Sensitivity: -36dB ±3dB, Impedance: 2.2KΩDimensions & weight: Headphones: 7.5"" H x 6"" W x 0.9"" D (6.9 oz)    The founders of AEGIS Acoustics have been working to combat noise induced hearing loss for four years by engineering AI enhanced audio products. In a partnership with Nakamichi, an audio company with almost 70 years of acoustic and engineering experience, the EDGE was able to evolve from a concept to reality. Through this crowdfunding campaign, the EDGE team hopes to combat the ever growing threat of noise induced hearing loss by introducing technology that will result in a lifetime of healthy hearing. Production Has Already Begun!

A month ago, we started producing our first batch of EDGE Headphones. Being the 5th production run since the project's inception, we have already optimized many procedures that occur during production and assembly, ensuring top-quality construction and efficiency. With a 70-year legacy of innovation and audio excellence, we at Nakamichi have successfully integrated Artificial Intelligence with cutting-edge, exclusive hardware technology. We have created a pair of smart headphones that elevate your listening experience and guards your ears from noise-induced hearing loss simultaneously, in real-time. Our many decades of experience in design, product development, engineering, manufacturing and international fulfillment makes us the best candidate to taking this new breed of headphones to your doorstep, in pristine quality and by the most efficient way possible.Partners:Marketing partner: Joe Johnston (Crowdlift), PR partner: PRserve, Videographer: Rumpus Creative, Photographer: Anthony Pontillas What is the sound quality like?Combining our proprietary AI logic, dual speaker driver configuration, and new generation speaker drivers, the sound quality is clean, clear and dynamic. However, we all know that sound quality is subjective. This is why we organized a Nakamichi demo event for blind-testers to try the headphones, as well as produced sample units for reviewers and journalists to test out. Please see our Nakamichi demo event and expert testimonial videos on the campaign page.How are your dual speaker drivers superior to having only one?Our dual speaker driver configuration has a 40mm driver and a 23mm driver. Their different sizes mean that each of them are better suited to reproduce audio from different spectrums of the entire frequency range. The larger (40mm) driver reproduces low-mid frequencies more accurately, while the smaller (23mm) driver excels at the high frequencies. After our AI logic aggregates the audio elements of your music, it channels each and every bit of output audio to the most suitable driver. This unlocks new and unheard-of details in your music.What is the battery life?14 hours (when LED lights are off).Are these headphones comfortable?The EDGE was designed and built with long term comfort in mind. The ear cushions and headband feature extra-soft durable protein leather, allowing you to wear it for extended listening sessions. The headband is adjustable, allowing the headphones to conform easily to your head.What is the Bluetooth version?4.0.How many Bluetooth devices can be simultaneously connected to the headphones?Two Bluetooth devices can be simultaneously connected to the headphones, but of these only one device can be used to listen to music or make phone calls at any time.How many devices can the headphones remember?The headphones' Bluetooth functionality will remember up to 8 devices. It will automatically connect to the last device it was paired to when it is powered on, provided that device's Bluetooth is switched on.How long is the warranty?Parts = 1 year. Labor = 90 days.Do you accept returns? What is your return policy?Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns here on IndieGoGo. We will, however, repair or replace a defective unit at no cost. Thanks for your understanding.What does the cost of shipping cover?Overseas shipping from China, thus the shipping cost was calculated based on the origin of manufacturing. For 90% of locations (USA, Europe, Canada, Australia, etc.), we have chosen to ship using DHL. Otherwise, we will use a shipper of similar standards to DHL.Are the headphones firmware upgradeable?No. Risks & ChallengesWith 2,700 units already produced, there is no other way to prove that this product will be a success. Furthermore, we have already gone through 5 production runs and optimized many procedures along the way prior to this. Assuming that all backers provide timely shipping info, we will be able to provide immediate fulfillment once the campaign ends. However, do note that after we have sent your headphones to our shipping partner for international fulfillment, there will always be a chance of short delays depending on shipping traffic to your location, storage capacity, etc. This is beyond our control.A major advantage in creating the EDGE headphones was Nakamichi having a base in Shenzhen, China, labeled by many as the ""manufacturing capital of the world"". This has allowed us to be on the ground, close to the source of production, as well as be highly selective, working with only the best suppliers and manufacturers.We are working with a top-tier manufacturing partner who owns 27 patents in their noise cancellation technologies. They also manufacture headphones for numerous top brands. Our team in Shenzhen works closely with them, overlooking all factory processes and operations, ensuring both quality and control over the manufacturing process and that every EDGE component is optimized.Having said that, we cannot completely eliminate any risk of delays. After the campaign ends, we will place a new purchase order of headphones in addition to the 2,700 units with our manufacturing partner. Because factories, in general, are busy producing for the end-of-year shopping seasons (Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Christmas, etc.), and the fact that factories will only begin dedicating resources after receiving a new purchase order, there is a chance that our 2nd order will coincide with orders by other brands, and lead to a delay of 2-4 weeks.",49.0,6,"1 Campaign

column2:
>

Start your musical journey the moment you turn it on!  The Blipblox After Dark is a fun electronic toy that’s ready for stage, studio or family room.  Designed to be safe and accessible for all ages.  Engineered with the latest synthesizer technology so anyone can produce professional-level sounds and beats.

So easy to use, just turn it on and start playing hundreds of built-in melodies, then use the colorful controls to start sculpting your own sounds.  An entire production system in your lap.  Or go pro with 5-pin MIDI In and ¼” Stereo Audio Out that lets you connect to a keyboard, drum machine or DAW.  Portable or studio play using included batteries or USB cable.

>

The After Dark comes loaded with over 300 melodies custom-made by professional musicians, so you can start creating the moment you turn it on.  Sixteen different oscillator types including wavetables provide a massive range of synthesis opportunities.  The new resonant multi-mode filter and a stereo multi-tap delay produce rich, professional sounds right from the output.  A built-in drum machine loaded with over a 100 pitch-shifting drum samples turns your synthesized sounds into danceable grooves.
column4:
>

Blipblox synthesizers are uniquely designed to be completely safe for kids.  The knobs can’t be pulled off, there aren’t sharp corners or edges, and the plastic case is designed to take hard hits, drops and spills.  Like the original, the After Dark is one of the only synthesizers fully certified to international toy safety standards for ages 3 and up.

 

The After Dark is ready to be integrated into a studio just like any other professional synthesizer.  Sequence your own melodies using your favorite hardware or software sequencer sending the notes into the After Dark using the MIDI In port.  Record or go loud using the stereo ¼” Audio Out port.  Instantly synchronize to drum machines or other devices with MIDI time code.

Contained within the 16 oscillator schemes are a wide range of synthesis methods including pulse width and frequency modulation, sync and detune.  A ROM-based wavetable with 256 unique tones can be scanned and morphed, giving the After Dark a range of synthesis possibilities never before seen on a device in this price range.
column6:
showinfo=0"">

Questions?  Click the FAQ link at the top of the page under the main video for more on the synthesis features of the After Dark.
column7:
>

Risks and Challenges

Playtime Engineering is an established company with a successful record of designing, manufacturing, and delivering thousands of units worldwide.  Our primary focus is the support of customers who have put their faith in our products.

Production

It all started in 2018 with the delivery of the original Blipblox to our first crowdfund backers.  Despite it being our first experience with mass production and global logistics, we delivered almost all Blipbloxes within a month of our estimated delivery date.  But we’ve also learned a lot in the past 2 years and we bring that knowledge to our campaign today.  Here’s what we’re doing to support our estimated delivery timeline:

column1: • We invested early in prototype PCB boards to give us nearly a year to fully test, debug and perfect After Dark hardware and software.

• In May 2020 we purchased all parts needed to produce the crowdfund units.  We took this step because the After Dark has many high demand electronic parts that have long lead times and didn’t want delays waiting on parts.
• The After Dark is being produced at the same factory as our original model.  This allows us to leverage our strong relationship in pushing timelines and resolving QC issues.
• The After Dark also utilizes the same plastic tooling as the original.  This means the look and feel of the plastic components has already been perfected.
• We have a much better understanding of global toy safety compliance standards so we can reduce the need for last minute changes.

Even with all of this experience and planning, we know that unexpected events, such as COVID-19, can cause unanticipated delays.  We are committed to transparent updates until the After Dark is in your hands.

Logistics and Delivery

There are two parts to getting a Blipblox from our factory to you.  First, we ship all units across the ocean to our warehouse in the US.  Then, we ship to each individual supporter.

We made some mistakes the first time around that resulted in lost packages and packages stuck in customs unnecessarily.  To address this, we’ve spent the last two years developing strategic shipping partnerships that streamline the delivery to make sure your After Dark arrives in a timely manner whether you are located in Los Angeles or London.
• All US orders will ship UPS Ground and will include door-to-door tracking.
• All international orders will ship DDP (Delivered with Duties Paid) which should eliminate hassles at customs.
• No matter where we’re shipping, you’ll get an email with tracking information once your order has shipped.

We also know that some things, such as delays at customs during our initial product import, are not in our control.  Because of this, we’ve selected a generous estimated shipping date in the hopes we can deliver early.

Questions?  Click the FAQ link at the top of the page under the main video for more on shipping.
column2:
>

Playtime Engineering is a boutique toy design startup with a mission to create a new class of intelligent music toys designed to promote creativity and audio exploration for all ages. 

Co-Founder Troy Sheets has 20 years of design experience in Silicon Valley as a Distinguished Engineer.  Troy has lifetime experience with music production and synthesizer design.  The Blipblox represents the culmination of these two passions. 

Co-Founder Kate Sheets, brings experience with sales, customer relationship management, product development, marketing, strategic planning and recruiting gained during a 15 year position with a boutique software development company and 4 years as Co-Founder of a textile and home decor design company. 

Special Shout-outs

Launching a crowdfund and bringing a product to market in the time of COVID-19 raises a special set of challenges.  We could not have done this without the creativity and support of the following people:

Alex Safonov
Drew Hepkins
​DJ Nu-Mark
Frank Dukes
DJ Ragin' Rainbow
Outersect
Aaron Peacock
Jordan Rose @ Synths for Kids

Mi nombre es Jorge Chafey, nacido y criado en San Juan, Puerto Rico. Comencé a tocar y grabar música desde mi adolescencia. Estudié antropología cultural e ingeniería de sonido en Nueva York, donde aprendí a grabarme a mi mismo. Mientrás vivía en la ciudad comencé un trio, el gran Trio Matapuerco que tocaba samba, funk y reggae en muchos bares de la ciudad, y mi propia banda de música original funk latina bajo el pseudónimo JBabun. Dos años mas tarde y de vuelta en San Juan, lanzo un nuevo disco titulado ""Carpe Diem"" que fue grabado y producido en casa, y donde toqué todos los instrumentos. Como parte de la promoción del disco se lanzaron los vídeos músicales de los temas Cupido online, Palabras no bastan y Soledad. Con este último disco la banda ha tenido la oportunidad de tocar, compartir y poner a bailar a gente linda por toda la isla y hasta la ciudad de Nueva York.

Ahora se nos abren las puertas para seguir hacía adelante y a través de tu ayuda podremos exponer esta música en el escenario de un festival internacional, SXSW 2017, como los únicos puertorriqueños en todo el festival. Esto sería una gran oportunidad no solo para exponer el talento de la escena musical independiente de PR, sino también la boyante escena artística puertorriqueña en estos momentos.

La banda esta compuesta por 4 miembros, voz, batería, bajo y guitarra. Esta cantidad de dinero ($2,500.00) será estrictamente utilizada para los gastos de la banda, incluyendo pasajes, estadía, transportación, dieta, equipo y emergencias.
No hay un límite por persona. Toda donación es importante y toda donación es bienvenida. Una donación de $5.00 podría ser un Uber para llegar a un show, un almuerzo, o una porción de un pasaje.
Hemos diseñado cierto premios como incentivos a esta causa.
Donaciones de $20.00 recibirán el SXSW 2017 ""playlist"", un grupo de canciones brutales, excesivamente sabrosas y jugosas que durará 2 horas.
Donaciones de $60.00 podrán obtener una clase de guitarra de una hora.
Donaciones de $100.00 tendrán la opción de usar el estudio de grabación por 5 horas, o tomar 2 clases de guitarra de una hora cada una.

Al donar $400.00 el donante podrá organizar un show, o evento en donde la banda participaría y tocaría en vivo para sus invitados. El donante proveerá el local y se coordinará la fecha. También existe la opción de tener un paquete de 10 clases de guitarra, cada clase de una hora. Si no deseas nada a cambio de tu donación, no hay problema
En fin les exhortamos a que compartan la campaña en todas sus redes sociales y les agradecemos de antemano su ayuda y participación en este proyecto.
Les deseamos lo mejor siempre y los queremos mucho!
Que viva la música, que viva Puerto Rico y que viva el crowdfunding. iBOMBA!

column5: visitId=52f48576-2303-41e6-8a92-45fb416a2692"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">
column8: >Damson HeadSpace is more than just “another” Wireless Headphone. From the ground up HeadSpace has been designed to deliver quality, either through the material used to manufacture them, or the technology inside that delivers the better than the best Active Noise Cancellation.
column10:
>We’ve achieved all this because at Damson Audio our slogan is “Hear it. Feel it.”
– to enjoy your audio you not only need to hear it, you need to feel it.  So we engineered HeadSpace to deliver the best disturbance -free audio experience. Whether you’re listening to your favourite album on a plane, watching the “cannot miss” box set on the train, or simply concentrating on hitting that work deadline you’re up against, HeadSpace delivers, and does it through XD Audio (because HD Simply isn’t good enough).
column14: >We invented XD Audio (or 'Crossover Definition') to give you the ultimate audio experience. Most active noise-cancellation headphones suffer from crossover interference
column15: we hear this as that annoying 'hiss' created by the software which processes the noise cancellation. With XD Audio, this hiss has been removed. Our innovative noise-cancelling technology shuts out what you don’t want while boosting what you do
column16: giving you unrivalled audio enjoyment on the go.
column24: >We are more mobile than ever, and we wanted HeadSpace to be suited to every need. Enjoy up to 16 hours of playback on a single charge thanks to our Lithium ion battery. Protect your headphones when travelling with our hard carry case, and recharge from flat in two hours. Finally, rest at ease with our 1 year guarantee.
column31: >
column43: >Here’s the best bit. We know contributing on a campaign through crowdfunding  can be a gamble. Not with Damson Audio. You can select your perk in total confidence that it will be delivered. How? Because the team behind Damson HeadSpace has completed 4 successful campaigns, shipped out three of them and our latest one is in progress.
column44: >
column45: >James, CEO of Damson Audio, is responsible for delivering a number of great products since Damson Audio's founding in 2012. James has significant knowledge and experience in crowdfunding campaigns, with this project being the fourth he has managed. James takes crowdfunding and its backers seriously and, as such, personally answers each email and comment throughout the campaign.
column46: >Priding himself on being very hands-on, James spends a lot of time in the US and China ensuring that Damson Audio's products are developed using the very latest technology, whilst making no compromises on quality. James' passion for audio was the very motivation to start up the company - the first version of the Cisor being its first product back in 2012.
column48: >Please note that whilst we endeavour to ensure that import taxes and duties are kept to a minimum for territories outside of our warehouse locations, local import taxes and duties may be required to be paid. column57: >All that's left to say is Thank you! We at Damson Audio sincerely appreciate your continued support of our projects and for backing us.
column58:
>

1. When will my order ship?

We are aiming to ship your order in June. We don’t have a precise date yet as we will be moving product by sea container to our various warehouses. You wll be informed when we have begun shipping.

2. What’s the status of the product currently?

It’s all ready. We are in production so you have total confidence that you will receive you HeadSpace

3. Can I  use my HeadSpace with the cable if the battery dies?

Yes you can. You will also find that using a cable extends the playback time of HeadSpace with ANC turned on

4. Why don’t you give a refund isn’t this a bit unfair?

It’s purely because of the nature of Indiegogo’s site and that we generally subsidise shipping fees to you. If you receive the product and then decided you want a refund we would end up out of pocket.

5. Will you be runnign a referral campaign on this project?

Yes – Stay tuned!

6. I’ve heard horror stories about projects that are crowdfunded how are you going to reassure me that you will ship?

Simple really, we’re in production, we’ve done all the hardwork already so there are no unforseen complications we can run into. We’ve lernt from our previous 4 campaigns this is the way to be.

7. What’s your warranty terms?

HeadSpace wll have a one year warranty from the time of shipping. Check out our website for more information. https://damsonaudio.com

","Damson HeadSpace is more than just “another” Wireless Headphone. From the ground up HeadSpace has been designed to deliver quality, either through the material used to manufacture them, or the technology inside that delivers the better than the best Active Noise Cancellation.We’ve achieved all this because at Damson Audio our slogan is “Hear it. Feel it.”– to enjoy your audio you not only need to hear it, you need to feel it.  So we engineered HeadSpace to deliver the best disturbance -free audio experience. Whether you’re listening to your favourite album on a plane, watching the “cannot miss” box set on the train, or simply concentrating on hitting that work deadline you’re up against, HeadSpace delivers, and does it through XD Audio (because HD Simply isn’t good enough).We invented XD Audio (or 'Crossover Definition') to give you the ultimate audio experience. Most active noise-cancellation headphones suffer from crossover interference
column59: we hear this as that annoying 'hiss' created by the software which processes the noise cancellation. With XD Audio, this hiss has been removed. Our innovative noise-cancelling technology shuts out what you don’t want while boosting what you do
column60: giving you unrivalled audio enjoyment on the go. We are more mobile than ever, and we wanted HeadSpace to be suited to every need. Enjoy up to 16 hours of playback on a single charge thanks to our Lithium ion battery. Protect your headphones when travelling with our hard carry case, and recharge from flat in two hours. Finally, rest at ease with our 1 year guarantee.Here’s the best bit. We know contributing on a campaign through crowdfunding  can be a gamble. Not with Damson Audio. You can select your perk in total confidence that it will be delivered. How? Because the team behind Damson HeadSpace has completed 4 successful campaigns, shipped out three of them and our latest one is in progress.James, CEO of Damson Audio, is responsible for delivering a number of great products since Damson Audio's founding in 2012. James has significant knowledge and experience in crowdfunding campaigns, with this project being the fourth he has managed. James takes crowdfunding and its backers seriously and, as such, personally answers each email and comment throughout the campaign.Priding himself on being very hands-on, James spends a lot of time in the US and China ensuring that Damson Audio's products are developed using the very latest technology, whilst making no compromises on quality. column1: Mugo is a result of nearly 400 days of hard work by top designers and engineers. It possesses amazing qualities.

There are several headsets in the market, which compromise either on the appearance or quality. Majority headsets were limited to conventional principles, while a few compromised to control industrial costs. The dogma of ignorance, limitations, and compromise on the headphone appearance needed to be overcome.

The “double-diagram structural vocal unit,”customized by Mugo, is powerful, and offers better tone quality and richer surround stereo field. It further brings you real professional auditory experience.

There is a great mystery in Mugo’s small sound chamber. By introducing professional paper tuning to control the airflow of the sound chamber, the bass performance of Mugo achieves deeper dove, making each drumbeat in music seem like a resonance within your chest.
Oval audio output renders the tone quality more delicate

The audio output of Mugo applies the original oval tone channel design, which concentrates sounds and makes the performance of alto and treble more delicate and broad. Thus, it highlights the dynamic state and instant details of music.
Fits perfectly and comfortably, just like “growing” in ears
Based on human engineering analysis, the in-ear design makes the end of Mugo fit the outline of ears tightly
column2: while the diagonal design of the front cavity sound mouth matches the structure of human’s acoustic meatus better. Through the double-fitting design, Mugo fits as comfortably as “growing” in ears. It will not fall when in movement and brings no wearer discomfort even after long use.

column1: Reliability is an essential quality of a Bluetooth wireless headset. Mugo has embedded top-quality CSR Bluetooth chip, which is manufactured in England and known for its stability and fluency. It not only supports steady and low-power Bluetooth link but also provides a great experience of stereo with high fidelity.
LDS antenna design that brings perfect tone quality anytime and anywhere

Mugo adopts the highly reliable LDS-antenna design that will not be influenced by directions of signals, signal interference, and the weakness of signals. Its steady receiving range is up to 10 m. Concurrently, the LDS antenna improves the transmision and reception of the bandwidths of signals, which means that one would listen to  high definition and valuable music through Mugo.

Regardless of whether it is an Android or iOS phone or any other equipment of a different sound source, as long as it supports Bluetooth®5.0 protocol or below, it can link to Mugo steadily and quickly.
Mini storage box for the charger that is convenient for carrying
Mugo is easily portable and you can enjoy music anytime as you wish, thus taking care of issues such as “headset’s out of charge, losing or inconvenience for carrying.”
Noise-reduction microphone of the eighth generation makes it extremely clear during a call

Mugo uses the eighth-generation CVC double-omnidirectional noise reduction microphone. Even if you make a call in a noisy environment, for example, a concert, your voice will be as clear as that in a quite environment.
Let’s draw a comparison between Mugo and other Bluetooth earbuds available in the market.

Every gamer wishes to have an immersive sound experience. Traditional headsets are heavy, sweaty, and extremely uncomfortable.
column2: >Traditional headsets are extremely uncomfortable.
column3:
>

Introducing QUAKE, world’s first vibration gaming earbuds with virtual 7.1. 

 Weighing at only 18g, QUAKE is the world’s lightest multi-channel gaming earphone.

Quake offers virtual 7.1 channel sound effect.

The EQ mode enhances the effects of footsteps and gunshots, adding a new dimension of fun to your entertainment experience.

The 10mm vibration units specialize in bringing out the bass effects of low-frequency sounds.
column7:
showinfo=0"">

 

With its control unit, you can adjust the sound, manually toggle microphone level without going into system settings, and pick up or hang up a phone call. Compatible with Windows 7/8/10 without a driver, the sound core DSP controller can increase volume by 20%.

The noise-canceling microphone employs the ENC MIC technology, effectively fades out noises and improves your voice quality. 

When traveling or listening to music with Quake, you may detach the microphone for maximum comfort.

When playing first-person shooter games, it’s absolutely necessary to identify the sources of sounds with precision.

Quake replicates the exact location of every footstep and explosion to provide you with the most realistic virtual world experience. The mini internal vibration unit is powered by the 3.5mm headphone jack without the need for an external power source.

QUAKE is compatible with gaming and video experiences on PC, smartphone, tablets, and various mobile devices. Especially enhancing the sounds of gunshots and explosions. 

Thanks to our sample testers for reviewing Quake. Here are some comments we received from them.

 

 

Also, we have a friend test Quake when playing PUBG on YouTube. ""The sound quality is fairly good!"". Check it out！

>So.... and I'm sure you know where we are headed with this, if you send us 5 people who back Piggyback by Cimorelli, we'll give you your SINGLE set for free. Send us 10 backers and you get 2 FREE Piggyback by Cimorelli sets! And so on, and so on... 

The more backers you send our way... the more FREE sets you get! 1 FREE set for every 5 backers! We ARE watching! GO GO GO!!!

column1: We can't always share the audio we love, because rarely do we have a splitter with us. Well now, if you have a pair of Piggyback by Cimorelli Earbuds, any friend with a set of earbuds can plug into what you are listening to. More than one friend? No problem - just keep Piggyback-ing them onto each other, without any loss in volume or sound quality!

column6:
/>

Before we ship, we will send you a survey that will ask you what colour you'd like (White, Gold or Black) and confirm shipping information.

column2: >It is no real surprise in an era of ""Collaborative Consumption"", where the ""Sharing Economy"" is growing at a rapid pace, if you Google images of ""sharing earbuds"" you will find it has also become a ""thing"" of our times. Regardless of the hygiene implications, millions of people of all ages, all over the world are sharing their earbuds with friends, family, lovers and sometimes complete strangers in the coffee shop line.  Sharing what you are listening to is an intimate social behavior and our newly designed, innovative product has made it more affordable, hygienic, fashionable, in stereo, and with none of the 'sharing experience' lost!

column1: Each set of Piggyback by Cimorelli comes with a randomly selected signature card. Collect all SIX!

column4: >How is Piggyback different from the traditional Y Splitter?

column1: With the Y splitter, we found that it was inconvenient for people to carry around. Personally, we kept losing these on my trips and these cheap Y splitters took a toll on volume and audio quality. So we were wondering, ""there has to be a better way."" That's when we came up with the idea for Piggyback by Cimorelli with a built in splitter that doesn't sacrifice audio quality or volume. The nice thing with Piggyback by Cimorelli is you can link 5 Piggybacks together (for example) without harming the audio quality or volume. The same cannot be said from a cheap dollar store Y splitter. Also they do not allow you to share a conversation. You could hear one, but if you spoke, no one would hear you. Also, with Piggyback by Cimorelli, everyone connected can operate the controls. Anyone can answer a call, play or pause the music or even skip a song. Everybody’s controls work. Basic splitters don't have that level of control.
Sharing your audio has never been easier! Piggyback by Cimorelli is convenient and less expensive!

We are so confident in our quality design, that we made a prototype mould to produce a limited run of retail ready Piggyback Earbuds. We know that our product works to the highest standards which we as electronic professionals expect, and we have been sending our earbuds out to followers and bloggers to review. We are running an Indiegogo campaign to fund a high capacity mould for large production runs as well as to develop and produce tooling for our Cimorelli Packaging and Branding!

column2: >We are so much farther ahead than your typical Indiegogo project because we actually have manufactured a limited number of our product and have it at our location ready to ship as
column4: >! We do however need to create tooling for multi-unit production runs, and our retail packaging. We researched and noted that many successfully funded Indiegogo campaigns became stalled at the manufacturing stage. Therefore, early in the game we teamed up with a very successful digital accessories manufacturer to provide us with the product we have
column5: so we have already handled all the challenges that usually happen at the manufacturing stage.

WANT A FREE PAIR OF PIGGYBACK BY CIMORELLI? READ HERE!

Hey CIMFAM! Okay... a little over 39% funded and just a few days left to go. That's excellent. Thinking about what we can do to push this over the top, and noticed that Indiegogo has a 'Referrers' tracking link. What that means is, if you hit the Link button on the left of our campaign video, you get a unique link you can share, and when the people you send it to, back Piggyback by Cimorelli, we get notification that it was you, and you alone that sent that person to us.

So.... and I'm sure you know where we are headed with this, if you send us 5 people who back Piggyback by Cimorelli, we'll give you your SINGLE set for free. Send us 10 backers and you get 2 FREE Piggyback by Cimorelli sets! And so on, and so on... The more backers you send our way... the more FREE sets you get! 1 FREE set for every 5 backers! We ARE watching! GO GO GO!!!
Look at the image below for instructions:

We can't always share the audio we love, because rarely do we have a splitter with us. Well now, if you have a pair of Piggyback by Cimorelli Earbuds, any friend with a set of earbuds can plug into what you are listening to. More than one friend? No problem - just keep Piggyback-ing them onto each other, without any loss in volume or sound quality!
Before we ship, we will send you a survey that will ask you what colour you'd like (White, Gold or Black) and confirm shipping information.

It is no real surprise in an era of ""Collaborative Consumption"", where the ""Sharing Economy"" is growing at a rapid pace, if you Google images of ""sharing earbuds"" you will find it has also become a ""thing"" of our times. Regardless of the hygiene implications, millions of people of all ages, all over the world are sharing their earbuds with friends, family, lovers and sometimes complete strangers in the coffee shop line.  Sharing what you are listening to is an intimate social behavior and our newly designed, innovative product has made it more affordable, hygienic, fashionable, in stereo, and with none of the 'sharing experience' lost!
Each set of Piggyback by Cimorelli comes with a randomly selected signature card. Collect all SIX!
How is Piggyback different from the traditional Y Splitter?

With the Y splitter, we found that it was inconvenient for people to carry around. Personally, we kept losing these on my trips and these cheap Y splitters took a toll on volume and audio quality. So we were wondering, ""there has to be a better way."" That's when we came up with the idea for Piggyback by Cimorelli with a built in splitter that doesn't sacrifice audio quality or volume. The nice thing with Piggyback by Cimorelli is you can link 5 Piggybacks together (for example) without harming the audio quality or volume. The same cannot be said from a cheap dollar store Y splitter. Also they do not allow you to share a conversation. You could hear one, but if you spoke, no one would hear you. Also, with Piggyback by Cimorelli, everyone connected can operate the controls. Anyone can answer a call, play or pause the music or even skip a song. Everybody’s controls work. Basic splitters don't have that level of control.
Sharing your audio has never been easier! Piggyback by Cimorelli is convenient and less expensive!
Who's Talking About Piggyback by Cimorelli?

We are so confident in our quality design, that we made a prototype mould to produce a limited run of retail ready Piggyback Earbuds. We know that our product works to the highest standards which we as electronic professionals expect, and we have been sending our earbuds out to followers and bloggers to review. We are running an Indiegogo campaign to fund a high capacity mould for large production runs as well as to develop and produce tooling for our Cimorelli Packaging and Branding!

We are so much farther ahead than your typical Indiegogo project because we actually have manufactured a limited number of our product and have it at our location ready to ship as Early Bird Rewards! We do however need to create tooling for multi-unit production runs, and our retail packaging. We researched and noted that many successfully funded Indiegogo campaigns became stalled at the manufacturing stage. Therefore, early in the game we teamed up with a very successful digital accessories manufacturer to provide us with the product we have

The team at Hope Tech Global combined the latest advances in technology to create a unique product: KULUMI. It is the first of its kind and it will help create a brighter tomorrow for millions of people living in the Developing World.

column3: >KULUMI's features include:
>Dimmable light output that prolongs battery life

column5: > with 2GB of internal data that can hold up to 120 hours of audio content

column3: >Unique audio management system that speedily delivers 5 customizable blocks of content

column4: > a crowd of up to

column3: >5V USB output for charging mobile phones

column4: >rechargeable via either a 3W Solar panel or 9V - 20V DC

/>Hope Tech Global is staffed by a multinational team from 6 countries. This provides us with a strong global network. Our team is committed to deliver services and products with excellence through continued innovation and persistence.

Our mandate is clear: to continuously strive to provide Hope through Technology on a Global scale.

column1: Our goal for 2013 is that KULUMI will impact 100,000 families in the Developing World by providing them adequate lighting, audio education and training in their own language.

column3: >You can help us achieve this goal by picking a perk located on the right hand side. Every contribution counts, no matter how small it is!

column2:
>We have already secured the financing for tooling and have established a supply chain that can handle a production volume of 1,000,000 units a year. We have started our plastic injection tooling and are currently gearing up for a trial run of 500 units that will happen during January. The trial run will be held in strategic locations in Africa and Asia.

We now need about $80,000 to jump start our mass manufacturing that is scheduled for March next year. This amount needed is equivalent to about 3,000 units which is a decent batch size to get KULUMI mobilized for the Developing World. Our mass manufacturing will start at a slower rate if we fall short on reaching our fund raising target.
>Your support to our project will make KULUMI a reality for people living in the Developing World, and you will be one of the first to enjoy the benefits that KULUMI offers!

column1: Hope Tech Global has been in business for 4 years and we have a vast network of suppliers. We have developed products for many customers over the years, however, we came to the point where we realized that we can make better use of our resources and time. Thus we decided to focus our efforts on creating products that can make a difference for people living in the Developing World.
KULUMI is the result of our passion. The combination of a battery powered powerful LED Light and a high quality Audio Player provides several benefits.

The LED Light enables children to study at night, prevents accidents in home and helps one get around in the dark.

The Audio Player provides a platform for Audio Education and Entertainment. Many people in the Developing World are still illiterate and this capability enables them to study.  Content can be downloaded via a USB interface and you can quickly access different kinds of contents via 5 customizable segments of content.

column2:
>KULUMI includes a Li-Ion battery which means you can use it anywhere. It has a flexible recharge setup which allows you to either charge it via a solar panel or 9V - 20V DC input. So whether you are in the outdoors or connected to a stable or unstable grid you can always be sure that you can use KULUMI.

KULUMI also comes with a convenient feature that can allow you to recharge your phone via a 5V USB output. Most people in Developing World went from no access to a land-line to a mobile phone. There are many places where the mobile network is up but no grid is available to recharge their phone. KULUMI caters for this need.
>KULUMI is ready, and with your help we are going to make a dent in their universe. Pick a perk located on the right hand side and lets make it happen!

column4: />We realize that one of the most significant challenges of helping people in the Developing World is to cover the last mile and get the help to them. HTG is answering this challenge by working with organizations based in the Developing World. We are also in the process of creating a distribution system. This distribution system is built around empowering a like-minded individual who will be able to distribute products that bring Hope in their community. With this model HTG can control costs and ensure that the people who most need the product can actually get it at the best price.

It is also likely that rural families here have a member or a relative living in an urban center. Thus KULUMI has a chance to reach rural areas via these relationships. This will be one of the many distribution strategies we will be implementing.  The goal is to first establish a beach head in area where there is some resources before moving deeper into the rural areas.
