Our champion in that country will provide you with a report to show who were the recipients of KULUMI.

Hope Tech Global has prepared a global logistic solution to help deliver your reward to your country. The rewards will ship from 4 warehouses located in the USA (L.A.), EU (London), South Africa and Hong Kong. You may have to pay additional duties and VAT when receiving the reward shipment should your country be outside the region of the warehouse.
2GB provides about 120h of audio content if the audio is encoded at 32 kbit/s. Music is typically encoded at 128 kbit/s which is equal to about 30h of on 2GB memory.
Below is some extracts from the Kulumi User Manual.

Can you tell me more about Kulumi's battery life?

Kulumi has a rechargable 10Wh Li-Ion battery. It is possible to CHOOSE the degrees of illuminations depending on your circumastances. Being tri directional, you can illuminate one, two or all 3 sides, and then have the option to have them at 10% , 25% , 50% and 100% fullly illuminated. For each one of these the battery life will differ.

Below is a breakdown of the battery life using lamp at various brightness settings:

column3:
/>

The Audio Player can be used for 14h at 100% volume if the light is not used.

Kulumi should charge two phones to 100% capacity (phone dependent).

What is the bulb life like?
Kulumi consists of high power LEDs that have a long life. The minimum life of the LEDs at 100% brightness is 5 years. At lower brightness settings you can easily stretch the life of the lamp to more than 10 years. The above estimates is based on using the lamp for 4h everyday.

column1:
Kulumi has 3 sides that produce light output which adds to its robustness. Should one side fail after 5 years then the other sides will continue to work.

Why is the solar panel not integrated into the Kulumi enclosure?
Kulumi has a large Li-Ion battery (10Wh) and a small built-in solar panel can not sufficiently charge it. Thus an external solar panel allows you to fully charge the battery. You can locate the solar panel in a convenient place and you do not have to leave your Kulumi in the sun. This allows you to continue using it indoors while it is charging.

Does Kulumi have a strap or handle?
The 3 metal rods actually forms a very good handle. You can also use the metal rods to hang it on from a hook, nail or branch.

What is the weight and size of Kulumi?
Weight: 400g (0.9 pounds)
Size: 115mm x 105mm x 155mm (4.5"" x 4.1"" x 6.1"")
KULUMI and the “ Rising Sun” logo are Hope Tech Global trademarks.

","The team at Hope Tech Global combined the latest advances in technology to create a unique product: KULUMI. It is the first of its kind and it will help create a brighter tomorrow for millions of people living in the Developing World.

column1: Powerful 400 lumens LED light (equivalent to a 40W light bulb)
Dimmable light output that prolongs battery life
An Audio Player with 2GB of internal data that can hold up to 120 hours of audio content (Expandable to 32 GB)
Unique audio management system that speedily delivers 5 customizable blocks of content
Built-in 2W speaker that enables a crowd of up to 20 people to hear audio content
5V USB output for charging mobile phones
KULUMI is rechargeable via either a 3W Solar panel or 9V - 20V DC

Hope Tech Global is staffed by a multinational team from 6 countries. This provides us with a strong global network. Our team is committed to deliver services and products with excellence through continued innovation and persistence. Our mandate is clear: to continuously strive to provide Hope through Technology on a Global scale.
Our goal for 2013 is that KULUMI will impact 100,000 families in the Developing World by providing them adequate lighting, audio education and training in their own language.
You can help us achieve this goal by picking a perk located on the right hand side. Every contribution counts, no matter how small it is!
What We Need & What You Get

We have already secured the financing for tooling and have established a supply chain that can handle a production volume of 1,000,000 units a year. We have started our plastic injection tooling and are currently gearing up for a trial run of 500 units that will happen during January. The trial run will be held in strategic locations in Africa and Asia. We now need about $80,000 to jump start our mass manufacturing that is scheduled for March next year. This amount needed is equivalent to about 3,000 units which is a decent batch size to get KULUMI mobilized for the Developing World. Our mass manufacturing will start at a slower rate if we fall short on reaching our fund raising target.
Your support to our project will make KULUMI a reality for people living in the Developing World, and you will be one of the first to enjoy the benefits that KULUMI offers!

Hope Tech Global has been in business for 4 years and we have a vast network of suppliers. We have developed products for many customers over the years, however, we came to the point where we realized that we can make better use of our resources and time. Thus we decided to focus our efforts on creating products that can make a difference for people living in the Developing World.

So whether you are in the outdoors or connected to a stable or unstable grid you can always be sure that you can use KULUMI.KULUMI also comes with a convenient feature that can allow you to recharge your phone via a 5V USB output. Most people in Developing World went from no access to a land-line to a mobile phone. There are many places where the mobile network is up but no grid is available to recharge their phone. KULUMI caters for this need.
KULUMI is ready, and with your help we are going to make a dent in their universe. Pick a perk located on the right hand side and lets make it happen!

We realize that one of the most significant challenges of helping people in the Developing World is to cover the last mile and get the help to them. HTG is answering this challenge by working with organizations based in the Developing World. We are also in the process of creating a distribution system. This distribution system is built around empowering a like-minded individual who will be able to distribute products that bring Hope in their community. With this model HTG can control costs and ensure that the people who most need the product can actually get it at the best price.

It is also likely that rural families here have a member or a relative living in an urban center. Thus KULUMI has a chance to reach rural areas via these relationships. Who Are We?

We founded Freq Industries in 2009 fueled by a passion for innovative products. Our two young Canadian founders have dedicated themselves to creating only the best and most inspiring wireless audio products. Since our founding we have dreamed up a product never before seen in the world of consumer electronics, and with the help of contributors we will bring this product to life.

The $25,000 we aim to raise will go directly to manufacturing 11s™ - A new wireless speaker system which kicks the asses of our competitors. We have successfully created and exhibited working prototypes and are now taking the next step and producing consumer ready speakers.
When you contribute to Freq, you get to take part in our journey to market. Our perks range from personalized updates on our business to putting your name on one of the first pairs of speakers made.
What Else Can You Do?
Our business is about making noise, and we’d love for you to join in. Spread the word about our business and our perks through Indiegogo’s sharing tools and your own social media.

11s use a new wireless audio standard, SKAA™: a plug and play technology for your portable devices. SKAA was developed by Canadian company Eleven Engineering specifically for high quality audio and out performs competitors beyond expectation.
USB Transmitter shown here. Works with all operating systems without drivers or application limitations

column2:
>A handmade product combines fashion and technologies

Jelly Galaxy is the first-of-its-kind that manufactured more than 80% by hands. An unique gadget that not only perfects itself  in  functionality, but also merges fashion and technologies. Have you ever considered an earphones to be so beautiful and so personal like a jewelry? Jelly Galaxy can full fill your taste in both music and style. Just give it your playlist, then you will stand out of the crowd.

Ultimate design for in-ear earphones

After hundreds of design drafts and dozens of different prototypes, we finally made Jelly Galaxy that is beautifully and minimally designed.

Pushing the limits of handmade manufacturing, the housings are designed to have no recognizable lids or edges. An unibody design that brings you the smoothness touch from top to bottom, and ultimately unifies all parts together in the Blue Galaxy themes.

Jelly Galaxy has the most functional minimalistic design ever. Y split and Jack with the maximum OD of 5mm enhance your daily usage by optimizing your finger placement when connect/disconnect to your smartphone. No more struggles finding the way in for your oversized audio jack through your smartphone case. With its minimalist 3.5mm audio input jack, you are free to enjoy your music session despite how small your phone case is.

Difference from other mass produced earphones, each Jelly Galaxy’s color are uniquely mixed by our experienced artisans. Regarding to Galaxy theme, it is created to have a deep, rich color, but still has a transparent feelings when you look at the housings. Its color is so unique, that each Jelly Galaxy has their own Galaxy in them. Each one is one of a kind.

Specs and Functions

Multi-task controller simplifies the way you use smartphones. Press once to accept incoming calls or play/pause music. Press twice to cancel phone calls or jump to your next favorite song. Triple click to jump to previous song and press hold to mute conversations. Crossing the line to bring the ultimate experience, it is designed to perform for both Android and iOS, so no matter what operating system you are using, we ensure you the finest experience.

Slim, smooth and edgeless. Jelly Galaxy’s controller takes the minimalist and unibody design to unify its overall structure. Building such a elegant and sophisticated piece pushing our artisans to overcome their limits. Differ from other mass produced control boards, each part of Jelly Galaxy’s  controller is carefully stringed onto cable before assembled. From this point on, even one single abrading mistake can cause huge damage. It requires the highest concentration and great experience for this process to create this detailed and marvelous piece. Simply perfect!

A 9mm dynamic driver with ability to deliver high sensitive SPL (Sound Pressure Level) in 110-120 range. This translate into quicker time and more vibrant audio. We have been working on dozens of prototypes to perfect the finest sound quality. 9mm dynamic driver lies a 35-degree angle of nozzle creating a larger, deeper soundstage compared to other IEM in the same price range. The balance between bass, mid and treble is also increased significantly by our customly made filter. No more weighty bass that overwhelms all the rest, no more bright treble that causes inconvenience every time you listen for long period. Put it on! and you’re gonna be amazed at its wonderful sound.

column1:
Special Features

Droplet shaped housing with a smooth 45-degree nozzle comfortably sits in your ear canal. This innovative design not only increases fitness, but also seals completely against your ear. And thank to its lightweight material, you can wear Jelly Galaxy all day long sitting, running, lying without any inconvenience.

Made of highly durable materials, protected by latest 2K coating technologies help decline chances of damage caused by sweat or rain, so you can fully enjoy your music in gym or even on the run.

Signal cable is knitted from four soft wires, This new improvement brings the more comfortable feeling to users. The cable is so light and soft that you don’t even feel its gentle touch on your skin.  It’s not only fashionable but also very durable, and very useful at preventing tangle when you keep them in pocket.

From Complexity to Simplicity

Each Jelly Galaxy has to get through 22 phases of complex hand processing to complete its simplistic design. The teardrop housings contain 3 different layers to create the transparent, deep, rich theme. They are precisely abraded in hours to achieve the smooth body that you can’t even distinguish edges between them. These processes require absolute concentration. Due to the unique texture on each earphones, our artisans need to stay focus on each one to locate their special texture, and enhance them through abrading and polishing. In that way, we deliver to you specially handmade earphones that no mass produced product is capable of.

The same process goes through Y split and audio Jack. At the moment they’re taken out from moulds. They are abraded by 6 different types of sandpapers to ensure the best smoothness surface for polishing. The maximum OD of 5mm  is a real challenge to our artisans. Rounding such a small piece requires precise pressure and proper hand movement. Too much force can cause deformation, too fast will cause discoloration. It requires such a huge effort to perfect these small details.

Even the strain relief part is carefully knitted from cotton viber to outline its outstanding handmade features.

After all the crucial details have been done. It takes another 2 hours to polish and 5 more to finally finish before packed and stored. So, everytime you wear it, you can be proud that your Jelly Galaxy is a 48-hour-of hardwork and passion. It is unique, and it is specially made for you!

Active package

Taking minimalism to the highest level,  we decided to create a package, that not only represents the elegant and marvelous texture of Jelly Galaxy, but also simplify users experience into one single case.

Made of the same material, each case has to go through 12 hand-processed phases before packing its beautiful earphones inside. We use total 8 types of sandpapers and spend at least 5 hours abrading on each one to ensure the finest shape.  Even its color is carefully mixed to have the same texture as Jelly Galaxy.

You will find your daily usage easier than ever with our minimalistic case. It not only shows itself as a display package, but also a fully functional travel case. Now you worry no more about unexpected scratches.The case is specially designed to preserve housings in the safest way, thank to 2 custom holders in central pole. It is even designed with custom lock to ensure the highest safety for your Jelly Galaxy.

The cable is logically organized by wrapping around its main pole, so no untangling furiousity is guaranteed!

And when it’s time for a new pair of tips, just look them up on the other half!

column2: >“It’s not only a good earphone, but also a stylish jewelry. This “made in Vietnam” earphone achieves both sound quality and unique imprint design. thank to its handcraft process.”

>“Unlike other mass production earphones manufacturers, Joinhandmade created a very unique headset. From the out-look, design, to sound quality, all show the care and passion of the team. To produce a finished earphones, each stage of processing is taken carefully and delicately, just to create a stylish and unique handmade earphones for users.”

column1: We are all audiophiles and beauty fanatics here in Joinhandmade. We have concerned more than hundred of drafts and sketches in this journey because we strived to develop an earphones that pushes the limit of beauty and functionality. Smartphone, tablet, wireless internet and other high-tech equipment have almost got human online 24/7. Perhaps this has made people lose concentration, which affects our creativity. Therefore, making and using handmade products are the alternative ways for us to escape from that virtual world, to perceive the real world with high concentration and thereby maintain the inherent creativity of mankind. In the world of technology, of modern and mass production, more and more people desire to own something unique and having some “human” in it. That’s what handmade gifts are made for, isn’t it?

After 3 years working in this project, our team realized that we can actually do more than what we think if we are not afraid to fail. Keeping that in mind, we’ve dedicated ourselves  to provide amazing features to make your personal time more styleful and enjoyable.
Join our journey and explore the possibilities!

Greater development requires enormous resources to achieve, but if we want Jelly Galaxy to be the ultimate earphones, we need your thoughts, comments, and support for this project. All the funding will go into creating and manufacturing  Jelly Galaxy. Anything from a comment to monetary support means a lot to us. Our team is eager to back up your ideas to improve the Jelly Galaxy  and take it to our designers to deliver. And don’t forget to share with your social media networks.

10/2014 - Jelly Galaxy project launched

3/2015 - Target to Indiegogo
Why does Jelly Galaxy take so much time to make?

Because 80% of Jelly Galaxy’s production is handmade . From moulding, coloring to polishing, they’re all carried by our wonderful artisans. Since each Jelly Galaxy’s texture is unique, it require our artisans to precisely locate and enhance them by hours of abrading and polishing. At the end, we totally spend at least 48 hour to finish this smooth, edgeless handmade beauty.
Yes! We will send you your pair of Jelly Galaxy earphones wherever you are in the world! Shipment only costs 15$ and we guarantee it will be yours in 10 working days!
To pay for it, just add an additional 15$ to your contribution amount when submitting your order.
GenK: Mở hộp tai nghe Jelly Galaxy phiên bản có mic: thủ công và tinh xảo
Tinhte: Joinhandmade giới thiệu Jelly Galaxy, tai nghe Việt Nam giá 35$ cho những ai đặt trước

In that way, we deliver to you specially handmade earphones that no mass produced product is capable of.The same process goes through Y split and audio Jack. At the moment they’re taken out from moulds. They are abraded by 6 different types of sandpapers to ensure the best smoothness surface for polishing. The maximum OD of 5mm  is a real challenge to our artisans. Rounding such a small piece requires precise pressure and proper hand movement. Too much force can cause deformation, too fast will cause discoloration. It requires such a huge effort to perfect these small details.Even the strain relief part is carefully knitted from cotton viber to outline its outstanding handmade features.After all the crucial details have been done. It takes another 2 hours to polish and 5 more to finally finish before packed and stored. So, everytime you wear it, you can be proud that your Jelly Galaxy is a 48-hour-of hardwork and passion. It is unique, and it is specially made for you!Active packageTaking minimalism to the highest level,  we decided to create a package, that not only represents the elegant and marvelous texture of Jelly Galaxy, but also simplify users experience into one single case.Made of the same material, each case has to go through 12 hand-processed phases before packing its beautiful earphones inside. We use total 8 types of sandpapers and spend at least 5 hours abrading on each one to ensure the finest shape.  Even its color is carefully mixed to have the same texture as Jelly Galaxy.You will find your daily usage easier than ever with our minimalistic case. It not only shows itself as a display package, but also a fully functional travel case. Now you worry no more about unexpected scratches.The case is specially designed to preserve housings in the safest way, thank to 2 custom holders in central pole. It is even designed with custom lock to ensure the highest safety for your Jelly Galaxy.The cable is logically organized by wrapping around its main pole, so no untangling furiousity is guaranteed!And when it’s time for a new pair of tips, just look them up on the other half!
Genk.vn - “It’s not only a good earphone, but also a stylish jewelry. This “made in Vietnam” earphone achieves both sound quality and unique imprint design. thank to its handcraft process.”

Charles Bonn (Head-fi) - “Unlike other mass production earphones manufacturers, Joinhandmade created a very unique headset. From the out-look, design, to sound quality, all show the care and passion of the team. To produce a finished earphones, each stage of processing is taken carefully and delicately, just to create a stylish and unique handmade earphones for users.”

We are all audiophiles and beauty fanatics here in Joinhandmade. We have concerned more than hundred of drafts and sketches in this journey because we strived to develop an earphones that pushes the limit of beauty and functionality. Smartphone, tablet, wireless internet and other high-tech equipment have almost got human online 24/7. Perhaps this has made people lose concentration, which affects our creativity. Therefore, making and using handmade products are the alternative ways for us to escape from that virtual world, to perceive the real world with high concentration and thereby maintain the inherent creativity of mankind. In the world of technology, of modern and mass production, more and more people desire to own something unique and having some “human” in it. That’s what handmade gifts are made for, isn’t it?

After 3 years working in this project, our team realized that we can actually do more than what we think if we are not afraid to fail. Keeping that in mind, we’ve dedicated ourselves  to provide amazing features to make your personal time more styleful and enjoyable.
Join our journey and explore the possibilities!

Greater development requires enormous resources to achieve, but if we want Jelly Galaxy to be the ultimate earphones, we need your thoughts, comments, and support for this project. All the funding will go into creating and manufacturing  Jelly Galaxy. Anything from a comment to monetary support means a lot to us. Our team is eager to back up your ideas to improve the Jelly Galaxy  and take it to our designers to deliver. And don’t forget to share with your social media networks.
10/2014 - Jelly Galaxy project launched3/2015 - Target to Indiegogo
Why does Jelly Galaxy take so much time to make?

Because 80% of Jelly Galaxy’s production is handmade . From moulding, coloring to polishing, they’re all carried by our wonderful artisans. Since each Jelly Galaxy’s texture is unique, it require our artisans to precisely locate and enhance them by hours of abrading and polishing. At the end, we totally spend at least 48 hour to finish this smooth, edgeless handmade beauty.
Yes! We will send you your pair of Jelly Galaxy earphones wherever you are in the world! Shipment only costs 15$ and we guarantee it will be yours in 10 working days!
How do I pay for shipment?
To pay for it, just add an additional 15$ to your contribution amount when submitting your order.
GenK: Mở hộp tai nghe Jelly Galaxy phiên bản có mic: thủ công và tinh xảo
Tinhte: Joinhandmade giới thiệu Jelly Galaxy, tai nghe Việt Nam giá 35$ cho những ai đặt trước

Plasmonic is the first synthesizer plugin by Rhizomatic Software Synthesis, founded by Brian Clevinger.

Plasmonic combines the resonant depth of physical modeling with subtractive synthesis. My goal is for Plasmonic to approach the depth and detail of an acoustic instrument, while making it easy to shape the sound into anything you want. Its deep modulation capability and MPE support make it very playable and expressive. 

 

Filters

The heart of Plasmonic is a self-oscillating waveguide/multimode ladder filter pair, which can be configured in parallel or in series. Each filter can take any combination of the audio sources as input. This creates some very interesting sonic interactions between the audio source and the feedback loop of the waveguide.

Sources

Audio sources include two wavetable oscillators, a sample-based impulse generator (built-in samples only), and a filtered noise generator. Both oscillators have waveform transformations which nicely complement the waveguide. The impulse generator is especially suited for making the waveguide ring. 

Master Channel

The master section contains a 3-band EQ, a saturator which can be polyphonic or monophonic, modulated delay effects and a final resonator effect. Like the waveguide, the delay effects are capable of self-oscillation, which can lead to all kinds of sonic mayhem.

Modulation

Modulation is deep and makes it easy to add detail and life to the sound. Each parameter has a popup panel displaying the depth, polarity and inversion of each modulation source, allowing unprecedented control. Currently there are 5 ADSR envelopes, 3 LFOs, a triggered random source, as well as midi control inputs. Development of the modulation section is evolving rapidly, and I intend to make it as fun and flexible as possible.

Interface

A resizable, single-panel user interface makes it easy to see where the dynamics of the patch are happening. 

Sounds

I have already been contacted by many top-level sound designers who want to create sounds for Plasmonic. Plasmonic always surprises me when creating my own patches, and I can’t wait to hear what others will come up with! 

Specs

* 4 audio sources:

    * 2 wavetable oscillators with dynamic wave transformations

    * A special impulse generator for making the waveguide ring

    * A noise generator with its own resonant lowpass filter

    

* 2 interacting filters:

    * A self-oscillating waveguide provides organic resonance

    * A multimode self-oscillating ladder filter: LP, HP, BP, 1, 2 and 4 pole 

    * Each filter can take any combination of audio sources

    * Can be configured in series or parallel

 

* Polyphonic saturation

* Self-oscillating delay effects

* Deep, precise modulation system

* Multiple ADSR and LFOs with unique features

* 6 configurable control macros

* MPE support

* NKS compatible

* Resizable single-panel graphic interface

* macOS: AU, VST 2 and 3, standalone, 64 bit

* Windows: VST 2 and 3, standalone, 64 bit

 

About Rhizomatic and Brian Clevinger

I’m the creator and primary developer of Native Instruments Absynth 1-5. I have 20 years experience developing synthesis software which is used by thousands of musicians in countless major music productions and films. I am always thinking about how to maximize the sonic and creative potential of my instrument designs. I know what it takes to develop reliable, cpu efficient software of the highest audio quality.

Risks and challenges

I’m very aware of what it takes to produce a professional software instrument, as well as what can go wrong! 
There are still many details to complete, but Plasmonic is at an advanced stage now and the most challenging work is done. 
There is always a chance release could be delayed a couple of months, I do not wish to release an unfinished product. I will keep backers informed of the progress and let them know of any delays. 

Release Target
Summer 2020. 

 

Videos:

Plucked/hammered sounds with polyphonic pitch bend
The original Rhizomatic teaser, all sounds made with Plasmonic...

The world's first All-in-One Home Music Player.

We love music, and it's everywhere. On our smartphone, our Mac/PC, or in the cloud. Olive ONE gives you convenient access to all your music, through one simple touchscreen interface. And it features our award-winning audiophile sound technology so you can enjoy your music in amazing quality.

column3: >

column1: No need to fumble for your smartphone. ONE comes with a gorgeous touchscreen!

We are a successful but small company that has developed high-end digital music servers since 2005. So why are we asking for your help? The answer is simple: We believe the idea behind Olive ONE is big--too big for our existing audiophile channel. Here’s why:

We want to build ONE to YOUR specification: Not only should you be able to get ONE in your favorite color and pattern, but also with the features you want. The hard- and software platform of ONE is very powerful. So powerful that we cannot envision all its possibilities. We want you to be part of our development team, and help us realize its potential.

Help speed up go-to-market: Your feedback is crucial to guide our development team, and help us to get it to market quickly. Your input will make the ONE instantaneously successful, because you'll be the driving force behind it!

Audiophile quality at an affordable price: We have only used best-in-class audio components and finest aluminum and glass materials for ONE. If we sell it through our regular distribution channel, the price will more than triple.
There are hundreds of networked music players, docking stations and other digital music players out there. But none of the other combine all these incredible features:
• Access to all your music through one simple touchscreen interface
• Open architecture for app developers and artist
• Customizable design with fine aluminum and glass materials
The Olive ONE does. And with your help it can become even better.

column3: >

column1: It smiles with every track you play!

column2: >A true Wireless HD docking station. No docking required.

column1: When designing ONE we thought it would be nice to connect all your portable gadgets and music libraries, and never ever have to deal with connectors and adapters again. So we simply packed it with the latest-and-greatest wireless technologies:

column2: title=""Packed with the best in wireless technologies""/>

column3: >

column1: Never worry about connectors again. ONE connects wirelessly to all your favorite gadgets and your network!
The Olive ONE has a digital out (RCA, coax) and analog out connector (3.5mm) so you can connect ONE to your amplifier, receiver, or external DAC. Gigabit Ethernet connectivity is now also built-in!

column2: >Plays all the music in the world.

column1: If you are like us, you love music. So we made sure ONE plays all of it:
• We plan to support all major music services like e.g. Pandora or Spotify. ONE is easily upgradeable through the internet, so you can tell us which services we should add next.
• Play music from cloud services like Amazon Locker, iTunes Match and Google Play. Or use ONE as your own — subscription free — home music cloud (see built-in HDD below).
• Streaming is great, if your network is stable. Music stored on ONE’s internal HDD (optional) plays instantly, and can be mixed any way you like. No buffering, no advertising breaks.
Plays all your music. Even the bad one.

If you have more than one room — and we hope you do — you can simply add ONE to each room and play the same or different songs. It takes one simple button-click to connect ONE to your network (via WPS).

Like most other music players (yawn!) we will offer iPhone, iPad or Android Apps to control ONE (Update: Due to the many requests we have received from our backers we have added Windows Phone 8 to our app development roadmap). We also plan to offer a web interface, so you can display the user interface on your TV.
Cool apps, even cooler TV interface. Let us know what you want to see on your big screen!

column2: >Smart. Social. Open. The ONE Music OS.

column1: We believe the Music Operating System is one of the key benefits of ONE, and where you will have the biggest impact in its development. It is revolutionary in three areas:
Smart: ONE learns from your listening habits. So the more you play, the smarter it gets.
Social: Connect ONE to your social networks, and post or tweet your favorite music discoveries.
Open: As a true crowd-powered device, ONE is built on open architecture and engages everyone that cares about music.
Working together to build the best music experience for your home.

Music lovers: As a backer of the project you are an active member of our development team. We'll ask you for feedback frequently and let the community vote on key features, design issues and other exciting stuff. Your involvement doesn't stop once the product is shipped to you. We have put a ""Hotline"" function directly into the user interface, allowing you to submit feedback right from your Olive ONE touchscreen and directly to our engineers in San Francisco.

Artists: Our vision is that Olive ONE will become the platform of choice for you — beloved jazz ensembles, garage bands, and rock stars — to deliver Studio Master Quality recordings directly to their fans. The Open Music Platform serves as the backbone. We even plan to integrate crowdfunding functionality so you can fund your projects directly through ONE. A crowdfunded music player doing crowdfunding. How cool is that?
App Developers: Geeks unite! We will be providing a Software Development Kit that will allow you to take advantage of the powerful hard- and software platform and build the coolest music apps.

Graphic Designers and Creative artist: Our goal is to make ONE completely customizable (we need special machinery for this). So you can design your ONE in the most amazing colors and designs you can imagine. We are already in talks with some famous designers that would love to wrap ONE in their distinctive design patterns, but more about this later ...

Industrial Designers: Don't like our design? Tough luck (just kidding). While the first ONE is already designed, we are open to feedback from industrial designers on how to design our roadmap of great new products. So if you are one of the many talented designers out there. We love to hear from you, and will put your proposal up for vote!

column3: >

column1: Everyone can participate! ONE looks good in any color.
We have built HD music servers for more than 7 years, and love the benefits that come with an internal hard drive. That is why you can choose to get your ONE with an ultra-quiet 2.5” AV drive:
• Enjoy instant access to your music, without buffering or relying on your internet connection, Mac or PC.
• Use the Olive Home Cloud Service* to access all the music on your ONE, anywhere in the world. No monthly subscription fee.
• Add time-shifting* to your internet radio. Play, pause, forward and rewind at any time. Or schedule recordings of your favorite show. Try this with your radio at home!
• Automatically sync ONE* with your music libraries on your PC or Mac.
*Some features will be implemented via software update at a later point in time.
Our team of audio engineers combines an impressive 150 years of experience in perfecting sound quality at Olive, and other leading audiophile brands. And they don't even look that old.

The Abso!ute Sound, Editors' Choice
""The coolest thing since crushed ice!""

What HiFi?, Editors' Choice
""Superb Hi-Fi sound quality!""

New York Times, David Pogue
""Olive has made an offer you can't refuse.""

WIRED magazine
""Olive has arrived to save us from mediocrity.""

Rolling Stone magazine
""Gear of the year!""
With your help the new Olive ONE can deliver the same stunning sound quality, at an affordable price. The press thinks the same:

column2: >Designed by you. With the finest materials.

column1: Can't argue about taste? We beg to differ and wrapped ONE in a solid aluminum and glass construction, not cheap plastic. The real cool thing however is that you can give it your personal touch by choosing a color, pattern or your own digital wallpaper. If we reach our extended goal of $1M we will buy some of the specialized machinery and equipment to custom-design the ONE to your liking. It’s your own limited edition ONE.
Customize your ONE with different colors and patterns!
If you like what we do and this campaign is successful we have many other great ideas: from a stackable speaker system to beautiful LED modules to invisible mounting. Join us to make them happen.

column4: >

column1: The Olive ONE BOX is a single cabinet full-range stereo speaker. Add another Olive ONE BOX and experience stereo sound with perfect channel separation and soundstage.
ONE looks even good on your wall. Speakers can be mounted as well.

column2: >Where Are We In the Development Process?

column1: Though we were already working on a multi-room player in late 2008, the current design and open platform idea was born in October 2011. Today Olive ONE's revolutionary hard- and software platform and its beautiful design are almost finished, but it's ""only"" the infrastructure (or backbone). We need your ideas and direct participation to bring it to live. Here is what we have done so far and plan to do in the upcoming months:

column3: >

column1: ONE is not our first project. We have it all planned out.
Without your help we will need to sell Olive ONE through our existing audiophile channel. This means it will ...
By backing us now, you will become an active member of our development team, and help us realize the full potential of this great product concept.
We have working prototypes and a supply chain that’s ready to go. We need your help to take the next step. We see the following funding milestones:

• We will use the first $200,000 raised through the campaign to buy tooling and enhance our manufacturing. For cost-efficient manufacturing of the aluminum enclosure we need an expensive die cast tooling, and there are additional tools for the glass plate, connectors and cabling that add up quickly.
• Get us to $650,000 and we will give every ONE free shipping.*
• At $750,000 we will upgrade every backer to an extended 2 year warranty, up from the standard 1 year.*

• At the goal of $1,000,000 we will we able to purchase some of the specialized machinery, equipment and hire additional staff required to customize some components of the Olive ONE to your personal preference.

The participation in creating Olive ONE is a great gift to give for any occassion. We have many perks at all price levels. All of them have one thing in common: they let you (or your loved one) participate in the greatest music revolution since Apple's iPod!
Here is a quick summary of our coolest perks:

$50 Gift Card: Your entry ticket to join the music revolution! You will be part of our development team and we will include you in all the decisions we put up for vote. Apply it to the purchase of an Olive ONE once it ships.
$100 Gift Card: Same as the $50 Gift Card, just twice the fun!
Limited quantities: Get your ONE for only $379. Plus FREE US shipping and Olive Care Program that extends the warranty to two years ($100 value).
And by the way, we ship to 220 countries world-wide!

We are a team of music lovers, engineers and scientists that have built audiophile-grade HD Music Servers since 2005. Today Olive products are sold in more than 50 countries around the world, and we have developed a small but loyal fan base. Our company is based in the heart of San Francisco, at the intersection of technology, design, and music. And as crazy as it sounds, we also hand-built all our products here. With the introduction of Olive ONE we plan to bring our award-winning audiophile sound quality to everyone, and evolve into a truly customer-driven development and design center.

Olive ships to more than 220 countries worldwide.  If you are unsure that we ship to your country please contact us at info [at] olivehd.com and we will confirm. Please always add international freight costs to your perk (specified at each perk level).
Why does the Olive ONE sound better than any other digital music player out there?
If you’re an audiophile, you’ll be impressed by our 32-bit/384kHz Burr-Brown DAC and its dual HD amplifiers. If you’re not an audiophile, here’s all you need to know: Wow.

Home Entertainment (USA)
""The Olive sounded absolutely superb!""

WhatHi-Fi?, Editors' Choice (UK)
""This is 21st century hi-fi: Superb to live with and listen to.""

Financial Times (UK)
""A whole-house audio system capable of delivering top-quality sound.""

AudioVideo revolution (USA)
""Excellent, punchy bass, plenty of soundstage depth, and great musical flow!""

STEREO, Reference Class (Germany)
""Sound quality and design are top notch!""

The Sunday Morning Herald (Australia)
""iPod-style convenience and optimum quality!""
How far are you in the development of Olive ONE and when will it be ready?

Pretty far. The hard- and software platform and the industrial design are basically done, and we have the first production samples already at our SF office (come by and see us!). Now we need your help to finish the software, buy tooling and expand our manufacturing capabilities. If all goes well we plan to ship the first ONE in July 2013.
How can I control the Olive ONE?

The Olive ONE can be controlled via the built-in touchscreen or our free iPhone, iPad and Android apps. Additionally you can view the user interface on the big screen, if your TV supports a standard web browser interface.
How do I know if I need a hard drive?

If you have an existing digital music library (e.g. on your Mac or PC) and you don’t want to stream it, then get the version with the hard drive. If you have lots of CDs we recommend to take advantage of our pre-load service (we use a bunch of robots to load all your CDs onto your ONE.). At the end of the day, the hard drive makes you independent from the network. We are also working on a subscription-free Home Cloud Service that will let you access the music on your ONE, anywhere in the world.
How can I customize my Olive ONE?

If we reach the $1M benchmark we will buy special machinery that allows you to define the color and pattern of the enclosure, glass surface and digital wallpaper. We have developed a cool customization tool that allows you to preview how your customized design will look like. You can even save those designs and share them with other backers (and enter a contest to win a prize).
What are the detailed Specs of Olive ONE?
• UPnP/DLNA: Play music from your Mac, PC or NAS
• Multi-room music streaming: Add ONE to each room and play the same or different songs
• Use the free iOS or Android app to control your ONE
• Smart: Using our patented SESSION technology Olive ONE learns from your listening habits. The more you play, the smarter it gets.

• Social: ONE integrates seamlessly into your favorite social networks. Post or tweet your favorite new music discovery with one simple touch of a button. Or rate, review and share your love for music with the Olive community.

• Open: If we reach critical mass (i.e. number of units) the ONE platform will be interesting to app developers and artists. We are working on a Software Development Kit so developers can deliver cool music apps. And we have designed an Open Music Platform that allows artists to bring you studio master quality recordings directly to you.
• Best-in-class Burr-Brown 32-bit/384kHz Digital-Analog-Converter with amazing SNR of 112dB!
• Dual HD amplifiers for direct output to your speakers.
• 24-bit DSP with our patented technology that dynamically adapts the sound output to your brand and model speakers, as well as music genre and other acoustic parameters
• Digital output: S/PDIF (RCA, coax) for connection to amplifier/receiver. USB for output to supported USB DACs.
• Ultra-quiet 2.5” AV hard drive with up to 2TB stores a maximum of 6,000 albums in CD quality, or 20,000 HD tracks. Enjoy instant access without relying on your network or Mac/PC.
• Home Cloud Service: Access music stored on your ONE, anywhere in the world.
• Olive ONE is built out of the finest aluminum and glass materials. If we reach critical mass we can customize your ONE to your favorite color or pattern and hand-built it in San Francisco, USA.
I have more questions. Who do I ask?

We love to hear from you. Simply shoot us an email to info [at] olivehd.com and we will get back to you quickly.

Smart: ONE learns from your listening habits. So the more you play, the smarter it gets.
Social: Connect ONE to your social networks, and post or tweet your favorite music discoveries.
Open: As a true crowd-powered device, ONE is built on open architecture and engages everyone that cares about music.
Working together to build the best music experience for your home.

Music lovers: As a backer of the project you are an active member of our development team. We'll ask you for feedback frequently and let the community vote on key features, design issues and other exciting stuff. Your involvement doesn't stop once the product is shipped to you. We have put a ""Hotline"" function directly into the user interface, allowing you to submit feedback right from your Olive ONE touchscreen and directly to our engineers in San Francisco.

Artists: Our vision is that Olive ONE will become the platform of choice for you — beloved jazz ensembles, garage bands, and rock stars — to deliver Studio Master Quality recordings directly to their fans. The Open Music Platform serves as the backbone. We even plan to integrate crowdfunding functionality so you can fund your projects directly through ONE. A crowdfunded music player doing crowdfunding. How cool is that?
App Developers: Geeks unite! We will be providing a Software Development Kit that will allow you to take advantage of the powerful hard- and software platform and build the coolest music apps.

Graphic Designers and Creative artist: Our goal is to make ONE completely customizable (we need special machinery for this). So you can design your ONE in the most amazing colors and designs you can imagine. We are already in talks with some famous designers that would love to wrap ONE in their distinctive design patterns, but more about this later ...

Industrial Designers: Don't like our design? Tough luck (just kidding). While the first ONE is already designed, we are open to feedback from industrial designers on how to design our roadmap of great new products. So if you are one of the many talented designers out there. We love to hear from you, and will put your proposal up for vote!
Everyone can participate! ONE looks good in any color.
We have built HD music servers for more than 7 years, and love the benefits that come with an internal hard drive. That is why you can choose to get your ONE with an ultra-quiet 2.5” AV drive:
Enjoy instant access to your music, without buffering or relying on your internet connection, Mac or PC.
Use the Olive Home Cloud Service* to access all the music on your ONE, anywhere in the world. No monthly subscription fee.
Add time-shifting* to your internet radio. Play, pause, forward and rewind at any time. Or schedule recordings of your favorite show. Try this with your radio at home!
Automatically sync ONE* with your music libraries on your PC or Mac.
*Some features will be implemented via software update at a later point in time.
Our team of audio engineers combines an impressive 150 years of experience in perfecting sound quality at Olive, and other leading audiophile brands. And they don't even look that old.
The Abso!ute Sound, Editors' Choice ""The coolest thing since crushed ice!""What HiFi?, Editors' Choice ""Superb Hi-Fi sound quality!""
New York Times, David Pogue ""Olive has made an offer you can't refuse.""
WIRED magazine ""Olive has arrived to save us from mediocrity.""Rolling Stone magazine ""Gear of the year!""
With your help the new Olive ONE can deliver the same stunning sound quality, at an affordable price. The press thinks the same:
Designed by you. With the finest materials.

Can't argue about taste? We beg to differ and wrapped ONE in a solid aluminum and glass construction, not cheap plastic. The real cool thing however is that you can give it your personal touch by choosing a color, pattern or your own digital wallpaper. If we reach our extended goal of $1M we will buy some of the specialized machinery and equipment to custom-design the ONE to your liking. It’s your own limited edition ONE.
Customize your ONE with different colors and patterns!
If you like what we do and this campaign is successful we have many other great ideas: from a stackable speaker system to beautiful LED modules to invisible mounting. Join us to make them happen.
The Olive ONE BOX is a single cabinet full-range stereo speaker. Add another Olive ONE BOX and experience stereo sound with perfect channel separation and soundstage.
ONE looks even good on your wall. Speakers can be mounted as well.
Where Are We In the Development Process?

Though we were already working on a multi-room player in late 2008, the current design and open platform idea was born in October 2011. Today Olive ONE's revolutionary hard- and software platform and its beautiful design are almost finished, but it's ""only"" the infrastructure (or backbone). We need your ideas and direct participation to bring it to live. Here is what we have done so far and plan to do in the upcoming months:
ONE is not our first project. We have it all planned out.
Without your help we will need to sell Olive ONE through our existing audiophile channel. This means it will ...
Be sold a considerably higher price,
By backing us now, you will become an active member of our development team, and help us realize the full potential of this great product concept.
We have working prototypes and a supply chain that’s ready to go. We need your help to take the next step. We see the following funding milestones:

We will use the first $200,000 raised through the campaign to buy tooling and enhance our manufacturing. For cost-efficient manufacturing of the aluminum enclosure we need an expensive die cast tooling, and there are additional tools for the glass plate, connectors and cabling that add up quickly.
Get us to $650,000 and we will give every ONE free shipping.*
At $750,000 we will upgrade every backer to an extended 2 year warranty, up from the standard 1 year.*

At the goal of $1,000,000 we will we able to purchase some of the specialized machinery, equipment and hire additional staff required to customize some components of the Olive ONE to your personal preference.

The participation in creating Olive ONE is a great gift to give for any occassion. We have many perks at all price levels. All of them have one thing in common: they let you (or your loved one) participate in the greatest music revolution since Apple's iPod!
Here is a quick summary of our coolest perks:

$50 Gift Card: Your entry ticket to join the music revolution! You will be part of our development team and we will include you in all the decisions we put up for vote. Apply it to the purchase of an Olive ONE once it ships.
$100 Gift Card: Same as the $50 Gift Card, just twice the fun!
Limited quantities: Get your ONE for only $379. Plus FREE US shipping and Olive Care Program that extends the warranty to two years ($100 value).
And by the way, we ship to 220 countries world-wide!

We are a team of music lovers, engineers and scientists that have built audiophile-grade HD Music Servers since 2005. Today Olive products are sold in more than 50 countries around the world, and we have developed a small but loyal fan base. Our company is based in the heart of San Francisco, at the intersection of technology, design, and music. And as crazy as it sounds, we also hand-built all our products here. With the introduction of Olive ONE we plan to bring our award-winning audiophile sound quality to everyone, and evolve into a truly customer-driven development and design center.
Which countries do we ship to?

Olive ships to more than 220 countries worldwide.  If you are unsure that we ship to your country please contact us at info [at] olivehd.com and we will confirm. Please always add international freight costs to your perk (specified at each perk level).
Why does the Olive ONE sound better than any other digital music player out there?
If you’re an audiophile, you’ll be impressed by our 32-bit/384kHz Burr-Brown DAC and its dual HD amplifiers. If you’re not an audiophile, here’s all you need to know: Wow.
Home Entertainment (USA)""The Olive sounded absolutely superb!""
WhatHi-Fi?, Editors' Choice (UK)""This is 21st century hi-fi: Superb to live with and listen to.""
Financial Times (UK)""A whole-house audio system capable of delivering top-quality sound.""
AudioVideo revolution (USA)""Excellent, punchy bass, plenty of soundstage depth, and great musical flow!""
STEREO, Reference Class (Germany)""Sound quality and design are top notch!""
The Sunday Morning Herald (Australia)""iPod-style convenience and optimum quality!""
How far are you in the development of Olive ONE and when will it be ready?

Pretty far. The hard- and software platform and the industrial design are basically done, and we have the first production samples already at our SF office (come by and see us!). Now we need your help to finish the software, buy tooling and expand our manufacturing capabilities. If all goes well we plan to ship the first ONE in July 2013.
How can I control the Olive ONE?

The Olive ONE can be controlled via the built-in touchscreen or our free iPhone, iPad and Android apps. Additionally you can view the user interface on the big screen, if your TV supports a standard web browser interface.
How do I know if I need a hard drive?

If you have an existing digital music library (e.g. on your Mac or PC) and you don’t want to stream it, then get the version with the hard drive. If you have lots of CDs we recommend to take advantage of our pre-load service (we use a bunch of robots to load all your CDs onto your ONE.). At the end of the day, the hard drive makes you independent from the network. We are also working on a subscription-free Home Cloud Service that will let you access the music on your ONE, anywhere in the world.
How can I customize my Olive ONE?

If we reach the $1M benchmark we will buy special machinery that allows you to define the color and pattern of the enclosure, glass surface and digital wallpaper. We have developed a cool customization tool that allows you to preview how your customized design will look like. You can even save those designs and share them with other backers (and enter a contest to win a prize).
What are the detailed Specs of Olive ONE?
Bluetooth: Connect to your favorite smartphones
UPnP/DLNA: Play music from your Mac, PC or NAS
Multi-room music streaming: Add ONE to each room and play the same or different songs
Use the free iOS or Android app to control your ONE
Smart: Using our patented SESSION technology Olive ONE learns from your listening habits. The more you play, the smarter it gets.

Social: ONE integrates seamlessly into your favorite social networks. Post or tweet your favorite new music discovery with one simple touch of a button. Or rate, review and share your love for music with the Olive community.

Open: If we reach critical mass (i.e. number of units) the ONE platform will be interesting to app developers and artists. We are working on a Software Development Kit so developers can deliver cool music apps. And we have designed an Open Music Platform that allows artists to bring you studio master quality recordings directly to you.
Best-in-class Burr-Brown 32-bit/384kHz Digital-Analog-Converter with amazing SNR of 112dB!
Dual HD amplifiers for direct output to your speakers.
24-bit DSP with our patented technology that dynamically adapts the sound output to your brand and model speakers, as well as music genre and other acoustic parameters
Analog out (3.5mm) for connection to amplifier/receiver.
Digital output: S/PDIF (RCA, coax) for connection to amplifier/receiver. USB for output to supported USB DACs.
Ultra-quiet 2.5” AV hard drive with up to 2TB stores a maximum of 6,000 albums in CD quality, or 20,000 HD tracks. Enjoy instant access without relying on your network or Mac/PC.
Home Cloud Service: Access music stored on your ONE, anywhere in the world.
Olive ONE is built out of the finest aluminum and glass materials. If we reach critical mass we can customize your ONE to your favorite color or pattern and hand-built it in San Francisco, USA.
I have more questions. Who do I ask?
We love to hear from you. Simply shoot us an email to info [at] olivehd.com and we will get back to you quickly.",23.0,0,"1 Campaign

column3: > is a division of AcrylicPress.com, a leading manufacturer of acrylic photo decor and full-color personalized acrylic keepsakes. We are an international team of photographers, graphic artists and acrylic manufacturers, representing over 60 years of photo art, design and acrylic manufacturing experience.

column1: We'd like to introduce you to our first project, the HiFiCube™ - The first fully personalizable Bluetooth® speaker. The HiFiCube allows you to express yourself through your art, your style, and your music. We want to make a unique entertainment device that people will love, travel with, get excited about, and use regularly. To create this experience, we have to manufacture it with the best quality inside and out.

WHAT WILL THE HiFiCUBE HAVE?

  • A sleek, futuristic, lightweight, and compact design that opens with a simple press
• Multiple speakers for enhanced sound quality and boosted bass
• High quality acrylic top binding a high-resolution acrylic print to the speaker
• The ability to personalize your speaker like you would a mug or T-shirt
• Bluetooth and auxiliary inputs with user-friendly controls and multiple pairing capability
• The ability to charge from a miniUSB input

WHAT WILL MAKE THE HiFiCUBE UNIQUE?

A unique innovation of the HiFiCube is its personalization capability. The top side of the cube can be customized to order, displaying any digital image professionally printed on high quality photographic paper. The image is then fused to crystal clear acrylic, a gorgeous, durable substrate.

Looking good only takes you so far, so we've made sure the HiFiCube sounds just as good as it looks. After several rounds of testing, our engineers felt confident giving our speaker the green light. We've shown our prototypes to a number of sound producers, musicians, and audiophiles and everyone's been very excited. The sound quality really shines through the speakers we've put into the HiFiCube and its audible range and volume are excellent.

WHAT ARE THE SPECS?

  • Bluetooth® v2.1 wireless connection up to 30 feet
• Long-lasting built-in lithium battery (10 hours of play time, rechargeable via included miniUSB to USB cable)
• User friendly controls for track selection, volume, and play/pause

WHAT IS THE PERSONALIZATION PROCESS?

We create the top layer of the cube using an incredible process called Acryliprint HD, which uses a propietary technology to fuse a high-res inkjet photo print to a crystal clear acrylic substrate. The process is efficient and affordable using a specialized machine, which we already have in house. The prints come out consistently beautiful with amazing picture quality. The Acryliprint HD process also doesn't produce any byproducts harmful to our environment.

The square shape of the plate lends itself perfectly to album art, while patterns, photographs, Instagram shots, and artwork prints look just as great on it. If you can digitally upload it, we can incorporate it onto the HiFiCube.

WHERE CAN I USE THE HiFiCUBE?

Sleek and inconspicuous, the HiFiCube's bluetooth capabilities and audio inputs make it incredibly versatile to use, as does its portability. Here's a few ways we've made use of the prototypes:
• Play energetic music at parties, and control the ""jukebox"" from anywhere in the house. Yeah, you'll hear it!
• Get great sound quality for movies on your tablet
• Listen to audiobooks and podcasts by the pool
• Have a clearly audible speaker phone in a cellular conference call

WHY WE NEED INDIEGOGO

As mentioned above, we’ve manufactured our first run of sample prototypes.  Through IndieGoGo we are looking to raise funds for our first large scale production. Funds will be allocated to pay for materials and manufacturing costs with our partner overseas.  This first large production run will also be personally supervised by one of our team members. Complete shipment will be inspected before leaving our partners manufacturing facility to ensure the highest quality control.
• $59,000 - ""Does it come in Black?"" If we achieve our first stretch goal, it will! At this goal, we'll begin production of the HiFiCube in black, with the same great personalization options.
• $100,000 - Additional Colors - If we reach or exceed this goal, we'll develop HiFiCubes in different, vibrant color options with the same awesome personalization capabilities. We take requests!

• $200,000 - Padded Carrying Case - If we reach this goal, we'll begin research and development on soft, padded carrying cases designed specifically to fit the HiFiCube and featuring the CUBiCtunes logo.
We showed our prototype HiFiCubes to a number of musicians, sound engineers, and music fans and got an incredibly positive response. Check out some of the reactions in this video!

Our team was brainstorming new ideas when someone pointed out a photo cube and asked, “What if this wasn't just a photo cube, but also a speaker? We could use the Acryliprint™HD process and combine art and music to make something truly unique.”

We loved the idea, so our graphic art manager was tasked with coming up with a design. We all agreed that on top of just personalization, we wanted to bring to the market a high quality speaker. The three main attributes we identified as essential were stereo speakers, a great bass sound, and wireless connectivity.
Having previous experience working with manufacturing partners overseas, we began looking for a dependable partner with a solid background in sound engineering to help us finalize our designs.

The design we ultimately settled on involves a sleek, minimalist cube shape which opens when pressed to reveal three speakers, user-friendly controls, and a futuristic suite of tones to communicate with the user. The speaker has tones to indicate when it is searching for a signal, when it has acquired one, and when its volume limit has been reached.

Soon afterwards we were able to secure funds to manufacture the first shipment of prototypes. The response to these prototypes was absolutely awesome. Our speaker is fantastic. The quality of the sound, crisp and clear with an amazingly full-sounding bass range, not only blew us away but everyone we've shown it to as well. Having such a wonderful product with great personalization capability encouraged us to create our new division for audio technology products.
This video shows the HiFiCube in action, and demonstrates pairing a phone with the speaker and adjusting tracks and volume from both the phone and the HiFiCube itself.
• By November 1st we hit our goal, with your help!
• By November 25th we expect to have the first load of speakers inspected and ready to ship.
• By November 29th speakers will be in-hand and personalization will begin.
• By December 9th the first Early Bird Backer packages will begin shipping.
• By December 16th All Backer incentive packages will have been shipped.
All of our pledge rewards are made by us! We'll be updating this spot with pictures of each of our rewards, so stay tuned.

Through the years we’ve had several products manufactured overseas. With as much experience as we have under our belts, we have seen the ups and downs of overseas manufacturing. We feel we have done our due process in finding a reliable manufacturing partner that can deliver our HiFiCube speaker in time and with our established quality control levels.

There are always risks in production and delivery time. We have visited our manufacturing partner’s facility and have gone through great lengths to feel assured that the 3 to 4 week production time is reasonable and doable. We have verified that our manufacturing partner currently manufactures other high quality products and trust that the production of our product will have the same treatment. From past experiences we also feel that having one of our team members overseeing the production run and doing a final inspection of the HiFiCube before shipping will give us and our supporters added confidence for our expectations.

Possible delays not under our control could include minor delays in customs or unforeseen delays with shipping couriers. We have given ourselves enough of a cushion in our production and shipping schedule to allow for any issues or delays that may arise so that our product can reach our backers in time.

We feel excited and thankful to see medias and bloggers post our news.

Concept is one of the most important and primary elements during the design process. When our team first sat down to design and discuss what would eventually become Mellow, we looked to nature’s design for inspiration. We sought to build a table that was inspired by beauty found in natural landscapes. We accomplished this by incorporating natural shapes, textures and colors into the design process. Mellow combines the organic feeling of nature with the heart of technology. Mellow is a one of a kind bluetooth speaker table that is feels timeless and modern at the same time!

We wanted Mellow to be not only visually stunning but also technology advanced. Our design team worked vigorously to create a truly state of the art table that that interacts with mobile devices. Mellow is a music player, electronic charger, and a traditional table all-in-one. With Mellow you are mobile. We guarantee that Mellow will be the most unique speaker you have ever owned!

Enjoy great sound. Mellow’s built-in speakers give you the power to enjoy music anywhere anytime. With Mellow - sound is captivating and extraordinary. It's time to upgrade the audio experience for your music, games and videos.

column3: '>Super simple pairing. Built in Bluetooth technology allows for wireless connectively to mobile devices within 10 Meters.

column1: Mellow’s power comes from a DC 16V wall power adapter and a built in lithium battery.
Great battery backup! The built-in Lithium battery has 6600mah capacity
column2: just takes 4 hours to charge the Mellow and it can play for 7 hours at 30% volume
column3: 5 hours at 75% volume and 3 hours at 100% volume.

column1: Power Bank. Mellow is powerful enough to charge several mobile devices. Two USB ports allow for multiple devices to charge at the same time. You can charge your iPhone 7 for 2.7 times and it just takes 3 hours to complete the charging.

column2: timeless design. Each Mellow table is crafted from high quality materials. Three beautifully crafted legs are made from 100% lush Black Walnut wood/Ash wood. Our tabletop is wrapped in a woven micro-fabric for a touch of modernity with four interactive buttons sewn into the fabric, giving them a professional look.

column1: Most of your music player APPs are supported. Connect Mellow with Bluetooth or AUX and enjoy your music time.
Mellow will double up as an alarm AND a robotic DJ at your party.

It’s time to beat your morning brain by using Mellow by your bed as an alarm clock! It’ll be a little harder to drown out the sound from an entire Bluetooth And imagine being able to host a party and relax because technology was doing all the work for you.
Whether in your study, bedroom, living room, kitchen, in the backyard or by the pool side, Mellow is sure to be a stylish centerpiece that will compliment any part of your home.
There’s never a dull moment with Mellow.

Think about all the potential scenarios. You’re watching all your favorite films on TV, but now you’ve got a cool little Bluetooth speaker in the corner, and you’re hearing the sound come wirelessly through this neat little device!
BlueMan Technology - A leading company which has more than 10 years experience in manufacturing and producing Bluetooth speaker.

Creatio Design - A young but experienced team of designers working together to create wonderful and innovative products. We are seekers of purity of form and the advancement of everyday life, lovers of cool gadgets and technology.

Whether in your study, bedroom, living room, kitchen, in the backyard or by the pool side, Mellow is sure to be a stylish centerpiece that will compliment any part of your home.
There’s never a dull moment with Mellow.

Think about all the potential scenarios. You’re watching all your favorite films on TV, but now you’ve got a cool little Bluetooth speaker in the corner, and you’re hearing the sound come wirelessly through this neat little device!
BlueMan Technology - A leading company which has more than 10 years experience in manufacturing and producing Bluetooth speaker.

column2:
>

Ever wanted to play an instrument right away?
Enjoy creating music in less than a minute with the Joué Play! You don’t have to be an expert or have any musical background.
Just place a Pad on the Board, start the application and enjoy creating a beat, a melody or play chords freely! Chose your sounds, record, and share your creation super easily with your friend!

column1:
The four Pads on the Joué come with professional sound banks ranging from traditional instruments to the coolest recent synthesizers and drum kits and covering a wide range of musical styles. You can add up to eight different instruments per song, add effects and mix it all within the app.

The Board of the Joué is super sensitive and captures all the gestures practiced on traditional instruments: vibrato, glissando, velocity… Because of this, the instrument enables a musical expressiveness rarely heard in digital music!

We challenged Senbeï, a French artist, to see how far the Joué Play can take you. Check out his videos!
We have players from 42 different countries! Are you from one of them or will you start the movement? Join us wherever you come from!
Nothing to configure or to program. Just switch the Pads to add a new instrument to your song, they are automatically recognized by the app in real time and you are ready to rock!
<div data-caption=""The Pads are automatically recognized by the app"" data-id=""28866251""><figure style=""margin: 0px
column2: >

column1:
Want to enjoy the fresh air and make some music on the go?
The Board of the Joué Play is portable and compact, but it’s also very sturdy. Along with its flexible silicon Pads, the instrument is easy to slip into your backpack.
Express your creativity anywhere and anytime!

Music is made to be shared. Want to show off your musical skills, share the new cool beat you made or have a groovy jam sesh with your friends? Plug several Joué Play board to the app and start jamming within a minute.

column1: YOU CAN ROCK THE JOUÉ PLAY! No need to be a pro to create music! Watch these people discovering the Joué Play for the first time.

“The lines are blurring between artist, DJ, and producer. The people who were just artists are becoming DJs. There are amazing DJs who are getting into production. A product like Joué makes sense to creatives who don’t fit into one single box.”

The Board of the Joué Play comprises a body made of beech wood from sustainably managed forests. It’s designed, manufactured and assembled in France. It doesn’t contain any battery or perishable components. As for the silicon Pads, they are highly resistant and washable with water.

Safely stored in its bag, your Joué Play will stay by your side for many years.

Everything is accessible from the main screen:

column1: • The instruments are gathered in a circle in the middle
• The timeline shows successive musical events simply and clearly
• The mixer lets you adjust the volume of each instrument
• Recording is accessible directly from the Pads, for maximum reactivity
Make as many project as you want and share them with your friends and other Joué Players.

column10: >

column1:
We launched our first product three years ago and were impressed with the community that comes together on that platform. We are looking forward to sharing our vision with that community once more and to enter a conversation with people from around the world who want to get started with music creation.

The funds collected will enable us to start industrial production and finish the development of the app.

The Joué Play comes in two different color schemes: Fire and Water. There is no functional difference between both, it's only aesthetic.

Pleas note that having 8 Pads allows to add up to 8 instruments in a project (1 Pad = 1 instrument in the app).

Three years ago, we launched our first product: an expressive and modular MIDI controller for seasoned musicians, which is used today by many artists around the world.

But lots of amateur musicians wanted to get their hands on it as well, and we felt frustrated that we couldn’t satisfy them, as current music software remains too complex to be apprehended easily.

So we decided to create a new instrument that would enable anyone to start making music. An instrument that’s really easy to use and fun, while being sufficiently powerful and evolutive to take you far into your music creation. Introducing the Joué Play.
We are a team of passionate musicians scattered around the globe, with a base camp in Bordeaux, France.

Since childhood, I have been passionate about two things: music and technology. I co-designed my first instrument 15 years ago, the legendary Lemur, which has been used by many great artists around the world throughout the years.

In 2015, at a turning point in my life, I came back to my piano that I hadn't touched for 8 years and started playing. The emotion I felt that day was so strong I thought that everyone should be able to feel it at some point in their life.

So I started working on a new instrument that everyone could play regardless of their musical or technical background. An instrument combining the power and ease of the digital world with the beauty and feeling of the traditional world.

The Joué Play was on its way.
At the crossroads of electronic machines and traditional instruments, Joué creates new types of instruments having the power &
column2: ease of the digital world coupled with the expressivity &amp
column3:
beauty of the traditional world.

Its modular Pads and lightweight but durable Boards can be used right out of the box in combination with the Joué Music app or plugged to any MIDI software.

Based in Bordeaux, Joué designs and manufactures its instruments and components out of environmentally friendly materials in France.

Its culture and production practices reflect a deep commitment to human creativity and environmental sustainability.

Connect with us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube &
column5: >

column1:
At Joué, we’re used to work remotely, as our team has always been scattered around the world, across several locations in France and in the USA, and even in a van traveling around the world for some of us!

The Covid-19 crisis mainly impacts us from a business point of view, like everyone else.

However, we believe there has never been a better time to share our passion for making music and playing an instrument, as we are all stuck at home with more and more overlap between our professional and personal lives.

Regarding the production of the hardware, all our suppliers are functioning and able to produce the devices, so we don’t expect much delay in our supply chain.

column1: • Allows you to use your voice as a live MIDI controller.
• Accurately select between, and trigger, up to 8 samples using your voice.
• Responsive to changes in velocity — takes all the information from exactly how you make a sound.
Simultaneously talks to multiple MIDI channels— enabling sample triggering and synth control at the same time.
• Control up to 4 CC [MIDI mapping] values based on the way you make a sound. Then easily map to anything from synth selection, effects controls, synth blending, filters and more.
• Works with non-vocal sounds too  — clap a beat or mic up an instrument.
• Can be used to control effects and filters on other MIDI devices and instruments.

column2: >Watch Liam demo how to create a whole track with JUST YOUR VOICE!
column3:
>

 

Dubler Studio Kit is a real-time vocal recognition MIDI controller. 

Our kit offers up a never seen before way to translate your musical ideas into reality, using the one instrument you’ve been practising since birth— the voice. 

The kit comes as—

column1: •  The Dubler software — a virtual MIDI instrument (a desktop application for Mac + PC) Compatible with any production software [DAW]. It is not a plugin or VST.
•  The Dubler microphone  — a low latency custom USB mic, tuned for the Dubler software.

column2: >
column3: >All you need to make music is a computer, a DAW, headphones and Dubler Studio Kit.

column2:
>

 

As musicians we all sing, hum, and record voice memos to track snippets of ideas – but that’s often where that idea ends, never making it into the studio or onto the stage. 

Our goal: To help you to release the stems of musical ideas trapped inside your head and get them directly into your production software— simply by vocalising them. 

Now anyone can turn their voice directly into MIDI— quickly, easily, intuitively and LIVE.
