column3:
>

With Dubler Studio Kit, effects, notes and samples are controlled absolutely live based on the timbre of your voice, not applied by post-processing like some other voice-to-MIDI solutions. 

Dubler Studio Kit the ultimate multi-dimensional MIDI controller— think of it as a MIDI keyboard and an MPC rolled into one, but controlled using the voice!

column1: Dubler learns your voice in under 60 seconds.

column2:
>

That enables you to:

 

Select and trigger samples: Use beatboxing sounds to trigger drum samples or click, clap, or tap to trigger any virtual instrument or sample in your DAW. This includes velocity control and envelope following. ?

column1: Synth control: Control pitch, velocity, envelope and pitch bend all totally live by singing and humming. ?
Effects control: The timbre of your voice (eg
column2: ‘hmmm’, ‘laaa’ and ‘ooohh’) control 4 CC MIDI dials. Map these to any effects, filters, synth or DAW parameters you like. ?

column1: Advanced control: Use in conjunction with loops, other MIDI instruments, for post produced automation... and loads more! ?
Dubler Studio Kit allows you to capture things that would otherwise be impossible with traditional desk-bound MIDI inputs.
• Take ideas for beats, melodies and musical compositions from your head directly into your production software [DAW].
• Augment live beatboxing performances with virtual instruments and synths.
Vocally control multiple parameters and effects of a synth, in real-time, as you lay down the melody two-handed on a MIDI keyboard.
Play a guitar part and simultaneously sketch out the rhythm for the corresponding drum track, vocally.

column2: >Luna Neptune- [Left to right] 1. Triggering synths with her voice, whilst playing guitar. 2. Micing up a guitar and using it's output as a MIDI trigger. 3. Using clicking as a trigger.

column1: • Use Dubler to give human expression to digitally tracked instruments.
• Train Dubler to non-vocal sounds such as clicking, clapping and stomping — Dubler’s training is sensitive enough to tell the difference between your left and right hand-click.
• Manipulate 4 control dimensions, at the same time as playing a melody and simultaneously crafting the envelope of the audio. Only the voice can capture that level of expression!

• Vocally control multiple MIDI effects whilst sending pitch information. You could map vocal sounds to control different chord effects in your DAW. For example, you can set it up so an ‘ooohhh’ makes a single note into a Major chord and 'eeeeeee’ makes a single note into a Minor chord. Then if you sing “ooohhh eeeeeee ooohhh ooohhh” You’ll get Major, Minor, Major, Major.
​These are just a few examples - we can’t wait to see how much further you will take it!

column2: >Note: Packaging design is yet to be finalised and may differ slightly from this.

column1: The Dubler software — a virtual MIDI instrument (desktop application for Mac + PC) Compatible with any production software [DAW]. It is not a plugin or VST.
The Dubler microphone  — a low latency custom USB mic, tuned for the Dubler software.

The Dubler Software is a virtual MIDI controller for Mac and PC that’s compatible with any music production software [DAW]. The set-up is minimal, opening up Dubler is just like plugging in a MIDI keyboard.

column2: >Dubler Studio Kit works with any DAW

>You can store an unlimited number of profiles on the Dubler Software.

PERFORMANCE MODE:
column3:
>This mode simplifies the mapping of midi CCs from the Dubler app to your DAW. It also allows you to map triggers to different MIDI events.

MAPPING MODE:
column4:
>This mode simplifies the mapping of midi CCs from the Dubler app to your DAW. It also allows you to map triggers to different MIDI events.

Planning to use Dubler on stage? We’ve built in noise resistance algorithms to avoid accidental drum triggers in noisy environments.

 

10ms LATENCY

We get lots of questions on latency. We’ve run several end-to-end tests, and land at a mean latency of approximately 10ms. 

[Note: This is before sending out MIDI — the MIDI and the DAW will likely add a further 5-10ms on top of that.]

The example test below lands at 11.5ms, which is low enough to feel unnoticeable.

Simulation of end to end latency in Dubler. These are used in our tests to maintain our app quality in new builds. The two humps happen when an onset sounds falls at the end of a prepared audio buffer. 

Minimum System Requirements:

column1:
To ensure the best possible experience on Windows, we are creating a custom low-latency ASIO driver for the Dubler microphone. This will make the user experience much simpler and avoid the issues associated with using a generic driver like ASIO4ALL.

Our low-latency USB microphone has been custom designed for use with Dubler software. We use a high-end microphone capsule and a built-in audio interface. This enables us to fine-tune the Dubler software for a known input. This way we can ensure a reliable, accurate and low latency out-of-the-box experience for our users. We are working with a highly respected microphone manufacturer to produce the devices and have selected components that are optimal for our use case. For example, the Dubler microphone has a double shock housing to reduce accidental MIDI triggers resulting from handling noise.

Being USB it’s great for being at home, in the studio or on the road— and you don’t need a separate audio interface to use it.
column2: >The Dubler Microphone. [1] Double shock housing to reduce accidental MIDI triggers resulting from handling noise. [2] Bevelled edges so the Dubler Microphone lies flat on any surface. [3] 1.2m USB cable.

We anticipate the following delivery times:

Estimated delivery date October 2019.

Mac only users may have their orders fulfilled sooner.

 

We’re based in London — a global hub of incredible music-makers, artists and producers! 

For the past three years, our technology has been through numerous design iterations and prototypes. We’ve now finalised all functionality and our most recent pre-launch beta kits are already in use with a bunch of international artists and producers. It’s been a long process of R&
column2:
D, building, testing, long nights and music-filled days, but, with a lot of excitement, we can now say we’re truly ready for launch. We can’t wait to see the Dubler Studio Kit in the hands of musicians, producers and performers all over the world. 

The idea for Dubler Studio Kit started out as a university project for Vochlea Music founder, George, whilst studying at the Royal College of Art in London. Since then, he’s been an Enterprise Fellow at The Royal College of Engineering (‘17-’18), been a finalist in the Interaction Design Awards (‘17), a SXSW Audio &
column3: Music Innovation finalist (‘17) and won the SXSW Accelerator Pitch (‘18)— all with his vocal recognition technology for music making, Dubler.
column4: >George presenting Dubler at the Abbey Road Demo Day 2018
column5:
> 

Some imagery from our development over the past 3 years.

column15:
> 

To help support the development so far, we've received small seed investments from individuals and incredibly supportive partners who are thrilled about the progression of the project. 

Your support will get us to the final stage, cover the upfront costs of manufacturing and help get Dubler out into the world. On the manufacturing side, we’re working with a globally renowned microphone manufacturer who has a 40-year heritage of sound innovation and audio hardware manufacturing.

2016:

column1: • George graduates from the Royal College of Art with ‘Vochlea’ as his graduation project.
• The project is featured in Dezeen and named as a finalist for the International Interaction Design Awards.
Vochlea Music becomes a registered business in the UK.
• George becomes an Enterprise Fellow at The Royal Academy of Engineering.
• Vochlea Music is a finalist in the Audio Innovation Awards at SXSW.
• George tours around testing, validating and improving the technology.
• Vochlea Music graduates from Abbey Road Red— a music technology incubator from Abbey Road Studios.
• George returns to SXSW and wins the pitch competition for Entertainment and Content Creation.
• Cam and Daven join the team to build out the technology, followed by Kelly to develop artist collaboration, communications and culture.

2019:

We launch our crowdfunding campaign and continue to work on the development of Dubler Studio Kit and test with musicians!

Late summer 2019: Begin fulfilling your orders. 

October 2019: Complete fulfilling your orders. You'll be using your voice as a MIDI controller way before the end of the year!

GEORGE

 

Founder George Wright is an engineer, inventor and designer originally from Leeds, England. He is an Enterprise Fellow with the Royal Academy of Engineering, graduate of the University of Oxford, the Royal College of Art and Imperial College London. Alongside his role at Vochlea Music, he is an avid musician, frontman of a 50’s rock n roll band (Yes, really) and founding member of design studio The F_T_R.

 

DAVEN

Founder and technical lead Daven Sanassy is a software engineer with 8 years of industrial experience and 4 years in academic research. He has a PhD in stochastic simulation algorithm research including the use of machine learning methods to optimise algorithmic performance. His professional experience includes working in 'triple A' game development and writing software for a London based audio streaming company. Daven is a massive drum and bass head and loves the occasional mixing session on his beloved Technics 1210s.

 

CAM

Senior engineer Cam Thomas is a C++ and Python developer with expertise in machine learning and audio. His prior work has included developing multichannel audio recognition software for live sports broadcasting, and at Goldsmiths he collaborated on developing state-of-the art neural audio synthesis for a famous trip-hop outfit. At home Cam is an Ableton producer &
column2:
Max/MSP enthusiast. 

 

KELLY

Head of culture and communications Kelly Angood has been supporting growth for technology, design and hardware start-ups since 2010. She's launched 5 of her own Kickstarter campaigns and helped dozens of others find success.  

Campaign Owners | Vochlea Music

Video | Kamil Dymek 

Photography | Becks Parnell

Special thanks to: Abbey Road Studios and Abbey Road Red, The Rattle, The Royal Academy of Engineering, Goldsmiths University, Sam Parke-Wolfe, Na Park, Leon Fedden, Kate Stevenson, Ollie Walton, Bella Williams, LeanSquare, Ascension, Mike H, Sam S, Jez W, our pre-launch beta testers, and to the countless others who have helped along the way!

The Vochlea Music Team

— George, Daven, Cam and Kelly.

Responsive to changes in velocity — takes all the information from exactly how you make a sound.
Simultaneously talks to multiple MIDI channels— enabling sample triggering and synth control at the same time.
Control up to 4 CC [MIDI mapping] values based on the way you make a sound. Then easily map to anything from synth selection, effects controls, synth blending, filters and more.
Additional control of Pitch Bend and Envelope Following.
Works with non-vocal sounds too  — clap a beat or mic up an instrument.
Can be used to control effects and filters on other MIDI devices and instruments.
Low latency [10-12ms] enabling real-time, live control.

Watch Liam demo how to create a whole track with JUST YOUR VOICE! Dubler Studio Kit is a real-time vocal recognition MIDI controller. Our kit offers up a never seen before way to translate your musical ideas into reality, using the one instrument you’ve been practising since birth— the voice. The kit comes as—
The Dubler software — a virtual MIDI instrument (a desktop application for Mac + PC) Compatible with any production software [DAW]. It is not a plugin or VST.
The Dubler microphone  — a low latency custom USB mic, tuned for the Dubler software.
All you need to make music is a computer, a DAW, headphones and Dubler Studio Kit.

As musicians we all sing, hum, and record voice memos to track snippets of ideas – but that’s often where that idea ends, never making it into the studio or onto the stage. Our goal: To help you to release the stems of musical ideas trapped inside your head and get them directly into your production software— simply by vocalising them. Now anyone can turn their voice directly into MIDI— quickly, easily, intuitively and LIVE.
Here we're using the Dubler Studio Kit with Native's Battery 4 sampler to trigger organ and drum sounds simultaneous with beatboxing.
“Resell your master keyboards, pads and wind controllers, because very soon your voice and a DAW will be the only tools needed.”       —Audiofanzine.fr
“Vochlea creation could revolutionise the world of sound and songwriting.""       —The Sunday TimesDubler Studio Kit at home.
Use it in the studio with your monitors to get instant feedback on your musical ideas.

We've been beta testing Dubler Studio Kit with a range of genre-spanning artists, find out what just a few of them thought of their experience.  NOVELIST + PREMMercury Prize Nominated MC and Producer Novelist and Producer PREM use Dubler Studio Kit with Reason.  Novelist and PREM“...it's really going to make me a better producer than I was yesterday.” — PREM.  Discover more of their music here: Novelist + PREM  LUNA NEPTUNEAlt-folk solo artist Luna Neptune uses Dubler Studio Kit with Logic Pro.    Luna Neptune“It's doing what I'm doing with my voice, in real time. It's incredible. I've not found any other piece of kit that's able to do that. Not even close.” — Luna Neptune. Discover more of her music here: Luna Neptune. MAGNUS CHAPPLELondon-based songwriter and producer Magnus Chapple uses Dubler Studio Kit with Logic Pro X.Magnus Chapple “...it's just mind-boggling how empty the industry was for something like this.”  — Magnus Chapple
Discover more of his music here: Magnus Chapple. INDIGO PALACE Production duo Indigo Palace uses Dubler Studio Kit with Logic Pro. Indigo Palace — Dee '93 and Jocelin Francis

“I've made a beat in five minutes if that, it's crazy fast...it just instantly gets it, and I can make my drum patterns just seamless.” — Jocelin Francis Discover more of their music here: Indigo Palace. SK SHLOMO Beatboxer and producer SK Shlomo uses Dubler Studio Kit with Ableton Live.SK Shlomo
“...this is sick because you can double up the beatboxing with like real drum machines and that creates like a real richness and a real craziness.” — SK Shlomo

Discover more of his music here: SK Shlomo. TAETROArtist and YouTuber TAETRO uses Dubler Studio Kit with Ableton LIVE. ""I'm really excited to be on the groundfloor of something that's so cool"" — TAETRO  Subscribe to his channel: TAETRO Kai Hadaway | The WarningzKai Hadaway uses Dubler Studio Kit with Logic Pro X. ""When you’re producing, staying inspired is key...I was able to quickly lay down my drum pattern right on the spot by beatboxing— something I always dreamt of doing."" — Kai Hadaway
Listen to more of their music:  The Warningz

Whilst our campaign is live, we’ll be continuing to test Dubler Studio Kit with musicians in their daily, music-making lives to ensure that we get the best product possible to you. Keep an eye out in our updates and across our social channels for more >>>

With Dubler Studio Kit, effects, notes and samples are controlled absolutely live based on the timbre of your voice, not applied by post-processing like some other voice-to-MIDI solutions. Dubler Studio Kit the ultimate multi-dimensional MIDI controller— think of it as a MIDI keyboard and an MPC rolled into one, but controlled using the voice!
Dubler learns your voice in under 60 seconds.

That enables you to: Select and trigger samples: Use beatboxing sounds to trigger drum samples or click, clap, or tap to trigger any virtual instrument or sample in your DAW. This includes velocity control and envelope following. ?
Synth control: Control pitch, velocity, envelope and pitch bend all totally live by singing and humming. ?
Effects control: The timbre of your voice (eg
column2: ‘hmmm’, ‘laaa’ and ‘ooohh’) control 4 CC MIDI dials. Map these to any effects, filters, synth or DAW parameters you like. ?

column1: Advanced control: Use in conjunction with loops, other MIDI instruments, for post produced automation... and loads more! ?
Dubler Studio Kit allows you to capture things that would otherwise be impossible with traditional desk-bound MIDI inputs.
Take ideas for beats, melodies and musical compositions from your head directly into your production software [DAW].
Augment live beatboxing performances with virtual instruments and synths.
Vocally control multiple parameters and effects of a synth, in real-time, as you lay down the melody two-handed on a MIDI keyboard.
Play a guitar part and simultaneously sketch out the rhythm for the corresponding drum track, vocally.
Luna Neptune- [Left to right] 1. Triggering synths with her voice, whilst playing guitar. 2. Micing up a guitar and using it's output as a MIDI trigger. 3. Using clicking as a trigger.
Use Dubler to give human expression to digitally tracked instruments.
Train Dubler to non-vocal sounds such as clicking, clapping and stomping — Dubler’s training is sensitive enough to tell the difference between your left and right hand-click.
Manipulate 4 control dimensions, at the same time as playing a melody and simultaneously crafting the envelope of the audio. Only the voice can capture that level of expression!

Vocally control multiple MIDI effects whilst sending pitch information. You could map vocal sounds to control different chord effects in your DAW. For example, you can set it up so an ‘ooohhh’ makes a single note into a Major chord and 'eeeeeee’ makes a single note into a Minor chord. Then if you sing “ooohhh eeeeeee ooohhh ooohhh” You’ll get Major, Minor, Major, Major.
​These are just a few examples - we can’t wait to see how much further you will take it!
Note: Packaging design is yet to be finalised and may differ slightly from this.
The Dubler software — a virtual MIDI instrument (desktop application for Mac + PC) Compatible with any production software [DAW]. It is not a plugin or VST.
The Dubler microphone  — a low latency custom USB mic, tuned for the Dubler software.
Dubler Studio Kit set-up at home

The Dubler Software is a virtual MIDI controller for Mac and PC that’s compatible with any music production software [DAW]. The set-up is minimal, opening up Dubler is just like plugging in a MIDI keyboard.
Dubler Studio Kit works with any DAW

You can store an unlimited number of profiles on the Dubler Software.PERFORMANCE MODE:This mode simplifies the mapping of midi CCs from the Dubler app to your DAW. It also allows you to map triggers to different MIDI events.MAPPING MODE:This mode simplifies the mapping of midi CCs from the Dubler app to your DAW. It also allows you to map triggers to different MIDI events. Planning to use Dubler on stage? We’ve built in noise resistance algorithms to avoid accidental drum triggers in noisy environments. 10ms LATENCYWe get lots of questions on latency. We’ve run several end-to-end tests, and land at a mean latency of approximately 10ms. [Note: This is before sending out MIDI — the MIDI and the DAW will likely add a further 5-10ms on top of that.]The example test below lands at 11.5ms, which is low enough to feel unnoticeable.Simulation of end to end latency in Dubler. These are used in our tests to maintain our app quality in new builds. The two humps happen when an onset sounds falls at the end of a prepared audio buffer. Minimum System Requirements:
Intel Core i5 CPU or equivalent

To ensure the best possible experience on Windows, we are creating a custom low-latency ASIO driver for the Dubler microphone. This will make the user experience much simpler and avoid the issues associated with using a generic driver like ASIO4ALL.Our low-latency USB microphone has been custom designed for use with Dubler software. We use a high-end microphone capsule and a built-in audio interface. This enables us to fine-tune the Dubler software for a known input. This way we can ensure a reliable, accurate and low latency out-of-the-box experience for our users. We are working with a highly respected microphone manufacturer to produce the devices and have selected components that are optimal for our use case. For example, the Dubler microphone has a double shock housing to reduce accidental MIDI triggers resulting from handling noise.Being USB it’s great for being at home, in the studio or on the road— and you don’t need a separate audio interface to use it. The Dubler Microphone. [1] Double shock housing to reduce accidental MIDI triggers resulting from handling noise. [2] Bevelled edges so the Dubler Microphone lies flat on any surface. [3] 1.2m USB cable.Dubler Studio Kit [1]£220 (around $286)  — Quantity: unlimited27% discount on retail price [£300]
The Dubler software — a virtual MIDI instrument (Mac or PC)
TWIN PACK: Two [2] Dubler Studio Kits£400 (around $520)  — Quantity: unlimited33% discount on retail price [£600]Includes:
The Dubler software — a virtual MIDI instrument (Mac or PC) x2

We anticipate the following delivery times:Estimated delivery date October 2019.Mac only users may have their orders fulfilled sooner. We’re based in London — a global hub of incredible music-makers, artists and producers! For the past three years, our technology has been through numerous design iterations and prototypes. We’ve now finalised all functionality and our most recent pre-launch beta kits are already in use with a bunch of international artists and producers. It’s been a long process of R&D, building, testing, long nights and music-filled days, but, with a lot of excitement, we can now say we’re truly ready for launch. We can’t wait to see the Dubler Studio Kit in the hands of musicians, producers and performers all over the world. The idea for Dubler Studio Kit started out as a university project for Vochlea Music founder, George, whilst studying at the Royal College of Art in London. Since then, he’s been an Enterprise Fellow at The Royal College of Engineering (‘17-’18), been a finalist in the Interaction Design Awards (‘17), a SXSW Audio & Music Innovation finalist (‘17) and won the SXSW Accelerator Pitch (‘18)— all with his vocal recognition technology for music making, Dubler.  George presenting Dubler at the Abbey Road Demo Day 2018 Some imagery from our development over the past 3 years.George's original idea sketches for the Dubler Microphone from 2015. Originally, it was designed so that the software and hardware were embodied in one handheld device.Our first working Dubler Microphone prototype — by this stage we had separate software offering. Feature in The Sunday Times and George using the original prototype.Earlier development UI [left] and our current 2019 UI [right]. Original UI development sketch and current Dubler software UI in use.  To help support the development so far, we've received small seed investments from individuals and incredibly supportive partners who are thrilled about the progression of the project. Your support will get us to the final stage, cover the upfront costs of manufacturing and help get Dubler out into the world. On the manufacturing side, we’re working with a globally renowned microphone manufacturer who has a 40-year heritage of sound innovation and audio hardware manufacturing.2016:
George graduates from the Royal College of Art with ‘Vochlea’ as his graduation project.
The project is featured in Dezeen and named as a finalist for the International Interaction Design Awards.
Vochlea Music becomes a registered business in the UK.
George becomes an Enterprise Fellow at The Royal Academy of Engineering.
Vochlea Music is a finalist in the Audio Innovation Awards at SXSW.
George tours around testing, validating and improving the technology.
Vochlea Music graduates from Abbey Road Red— a music technology incubator from Abbey Road Studios.
George returns to SXSW and wins the pitch competition for Entertainment and Content Creation.
Cam and Daven join the team to build out the technology, followed by Kelly to develop artist collaboration, communications and culture.

2019: We launch our crowdfunding campaign and continue to work on the development of Dubler Studio Kit and test with musicians!Late summer 2019: Begin fulfilling your orders. October 2019: Complete fulfilling your orders. You'll be using your voice as a MIDI controller way before the end of the year!GEORGE Founder George Wright is an engineer, inventor and designer originally from Leeds, England. He is an Enterprise Fellow with the Royal Academy of Engineering, graduate of the University of Oxford, the Royal College of Art and Imperial College London. Alongside his role at Vochlea Music, he is an avid musician, frontman of a 50’s rock n roll band (Yes, really) and founding member of design studio The F_T_R. DAVENFounder and technical lead Daven Sanassy is a software engineer with 8 years of industrial experience and 4 years in academic research. He has a PhD in stochastic simulation algorithm research including the use of machine learning methods to optimise algorithmic performance. His professional experience includes working in 'triple A' game development and writing software for a London based audio streaming company. Daven is a massive drum and bass head and loves the occasional mixing session on his beloved Technics 1210s. CAMSenior engineer Cam Thomas is a C++ and Python developer with expertise in machine learning and audio. His prior work has included developing multichannel audio recognition software for live sports broadcasting, and at Goldsmiths he collaborated on developing state-of-the art neural audio synthesis for a famous trip-hop outfit. At home Cam is an Ableton producer & Max/MSP enthusiast.  KELLYHead of culture and communications Kelly Angood has been supporting growth for technology, design and hardware start-ups since 2010. She's launched 5 of her own Kickstarter campaigns and helped dozens of others find success.  Campaign Owners | Vochlea MusicVideo | Kamil Dymek Photography | Becks ParnellSpecial thanks to: Abbey Road Studios and Abbey Road Red, The Rattle, The Royal Academy of Engineering, Goldsmiths University, Sam Parke-Wolfe, Na Park, Leon Fedden, Kate Stevenson, Ollie Walton, Bella Williams, LeanSquare, Ascension, Mike H, Sam S, Jez W, our pre-launch beta testers, and to the countless others who have helped along the way!The Vochlea Music Team— George, Daven, Cam and Kelly.",91.0,14,"1 Campaign

We’re back on Indiegogo!

After launching our 1st generation product, funding it, building it &
column2:
shipping it to our first backers across the globe, we have come back to YOU: to give you first access to our GEN 2 Helmet at an epic discount.

We've already started shipping out all US &
column3:
EU Orders! 

 

As skiers we lived through the expensive audio kits that work for one season, taking the phone out on the chairlift and living in fear of dropping our white air pods on the snow. In fact, we've obsessed over all our negative experiences in order to create a new one.

This one:

Designed in Patagonia by a team of obsessive skiers, riders &
column5: headphone experts and then tested in crud, ice &amp
column6:
powder across the Rockies, the Alps and the Andes. 

Here’s a full spread on the functionality behind the U1 Helmet.

Glove-friendly controls right there on the helmet that you can use without even stopping. Play, pause, skip track, take a call…you can do it all even with the thickest mittens out there. Once your phone goes in your pocket, it stays there all day. 

 

We pulled out all the stops on this one:  40mm drivers coupled with top-tier components to deliver exceptional audio quality. Quality you’d have on studio headphones...the kind you'd never take to the slopes!

 

We all like skiing with friends but there’s always the one who gets lost, misses the exit or strays away from the group. With helmet to helmet walkie-talkie your pow-crew will get a serious upgrade.

 

We’ve all been through the ordeal of pulling your phone on the chairlift and the mini heart attack when it slips from your grasp. With Siri &
column7:
Google Assistant Compatibility you can tap into the full functionality of your smartphone directly from the helmet. Your phone can now stay safely in your pocket.

 

The ‘audio’ part of the helmet is not an audio kit we dropped in: those are detachable on-ear headphones, meaning they work on &
column8:
off the helmet. For the hill, you can dock them into the helmet with our patented QUAD4LOCK Technology. After the day’s ride, simply unclip them and take them with you. 

Built to endure an active lifestyle, on &
column9:
off the slopes: these bad boys can handle snow, rain, sweat and won’t complain when you take them on your adventures.

 

The highest safety standards combined with awareness-oriented solutions. This means protecting your head and being aware of your surroundings.

This is much more than a helmet, it’s a system of products &
column10:
accessories designed to work together and solve the very real problems we all have on the hill.

 

We’ve gone through little detail so you don’t have to: from ear covers to stay warm without the headphones to washable, interchangeable ear pads - we have you covered.

 

The UNIT 1 App turns your helmet into a walkie-talkie. You can create a group with your ski-buddies and share a live channel with them. No more tracking down that friend that always gets lost!

As you read this, there are containers of GEN 2s making their way to our warehouses in California &
column11:
Rotterdam. As soon as the campaign ends on November 16th, we’ll start shipping them to our backers. 

If you order through this Campaign you will have access the first batch of helmets, this means the lowest available prices and the earliest delivery dates.

The UNIT 1 Helmet comes in 2 bold colorways.
Choose yours during checkout!

In order to get the right fit it’s very important to get your size right. Follow this guide or better yet, check out our interactive Size Finder to get it right.

 

We’re trying to disrupt the winter-sports industry through innovative products -    and we can’t do it without you. Share our story to inspire fellow skiers &
column12:
snowboarders!

Our entire team is answering questions in real time. If you have any questions or comments please email us to support@unit1gear.com. Or you can take a look to our Help Center.

column1: It's time to stop worrying about water damaged earbuds and start bringing your favorite tunes into the water with you. The lightning-fast Bluetooth 5 technology, certified IP68 water, and dust-proof rating, detachable hidden split design, and up to 30-hour battery life make these truly wireless, auto-pairing earbuds perfect for rainy days.

column2: >

column1: Bring your music everywhere! Listen in the rain, in the shower, in the hot tub or even while surfing! With their IP68 rating, the Dolphin earbuds are 100% waterproof and can be fully submerged in water!

With the power of touch and slip, you’ll barely have to use your phone screen. The Dolphin lets you do so much with just your earbuds, from playing/pausing your music, skipping to the next song, to answering and ending phone calls.

Using a hidden split ear hook design (which is one-of-a-kind and patented) to rest comfortably and securely in your ear. It can be removed when you require more mobility so you can listen to music whether you are working out, running, swimming, leaning to surf, or even just hanging out in the hot-tub.
The unique and patented split ear removable hook allows the Dolphin earbuds to stay firmly planted in your ears, ensuring they’ll never fall out no matter what you're doing.

Using Bluetooth 5.0, the Dolphin earbuds provide you with a true wireless high fidelity experience, offering 4x the range of previous Bluetooth devices with 8x the data at 2x the transfer speed, so you’ll always have a seamless connection and a crystal clear audio experience.

Never worry about plugs or cables again thanks to Dolphin’s wireless charging case. Using 5W QI  technology that allows you to just place the case down so you can recharge it quickly, and pick it up when you’re ready to go.

Enjoy up to 3 hours of regular playback on your music or calls, OR up to 30 hours with the portable charging case, which allows you to charge your earbuds wherever you are, without needing any cables. Charge your case easily with any QI compatible wireless charging plate.
We are offering and able to ship worldwide, however VAT and GST is not included in the price.

We plan to ship the product to all of our backers in November 2018. International. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary but we will keep you notified as to the status of your order.

How can I contact your Team?
You can contact us at team@dolphinearbuds.com.

Where will Dolphin be shipped to?
We are offering global shipping to all backers for the Dolphin Earbuds.

Can I make phone calls through my Dolphin?
Yes, Dolphin Earbuds can function as a bluetooth headset.

When I’m on a call, can the caller hear the noisy environment around me (people talking, tv, etc)?
Yes, the Dolphin uses a powerful mic so your callers will be able to hear the environment around you, but they will hear you clearly thanks to your proximity to the mic.

How water/sweat resistant are the Dolphin earbuds?
Dolphin Earbuds are totally water resistant. They have a IP68 rating.

What is the connection range of the Dolphin Earbuds?
The Dolphin connection range is 10 meters.

Does Dolphin work with android and iOS phones?
Yes, it can connect to any bluetooth device whether it is Android or iOS.

How long does the battery last?
The Dolphin battery can last up to 10 hours  (or 30 with the portable charging case)

column2: >Award-winning true wireless earbuds by Mobvoi . Use the power of touch to stay off your phone screen. Hear your calls in both ears while our ambient noise cancellation and noise isolation make your calls crystal clear.
column3: >TicPods Free's intuitive touch controls let you activate all your favorite features with just a touch on the stem so you can slide volume up and down, take or end calls, skip songs, and activate your voice assistant - all without spending more time on your phone screen.
column6: >Slide up and down
column8: >Try doing that on other earbuds. Go ahead. We'll wait.

column4: >Tap-tap. Your audio, your control.
column8: >All good things come to those who... press for two seconds.
column10: >Pioneers of wearable touch controls.
column12: >We’ve been doing this since 2015, innovating touch controls directly on the hardware. Affectionately name the “Tickle” function (and how we named the TicWatch), no one does hardware touch control as well, or for as long as we have.

column2: >Smart and seamless. In-ear detection allows TicPods Free to know when you’re listening. Music pauses when you take one earbud out and resumes when you put it back in.

>Most wireless earbuds experience significant lag when gaming or video watching. We've optimized signal transmission and minimized audio lag so TicPods Free will enable you to clash royale or watch the playoffs on your train to work.
>Silicone tips (2 sizes come in the box) paired with ergonomic design create comfortable noise isolation. Hear only what you should.
>Hear your caller clearly in both ears, not just in one like other true wireless earbuds.
>Cancel out external sounds, other voices,  and ambient noise (like the wind) when you’re on a call, thereby isolating your voice so it sounds like you're in a quiet room.
>Speak and you shall receive. Long press for two seconds on the stem to access your voice assistant to control your music, make calls, receive notifications and more.

column1: IPX5 water and dust resistance.

column8:
>Do you lose things? Worry not because we’ve got you covered. Each pair of TicPods Free comes with a 1-year warranty and the option for you to buy individual earbuds should you lose one.

Countries we ship to

We ship worldwide, with the exception of Saudi Arabia, Peru, Ecuador, Macedonia, Kosovo, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that we cannot ship to military locations.

FAQ

For more information, please click here.

Team Mobvoi

Founded in 2012 by ex-Googlers, Mobvoi aspires to define the next generation of human-machine interaction. Our engineers strive to innovate tech products that seamlessly integrate cutting edge technology into daily life.

Our crowdfunding journey, with your support:

column1:
And it didn’t end there as we've gone on to be a best seller on Amazon. Join us in our journey to define the future of human-machine interaction!

","Award-winning true wireless earbuds by Mobvoi . Use the power of touch to stay off your phone screen. Hear your calls in both ears while our ambient noise cancellation and noise isolation make your calls crystal clear. TicPods Free's intuitive touch controls let you activate all your favorite features with just a touch on the stem so you can slide volume up and down, take or end calls, skip songs, and activate your voice assistant - all without spending more time on your phone screen.Ultra-intuitive touch controls. Slide up and downTry doing that on other earbuds. Go ahead. We'll wait.

Double tap. Tap-tap. Your audio, your control. Long press.All good things come to those who... press for two seconds. Pioneers of wearable touch controls.We’ve been doing this since 2015, innovating touch controls directly on the hardware. Affectionately name the “Tickle” function (and how we named the TicWatch), no one does hardware touch control as well, or for as long as we have.In-ear detection.
Smart and seamless. In-ear detection allows TicPods Free to know when you’re listening. Music pauses when you take one earbud out and resumes when you put it back in.

Most wireless earbuds experience significant lag when gaming or video watching. We've optimized signal transmission and minimized audio lag so TicPods Free will enable you to clash royale or watch the playoffs on your train to work.
Silicone tips (2 sizes come in the box) paired with ergonomic design create comfortable noise isolation. Hear only what you should.
Hear your caller clearly in both ears, not just in one like other true wireless earbuds.
Cancel out external sounds, other voices,  and ambient noise (like the wind) when you’re on a call, thereby isolating your voice so it sounds like you're in a quiet room.
Speak and you shall receive. Long press for two seconds on the stem to access your voice assistant to control your music, make calls, receive notifications and more.

And it didn’t end there as we've gone on to be a best seller on Amazon. Join us in our journey to define the future of human-machine interaction!",31.0,0,"2 Campaigns

BIG AIWA SOUND
The Exos-X8 is two things - Big.  And loud. It pushes major wattage through a reflex-ported 8” woofer and high-performance 3” tweeter. But Aiwa sound doesn't sacrifice sound quality for volume - with a wide, even frequency response and low distortion, you’ll hear every detail… even down the street.
With a high-accuracy class-D amplifier, custom-designed dual-magnet woofer, tweeter, and crossover, and 12+ hours of battery, the X8 will fuel the fun wherever you go!

We have a very simple formula for delivering better products: we put your money into what matters, into the hardware itself.  We don't waste money on fancy packaging, inefficient sales channels or celebrity endorsements, and you can hear the difference.

RUGGED PORTABILITY
At 20 pounds and 24” tall, the X8 is no pocket-sized beatbox. The 18” telescoping handle and built-in, high-quality shock-absorbing wheels make this beast of a speaker as mobile as you are.

ALL-DAY BATTERY LIFE
Keep the party going with 12+ hours of playtime with the built-in 12-volt battery and a 5V/1A USB power outlet to keep your phone and devices charged and ready to go.

ALL THE CONNECTIVITY
Whatever you’ve got, the X8 will play it, featuring Bluetooth 4.2, 3.5mm auxiliary input, USB playback, FM radio, (2) 6.35mm microphone jacks.

FUEL THE FUN WHEREVER YOU GO
Turn any get-together into a party with the Exos-X8, designed from the ground up to get your friends to engage with the music (and each other). Use the X8 and your exclusive access to Aiwa.FM to make the most of every party, karaoke night, wedding, birthday, holiday, tailgate, cookout or impromptu gathering.

The Aiwa Exos-X8 brings people together in ways that no other speaker can. It’s bigger, louder, and more portable, so you can make memories together wherever you are. And with exclusive free access to the world’s fastest playlist-sharing jukebox app Aiwa.FM, you’ll always have the right music and the right sound, right where you are.

AIWA.FM
With Aiwa.FM, you get a perfect automatic queue to keep track of whose turn it is, and all the flexibility of the cloud, to instantly get access to all the deep cuts and new hits on Youtube.

The Exos-X8 grants you exclusive early access to Aiwa.FM, a revolutionary new service that lets you share music at a party more easily than ever.  Many apps let you share or edit playlists, but none make it as easy and simple as sending an email.  No sign-ins, no apps to install, nothing to connect - just a shared jukebox where anyone can pitch in and share their favorite tunes late into the evening.  Never bother with the Aux cord or Bluetooth again when you want to share music - just share it to Aiwa.FM.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE
Aiwa has a great track record for customer service - you can read our reviews on Amazon.com.  You can count on the same support for your Exos-X8.  You can cancel your order at any time, and we'll offer our 2-year warranty and 90-day return policy on this product also.  We're here to help with any issues you might have, and you'll never be stuck with anything.

THE AIWA PROMISE 
The most important feature of this speaker is the people at Aiwa. We stand behind our products - the X8 is built to last. It’s backed by a 2-year warranty and 90-day no questions asked return policy. We also have full-time expert support staff based in the US to solve any issue you might have with the speaker. Buy with confidence, we know the only way to succeed is to treat our customers right.

WHO IS AIWA?
Aiwa is a small team with decades of experience in consumer electronics and audio. We're not the Aiwa you might remember from decades past - we have no affiliation with the ""old"" Aiwa or their corporate parent Sony. We relaunched the brand in 2015 to give the brand a new home to honor the ethos of creating incredible sounding audio products. We did that with some of the top-rated speakers and headphones on Amazon, including the Exos-9 (shown below), and we'd encourage you to read the reviews of both our products and our customer service.

WHAT WE BELEIVE
Aiwa believes that music is at the core of what makes us human.  For thousands of years, all music was a group activity - whenever there was music, we sang, danced, or played instruments together. There were no musicians or audiences, it was just us. This inspires our approach to speakers - they are for bringing people together, getting involved with the music, and making memories.

The Exos-X8 is not a one-off, luxury-grade, handcrafted speaker. It's a speaker for everyday life, real parties, and bringing with you wherever you go. It's a product Aiwa is bringing to market with the full benefit of its mature supply chain and full economies of scale (and the bang for your buck reflects that).  So why Indiegogo?  Feedback from our customers is extremely valuable. We want to give special benefits to the early adopters who get in first and help guide the direction of the product and company.  Indiegogo is the best way to do that.  We're raising $40,000 in early orders to help speed up delivery of the X8 to your doorstep.

  appropriate for people with mild to moderately-severe hearing loss.

column16: />
column24: >Nanoplug is a high-tech product adjustable in the privacy of your own home. Suitable for use with mobile  phones,  as well.  Most  importantly,  affordable.
column30: >Nanoplug allows you to keep your hearing loss secret with no noticeable  change to your appearance.
column40: >No one will know why you’re hearing better except you.

column7: >A huge leap forward in design, eliminating embarrassment and social stigma.

column1: Change lives by revolutionizing the Hearing Aid Industry.

column2: >To do so, we aimed at eliminating the top complaints people have with current hearing aids. <span style=""font-size: 16px
>The goal at Nanoplug was change lives by creating an affordable, invisible, instant-fitting, user programmable and better quality hearing aid than ever seen before.
>Nanoplug team was founded with the belief that the hearing aid industry needs a reinvention and refresh. With technological progress of the 21st century, hearing aids

column1: shouldn’t cost $2,000, come in antiquated designs, or be tedious to obtain.

column2: >Nanoplug is comprised of micro-components and nano-battery, allowing for a hearing aid  at a fraction of the size of  the next  smallest on the market.

>With a cell that is only nanometers in dimension, the nanobattery can be configured and connected to scale the output of power by accessing groups of cells into different sized banks, allowing for a variable output that transcends all boundaries and spans all applications.

>Additionally, with its extremely high surface to volume ratio, it provides a virtually instantaneous recharge. Batteries contain no toxic chemicals or heavy metals providing safety  while being  eco-friendly. They are  integrated and  rechargeable.
>Battery would give 138.888 hours runtime (6 days before recharging).
>Nanoplug  captures sound in the same way that your ears were designed to do.
>Device gently preserves and amplifies sounds so that what you hear is always clear, and you will be able to participate confidently in all situations.
>Nanoplug positioning reduces the risk of internal feedback and wind noise, allowing active users to comfortably enjoy the sounds around them.

>The benefit of the Nanoplug is that it keeps your ear canal open which is important for localizing sounds because the perception of sounds depends heavily on whether it comes from the back, the side or the front as the sound is influenced by the pinna and the ear canal.<span style=""color: rgb(106, 106, 106)
>Acous-Tap technology allows you to program your Nanoplug for up to 4 different environment (noise) settings.
>Simply pat your ear and Nanoplug will switch through your personal, preset programs to adapt to your current situation and noise levels.
>Nanoplug could be programmed for a noisy restaurant, walking or enjoying the outdoors, watching TV, etc.
>Before your Nanoplug hearing aids are sent to you, they are programmed to meet your specific hearing requirements.
>Making Nanoplug unique, you will also receive a Hearing Aid Programmer, allowing for adjustments in the privacy of your own home.
>Nanoplug's high tech adjustable hearing aids places the ability to make programming adjustments in the hands of the consumer.
>Hearing aid manufacturers will not provide this kind of programming option because they do not want you to have control of your own hearing aids.

column9: >You need to enter your audiogram. Based on the audiogram information entered,  ""auto fit"" program will automatically provide a ""first fit"" for the sound settings. Then you can make adjustments to the hearing aids. It really couldn't be easier.

column2: >A comfortable fit, no matter what size your ear canals are, even for people with small, thin and short ear canals.
>Easy to insert and easy to remove.
>Nanoplug is very powerful device based on the latest generation of microchips. It was built by a team of audiologists, engineers, and industrial designers.
>Nanoplug device guarantees high quality sound,  while lasting for  6 days without recharging.
>Nanoplug hearing aid has three basic parts: a microphone, microchip and  receiver.

>Small microphone collect sounds from the environment. A microchip converts the incoming sound into digital code. Then it analyzes and adjusts the sound based on your hearing loss, listening needs and the level of the sounds around you. The signals are then converted back into sound waves and delivered to your ears through receiver.

>Nanoplug also reduced the size of the cover by micro  injection molding. Micro injection molding is a processing technology using extremely high pressure and speed in  producing very small  and  accurate molded  parts.

>Micro injection molding is widely suited for most of raw materials ranging from high-temperature resistant engineering plastics to commodity resins. Thin wall injection molding can produce walls as thin as 0.3 mm.
>Nanoplug is not a mere project.  The frame prototype is already fully developed.
>We have spent more than a year designing and developing Nanoplug with the leading  audiologists, engineers, and industrial designers.

column2: >Nanoplug is more than just a product: it is a step in the right direction to change  the lives of people everywhere, for the better.

column1: ","Nanoplug is 100% invisible hearing aid, instant-fit,   appropriate for people with mild to moderately-severe hearing loss.

Nanoplug is a high-tech product adjustable in the privacy of your own home. Suitable for use with mobile  phones,  as well.  Most  importantly,  affordable.Nanoplug allows you to keep your hearing loss secret with no noticeable  change to your appearance.No one will know why you’re hearing better except you.
A huge leap forward in design, eliminating embarrassment and social stigma.
Change lives by revolutionizing the Hearing Aid Industry.
To do so, we aimed at eliminating the top complaints people have with current hearing aids.
The goal at Nanoplug was change lives by creating an affordable, invisible, instant-fitting, user programmable and better quality hearing aid than ever seen before.
Nanoplug team was founded with the belief that the hearing aid industry needs a reinvention and refresh. With technological progress of the 21st century, hearing aids
shouldn’t cost $2,000, come in antiquated designs, or be tedious to obtain.
Nanoplug is comprised of micro-components and nano-battery, allowing for a hearing aid  at a fraction of the size of  the next  smallest on the market.

With a cell that is only nanometers in dimension, the nanobattery can be configured and connected to scale the output of power by accessing groups of cells into different sized banks, allowing for a variable output that transcends all boundaries and spans all applications.

Additionally, with its extremely high surface to volume ratio, it provides a virtually instantaneous recharge. Batteries contain no toxic chemicals or heavy metals providing safety  while being  eco-friendly. They are  integrated and  rechargeable.
Battery would give 138.888 hours runtime (6 days before recharging).
Nanoplug  captures sound in the same way that your ears were designed to do.
Device gently preserves and amplifies sounds so that what you hear is always clear, and you will be able to participate confidently in all situations.
Nanoplug positioning reduces the risk of internal feedback and wind noise, allowing active users to comfortably enjoy the sounds around them.

The benefit of the Nanoplug is that it keeps your ear canal open which is important for localizing sounds because the perception of sounds depends heavily on whether it comes from the back, the side or the front as the sound is influenced by the pinna and the ear canal.
Acous-Tap technology allows you to program your Nanoplug for up to 4 different environment (noise) settings.
Simply pat your ear and Nanoplug will switch through your personal, preset programs to adapt to your current situation and noise levels.
Nanoplug could be programmed for a noisy restaurant, walking or enjoying the outdoors, watching TV, etc.
Before your Nanoplug hearing aids are sent to you, they are programmed to meet your specific hearing requirements.
Making Nanoplug unique, you will also receive a Hearing Aid Programmer, allowing for adjustments in the privacy of your own home.
Nanoplug's high tech adjustable hearing aids places the ability to make programming adjustments in the hands of the consumer.
Hearing aid manufacturers will not provide this kind of programming option because they do not want you to have control of your own hearing aids.

You need to enter your audiogram. Based on the audiogram information entered,  ""auto fit"" program will automatically provide a ""first fit"" for the sound settings. Then you can make adjustments to the hearing aids. It really couldn't be easier.
A comfortable fit, no matter what size your ear canals are, even for people with small, thin and short ear canals.
Easy to insert and easy to remove.
Nanoplug is very powerful device based on the latest generation of microchips. It was built by a team of audiologists, engineers, and industrial designers.
Nanoplug device guarantees high quality sound,  while lasting for  6 days without recharging.
Nanoplug hearing aid has three basic parts: a microphone, microchip and  receiver.

Small microphone collect sounds from the environment. A microchip converts the incoming sound into digital code. Then it analyzes and adjusts the sound based on your hearing loss, listening needs and the level of the sounds around you. The signals are then converted back into sound waves and delivered to your ears through receiver.

Nanoplug also reduced the size of the cover by micro  injection molding. Micro injection molding is a processing technology using extremely high pressure and speed in  producing very small  and  accurate molded  parts.

Micro injection molding is widely suited for most of raw materials ranging from high-temperature resistant engineering plastics to commodity resins. Thin wall injection molding can produce walls as thin as 0.3 mm.
Nanoplug is not a mere project.  The frame prototype is already fully developed.
We have spent more than a year designing and developing Nanoplug with the leading  audiologists, engineers, and industrial designers.
Your  support is crucial for  Nanoplug to get through the next  steps of  tooling  and commercial production, outlined in our schedule below.
Nanoplug is more than just a product: it is a step in the right direction to change  the lives of people everywhere, for the better.
You can choose between two options:",66.0,2,"1 Campaign

column4: >The Most Advanced WiFi Speaker, JookBox Broadcasts Its Own Network

column2:
>

JookBox WiFi speakers are custom designed to fill every room in your home with vibrant sound. Our cutting-edge, full-range drivers deliver deep, crystal-clear high fidelity acoustics. Each JookBox broadcasts its own dedicated WiFi network which is used to communicate with other JookBox speakers. The best part? You don’t need to connect JookBox to your home WiFi network or buy additional hubs. Just use the JookBox app to stream all the music on earth, on up to 10 JookBox speakers at the same time. You can even create a collaborative playlist and let your friends effortlessly queue and play their own music by enabling  party mode!


""While I think the JookBox app itself would have been a sufficient innovation, the creators weren't content with stopping there, so they also invented the JookBox speaker."" - CNET

column1: ""In the cut-throat market of wireless speakers, the trick of the trade is being original."" - Digital Trends

column4: > by allowing guests and hosts to fine-tune the playlist socially."" -

column2: >Don't let the small size fool you. The crystal-clear acoustics that emit from JookBox make every other speaker on the market sound flat and one-dimensional.
column3: > The two-driver setup with dedicated Class-D digital amplifier delivers rich and full-bodied sound for a true HiFi music experience. These incredibly versatile, full-range drivers allows for high resolution audio playback, with no loss in quality.

column1: Unlike our competition, we did not want to create a compact speaker that only utilized a combination of tweeter, mid-range driver or mid-woofer. We could never settle for a speaker that sounded dull and boring. Our goal was clear and simple
column2: to create an acoustic marvel. And that's exactly what we did. The pitch-perfect sound of JookBox is achieved by engineering state-of-the-art, dual 2.5’’ full-range drivers from the ground up.

column1: Full-range drivers allow JookBox to re-create acoustics that stretch across the entire audible sound spectrum. Reaching deep for those heart-felt lows, all the way up to angelic highs, JookBox makes music feel like it's being performed live, right in your home.

column4: > from the typical negatives of full-range drivers, like low output abilities and limited frequency response. We custom designed our drivers to have:

column3: >we knew it could be so much more than just a great sounding speaker, so we put our heads together and created something incredible. What we developed is a revolutionary new way to stream audio on multiple speakers simultaneously over WiFi

column1: The JookBox App connects to each JookBox speaker through JookNet on a separate wireless channel so you don't have to connect to your home WiFI network. Use the app on your smartphone, tablet, or WiFi enabled device to control the music from up to 100 feet away.

JookBox is the only WiFI speaker that is truly portable. Since you don’t need to connect JookBox to a WiFi network, you can listen to your favorite music everywhere, even while you’re hanging out at the pool.

JookBox is the most advanced multi-room speaker system ever developed. You can listen to a different song in each room, group rooms together, or hear the same music everywhere. JookBox can play music on up to 10 speakers at the same time without external hardware. Connecting multiple JookBox speakers forms a secure AES encrypted, dynamic peer-to-peer wireless mesh network.

column3: >designed to be beautiful, highly functional, and sound incredible
column4: >with the versatility to adorn any space. Its vibrant color scheme, compact size, and lack of messy cords makes JookBox the perfect accessory to compliment any decor.

column1: JookBox is very easy to set up through the JookBox App. Press and hold the logo on the front of the speaker for 3 seconds and JookBox will show up on the app. Then tap to connect. After JookBox is connected you can create a room to quickly access and control what music is playing. Expanding your JookBox speaker system is even easier. Just connect your new speakers, select which rooms they go in, and you’re all set.
The JookBox App lets you manage your playlist queue and set the mood around your home. Choose how loud you want each room, which song is playing, and edit the play queue for each room on the fly.

JookBox is the only WiFi speaker system that gives you complete control of your home listening experience without connecting to an external hub. When connected to a WiFi network, each JookBox speaker can act as a WiFi repeater  and increase the range of JookNet by 100 feet. This means that you can play the same song on every speaker from up to 1000 feet away.
JookBox speakers can be paired with near perfect sound channel synchronization for true stereo sound. Each speaker can stream separate Left &
column2: Right channels to create an immersive 5.1 surround sound, home theatre experience.

column1: JookBox can also stream from today's most popular streaming services like Netflix and Hulu or internet videos on YouTube, JookBox can play audio from any video source your WiFi enabled smart device can access. You can even plug your Apple TV, cable box, or Playstation into JookBox and your TV for captivating home theatre audio performance.

The JookBox App is what really sets JookBox apart and is the best way to organize and enjoy the music you love from any device. Play your favorite songs, explore new music, and create collaborative playlists at your next party.

Activate party mode and invite friends to queue and play their own music by adding their favorite songs to your collaborative playlist. You have control over who gets to access your playlist and how many songs they can submit to the queue. If you don’t like a song one of your friends added, you can quickly remove it from the playlist or slide it down to play it later.

The party is just a tap away with the JookBox App. Search and play any song from your smartphone, tablet, or computer. Check who added the next song, get all the info on the song that's currently playing, and see which songs have already been played.

column1: BSX Audio was founded just over a year ago by a small team of audiophiles that wanted high quality audio performance products at prices that wouldn’t break the bank. Our first project was creating the BSX Basix earphones. We partnered with a premier audio manufacturer to create great sounding headphones that were stylish, durable and reasonably priced. After the successful launch of our Basix earphones, we wanted to create a great sounding speaker that could be enjoyed by a group of people.

When we first began working on this project, we wanted to design a portable WiFi  speaker that you could toss in your backpack and take on the go or place in your living room. It had to sound great, look stylish, play music for hours, and it couldn’t cost an arm and a leg. Our original vision hasn’t changed from the time we came up with the concept and drafted our initial sketches.

Achieving our goal began with turning our concept sketches into working prototypes. After months of intense research, multiple prototype designs, and numerous meetings with sound engineers, we finally knew what we had to do.

column2: Hudson (engineer, right) holding the first JookBox.

column1: We built several functional prototypes to test sound quality, WiFi networking and connectivity. We saw huge improvements in quality, size, and battery life with each revision. Our second functional prototype was 40% smaller, lasted 3 hours longer than the first design, and was able to produce clear consistent audio.

column3: > we arrived at the final JookBox prototype that we'll use prior to manufacturing.

column1: Our next step was to find a manufacturer that was highly experienced in sourcing WiFi components and producing high end audio speakers. We visited multiple factories and finally found a manufacturer that could provide JookBox with amazing sound quality and WiFi connectivity.

Tommy is a true audiophile at heart that does everything at a lightning fast pace and envisions the future of audio to guide us forward. His remarkable level of discipline and determination are the virtues that inspires our team’s attempts to surpass his focus and efficiency. Tommy is masterful at communicating his concepts that compels powerful collaboration and brainstorming sessions, even though he’s usually two to four products ahead of the rest of us,

Aldo is the visionary behind many features of JookBox and has worked closely with Tommy to create the speaker. His expertise in hardware engineering is an invaluable asset that has fueled his drive for innovation and creativity. Aldo is also our lead graphic designer whose eye for design and photoshop skills are second to none. Aldo is working on the PCB layout and manufacturing preparation for JookBox, as well as overseeing the engineering design process.

Mike has a long history of strong leadership practices and a deep practical engineering experience that helps provide direction for our team. Even though Mike is a zealous free thinker, and inspires some of our most innovative ideas, he always manages to keep our priorities clear and in focus.

Jesse Caruso is the man behind the scenes connecting all the dots to keep BSX running efficiently. He is extremely detail oriented and meticulously crafts the organizational architecture and flow of BSX. Jesse leverages his extensive business knowledge and experience to handle every aspect of the business.

Moe balances marketing, operations, and brand awareness like a true boss. He helps create everything behind the curtains at BSX in every aspect of the business from constructing the system architecture to creating Facebook ads.

column2: >Sinisa has helped expedite our design process with his 10+ years experience in leading teams of product, UI, and creative developers. Sinisa is an extremely detail oriented designer that has created everything from the appearance of JookBox’s enclosure to the experience of opening the packaging. Although he excels in rapid prototype development and facilitating collaboration among the team, Sinisa never skips a step in the design process.

>Hudson's impeccable ear for audio imperfections and passion to fix them has magnified the sound quality of JookBox to levels we did not think were possible. He’s a true artist at positioning hardware components inside audio device enclosures to deliver vibrant sound that is both immersive and moving. Hudson is a classical music audiophile, and will only endorse the final speaker design when it can produce a sound experience with the realism of live music.

column1: Thank you for your love and support, Indiegogo!
Together we can create the next big thing in the audio world.
","The Most Advanced WiFi Speaker, JookBox Broadcasts Its Own Network

JookBox WiFi speakers are custom designed to fill every room in your home with vibrant sound. Our cutting-edge, full-range drivers deliver deep, crystal-clear high fidelity acoustics. Each JookBox broadcasts its own dedicated WiFi network which is used to communicate with other JookBox speakers. The best part? You don’t need to connect JookBox to your home WiFi network or buy additional hubs. Just use the JookBox app to stream all the music on earth, on up to 10 JookBox speakers at the same time. You can even create a collaborative playlist and let your friends effortlessly queue and play their own music by enabling  party mode!""While I think the JookBox app itself would have been a sufficient innovation, the creators weren't content with stopping there, so they also invented the JookBox speaker."" - CNET
In the cut-throat market of wireless speakers, the trick of the trade is being original."" - Digital Trends
JookBox social speaker shifts the music sharing paradigm by allowing guests and hosts to fine-tune the playlist socially."" - PSFK

Don't let the small size fool you. The crystal-clear acoustics that emit from JookBox make every other speaker on the market sound flat and one-dimensional. The two-driver setup with dedicated Class-D digital amplifier delivers rich and full-bodied sound for a true HiFi music experience. These incredibly versatile, full-range drivers allows for high resolution audio playback, with no loss in quality.

Unlike our competition, we did not want to create a compact speaker that only utilized a combination of tweeter, mid-range driver or mid-woofer. We could never settle for a speaker that sounded dull and boring. Our goal was clear and simple
column2: to create an acoustic marvel. And that's exactly what we did. The pitch-perfect sound of JookBox is achieved by engineering state-of-the-art, dual 2.5’’ full-range drivers from the ground up.

column1: Full-range drivers allow JookBox to re-create acoustics that stretch across the entire audible sound spectrum. Reaching deep for those heart-felt lows, all the way up to angelic highs, JookBox makes music feel like it's being performed live, right in your home. We also made sure that JookBox did not suffer from the typical negatives of full-range drivers, like low output abilities and limited frequency response. We custom designed our drivers to have:

While designing JookBox we knew it could be so much more than just a great sounding speaker, so we put our heads together and created something incredible. What we developed is a revolutionary new way to stream audio on multiple speakers simultaneously over WiFi without connecting to your router.

Our cutting-edge WiFi chipset allows each JookBox speaker to broadcast its own dedicated 2.4GHz WiFi network that we call JookNet. Using a dedicated network ensures a consistent audio experience without delays, skips, or drops caused by streaming music on overcrowded home networks. JookBox also supports Apple AirPlay and DLNA.

The JookBox App connects to each JookBox speaker through JookNet on a separate wireless channel so you don't have to connect to your home WiFI network. Use the app on your smartphone, tablet, or WiFi enabled device to control the music from up to 100 feet away.

JookBox is the only WiFI speaker that is truly portable. Since you don’t need to connect JookBox to a WiFi network, you can listen to your favorite music everywhere, even while you’re hanging out at the pool.

JookBox is the most advanced multi-room speaker system ever developed. You can listen to a different song in each room, group rooms together, or hear the same music everywhere. JookBox can play music on up to 10 speakers at the same time without external hardware. Connecting multiple JookBox speakers forms a secure AES encrypted, dynamic peer-to-peer wireless mesh network.

JookBox was designed to be beautiful, highly functional, and sound incredible with the versatility to adorn any space. Its vibrant color scheme, compact size, and lack of messy cords makes JookBox the perfect accessory to compliment any decor.

JookBox is very easy to set up through the JookBox App. Press and hold the logo on the front of the speaker for 3 seconds and JookBox will show up on the app. Then tap to connect. After JookBox is connected you can create a room to quickly access and control what music is playing. Expanding your JookBox speaker system is even easier. Just connect your new speakers, select which rooms they go in, and you’re all set.
The JookBox App lets you manage your playlist queue and set the mood around your home. Choose how loud you want each room, which song is playing, and edit the play queue for each room on the fly.

JookBox is the only WiFi speaker system that gives you complete control of your home listening experience without connecting to an external hub. When connected to a WiFi network, each JookBox speaker can act as a WiFi repeater  and increase the range of JookNet by 100 feet. This means that you can play the same song on every speaker from up to 1000 feet away.

JookBox speakers can be paired with near perfect sound channel synchronization for true stereo sound. Each speaker can stream separate Left & Right channels to create an immersive 5.1 surround sound, home theatre experience.

JookBox can also stream from today's most popular streaming services like Netflix and Hulu or internet videos on YouTube, JookBox can play audio from any video source your WiFi enabled smart device can access. You can even plug your Apple TV, cable box, or Playstation into JookBox and your TV for captivating home theatre audio performance.

The JookBox App is what really sets JookBox apart and is the best way to organize and enjoy the music you love from any device. Play your favorite songs, explore new music, and create collaborative playlists at your next party.

Activate party mode and invite friends to queue and play their own music by adding their favorite songs to your collaborative playlist. You have control over who gets to access your playlist and how many songs they can submit to the queue. If you don’t like a song one of your friends added, you can quickly remove it from the playlist or slide it down to play it later.

The party is just a tap away with the JookBox App. Search and play any song from your smartphone, tablet, or computer. Check who added the next song, get all the info on the song that's currently playing, and see which songs have already been played.
Check out this quick video that shows how your friend can request access to your party playlist and play their own song.

Play all the music on earth or quickly search for the next song. Find anything you want to hear from your local library or across all the music services you use in one place, at the same time. The JookBox App currently integrates with the most popular music streaming and internet radio services like Spotify, iTunes, 8tracks, and Pandora. More streaming service integrations are coming soon!
Amplifiers: Two Class-D digital amplifiers, perfectly tuned to match the speakers and acoustic architecture.
Wireless Connectivity: WiFi and NFC enabled. Works on JookNet, a dedicated 2.4GHz secure AES encrypted, wireless mesh network. Also supports Apple AirPlay and DLNA.
Audio Formats: MP3, WMA, WAV, FLAC, DSD, AAC, W4A.
Battery: 7.4V4400mAH (10 hours of music playback) rechargeable Lithium Ion.
Dimensions (W x D x FrontH x BackH): 8.35” x 3.10” x 2.4”  x 2.2”
COME PARTY WITH THE X TEAM IN BOSTON, MA!

BSX Audio was founded just over a year ago by a small team of audiophiles that wanted high quality audio performance products at prices that wouldn’t break the bank. Our first project was creating the BSX Basix earphones. We partnered with a premier audio manufacturer to create great sounding headphones that were stylish, durable and reasonably priced. After the successful launch of our Basix earphones, we wanted to create a great sounding speaker that could be enjoyed by a group of people.

When we first began working on this project, we wanted to design a portable WiFi  speaker that you could toss in your backpack and take on the go or place in your living room. It had to sound great, look stylish, play music for hours, and it couldn’t cost an arm and a leg. Our original vision hasn’t changed from the time we came up with the concept and drafted our initial sketches.

Achieving our goal began with turning our concept sketches into working prototypes. After months of intense research, multiple prototype designs, and numerous meetings with sound engineers, we finally knew what we had to do.
The first JookBox prototype is born.
Tommy (founder, left) & Hudson (engineer, right) holding the first JookBox.

We built several functional prototypes to test sound quality, WiFi networking and connectivity. We saw huge improvements in quality, size, and battery life with each revision. Our second functional prototype was 40% smaller, lasted 3 hours longer than the first design, and was able to produce clear consistent audio.
After many revisions we arrived at the final JookBox prototype that we'll use prior to manufacturing.

Our next step was to find a manufacturer that was highly experienced in sourcing WiFi components and producing high end audio speakers. We visited multiple factories and finally found a manufacturer that could provide JookBox with amazing sound quality and WiFi connectivity.

Tommy is a true audiophile at heart that does everything at a lightning fast pace and envisions the future of audio to guide us forward. His remarkable level of discipline and determination are the virtues that inspires our team’s attempts to surpass his focus and efficiency. Tommy is masterful at communicating his concepts that compels powerful collaboration and brainstorming sessions, even though he’s usually two to four products ahead of the rest of us,

Aldo is the visionary behind many features of JookBox and has worked closely with Tommy to create the speaker. His expertise in hardware engineering is an invaluable asset that has fueled his drive for innovation and creativity. Aldo is also our lead graphic designer whose eye for design and photoshop skills are second to none. Aldo is working on the PCB layout and manufacturing preparation for JookBox, as well as overseeing the engineering design process.

Mike has a long history of strong leadership practices and a deep practical engineering experience that helps provide direction for our team. Even though Mike is a zealous free thinker, and inspires some of our most innovative ideas, he always manages to keep our priorities clear and in focus.

Jesse Caruso is the man behind the scenes connecting all the dots to keep BSX running efficiently. He is extremely detail oriented and meticulously crafts the organizational architecture and flow of BSX. Jesse leverages his extensive business knowledge and experience to handle every aspect of the business.

Moe balances marketing, operations, and brand awareness like a true boss. He helps create everything behind the curtains at BSX in every aspect of the business from constructing the system architecture to creating Facebook ads.

Sinisa has helped expedite our design process with his 10+ years experience in leading teams of product, UI, and creative developers. Sinisa is an extremely detail oriented designer that has created everything from the appearance of JookBox’s enclosure to the experience of opening the packaging. Although he excels in rapid prototype development and facilitating collaboration among the team, Sinisa never skips a step in the design process.

Hudson's impeccable ear for audio imperfections and passion to fix them has magnified the sound quality of JookBox to levels we did not think were possible. He’s a true artist at positioning hardware components inside audio device enclosures to deliver vibrant sound that is both immersive and moving. Hudson is a classical music audiophile, and will only endorse the final speaker design when it can produce a sound experience with the realism of live music.

Your pledges will help us accelerate the manufacturing process, perfect our mobile user experience, and most importantly grow the JookBox community. We’ve done the hard part, now we just need your help to make JookBox a reality, so please pledge to our campaign and help us reach our goal.
Music is meant to be enjoyed with friends. So please spread the word and tell everyone you know by tweeting (click the bird below) or sharing on Facebook.
Thank you for your love and support, Indiegogo!
Together we can create the next big thing in the audio world.
