>Everywhere You Go

 

Motikom MPlus was designed under our decades of experience in product manufacturing.  We are devoted to design and provide high-quality products through innovation and latest technology. As our mission claims, to solve communication in motion. Take the challenge and develop a new way for communication. 

The world 1st Crossover Headphone with HDNC™ and BT Intercom for motorcyclists and outdoor activities lovers

Keys  Features

column1:
Hybrid Dynamic Noise Cancellation System (HDNC™) 

Powered by HDNC™ Technology we’ve been working on for over 2 years, you can adjust a total of 5 control levels from ultimate noise cancellation to amplified surrounding sound. MPlus delivers the best motorcycle noise-free experience on the market. In the Ultimate HDNC mode, MPlus minimizes most of the engine &
column2:
wind noise and gives you peace of mind but you still can safely hear a normal car horn and police siren loud and clear.

5-Level Control

MPlus can not only eliminate noise but also gives you control of how much sound you want to let in. In this way, you can optimize the HDNC™ to meet your needs.

Hear the difference among each HDNC™ level:
column4:
>

Powerful Connection 

MPlus adopts Bluetooth Technology 5.0 protocol to provide the most stable connection and power saving. Its full-duplex link supports simultaneous transmit and receive. After the long-term market research and repeated tests, we successfully increased the communication distance to over 150-meter range with low latency. With this incredible approval distance, riders have no need to worry about losing your riding buddy.
column5:
/>

Twist, then speak. The innovative twist control system (TCS™) is natural and intuitive for maximum safety while riding!

When it comes to a call while riding, don’t bother to search for your phone or any button. Simply twist the knob,  the Mics are ready for your to talk. Making sure that you are safe and sound when riding!

Whenever You Need the Intercom

Even when you are off the road, MPlus can meet your requirements of BT communication in all kinds of occasions. Compared with traditional Bluetooth headphones, MPlus delivers the more stable connection with longer working range. Never worry losing your partners.

Enhanced Communication with Extra Boom Mic

MPlus with dual MEMs Mics functions excellently in picking up a voice in all directions. To deliver even better communication experience, we also developed an enhanced version of MPlus that comes with a detachable Boom Mic Kits. It provides awesome flexibility and makes it possible to communicate in the worst noisy environment. Don’t worry about wind noise or any unwanted one, the Mic nails it.

MPlus is compatible with other Bluetooth earphones/motorcycle intercom devices via Bluetooth HFP Profile.

*The Universal pairing connectivity is subject to the 3rd party BT device's software. 

Simple Installation

Compared to other motorcycling intercom system, MPlus is super easy to install and take off. It is compatible with all kinds of helmets without complicated set-up.
column7:
/>

MPlus Works with Any Helmet Type without Complicated Set-up

Thanks to the effort of designers and engineers at the helm of our product,

MPLUS won the HONG KONG SMART DESIGN AWARDS 2020 GOLD Awards

Motikom offers a 1-year Warranty for MPlus. Please find the detail HERE.

column5: >Geek Out V2 is a compact DAC and headphone amplifier that connects to your computer or mobile device through a USB port. It supports full-resolution audio so you can feel closer to your music, no matter the format.

column2: >Geek Out V2 is a problem solver.

column5: >About twenty-five times more powerful than a laptop or phone's output jack, Geek Out V2 can drive any set of headphones.
>Geek Out V2 is small and lightweight so you can take it anywhere you go, but don't let its diminutive size fool you. It's a boss.
>Geek Out V2 is the most transparent DAC you can find, supporting PCM up to 32/384 kHz and DSD up to 128 times the sample rate of a CD.
>Geek Out V2 lets you choose between Time Coherence Mode (minimum phase) or Frequency Response Mode (slow roll-off linear). It's the only portable DAC that gives you this much control.
>Geek Out V2 fully complies with the USB 2.0 Audio Specification. That means it's plug-and-play on USB 2.0 devices. We provide a driver for non-compliant operating systems.
>Not all headphones are created equal, so Geek Out V2 lets you choose how much power to output: 100 mW for sensitive IEM's or 1000 mW for large cans.

column2: >Geek Out V2+ is the master of adaptability.

column5: >Geek Out V2+ takes the cutting-edge tech of V2 and adds a huge 3100 mAh lithium ion battery, giving you noise-free playback for up to 10 hours.
>With its added portability, Geek Out V2+ is designed to connect to your computer and your Android or iOS device*.

column1: *Connection of Geek Out V2+ to your iOS device requires Apple's Camera Connection Kit and Lightspeed B to B OTG cable from LH Labs.

Geek Out V2 and V2+ are designed with the same principle in mind that we used when we first introduced our original Geek Out, it has to play real 32 bit / 384 kHz PCM audio and DSD128 natively. That means, it can play any music file format.

Geek Out V2 and V2+ are designed to give you the most accurate, real to life, playback of your favorite music. Thanks to their high-resolution capabilities, noise-free background and increased amplification, your music is effortlessly placed on a true to life, three dimensional soundstage. They're unlike any other portable headphone device out there. So go ahead, take your soundstage with you anywhere you go.

Ever wish you could turn up the volume on your music just a little more? Well, Geek Out V2 and V2+'s amplifier is up to 25 times more powerful than the headphone amplifier typically used in audio devices. That means you can really crank this sucker up. Not only is it louder, it's clearer and has dramatically more detail and bass.

Geek Out V2 and V2+ aren't just a couple of powerful audio devices, they're also very high resolution ones. That means they can reproduce even the tiniest details in your music, making the experience of listening to music more like real life.

One secret of great digital audio is a lack of digital noise. Geek Out V2 and V2+ don't let noise get into the signal thanks to their regulated bipolar power supplies and extremely accurate dual clocks. The end result is real-to-life vocals and amazingly accurate instrument separation.

Just because Geek Out V2 and V2+ can scream at the top of its lungs doesn't mean it's not sensitive enough to whisper into you in-ear-monitors. Adjustable gain settings allow you to perfectly match the output power for your HUGE power hungry cans or uber sensitive IEM's.

column2: >More Specs than You Can Shake a Stick At

column1:
You don't have to wait long! Shipping of pre-ordered Geek Out V2 and Geek Out V2+ units begin in December 2015.

","Powerful. Convenient. Transparent.

Geek Out V2 is a compact DAC and headphone amplifier that connects to your computer or mobile device through a USB port. It supports full-resolution audio so you can feel closer to your music, no matter the format.
Geek Out V2 is a problem solver.
About twenty-five times more powerful than a laptop or phone's output jack, Geek Out V2 can drive any set of headphones.
Geek Out V2 is small and lightweight so you can take it anywhere you go, but don't let its diminutive size fool you. It's a boss.
Geek Out V2 is the most transparent DAC you can find, supporting PCM up to 32/384 kHz and DSD up to 128 times the sample rate of a CD.
Geek Out V2 lets you choose between Time Coherence Mode (minimum phase) or Frequency Response Mode (slow roll-off linear). It's the only portable DAC that gives you this much control.
Geek Out V2 fully complies with the USB 2.0 Audio Specification. That means it's plug-and-play on USB 2.0 devices. We provide a driver for non-compliant operating systems.
Not all headphones are created equal, so Geek Out V2 lets you choose how much power to output: 100 mW for sensitive IEM's or 1000 mW for large cans.
Geek Out V2+ is the master of adaptability.
Geek Out V2+ takes the cutting-edge tech of V2 and adds a huge 3100 mAh lithium ion battery, giving you noise-free playback for up to 10 hours.
With its added portability, Geek Out V2+ is designed to connect to your computer and your Android or iOS device*.
*Connection of Geek Out V2+ to your iOS device requires Apple's Camera Connection Kit and Lightspeed B to B OTG cable from LH Labs.

Geek Out V2 and V2+ are designed with the same principle in mind that we used when we first introduced our original Geek Out, it has to play real 32 bit / 384 kHz PCM audio and DSD128 natively. That means, it can play any music file format.

Thanks to their high-resolution capabilities, noise-free background and increased amplification, your music is effortlessly placed on a true to life, three dimensional soundstage. They're unlike any other portable headphone device out there. So go ahead, take your soundstage with you anywhere you go.

Well, Geek Out V2 and V2+'s amplifier is up to 25 times more powerful than the headphone amplifier typically used in audio devices. That means you can really crank this sucker up. Not only is it louder, it's clearer and has dramatically more detail and bass.

Geek Out V2 and V2+ aren't just a couple of powerful audio devices, they're also very high resolution ones. That means they can reproduce even the tiniest details in your music, making the experience of listening to music more like real life.

One secret of great digital audio is a lack of digital noise. Geek Out V2 and V2+ don't let noise get into the signal thanks to their regulated bipolar power supplies and extremely accurate dual clocks. The end result is real-to-life vocals and amazingly accurate instrument separation.

Just because Geek Out V2 and V2+ can scream at the top of its lungs doesn't mean it's not sensitive enough to whisper into you in-ear-monitors. Adjustable gain settings allow you to perfectly match the output power for your HUGE power hungry cans or uber sensitive IEM's.
More Specs than You Can Shake a Stick At
You don't have to wait long! Shipping of pre-ordered Geek Out V2 and Geek Out V2+ units begin in December 2015.",22.0,0,"9 Campaigns

ALL YOUR FAVORITE ANDROID AUDIO APPS 

Swimcast has Google’s Chromecast Audio built in, so it’s already optimized for popular streaming apps like Spotify on Android. The popularity of the Chromecast means that as new audio apps become available over time, they will likely be supported. As a bonus, the native Cast button in Android will stream any audio coming from your phone!

CONTINUOUS AUDIO STREAMING

Powered by the WiFi enabled Chromecast Audio, Swimcast delivers continuous audio even during flip turns and push offs. Popular wireless technologies like Bluetooth can’t play music in the pool without interruptions. By creating a mobile WiFi hotspot on your phone, you can use Swimcast anywhere, and if your pool already provides WiFi, you can just start your playlist from the locker room and leave your phone behind.

ANY SONG ANY TIME

Life is full of limits, but your music library shouldn’t be one of them. Mp3 players and recent “streaming” devices limit you to a few gigabytes of storage and force you to plan your music ahead of time. With Swimcast, you can pick the music you are in the mood for while you are at the pool, making your playlist infinite! 

NO WASTED TIME DOWNLOADING 

One of the best benefits of streaming music on your phone is that it’s hassle free, and bringing music to the pool shouldn’t be any different. Why waste time buying songs, downloading them to your computer or phone, and then transferring them to your music player? Direct streaming on Swimcast simplifies the whole process, so all you have to do is press play and cast it.

NO PAID ACCOUNTS REQUIRED

Swimcast streams live from the internet while you swim, so you don’t need to purchase any premium accounts. Instead, the money you save on a Spotify subscription you can spend on new swim gear, a gym membership, or even just a nice meal. Since you are not locked into one service, you can stream Pandora one day and YouTube the next.

BEST AUDIO QUALITY AVAILABLE

Another benefit of incorporating Google’s Chromecast Audio into Swimcast is the high-quality sound it delivers. Wireless technologies like Bluetooth over-compress files and degrade the audio quality of your music. WiFi maintains lossless compression creating better detail and a more dynamic range. At 24 Bits and 96kHZ, Swimcast is even better than CD quality, giving you the highest quality audio available in the pool. 

EVERYTHINGPROOF

Between the certain peril of water, and inevitable chips, scuffs, and scratches of concrete, pools are a dangerous place to take your precious electronics. At Waterfi we know water, and we know pools. For seven years we have tested every which way to keep your electronics safe. Equipped with our most durable process yet, Swimcast is watertight and completely cushioned from any hazard you could run into when you head out for a swim.

SIMPLE ONE TIME SETUP

Swimcast has a Chromecast Audio built into its core, so it uses the same, user-friendly software developed by the masters at Google. Just download the 'Google Home' app and follow the simple, one-time setup process shown in the video below. Every time you go to the pool after that all you have to do is open a Chromecast supported app (which most are), choose your music, and press the Cast button.

Our Kickstarter campaign raised over $33,000, giving us all the funding we need to make swimcast a reality, but we want to keep Swimcast available to pre-order at a discounted rate until our production line is fully up and running.  On top of that, the Swimcast only scratches the surface of what we can do with the patent pending technology we used to create it.  Make a pledge now so you can be among the first in line to get a Swimcast when it’s ready.
At this stage of our project, we have:
• Tested Swimcast while swimming laps and doing flip turns
• Produced products in the past that will use the same in-house manufacturing equipment and suppliers
• Produced almost 200,000 waterproof devices over the last seven years, proving we can produce high-quality electronics for swimmers.
• Raised enough funding to launch production of Swimcast

column2:
>

FAQ

What apps work with Swimcast on Android?

A big reason we chose to use a Chromecast Audio inside of Swimcast is the fact that it gives us full Android integration. This means any and every app that you can get on Android will work with Swimcast! Audiobooks, Podcasts, mp3s stored on your phone, even Apple Music! They all work because the Android Operating System has a Cast button built into the Settings so it will stream any audio that would normally come out of your phone, over to the Swimcast.

What apps work with Swimcast on iOS?

Swimcast is compatible with iPhone and iPad. The Google Chromecast Audio we use to power Swimcast is set up to work with a variety of iOS apps.

When using your iPhone as a Mobile Hotspot you can use:

column1: In addition to that, if you can connect to your gym's Wifi or if you swim at home, you can also use:
Unfortunately, Apple and Amazon do not support casting in their iOS apps so Amazon music, Audible, Apple Podcasts &
column2:
Apple Music aren't supported on iOS.

Apple Music and all other apps do work with Swimcast on Android though.

What is a hotspot?

There are two ways to connect to the internet on Swimcast: you can use a building’s existing WiFi or make your own WiFi, otherwise known as a hotspot. A hotspot can be made on your iOS or Android phone or tablet by simply pressing a single button, usually in your quick settings dropdown window. There are also standalone hotspot devices that use the same cell towers your phone uses to turn a 4G data connection into a WiFi network.

Pro tip: Set your phone’s hotspot to the same name and password as your home wifi network and Swimcast will automatically connect. This way you can conveniently set up Swimcast at home and not do anything different to connect on your phone.

Founded in sunny San Diego in 2010 by Engineer Royce Nicholas, Waterfi has always been passionate about achieving the impossible: making your favorite gadgets work underwater! Waterfi is a tight-knit, 10 person company in the trendy North Park neighborhood which has spent the last seven years designing and manufacturing the best waterproof products and processes. This year we are risking it all to help swimmers transition from downloaded music MP3 players to the bright world of streaming music players. We will not be satisfied until your swim experience is just as fun and easy as listening to music from your phone.

Hi there, Captain OT here to announce the launch of the Big Turtle Shell Ultra by Outdoor Tech. I’m ready to brighten up your day by letting you see more of myself. Yes, I know it’s extremely generous of me, but since I am so awesome, I have decided to share my awesomeness with you.

At long last, the greatest superhero ever has a film to show off his greatestness and the greatness of the new Big Turtle Shell Ultra. Feast your eyes upon the strong, handsome, intelligent, and strong (did I say strong again)… Captain OT. Not since the dawn of civilization has the world seen such a wonderful being . . .  ughh I mean speaker.
I’ll let the gang from Outdoor Tech take it from here. - Captain OT
Thanks Captain OT, you are quite the wordsmith. Greatestness?

We are Outdoor Tech and we love making Stuff You Probably Want. Since 2009, Outdoor Tech has been shaped by this constant push and pull, to stay connected but not tethered. Our blood boils with design, style, and creation. From our magical home in Southern California we aim to create products that serve real needs, for real people that do real things.
Our mission is to bridge the gap between brilliant design and rugged accessories that stand up to an active lifestyle.

The Big Turtle Shell Ultra provides a full wireless audio experience. Using Bluetooth 4.2 True Wireless technology (pair two together), the Big Turtle Shell Ultra wirelessly connects with your phone, tablet, laptop, or any other Bluetooth-enabled device to bring you loud, quality, wireless auditory bliss. Streaming crystal-clear audio from a range of over 30 feet and a play time of 8 hours on a single battery charge.

Your Big Turtle Shell Ultra is built with a rugged, waterproof housing so you no longer have to be afraid of taking your speaker off of your coffee table and into the wild. The Big Turtle Shell Ultra was built for adventure, it's begging you to take it to the extreme corners of the world, but it will settle for your summer pool party if that's the best you can throw at it. That is right, drop it in the pool and listen away.

The Big Turtle Shell Ultra is capable of 360° omnidirectional stereo sound. Unlike a traditional “brick” speaker that just points sound at you, the Big Turtle Shell Ultra fills the area with perfect, loud, wireless auditory bliss. The upgraded Neodymium magnetic drivers conduct sound like no other.

Here are some of the stats on the speaker:
Speaker Size: 2 70mm drivers
Speaker Sensitivity: 78±3dB
Speaker Impedance: 6 Ohm
Speaker Max Input Power: 2*10W
Speaker Frequency Range: 100HZ~20KHz
Speaker Passive Bass Radiator: 75db 164*80mm

It's important to note that having a loud speaker is rad but when the Big Turtle Shell Ultra is at maximum volume it sounds amazing. We balanced out the audio and are very pleased with the results. You will be too.

Wirelessly connect 2 Big Turtle Shell Ultras together via True Wireless technology. It's easy too, we added a True Wireless button on the Big Turtle Shell Ultra so syncing up 2 speakers is as simple as pressing a button. First you pair one speaker with your device (phone, tablet, computer, etc.) then you pair that speaker with another Big Turtle Shell Ultra. You can have the first speaker up to 30 feet from your device and the second speaker up to 30 feet from the first speaker!

Our product engineers have worked hard to make the Big Turtle Shell Ultra have a waterproof rating of at least IPX7, yep completely waterproof. Which means that you can take the Big Turtle Shell Ultra almost anywhere without having to worry about it getting ruined by the elements. Made for a life on the go the Big Turtle Shell Ultra is easy to handle, mount, pack, and take with you.

The huge 8,800 mAh internal battery will keep the music blasting for over 12 hours! You can even use that power to charge external devices like your phone, GoPro, or other small electronics via the Big Turtle Shell Ultra’s USB (standard A) port.
Say goodbye to that clunky AC Adapter. The Big Turtle Shell Ultra has a micro USB (type B) in port for charging. So, charging up in any country is as easy as finding a USB port with power.

Set the mood with the cool white LED lighting array in the Big Turtle Shell Ultra. Three lighting modes let you choose how much glow you want. A high setting of 150 lumens, middle of 100 lumens, and low of 50 lumens. So now you can pretend your Big Turtle Shell Ultra is a flying saucer that plays heavy metal or mellow jazz, that’s up to you.
Of course the Big Turtle Shell Ultra has a built-in microphone too. This means you can use it as a speakerphone for calls or other voice functions on your phone, tablet, or computer.

With just a few buttons on the Big Turtle Shell Ultra, you can do the following: power on/off, pair with device, pair with another speaker, play/pause music, skip forward/back, volume up/down, answer/end call, activate Siri/Google Assistant, and turn on/off lights. Yeah, that’s a lot of stuff!

Designing and developing the Big Turtle Shell Ultra has been both fun and challenging and now we are at the most difficult part of the entire project. This is the part where we need to actually start production, but we don't have the funds to do that. We need the help from the Indiegogo community to finish the product and bring it to market.
Once in a Lifetime Opportunity
We can tell you that getting this on Indiegogo is a crazy deal. You won't be able to grab one (or four) at this price anywhere once it's available.

>Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Q: Does iSolo have frequency disruption problem?
A: iSolo can automatically hopping to better channel at ISM 2.4GHZ Band. If you experience unstable connection, please use following step:
-Move transmitter closer to receiver. 
-Provide a clearer line of sight between transmitter and receiver.
-Place receiver in a high location.
-Turn on flight mode and turn off WiFi, when you record on a smartphone.

column1:
Q: Can I use it with android phones?
A: Require an Android 5.0 or later version, the applicability of different types of Android phones still depends on practical test.

Q: What is the max distance between transmitter and receiver?
A: Live receiver have two modes. “Near”: 3~5meters, “Far”: 5~10meters. The distance still depends on the stage conditions and the volume of wifi routers.

Q: What kind of instruments does iSolo support?
A: Upcoming: Cello, violin, ukulele, erhu, zither

Q: How to connect to receiver?
A: Start iSolo first, put it near the receiver and press pair button once. The green light will light consistently when it connects.

Return Policy

If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, simply return the item within 14 days. You can refund the entire amount by PayPal. Please note delivery fees are not refundable.
*Valid in the continental United States only.

Contact us 

For press inquiries or have a question, feel free to mail us! 
info@cloudvocal.com

Imagine a speaker that only you can hear, even if there are a bunch of other people in the room. Akoustic Arts' « A » speaker is the world’s most advanced directional speaker. It creates a narrow beam of sound, the same way that a laser creates a beam of light to focus on a precise area, allowing you to blast sound directly into your ears from across the room without anyone else hearing it. 

 

 

 

                

 

 

 

 

 

                 
 

""A speaker that only you can hear, even if there are a bunch of other people in the room."" – Wired

""The « A » speaker is one of those fabulous creations that your brain tells you is completely impossible, even while you’re listening to it. (...) When the speaker isn’t aimed directly at you, you don’t hear it at all."" – Stuff

""When I was a foot away from that speaker, I was off to the side. But, when I walked a couple steps and got directly in front of the speaker, I could hear the audio clearly and loudly. That’s the awesome part about this speaker — you can crank up the volume without disturbing anyone else."" – Chipchik

""This speaker allows you to listen to music alone, without bothering anyone else around. Out of the sound beam, it’s impossible to hear anything, even if you are in the same room."" – Le Figaro

""You don’t need headphones anymore to stay in a bubble in the middle of the living-room !"" – Science&
column2:
Vie


(Retrouvez une revue de presse en français ici)

 

Whether you’re at work, in your bedroom, or in your living room, the possibilities are endless. Here are just a few ways to enjoy « A » :
 

 

                             Watch a late night movie without disturbing anyone

 

 

                      Enjoy music quietly while staying alert to your surroundings

 

 

 

 

         Enjoy your contents privately at work without distracting your colleagues

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

                          Play to your games without those annoying headphones

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                     Enjoy your music discreetly in your bedroom
NOTE: The version used for the photos is « A » Original.

column1:
« A » is available in two versions :

- Original (20x20cm / 8"" sq.)
- Junior (9x9cm / 3.5"" sq.)

 

 


In the back, you can easily fix « A » to a stand or wall-mount.

« A » gets plugged through its core. There are two line input/output so you can plug in your smartphone to the first one and link up another « A » through the second.

 

 

 

 


 

 

 




Nothing's easier than setting up your « A »
• Plug in the charging cable to the speaker
• Connect the speaker to your device (smartphone, tablet, laptop...)

Like any other external speaker, you can connect « A » to any of your audio devices through a 3.5mm mini-jack : smartphones, tablets, computers, stereos, TVs, mp3 players…

 

 

(Version française ici)

What’s the secret behind the « A » speaker ? « A » uses revolutionary ultrasonic technology to point sound directly at one listener, while excluding everyone nearby.

Inside the beam, you hear sound.
Outside, you hear nothing.

 

 

 

 

 


 

Let’s get scientific !

The « A » speaker works in an entirely different way from conventional loudspeakers. The biggest difference is it does not produce ordinary sound waves with a single, moving electromagnetic coil and cone. Instead, it generates ultrasonic waves (high-frequency sound waves) that are then turned into audible sound waves.

 

 

 

 

 

 

                                   
 


As you can see on the above figure, the primary beam is generated by transposing the audio signal into the ultrasonic domain. This primary beam is then emitted by the loudspeaker, propagates in the air and self-demodulates to reconstitute the audible audio signal.

Now you may ask yourself, how can sound be emitted through a constrained zone, instead of going in every direction ? Well, because of the self-demodulation effect that appears on each point of the primary beam, the demodulated waves act as a virtual array, interacting with each other inside a secondary beam that keeps the same directivity properties than the ultrasonic primary beam.

In the end, sound travels out from the « A » speaker in a narrowly focused column, like a flashlight beam.

In fact, we're on a mission to finally get sound to ease and enhance our daily lives, while avoiding sound pollution :

We’d love to adapt « A » to your ideas and give you the best private listening experience possible. Leave us a comment with your suggestions !

column10: D, they are proud to introduce you to « A », the world's most advanced directional speaker.

column1:
When will my « A » be delivered ?

We anticipate fulfilling orders in September 2016.

How much is shipping and handling ?
$20 for Europe
$30 for International orders

Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries.

UE residents, VAT costs (20%) are added directly to shipping costs.

What’s in the box ?  
Here’s a list of everything that comes with your « A » :
« A » Speaker
Charging cable
3.5mm stereo mini-jack

What are the main differences between « A » Original and « A » Junior ?
The main difference is that Junior is half the size of Original. Therefore, its beam of sound is tighter and volume is less loud. Junior is more adapted for a proximity use (on a desk for instance). Original can be used for longer distances.

I can't read the Directivity Diagrams. Can you help ?
These diagrams are an illustration of the sound level (in decibels) depending on your position from the axis of the speaker (in degrees).
Let’s take the Original’s diagram as an example : at approx. 20° from the axis of the speaker, we measure a 30dB loss.

I can’t read the Frequency Response tables. Can you help ?
These tables are an illustration of the sound level (in decibels) depending on the frequency (in Hz). Let’s take the Original’s frequency response table as an example : it better restitutes a 2000Hz frequency than a 1000Hz frequency as we observe a 5dB increase between the two.

How precise directivity is ?
Very. In fact, our technology is unrivaled and enables a very clean and intelligible beam of sound that makes you the only one to hear it. You can watch an amateur video footage shot on our stand at International CES earlier this year, showing « A »’s directivity
column2:
feature=em-upload_owner"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">here.
 As it is so directional, you have to aim well to hear sound. Another factor to bare in mind is that sound might reflect on smooth surfaces such as walls or glass and other people might hear those reflections. Make sure to point it precisely at you in order to absorb sound and avoid any reflections.

How does « A » sound ?
It provides an amazing experience. Directional sound is something that we are not used to and it will undoubtedly surprise you when you first hear it. « A » adds a spacial dimension to sound and provides an immersive listening experience. However, it is not comparable to a hi-fi sound system and will find its limits when playing music that is big on low frequencies. « A » diffuses low frequencies in the very middle of its beam and there are so physically tight that you have to aim right to hear them.
Click
column3:
list=PL-GIa2iaVISKmKdP6HO5CwKSYt4LnWFcU"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">here to watch a demonstration of « A » Original.

Is the use of high frequencies harmful to my ears ?  
Don’t worry, we have cautiously eliminated every undesired audible frequencies that could cause trouble to your ears. The only danger, like any other loudspeaker or headphones, is playing it at too loud a level for long periods. We therefore recommend limiting extended exposure to loud sound volumes. Generally speaking, take care of your ears !

Is it mono or stereo ?
« A » has bridged mono sound. This means that it mixes both left and right channels from stereo input.

How far can sound travel ?
« A » Original (the most powerful version) can emit sound within a distance of approx. 10 meters.

Can I control sound distance ?
Simply aim the speaker at you so the sound waves are absorbed.

What are the color options ?  
For now, « A » comes in a beautiful white case. More color options will depend on how well the campaign goes !

Can I expect a wireless version of « A » ?
Yes, but not before 2017. R&
column4:

Does « A » have a warranty ? 
Yes. It comes with a 90 days limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

Please note that all product specifications, illustrations, drawings, particulars, dimensions and other information made available by us are intended to represent no more than a general illustration of the Product and its features and do not constitute a warranty or representation by us that the Product will conform with the same.

 

Can I change or cancel my perk ?

Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. See more information on how to do this here.

","Imagine a speaker that only you can hear, even if there are a bunch of other people in the room. Akoustic Arts' « A » speaker is the world’s most advanced directional speaker. It creates a narrow beam of sound, the same way that a laser creates a beam of light to focus on a precise area, allowing you to blast sound directly into your ears from across the room without anyone else hearing it.                                             ""A speaker that only you can hear, even if there are a bunch of other people in the room."" – Wired""The « A » speaker is one of those fabulous creations that your brain tells you is completely impossible, even while you’re listening to it. (...) When the speaker isn’t aimed directly at you, you don’t hear it at all."" – Stuff""When I was a foot away from that speaker, I was off to the side. But, when I walked a couple steps and got directly in front of the speaker, I could hear the audio clearly and loudly. That’s the awesome part about this speaker — you can crank up the volume without disturbing anyone else."" – Chipchik""This speaker allows you to listen to music alone, without bothering anyone else around. Out of the sound beam, it’s impossible to hear anything, even if you are in the same room."" – Le Figaro""You don’t need headphones anymore to stay in a bubble in the middle of the living-room !"" – Science&Vie(Retrouvez une revue de presse en français ici) Whether you’re at work, in your bedroom, or in your living room, the possibilities are endless. Here are just a few ways to enjoy « A » :                               Watch a late night movie without disturbing anyone                        Enjoy music quietly while staying alert to your surroundings             Enjoy your contents privately at work without distracting your colleagues                                  Play to your games without those annoying headphones                                             Enjoy your music discreetly in your bedroomNOTE: The version used for the photos is « A » Original.

« A » is available in two versions :- Original (20x20cm / 8"" sq.)- Junior (9x9cm / 3.5"" sq.)  In the back, you can easily fix « A » to a stand or wall-mount.« A » gets plugged through its core. There are two line input/output so you can plug in your smartphone to the first one and link up another « A » through the second.       Nothing's easier than setting up your « A »
Plug in the charging cable to the speaker
Connect the speaker to your device (smartphone, tablet, laptop...)

Like any other external speaker, you can connect « A » to any of your audio devices through a 3.5mm mini-jack : smartphones, tablets, computers, stereos, TVs, mp3 players…  (Version française ici)What’s the secret behind the « A » speaker ? « A » uses revolutionary ultrasonic technology to point sound directly at one listener, while excluding everyone nearby.Inside the beam, you hear sound.Outside, you hear nothing.       Let’s get scientific !The « A » speaker works in an entirely different way from conventional loudspeakers. The biggest difference is it does not produce ordinary sound waves with a single, moving electromagnetic coil and cone. Instead, it generates ultrasonic waves (high-frequency sound waves) that are then turned into audible sound waves.                                           As you can see on the above figure, the primary beam is generated by transposing the audio signal into the ultrasonic domain. Well, because of the self-demodulation effect that appears on each point of the primary beam, the demodulated waves act as a virtual array, interacting with each other inside a secondary beam that keeps the same directivity properties than the ultrasonic primary beam.In the end, sound travels out from the « A » speaker in a narrowly focused column, like a flashlight beam.                                                    Whether you'd like to set « A » on your desk or fix it to a wall, it's all possible with our accessories.                                  NOTE : « A » automatically comes with a stand. SenCbuds are the world’s first smart earphones that can automatically detect when your music, podcasts or movies need to be paused. Join us and take the way you listen to music to the next level!

Headphones and earphones have been improved and optimized immensely in the past few years. It is nowadays common that you can play and pause your music by pushing a built-in button and that you can use most earphones as a headset as well. Now, it’s time for earphones to reach their next evolutionary step!

Meet SenCbuds, the first earphones that can automatically detect when to pause your music. Using patent pending sensor technology, SenCbuds recognize when they are taken out of your ear, and pause the music you are listening to, or the movie you are watching, accordingly!
SenCbuds unique functionality is powered by motion-sensitive, patent pending Smart Sense Technology (SST).
Smart Sense Technology allows SenCbuds to instantly pause your music when you take them out of your ear, and to restart it when you put them back in.

All SenCbuds come with a convenient management system to avoid tangled cables! It also comes with buttons that you can use to control your music and accept calls manually in case the battery of your SenCbuds died.

When creating SenCbuds, we wanted to produce earphones that offer the most excellent audio quality possible. We wanted to equip SenCbuds with the most advanced compatible technology in order to provide clear and powerful sound!
If you get our SenCbuds Plus, your earphones will also be equipped with a gold plated audio jack, a do-not-disturb light and noise isolation through memory foam earbuds!
We are offering worldwide shipping for $10 USD per unit. If you order more than one unit, every unit after the first costs $5 USD more.
The Thank You Pack, the Workout Pack, the Retail Starter Pack and the Distribution Pack include free shipping worldwide!

While on a trip to San Francisco, Dhaval had a long conversation with a friend who told him about his experiences with working in a co-working space. He told Dhaval about his habit of listening to podcasts during work and about the many times that someone had come up to him to talk to him while he was in the middle of a podcast. Naturally, he would then take out his earphones and talk to whoever came up to him, but he would always get frustrated when realizing that his podcast had progressed to a completely different part in the meantime. That’s when Dhaval had the idea for SenCbuds - earphones that would pause what you were listening to once you take them out of your ears!
The more Dhaval thought about his idea, the more it became evident that this would not just be convenient during working hours, but also in the gym, outdoors or while travelling.

Now, approximately one year later, the basic development of the earphones is done and we are ready to bring SenCbuds to all the people who share our daily frustrations! Join us, and become part of the SenCbuds story!

Dhaval is a software engineer from New Zealand and the inventor of SenCbuds. Besides coming up with the idea, Dhaval is in charge of having SenCbuds become a reality, which means that he handles project management, fulfilment and everything else that comes up!

Bas is an industrial designer from the Netherlands and responsible for SenCbuds’ amazing product design. He has spent hours and hours on ensuring that your SenCbuds provide the best user experience, durability and aesthetics possible!

Earphones are as much a matter of style and preference as they are bound to the technology that powers them. We want to provide a product that is of the best possible quality in every aspect, which is why we have allowed sufficient time for testing in our timeline. Nonetheless, we do face risk that the prototype tests reveal bugs or errors resulting in optimizations, and thus leading to delays in our delivery plan.

While we are confident that our team’s vast experience in all relevant fields is extensive to overcome all challenges that might come up, we have lined-up partnerships with leading specialist in all critical areas of our fulfilment process. Therefore, we are confident that we can handle all the risks associated with the development of SenCbuds.

Our goal is to process and ship all rewards within six months of being funded. This will give us time to make sure everything is in order, that we have all necessary materials in-hand and that the earphones we’re sending out to our backers are of the best quality possible.
Which devices can I use my SenCbuds with?

We’ve equipped SenCbuds with a handy iOS/Android switch, which enables you to use them with virtually any smartphone, tablet or laptop. Just plug SenCbuds into your device, flip the switch to the appropriate platform and enjoy!
Do my SenCbuds come with a warranty?
Yep! SenCbuds will be shipped including a one-year warranty covering any defects or malfunctions. The warranty will not cover misuse or user-inflicted damages, such as modifications, however.

When you receive your SenCbuds package, it will include the reward you selected, one cord housing component, one pair of silicone cap replacements for the earbuds, and, of course, a set of instructions.
What is the average battery life of my SenCbuds?
SenCbuds were designed to last longer than two weeks on a single battery charge! In our initial stages of testing, we’ve even experienced lifespans of up to 17 days.
Will my SenCbuds still work once the battery died?

Absolutely! When the battery is low or dead, SenCbuds revert to being regular earbuds! The sensor will not detect your motions once the battery is drained, but you can still pause and play manually, when listening to your tunes or watching Netflix.
There is a USB charging port built into the housing frame of the cord coil. All you need to do to charge your SenCbuds, is using the included USB adapter with your available power source!
How is the sound quality of SenCbuds?

SenCbuds were designed to be more than just intuitive - we also wanted to create earphones that have the most excellent audio quality possible. That’s why we equipped SenCbuds with 9mm drivers, sensitivity to 98DB, an impedance of 16Ω and a frequency range of 5Hz to 25kHz.
Yes, SenCbuds have a built-in microphone. It allows you to use them as a headset for all your smart devices!

What is the Smart Sense Technology (SST) that powers SenCbuds?

The sensor that gives your SenCbuds their unique functionality is a patent-pending, proprietarily designed smart sensor. The sensor is designed to detect the precise moments in which you take your SenCbuds out of your ears, and in which you put them back in, creating a smooth playback experience!

","Yes, Hi-FI sound refers to the original sound played back in a recording studio              Having a microphone inside the earbuds, the voice traveling through Eustachian Tube will be caught by inner-mic and the ambient noises around you will be physically blocked when you talk on the phone or use voice commands.       ACCUDIO Button’s Noise Blocking solution always maintains noise-reduction performance at least 35 dB, regardless of the types of noise. Whereas normal earbuds show a drop in voice recognition rate as the noise level increases. ACCUDIO Button maintains at least a 90% rate of voice recognition. especially for the voice-type of noise.  Other earbuds can detect speech in less than 75 dB of noise.However, ACCUDIO Button can recognize speech in almost any environment with less than 100 dB of noise.    Inner Mic Technology allows you to enjoy your clear phone calls, high-quality sounds, and noise-free communications Our technology removes every noise and allows clear communication in extremely noisy environments like battlefields, construction sites, and airport runways. Using ACCUDIO Button, the user can send accurate voice messages, voice commands, and voice notes even in a noisy environment. Additionally, these can be automatically converted into text.We will deliver more AI service for your better AI life.                                                         If you want to have a partnership with us, feel free to contact us: contact@orfeosound.com",88.0,6,"1 Campaign

column1: One Control Pedal to Rule Them All!

Hi everyone! If you know me from the Facebook Spark groups, you know I have already been hard at work on my developing an open-source Wireless control footpedal/remote for digital guitar amps, the TinderBox. If not, this is the first pedal compatible with controlling the hot new Spark 40 Amp from Positive Grid, and it works without modification to the amp (just like a universal remote does with your TV). I am very grateful for the overwhelmingly positive response from the Spark community so far. Now, I want to take this project and energy even further!

It is no suprise that experimentation and development costs a fair amount of money for parts and equiment. I have done well self-funding so far, but to do even more, I am going to need your help! This will enable me to explore new and innovative ideas around:
• Rotary controls for tone and effects adjustments!
• Use with other wirelessly controlled amp brands and models!

In exchange for your support, 10 of you will get a chance to be intrepid navigators of uncharted tonal uses of the Spark before anyone else, and be able to buy an early prototyped version of the pedal for $75! You will also be able to help dial in pedal design, responsiveness, and user experience. Additionally, you'll receive personal support for the device from me! Lastly, you will have the choice to keep the Explorer TinderBox Pedal or exchange it towards 40% off on the finalized pre-built version of the TinderBox Pedal later!

But what if you are not one of the first 10, and you still reaaally like what I'm doing? Pledge $10 now towards my exploration efforts, and you will get 10% off the finalized pre-built TinderBox Pedal.
The road ahead is not without potential hazards (as any Spark owner knows). I want to address any issues as they arrise, but for the moment, the most pressing concerns are:
• Legal response from Positive Grid (so far there has been nothing but good vibes from them!)

I have been programming and experimenting with robotics since I was 11, and have spent the last four years working as a professional software developer for two Fortune 500 companies in the financial and video streaming industries.

Does this sound familiar to you?

The thing about audio.
Ears are less forgiving than eyes.


There are so many situations where the audio quality is easily forgotten in the first place, but hard to ignore afterward. So, whenever we watch or listen to something, we rather have decent audio. Otherwise, it quickly gets annoying. To get there, there a simple thing to regard:
the position of the microphone.

When you film a video with your smartphone, for instance, the built-in microphone is mostly too far away from the person you actually want to hear in your video. Why? 
More distance means more ambient and surrounding noise. 

In other words, you pick up the traffic and other people’s talking and just get this:

 

Instead, with an external microphone, you can record close to the sound source.
Short distance means little surrounding noise.

In other words, you record only the audio of your interest and just get this:

 


 

With Mikme, you record audio at its best. Easily, instantly, wirelessly.


From now on, you only capture the best sound – for your business calls, your video memories or your voice recordings.

Mikme is the world’s first wireless recording microphone that captures your audio with just the push of a button. Equipped with a large (2/3 inch) electret capsule you’ll get nothing short of professional sound. 

Capture ideas or events instantly on the built-in audio recorder. Sync the audio from the Mikme directly with your smartphone’s video using our all-new Mikme App. If you’re a lot on video calls or rather crec sound with your computer, no problem, Mikme also works as USB microphone.
 

No matter what, Mikme has you covered.

Made for

 

 

No extra cables &

column1: Audio recorded with Mikme Microphone Gold

Mikme in review.
What press and others say

The Mikme journey
 

The Mikme Silver is already the second member in the Mikme family. It was in Summer 2015 when we first introduced the Mikme Microphone Gold on Indiegogo. We look back on a great campaign with an overwhelming support: 


As we are crazy about audio, we always wanted tools that make the recording of sound at its best easy and hassle-free – for all kinds of creators.

With that mission in mind and with the demand for other versions in a growing community, we're now back with this next family member, the Mikme Microphone Silver.

The Mikme Collection


The new product for this campaign is the Mikme Microphone Silver. But we also wanted to offer a complete set of products and accessories to fit your use case.

Perk Overview

These are the perks for this campaign. Every perk features a different set of hardware products.

    All perks include a 6-month subscription of the Mikme Plus Service (launching Q1 2019) with unique features such as:
Branding of audio-video content with Intro/Outro videos and watermark
Video live streaming within Mikme App to Facebook

US or international backers

Please select this perk when your shipping address is in the United States or another international location (that is NOT in the European Union):
• Please select a perk labeled with ""(for US/Intl)""

EU backers

Please select this perk when your shipping address is in the European Union:
• Please select a perk labeled with ""(for EU)""

VAT included (20% VAT, Austria)
Please note, the included tax is the reason for the higher perk price.

Listen for yourself

At first sight, both versions look the same. If you want to know the difference we'd say to best give it a listen. In the following video, you can hear the distinction between the Mikme Silver and Gold. You'll also find comparing a sample of a $2.500 vintage Neumann studio microphone and our Mikme.
Here is an overview of the most important  Mikme Silver and Mikme Gold (original Mikme from Indiegogo campaign 2015 and available on the market right now)

The Mikme App Features


The Mikme iOS App is already available in the Apple App store.
The Mikme Android App will be available in late 2018 / early 2019.

Released app features (with Mikme iOS App 3.0)

Remote control all parameters of the Mikme right from the app
(Start/Stop recordings, change the gain, set sample rates, and file type...)
Wirelessly stream audio from your Mikme Microphone to your smartphone with the Mikme Lost &
column3: Found protocol makes sure that you never have any dropouts in your recordings as a failsafe copy of your audio recording is always stored in your Mikme and can be synced after the end of the recording.

column1: Wireless stream audio from your Mikme Microphone and record video with your smartphone camera. The Mikme App will sync the audio and video automatically.
• Update your Mikme via the app over the air (OTA update of Mikme OS)
• Organize your recordings in the visual gallery, mark recordings as favorites.
• Change the audio volume and panorama for audio tracks
Offline sync of offline recorded files from Mikme
• Set manual focus and exposure points (lock focus and exposure) for video
Customize framerate and resolution of video recording (depends on the smartphone)
• Add custom watermark and Intro/Outro videos for the branding of content
Autogain for automatic setup and change of gain before and while recording

Mikme Plus Service

The Mikme product range consists of hardware and software products. The hardware products are the Mikme Microphone Silver and Gold plus a range of accessories such as bags, cases and a windscreen.

Additionally, the software products are the Mikme OS running on the Mikme Microphone and the Mikme Apps. As Mikme can work in a number of different use cases we want to offer the best possible features set at the most affordable price. Thus, we will offer different feature sets of the Mikme App with different tiers of the Mikme Plus Service.

The Mikme hardware products work standalone as audio recorders or as USB microphones without the need of any additional Mikme app or Mikme Plus service. These are free features.

Furthermore, the Mikme hardware products can be remotely controlled and monitored as well as updated with the Mikme app as part of the free tier of the Mikme Plus Service.

 

Launch

The Mikme Plus service will launch Q1 2019. These main features will be introduced with the Mikme Plus service:
Branding of audio-video content with custom watermark and Intro/Outro videos
Video live streaming with Mikme App to Facebook

-----

IMPORTANT – Current customers and Mikme Plus Service

Current customer:

All current customers who bought the Mikme Gold at the original Indiegogo campaign and from dealers plus all customers who will buy the Mikme at dealers until the launch of the Mikme Plus Service (planned to launch Q1 2019) will get the actual released features of the Mikme iOS App 3.0.1 (see list above) for free forever.

We will not charge additional costs for audio wireless sync and audio/video sync and for a current customer this will be free forever.

We want to respect your early support for Mikme. Many thanks for your support so far :-)

Mikme Silver campaign backers:

All backers who bought a perk with the 6 months Mikme Plus Service subscription included (starting at the launch of Mikme Plus Service - Q1 2019) will get the new features of the app (see new features of app list above).

-----

Service Tiers

The Mikme Plus Service tiers ""Basic"" and ""Plus"" offer features such as unlimited audio/video sync plus custom video settings, branding, and live streaming.

A 6-month subscription of the Mikme Plus Service tier ""Plus"" is included in all perks of this Indiegogo campaign.

Here's an overview of the Mikme Plus Service:

Who we are 


We love shooting videos or recording songs ourselves. And we are fathers, friends, and musicians ourselves. So we know there is nothing more important than our kid's rehearsals, our friend's wedding or a new idea for a song. It is those moments we want to capture in the best and easiest possible way.

We want to add the sound these moments deserve.

We have a professional audio manufacturing background. Half of our team worked for the well-known microphone manufacturer AKG in Vienna, Austria. At AKG we developed, manufactured and designed dozens of professional microphones, wireless microphones, headphones and conferencing system. 

Since 2016, the team has steadily been growing and now we are a team of 9 persons running Mikme. We've already shipped thousands of Mikmes in more than 100 countries. We are committed to develop Mikme further and to keep the innovation going. We want you to get the best content creation toolkit on the market for the mobile generation. 
 

 

 

Behind the Scenes


As we've already launched our first hardware product, the Mikme Gold, to customers around the world, and started production/ramp up back in Autumn 2016. We have already a lot of experience with production and shipping. With some experience and time, we've learned what is important and have already built a solid production line.

We manufacture in Germany with the highest attention to detail.

As the new product the Mikme Silver is 90% identical with the Mikme Gold we can reuse lots of things such as 90% of the mechanical parts, 95% of the electronics, the same ATE (measurement stuff in the production), production tools and processes which ultimately makes the production ramp up process much smoother and less risky.

We have found reliable partners when it comes to shipping. 

 

See the Mikme factory

column3: '>FCC and CE certifications are passed and the development is finished. The Mikme OS software is stable as it is taken over and slightly changed from original Mikme OS.

column1: • 2013: Philipp left AKG to found Mikme, Teamsize: 1

• 2015: successfully launched Mikme on Indiegogo:
    $403.000 raised, 2000 Mikmes sold with 1.750 backers in 100+ countries
• 2016 Summer: Thomas joined Philipp as co-founder, Teamsize: 5
• 2017 Spring: Shipped 2.000 Mikmes to Indiegogo backers in 100+ countries
• 2017 Summer: Certifications passed and Mikme App in the Apple App store, MFi certified
• Autumn 2017: First Mikme Silver Prototypes ready - DONE
• April 2018: First trial run for Mikme Silver completed - DONE
• May 2018: Software customized for Mikme Silver - DONE
• June 2018: Launched – Mikme OS update with USB Mic feature (works for Mikme Gold and Silver) - DONE
• June 2018: Launched – Mikme App 3.0 - reworked UI (works for Mikme Gold and Silver) - DONE
• September 2018: Ramp up of mass production of Mikme Microphone Silver starts
• November 2018: Shipping of Mikme Microphone Silver to first backers
• February 2019: Sync of files which were recorded without the app

• Q1 2019: Launch Mikme Mikme Plus service
    - iOS App with branding
    - Custom video features (manual focus and exposure, 4k resolution, custom frame rate)
    - Video live streaming

FAQs

 

What's the main difference between the Mikme Gold and Silver?

The Mikme Silver has a 2/3 inch electret capsule whereas the Mikme Gold has a gold-plated, phantom powered capsule.

The Mikme Silver is more optimized towards speech recording and blocks background noise from the backside a bit more.

It features 2GB instead of 16GB of storage and can record in 24Bit with 44.1 and 48 kHz but NOT with 96kHz. Also, you can record only in m4a file instead of raw and m4a files for the Mikme Microphone BlackGold 16GB.

Why are there price differences for EU and US/International backers?

Because we do not collect VAT for the US and international customers but need to collect VAT for EU customers and due to that we need to have a higher price for EU customers.

When will the Android App be launched?

We target a release late 2018 / beginning 2019.

Does the Mikme work without the Mikme Plus Service?

The Mikme Microphone is working standalone as USB Microphone and audio recorder without the Mikme App. Basic remote features are available with the free Mikme App. There are certain features which are available with the Mikme Plus service.

launching late 2018 / early 2019Wired – Micro USB ConnectorWorks with- Windows XP and higher with USB 2.0- Mac OS 10.8 and higher with USB 2.0Audio Out 3.5mm Mini JackLow latency monitoring of- Microphone capsule audio signal- Playback audio signal from Mikme App- Mix balance adjustable via Mikme AppUsed for- Headphones Monitoring- Stereo audio out to DSLR or mixerMounting3/8 in thread for microphone stands1/4 in thread for DSLR tripods and mic standsDimensions and Weight70 mm (2.75 in) x 70 mm (2.75 in) x 35 mm (1.4 in)220 g (0.35 lbs) Weight  Who we are We love shooting videos or recording songs ourselves. And we are fathers, friends, and musicians ourselves. So we know there is nothing more important than our kid's rehearsals, our friend's wedding or a new idea for a song. It is those moments we want to capture in the best and easiest possible way.We want to add the sound these moments deserve.We have a professional audio manufacturing background. Half of our team worked for the well-known microphone manufacturer AKG in Vienna, Austria. At AKG we developed, manufactured and designed dozens of professional microphones, wireless microphones, headphones and conferencing system. Since 2016, the team has steadily been growing and now we are a team of 9 persons running Mikme. We've already shipped thousands of Mikmes in more than 100 countries. We are committed to develop Mikme further and to keep the innovation going. We want you to get the best content creation toolkit on the market for the mobile generation.    Behind the ScenesAs we've already launched our first hardware product, the Mikme Gold, to customers around the world, and started production/ramp up back in Autumn 2016. We have already a lot of experience with production and shipping. With some experience and time, we've learned what is important and have already built a solid production line.We manufacture in Germany with the highest attention to detail.As the new product the Mikme Silver is 90% identical with the Mikme Gold we can reuse lots of things such as 90% of the mechanical parts, 95% of the electronics, the same ATE (measurement stuff in the production), production tools and processes which ultimately makes the production ramp up process much smoother and less risky.We have found reliable partners when it comes to shipping.  See the Mikme factory
FCC and CE certifications are passed and the development is finished. The Mikme OS software is stable as it is taken over and slightly changed from original Mikme OS.
2013: Philipp left AKG to found Mikme, Teamsize: 1
2015: successfully launched Mikme on Indiegogo:$403.000 raised, 2000 Mikmes sold with 1.750 backers in 100+ countries
2016 Summer: Thomas joined Philipp as co-founder, Teamsize: 5
2017 Spring: Shipped 2.000 Mikmes to Indiegogo backers in 100+ countries
2017 Summer: Certifications passed and Mikme App in the Apple App store, MFi certified
Autumn 2017: First Mikme Silver Prototypes ready - DONE
April 2018: First trial run for Mikme Silver completed - DONE
May 2018: Software customized for Mikme Silver - DONE
June 2018: Launched – Mikme OS update with USB Mic feature (works for Mikme Gold and Silver) - DONE
June 2018: Launched – Mikme App 3.0 - reworked UI (works for Mikme Gold and Silver) - DONE
July 2018: Indiegogo campaign for Mikme Silver
September 2018: Ramp up of mass production of Mikme Microphone Silver starts
November 2018: Shipping of Mikme Microphone Silver to first backers
February 2019: Sync of files which were recorded without the app
Q1 2019: Launch Mikme Mikme Plus service- iOS App with branding- Custom video features (manual focus and exposure, 4k resolution, custom frame rate)- Video live streaming

FAQs What's the main difference between the Mikme Gold and Silver?The Mikme Silver has a 2/3 inch electret capsule whereas the Mikme Gold has a gold-plated, phantom powered capsule.The Mikme Silver is more optimized towards speech recording and blocks background noise from the backside a bit more.It features 2GB instead of 16GB of storage and can record in 24Bit with 44.1 and 48 kHz but NOT with 96kHz. Also, you can record only in m4a file instead of raw and m4a files for the Mikme Microphone BlackGold 16GB.Why are there price differences for EU and US/International backers?Because we do not collect VAT for the US and international customers but need to collect VAT for EU customers and due to that we need to have a higher price for EU customers.When will the Android App be launched?We target a release late 2018 / beginning 2019.Does the Mikme work without the Mikme Plus Service?The Mikme Microphone is working standalone as USB Microphone and audio recorder without the Mikme App. Basic remote features are available with the free Mikme App. There are certain features which are available with the Mikme Plus service.",57.0,7,"3 Campaigns

column1: It has been a long adventure. From brainstorming to product design, engineering, and branding, it has been a trying, monumental amount of time, conviction and expertise.
It has been a stressful, exciting and thrilling experience to design a product from scratch. We want you to be part of our experience!

column2: >1. How do I record with Instamic?

>The fastest one is using the recording button on the bottom part of the Instamic (the Instamic logo) . Once the mic is on, simply tap and hold the button for a second, Instamic will automatically adjust the gain on its own in the first 10 seconds and then it will keep that optimal level. We call it Smart Gain. Tap and hold again for a second and it will stop recording.
>If you have a mobile device, pair Instamic with it, and control it through the Instamic App.
>2. How can I monitor the input signal?
>Instamic has 3 LEDs onboard, showing the input level.
>You have a more precise VU meter on the mobile app, with the ability to control the input level while recording (if you set up the Input Mode on Manual)
>3. About how long can Instamic record for?

>The maximum recording time depends on the recording format you choose. Currently the maximum recording time is up to 16hrs at 48 khz / 24 bits Mono and 8hrs at 48 khz / 24 bits Dual Mono (Instamic) - Dual mono or Stereo (Instamic Pro) uncompressed audio (LPCM WAV format) .
>4. How long will the batteries last?
>You will get 4 hours of recording time. Duration can vary depending on charging time, temperature and storage conditions.
>5. How do I charge my Instamic?
>Plug it into an available USB port using the USB cable provided. The LEDs will start flashing, showing the current battery level. When all the 3 LEDs are lighten up, the battery is fully charged.
>7. How do I use the quick release clip?

>Instamic has a quick release clip that gives you the versatility to take it on and off in seconds. With each Instamic you will get 3 release clips with 3 different mounting options: Magnet, Velcro and Tape. All 3 of them have a hole to attach your own lanyard.
>8. Which are the main functions of the mobile app?

>Once you pair Instamic with your mobile device, press record and start capturing immediately, Instamic will automatically adjust the gain on its own in the first 10 secs and then it keeps that level. You can also control the input level manually from the app. Before recording you can access Instamic’s settings and customize them to your needs (Input level - Manual / Smart Gain, Rec Mode - Mono, Dual Mono, Stereo).
>9. How do I transfer the audio files to my computer

>Instamic has a splash proof (Instamic) and waterproof (Instamic PRO) micro USB 2.0 connector. Connect it using a USB cable into an available USB port. This will bring up a window showing the Instamic as an external device drive on your computer. There you will find each take as a single .wav file.
>10. Instamic Pro is waterproof. What is the maximum depth?
column3: >You can take Instamic up to 3.2 feet for maximum 30 minutes, according with IP67.

column1: My name is Michele and I live to capture life’s senses through film. I’ve been on many shoots weighed down by equipment. These work for bigger productions, but what about life’s subtler moments. I dreamt about a tiny device capturing life’s textures so often lost between the recorder and the scene. A device that anyone could use. That device is Instamic. Let's change the way we capture sound.
For any questions please email us at support@instamic.io.                                 INSTAMIC BASIC
The Instamic is splash-proof, so while it cannot be submerged under water, a little drizzle won't get in the way of your day in the field. Capture the beautiful sounds of rain without any worry.
The Instamic Pro is waterproof up to 5 feet underwater. Forget the heady and expensive waterproofing gear - now you can produce sounds from the sea.

FIRMWARESend us a Firmware Upgrade Request to support@instamic.io with your Order info and Serial Number of your Instamic / Instamics. We will guide you through the upgrade procedure. Thanks for your collaboration.
Our team is ready - so is the manufacturing - now we just need you!
It has been a long adventure. From brainstorming to product design, engineering, and branding, it has been a trying, monumental amount of time, conviction and expertise.
It has been a stressful, exciting and thrilling experience to design a product from scratch. We want you to be part of our experience!
1. How do I record with Instamic?

The fastest one is using the recording button on the bottom part of the Instamic (the Instamic logo) . Once the mic is on, simply tap and hold the button for a second, Instamic will automatically adjust the gain on its own in the first 10 seconds and then it will keep that optimal level. We call it Smart Gain. Tap and hold again for a second and it will stop recording.
If you have a mobile device, pair Instamic with it, and control it through the Instamic App.
2. How can I monitor the input signal?
Instamic has 3 LEDs onboard, showing the input level.
You have a more precise VU meter on the mobile app, with the ability to control the input level while recording (if you set up the Input Mode on Manual)
3. About how long can Instamic record for?

The maximum recording time depends on the recording format you choose. Currently the maximum recording time is up to 16hrs at 48 khz / 24 bits Mono and 8hrs at 48 khz / 24 bits Dual Mono (Instamic) - Dual mono or Stereo (Instamic Pro) uncompressed audio (LPCM WAV format) .
4. How long will the batteries last?
You will get 4 hours of recording time. Duration can vary depending on charging time, temperature and storage conditions.
5. How do I charge my Instamic?
Plug it into an available USB port using the USB cable provided. The LEDs will start flashing, showing the current battery level. When all the 3 LEDs are lighten up, the battery is fully charged.
7. How do I use the quick release clip?

Instamic has a quick release clip that gives you the versatility to take it on and off in seconds. With each Instamic you will get 3 release clips with 3 different mounting options: Magnet, Velcro and Tape. All 3 of them have a hole to attach your own lanyard.
8. Which are the main functions of the mobile app?

Once you pair Instamic with your mobile device, press record and start capturing immediately, Instamic will automatically adjust the gain on its own in the first 10 secs and then it keeps that level. You can also control the input level manually from the app. Before recording you can access Instamic’s settings and customize them to your needs (Input level - Manual / Smart Gain, Rec Mode - Mono, Dual Mono, Stereo).
9. How do I transfer the audio files to my computer

Instamic has a splash proof (Instamic) and waterproof (Instamic PRO) micro USB 2.0 connector. Connect it using a USB cable into an available USB port. This will bring up a window showing the Instamic as an external device drive on your computer. There you will find each take as a single .wav file.

10. Instamic Pro is waterproof. What is the maximum depth?You can take Instamic up to 3.2 feet for maximum 30 minutes, according with IP67.                      SUPPORT  Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!  Email Support at support@instamic.io  Please note that our team will try as hard as possible to answer any and all questions and comments that are left on the comments page but the easiest way to get immediate assistance is to email our Support Team, support@instamic.io  Don't forget to like and follow us for the latest information on all things Instamic!  Like us on facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/Instamic  Send us a tweet: @Instamic
