Say Hello to  Squawk'r
column4:
>Squawk'r is a unique way to enjoy your favorite music from your phone, tablet, or laptop using a wireless Bluetooth connection. Popular music apps such as Pandora, Spotify, Google Play, and iTunes all work well with Squawk'r when connected via Bluetooth. 

Squawk'r is portable, versatile and provides music on the go no matter where you are. Play your favorite music at the pool, in the shower or bath, in the car, on your desk at work, in the kitchen, or relaxing on the porch.
>Easy to operate.  Connects to just about any Bluetooth-enabled device and is compatible with popular music apps.
>Answer incoming phone calls for hands-free conferencing with its built-in microphone then automatically return to music.
>Water resistant silicone rubber shell attaches to almost any smooth surface with its suction cup base.
>Micro SD Memory Card Slot turns Squawk’r into a stand-alone music player!
>Direct connect devices that do not have Bluetooth capabilities with provided audio cable.
>Charge the unit with the included micro USB cable.
>3 hours play time with one full charge.

column1:
We were excited about Squawk'r from the very beginning.  We decided that Indiegogo would be a great way to expand our reach into the market and enable us to get feedback directly from our customers about our little duck .  We value our customers and hope to have a closer relationship with those who's daily lives will be touched by our products. 

Squawk’r will live in a larger family of products under the banner of start-up company XILO, a new electronics lifestyle brand that offers on-the-go, high quality portable power and audio products.  XILO - Extend the Play. 

The money raised from this campaign will help us place larger orders with our suppliers to insure a stable supply chain with consistent quality and pricing.  Also, we have some new and exciting product designs waiting in the wings. This will require additional funding to take them into production. With your backing, we can successfully boost XILO to a level that enables us to expand our design, manufacturing, and marketing capabilities. Then we can realize our vision of bringing you more unique power and audio solutions for years to come.
column9:
>

Squawk'r was inspired by the giant, floating, rubber duck sculptures that Dutch artist Florentijn Hofman set sail in Sydney, Osaka, Hong Kong, Pittsburgh. and recently Los Angeles.  Hofman entertained the world by naming the tour “Spreading Joy Around the World.”  Through Squawk'r we hope to bring a little joy to your world too!  Read about Hofman's rubber ducks here: http://goo.gl/xxb75H


Perks &
column10:
Stretch Goals

Once we achieve our goals on IndieGoGo and take Squawk’r into the market the intended retail price will be $39.95. For a limited time only, exclusive to our IndieGoGo supporters, we will be offering Squawk’r at several discount levels. There will be two early bird specials rewarding those who contribute first and then ongoing campaign perks that will offer Squawk’r at even larger savings depending on which level you choose to contribute to our campaign. 

Currently we are offering Squawk’r in three colors: Yellow, Camo and Pink. To make things a bit more interesting our two stretch goals will unlock more custom colors for you to choose from! And, each time we break a stretch goal ALL of those who contributed for a Squawk’r, no matter how many units, early bird specials included, will be able to choose any color they like, mix and match any combination they want! Before the campaign closes we will follow up with you shortly after and take your color order.


At XILO we are passionate about bringing exciting, new products to market, but we also have a vision of a hunger-free America.  Many of the rubber duckie regattas held across the USA raise money for their local food banks. Since our campaign will reach across America, we will donate $3000 directly to Feeding America once we reach the $150,000 stretch goal. That means we will be able to feed 6 families for a year.  Once we reach the second stretch goal of $250,000 we will donate another $3000 to Feeding America so we will be able to feed a total of 12 families for a year.  To learn more about Feeding America: http://goo.gl/4nRjXz


Features and Controls

column1: Squawk’r is equipped with a silicone rubber body and suction cup base, 2” Bluetooth speaker, and a microphone embedded in it’s beak. Squawk’r also has a tail hatch that reveals a Micro SD memory card slot,  3.5 mm audio input, Micro USB charge input, and its own LED charging light.

column4: >What will the funds be used for?  The approximation of our immediate needs are as follows:  Manufacturing 55%, Web development &

>What are your production goals?  The good news is that we already have fully functioning prototypes but there will be a final phase once this campaign closes including: Beta testing, Final adjustments, Final Packaging Design, Production, manufacturing, and finally the delivery of the product to you!
>When will the products be delivered?  Our goal is to start shipping the Yellow, Pink &
column5: Camo Squawk'r within 30 days from the close of the campaign using USPS Priority Mail with an expected delivery in November 2014.  We have a limited number of yellow and camo Squawk'r that can be shipped out immediately, so the earliest supporters can get theirs in September. Depending on when stretch goals are achieved, the mystery color Squawk'r could take 45-60 Days from the close of the campaign to begin shipment - We will do our best to keep that time frame as minimal as possible and keep you updated every step of the way. US delivery should be within 2-3 days of shipment and an email will be sent with tracking info. International shipments should be approximately 6 - 10 business days from the shipment date and an email will be sent with tracking info.

column1: Is Squawk’r Waterproof?  No, it can not be submerged under water. However,  it is water resistant which means you can use it in the shower or on the side of the bathtub or near water. If water is splashed on the silicone body it will not hurt it but if water gets into the speaker holes on the bottom it may damage the Squawk’r
How long after the campaign can I expect my Squawk’r to arrive at my door?  Our goal is to start shipping the Yellow, Pink &
column2: Camo Squawk'r 30 days from the close of the campaign using USPS Priority Mail. Depending on when stretch goals are achieved, the mystery color Squawk'rs could take 45-60 Days from the close of the campaign to begin shipment - We will do our best to keep that time frame as minimal as possible and keep you updated every step of the way. US delivery should be within 2-3 days of shipment and an email will be sent with tracking info. International shipments should be approximately 15 - 20 days from the shipment date and an email will be sent with tracking info.

column1: How much of a range does Squawk’r have with my device?  Normally 30 feet without any obstructions. If there is a wall or some other obstacle between your device and the Squawk’r then the distance will be less.
Is Squawk’r compatible with my Android / iPhone handset?  Yes, it will work with most Bluetooth enabled devices including smartphones, tablets and Bluetooth enabled laptops and personal computers.

Will Squawk’r play my Pandora, Spotify, Google Play, iTunes music?  Yes. If your smartphone, handset, or tablet has Bluetooth capabilities and will connect to another device the music you are playing on your application of choice should play on the Squawk’r.

Does the suction cup have adhesive? Will it leave a residue?  There is no adhesive on the suction cup. The suction cup is designed to easily attach to a smooth surface by pushing down until the suction cup is flat. Any “ring” of moisture that is left behind when you remove the Squawk’r can easily be wiped off. Be sure to release the suction by lifting up the edge of the base. Pulling  by the body may separate the suction cup base from the body.

What if my Squawk’r stops working?  Squawk’r has a 1 year limited warranty for manufacturing defects. Send your defective Squawk’r back within the warranty period to be considered for replacement. Remember, Squawk’r is “water resistant” and NOT “waterproof”. That means if you submerge it in water it will stop working. The warranty does not cover a Squawk’r that has been allowed to be dunked or submerged in water or any other liquid.

How much will it cost to ship my Squawk’r?  Shipping within the continental USA is free.  INTERNATIONAL Shipping: Please See Each Individual Perk Level and add the appropriate cost to your final perk total before you place your order.

I don’t live in the USA. Can you ship a Squawk’r to me?  Yes, We offer a flat rate of  $15 for Canada (1-10 units) and $30 for other International (1-10 units) Orders of 11 or more units add an additional $2  each to Canada and $3 each International.

Rob Wallace – Co Founder of XILO - Rob’s main passion is innovation and technology, improving products, and new product design. He enjoys artistic glassblowing. Rob lives in Connecticut. Founded Design Glassworks, a scientific glassblowing company that supported research and development for new products. The company was acquired in 2006. Rob is married with three beautiful children.

Mike Burchfield – Co Founder of XILO - Mike has 25 years of experience in Engineering Research at a Fortune 50 company,  His passion for new technology and a love of the outdoors helped shape the idea of a company that offers portable electronics to people on the go.  Mike enjoys kayaking, volleyball, and hiking the Blue Ridge Mountains. He lives with his wife in the Asheville, NC area.
Jen Dusold – Creative Director of XILO - Jen infuses out-of-the box brand-thinking and design prowess into the XILO brand &
column2: aesthetic story. She has been serving the design industry for 11 years from NYC and, currently, Cincinnati, in which she leads upstream design direction for a $9.3B global brand.  Playtime is crucial for Jen, which typically includes activities involving her 3 kids, power yoga, long jogs, God, happy music, muddy hikes, and funny TV shows.

column1: Phil Buckley - Concept Design Consultant - Phil has over thirty-four years of experience in Information Technology, Project Management, Management, Finance, and Accounting including fifteen years in software development at a large telecommunications software firm. He provides consulting, conceptual speaker design and prototyping for XILO. Phil and his wife live in Southwest Ohio and have two grown children.  His interests including speaker building, guitar, and songwriting.
Special thanks for their hard work and support during this campaign:

Peppermint Media Group - This talented collective located in the Asheville, NC area specializes in web design and development, graphic design, print media and photography. PMG is staffed and operated by a team with over 15 years combined experience. The first time they saw Squawk'r in action they knew they had to be involved with this campaign. http://Peppermint.ws
Mountain Multimedia, Inc. - This full service production company provides professional videography &
column2: photography. They create advertisements for television broadcast, web content &amp
column3: social media for a variety of businesses. If you have branding or product videos to create you can find more information @ http://mountainmultimedia.net

column1: Christian Bobek - This talented young lady from western North Carolina has been part of the Squawk'r beta test group with XILO for almost a year and is the star of our campaign films.
Outthink, LLC - Special thanks and recognition for their help getting XILO off to a great start.  http://www.outthink.com/

What will the funds be used for?  The approximation of our immediate needs are as follows:  Manufacturing 55%, Web development & Marketing 26%, Packaging design 19%.

What are your production goals?  The good news is that we already have fully functioning prototypes but there will be a final phase once this campaign closes including: Beta testing, Final adjustments, Final Packaging Design, Production, manufacturing, and finally the delivery of the product to you!

When will the products be delivered?  Our goal is to start shipping the Yellow, Pink & Camo Squawk'r within 30 days from the close of the campaign using USPS Priority Mail with an expected delivery in November 2014.  We have a limited number of yellow and camo Squawk'r that can be shipped out immediately, so the earliest supporters can get theirs in September. Depending on when stretch goals are achieved, the mystery color Squawk'r could take 45-60 Days from the close of the campaign to begin shipment - We will do our best to keep that time frame as minimal as possible and keep you updated every step of the way. US delivery should be within 2-3 days of shipment and an email will be sent with tracking info. International shipments should be approximately 6 - 10 business days from the shipment date and an email will be sent with tracking info.

Is Squawk’r Waterproof?  No, it can not be submerged under water. However,  it is water resistant which means you can use it in the shower or on the side of the bathtub or near water. If water is splashed on the silicone body it will not hurt it but if water gets into the speaker holes on the bottom it may damage the Squawk’r

How long after the campaign can I expect my Squawk’r to arrive at my door?  Our goal is to start shipping the Yellow, Pink & Camo Squawk'r 30 days from the close of the campaign using USPS Priority Mail. Depending on when stretch goals are achieved, the mystery color Squawk'rs could take 45-60 Days from the close of the campaign to begin shipment - We will do our best to keep that time frame as minimal as possible and keep you updated every step of the way. US delivery should be within 2-3 days of shipment and an email will be sent with tracking info. International shipments should be approximately 15 - 20 days from the shipment date and an email will be sent with tracking info.

How much of a range does Squawk’r have with my device?  Normally 30 feet without any obstructions. If there is a wall or some other obstacle between your device and the Squawk’r then the distance will be less.
Is Squawk’r compatible with my Android / iPhone handset?  Yes, it will work with most Bluetooth enabled devices including smartphones, tablets and Bluetooth enabled laptops and personal computers.

Will Squawk’r play my Pandora, Spotify, Google Play, iTunes music?  Yes. If your smartphone, handset, or tablet has Bluetooth capabilities and will connect to another device the music you are playing on your application of choice should play on the Squawk’r.

Does the suction cup have adhesive? Will it leave a residue?  There is no adhesive on the suction cup. The suction cup is designed to easily attach to a smooth surface by pushing down until the suction cup is flat. Any “ring” of moisture that is left behind when you remove the Squawk’r can easily be wiped off. Be sure to release the suction by lifting up the edge of the base. Pulling  by the body may separate the suction cup base from the body.

What if my Squawk’r stops working?  Squawk’r has a 1 year limited warranty for manufacturing defects. Send your defective Squawk’r back within the warranty period to be considered for replacement. Remember, Squawk’r is “water resistant” and NOT “waterproof”. That means if you submerge it in water it will stop working. The warranty does not cover a Squawk’r that has been allowed to be dunked or submerged in water or any other liquid.

How much will it cost to ship my Squawk’r?  Shipping within the continental USA is free.  INTERNATIONAL Shipping: Please See Each Individual Perk Level and add the appropriate cost to your final perk total before you place your order.

I don’t live in the USA. Can you ship a Squawk’r to me?  Yes, We offer a flat rate of  $15 for Canada (1-10 units) and $30 for other International (1-10 units) Orders of 11 or more units add an additional $2  each to Canada and $3 each International.

Rob Wallace – Co Founder of XILO - Rob’s main passion is innovation and technology, improving products, and new product design. He enjoys artistic glassblowing. Rob lives in Connecticut. Founded Design Glassworks, a scientific glassblowing company that supported research and development for new products. The company was acquired in 2006. Rob is married with three beautiful children.

Mike Burchfield – Co Founder of XILO - Mike has 25 years of experience in Engineering Research at a Fortune 50 company,  His passion for new technology and a love of the outdoors helped shape the idea of a company that offers portable electronics to people on the go.  Mike enjoys kayaking, volleyball, and hiking the Blue Ridge Mountains. He lives with his wife in the Asheville, NC area.

Jen Dusold – Creative Director of XILO - Jen infuses out-of-the box brand-thinking and design prowess into the XILO brand & aesthetic story. She has been serving the design industry for 11 years from NYC and, currently, Cincinnati, in which she leads upstream design direction for a $9.3B global brand.  Playtime is crucial for Jen, which typically includes activities involving her 3 kids, power yoga, long jogs, God, happy music, muddy hikes, and funny TV shows.

Phil Buckley - Concept Design Consultant - Phil has over thirty-four years of experience in Information Technology, Project Management, Management, Finance, and Accounting including fifteen years in software development at a large telecommunications software firm. He provides consulting, conceptual speaker design and prototyping for XILO. Phil and his wife live in Southwest Ohio and have two grown children.  His interests including speaker building, guitar, and songwriting.
Special thanks for their hard work and support during this campaign:

Peppermint Media Group - This talented collective located in the Asheville, NC area specializes in web design and development, graphic design, print media and photography. PMG is staffed and operated by a team with over 15 years combined experience. The first time they saw Squawk'r in action they knew they had to be involved with this campaign. http://Peppermint.ws

Mountain Multimedia, Inc. - This full service production company provides professional videography & photography. They create advertisements for television broadcast, web content & social media for a variety of businesses. If you have branding or product videos to create you can find more information @ http://mountainmultimedia.net
Christian Bobek - This talented young lady from western North Carolina has been part of the Squawk'r beta test group with XILO for almost a year and is the star of our campaign films.
Outthink, LLC - Special thanks and recognition for their help getting XILO off to a great start.  http://www.outthink.com/",15.0,1,"1 Campaign

Music gives feelings to the space around you. It binds moments to memory. It brings people together. Fill the world with music through X6, a high-performance portable Bluetooth speaker with the power to transform any setting into an immersive auditory experience. 

 

When music fills the space around you, it isn’t just heard — it’s felt. The X6 surrounds you with sound waves that resonate with the senses and bring music energy to life. Its compact size and sealed architecture are engineered to pack a wallop and deliver surprisingly-powerful and high-quality sound through a stainless steel front woofer and a 57mm rutie-boron lateral loudspeaker with a balanced bottom for total stability even at reverberating volumes. 

 

Sleek, lightweight and durable, the X6 is easy to carry, fits in your hand or bag, and can be deployed anywhere and anytime an audible aura is well received. 

 

Connect 2 X6 speakers with Bluetooth 5.0 and immersive yourself in portable surround sound for 4D sound effects that give your music a multidimensional edge.

 

AND MORE THAN THAT...

A charging time of only 1-2hrs fills the high-performance 1200mAh battery with 10 hours of continuous playtime so you can enjoy your favorite tracks nonstop till you drop. 

 

Connect X6 to any device by BT/TF/U disk/AUX and enjoy metal bass, 3D sound, DUO mode (4D sound), music, calls and radio with high-quality and crisp sound.

 

A built-in intelligent auto noise reduction microphone lets you answer your calls without disconnecting and have conversations on the spot or switch over to FM radio anytime.

column1:
Share the X6 campaign with your family and friends to get an instant $5 CASH BACK on your speaker purchase. 

 

 

 

CONTACT US for even more discounts and to learn more about X6 today.

A little about me and my journey so far...

I have been a singer before I knew how to talk.  That's not an exaggertation. The nurses in the hospital literally told my mother when I was born, ""Congratulations Mrs. Tarpley, you have the loudest baby we have ever heard."" Turns out I was simply testing my pipes!  When I'm singing, whether it's alone or in front of a crowd, I feel at home, and it's been that way for as long as I can remember.   As far as songwriting, it was not until 2013 at a convention in Orlando that I felt inspired to try songwriting for the first time.  I went from a girl that was intimidated by the idea, to a girl who completed her first original album, and released it in May of 2016.  You can download the album from itunes or Spotify, or you can listen to a free sample here:
column3:
showinfo=0"">

My upcoming project:

Through all of my social media posting, I was fortunate enough to catch the attention of songwriter and producer Don Koch in Nashville.  You may research him if you like, but he is a very successful songwriter and producer with faith-based music.  He has worked with anyone from Avalon to Steven Curtis Chapman, and now wants to work with ME! :) He came across my cover of ""Grace of God"" by Katy Perry, (the audio is featured in the campaign video) And he wants to co-write an album with me.  I have decided that I want to take him up on this amazing opportunity!

If you are also a musician, you realize that the music world is often a world of many no's.  I do not let the no's bother me, but instead focus on the few yes's I need to succeed. This project is one of those ""yes's"" and I have no doubt that God has led me to this next step of my songwriting journey. Sure I have had wonderful moments of singing and songwriting, but I've also had discouraging moments.  Music is a world where you have to have thick skin, but thankfully I do and I am not giving up.  

Don actually approached me over a year ago, and I felt I was not ready to write this genre of music. What changed is, I began to witness what worship music does to people, how it moves them, and how it heals. I listened to artists such as Carrie Underwood and Hillsong sing about their faith,  I realized that being a part of music like that was exactly where I needed to be. I sang a cover of Hillsong's ""Oceans"" for a crowd, and the reaction was different than any other performance I had ever experienced.  

Blessing others with music is simply a part of who I am, and doing this project just brings me closer to a dream I've had since I was a little girl. The passion has not changed from age 2 to 28, and I know this is a passion that will ALWAYS be with me. If you support me in this upcoming project, as cliche as this may sound, you are truly helping my life-long dreams come true.

Challenges: 

Unfortunately, making professional quality music is not free. I paid for all the expenses on my first album by myself, and I am so grateful that I did. However, this project would take it to a new level, and radio-quality produced music requires a substantial amount of money. I am an independent artist, and it is not easy to immediately jump into radio play without the right mixed sound and right connections, ie someone like Don Koch, helping you. Many things add up and include hiring musicians, production, mixing, and so on.  In this case, the total price comes to $3000 a song.  My goal is a 3 song EP, which would require $9000. If I were to exceed the goal, I would do more songs that the budget allowed.  

Here's where I need my community. I plan on doing this project regardless, but with your help I can make it a reality now! Please know that I will be pouring my own money into it anywhere and everywhere I can.  Should I not reach the $9000 goal, which I'm praying the funds come in, I will still use the funds to create one song, and create more as time and money allows. One song is not my ultimate goal, but I can assure you your donations will not go to waste and I will make the most of this project with whatever I am blessed with. I view this is a ministry as well as a music endeavor, and where there is a will, there's a way!!

To sum up:
    I have prayed about it, and I believe that singing about my faith is something I am called to do.  Maybe it will reach the masses, maybe it will reach one person, but at the end of the day if it only encourages one person, then it will be worth it to me.  I'm not even close to perfect, but my faith is a huge part of my life, and I've decided that I want it to be reflected in the music I write.

If you are able to help me in this journey, I can't tell you how much I would appreciate it.  Unfortunately, everything in life comes with a risk, and the music business is quite possibly the most risky business there is. I can't guarantee that this music will get exposed to the world, but I will regret if I do not try, and uplifting only one person is worth it to me.  This is more of a donation to a ministry, a music ministry. Again, please know that I will be sinking a great deal of my own money in this, so I am not asking for your assistance so I can get by with this without a sacrifice.

So how can you help?

Here's how you, my community, can help! I am starting this project when I have half of the funds in place ($4500) and I am finishing it when the $9000 is completed. If you are able to help with anything, every little bit helps!!! As stated earlier, I will still do as much of this project with whatever funds I am given, so your donation will in NO way go to waste. I mean, think about it. If 1000 out  of my 2000 social media contacts gave $5, that's over half of the goal! If you are not able to help financially, please do all you can to share the campaign with others! There's power in social media posting, and also good old-fashioned word of mouth.  I pray all the funds come in, but if for some reason they do not, I will still do a smaller version of this project, it will just have to be added to as time and money allows.

Rewards
If you ARE able to donate, there are some great perks! Please be sure to click directly on the box to view the different perks and prices I have in place.

 

Thank you SO much for taking the time to hear my story, and don't hesitate to reach out to me with any questions! courtneybtarpley@gmail.com

In the past, speakers have been characterized as directional, large, boxy objects framing a home’s entertainment system and mounted to specific corners of a room. Connected through a twist of wires and controlled with a remote often misplaced or buried between couch cushions, home audio systems of the past proved rigid, cumbersome and crude to the eye. With ARCHT One, we have developed the solution.

column1: ARCHT One transforms audio into something that
column2: >listeners can seamlessly integrate into their lifestyle and home without compromising quality. Incorporating elegant design with innovative acoustics and simple-to-use features, ARCHT O
column7: >t listeners can control from their fingertips.

column2:
>

PATENTED ACOUSTIC INNOVATION: Consistent Multi-Directional Sound Dispersion that Adapts to its Environment

>

ARCHT One is designed to sound acoustically perfect, regardless of where you put it in the room. ARCHT One’s stunning design architecture incorporates years of acoustic research resulting in the creation of our groundbreaking Sound Array technology,
column5: > a symbiotic relationship between function and design.

column1: ARCHT One is a true omni-directional speaker with a built in sub-woofer

With its patented Sound Array technology, the ARCHT One is the only one of its kind. It only uses 3 speakers – a full range driver for the mids and highs, a sub-woofer and passive radiator for the bass. Each of these speakers are equipped with a Sound Array module, which transforms the speakers from directional to omnidirectional. The result is consistent, distortion free audio which redefines the meaning of surround sound - it’s truly amazing.
ARCHT One adapts to its surroundings with connectivity options for everyone

At the push of a button, you can control playback of music directly on the ARCHT One wirelessly from your laptop, tablet or mobile device. Choose from connections such as WiFi, AirPlay, DLNA, Bluetooth and direct USB or AUX and stream music straight from the Internet!
WiFi capabilities, in particular, allow you to stream and enjoy your music in high quality formats (24bit/192kHz) – turn the music up and enjoy each song as it was intended to be heard.
ARCHT One supports Multi- Zone over WiFi

column2: >Up to 6 ARCHT One speakers can also be connected over AirPlay, either in the same room or in multiple rooms, giving listeners a complete home audio experience.

column1: ARCHT One can be connected in True Stereo with Bluetooth Pairing

column2: >For those who live by true stereo sound, 2 ARCHT Ones can be paired together in the same room over bluetooth for double the experience!

column1: MODERN LIFESTYLE DESIGN:  A Complete Audio System in a Single Device that Fits Any Space

column5:
>

Use your ARCHT One as you deem fit! Be it as a table centerpiece, at the bar, in the corner of your dining area, by your TV or for your barbeque, ARCHT One works in every scenario.
column6: >
column10: >ARCHT One's unique all-in-one design comes fully equipped with full range drivers, a sub-woofer, a passive radiator, amplifier, digital signal processor (DSP), digital analog (DAC) converter, and a plethora of connectivity options, eliminating wire clutter. All this is efficiently assembled into a sleek package guaranteed to turn heads.
column14:
>

SIMPLE-TO-USE FEATURES: An Audio System with all the Tech but without the Stress!

column1: With ARCHT One, you can once again hear each beat and lyric the musician intended it as the speaker delivers the quality of live performances straight to your living room. We intentionally crafted ARCHT One to be aesthetically-appealing and produce sound quality that is all-encompassing. ARCHT One will provide a definitive home audio experience with high-resolution sound and modern design for a more immersive and personal audio experience.
OUR STORY: In Search of the Ultimate Audio Experience

To ensure we were creating an ultimate audio experience, we engaged a diverse group of award winning engineers and designers, who've developed and designed anything from Klipsch speakers to Sennheiser headphones. We wanted to craft a speaker that would look fantastic, sound awesome and be extremely easy for anyone to setup and use.

3 years in the making, we launched our first crowdfunding campaign and raised $242k from 500+ backers in Dec 2014. Not only did we deliver 80% of all units ordered within the first 3 months (Mar 2015). By Jul 2015, all backers received their ARCHT One.
ARCHT One can now be found here on Indiegogo Indemand, on our website and on Amazon. Check out our Amazon reviews to see what our backers think!

By purchasing an ARCHT One, you'll not only be buying a one-of-a-kind audio system, you will also be revolutionizing the audio industry, one speaker at a time. With your support, we develop our next product and take ARCHT into retail, launching in a city near you.

column4: >Will the USB port charge mobile devices?

>Yes! The USB port charges any USB devices and is capable of charging up to 2.4A.

What are the available adapters?
Adapters are available in three versions: US, EU and UK only.
>When more than one speaker unit is active in a room, does the optimization wizardry ensure that one doesn't interfere with the other?
>Yes it does - just set up the speakers one at a time.
>Do you have details of the wireless tech (which version of Bluetooth) for example?
>We are using the Bluetooth 4.0 and WiFi is 802.11G.
>Can you tell us a little more about the ""location-based optimization sensor"" which works with the companion App?

>The sound optimizer sends out spatial test tones that measures your environment. This provides feedback to ARCHT One through your phone and balances the frequency response of ARCHT One for the best sound configuration in your space.
>Does ARCHT One come with a battery?

>ARCHT One does not come with a battery. It is a wall powered unit that comes with an in-built power supply. For its size, ARCHT One is portable around your home. To bring it outdoors, you will need an electric output.
>Can ARCHT One be connected to my TV?

>To get a fully immersive cinematic experience at home, a movie buff only needs an ARCHT One and an analog cable. Simply connect the cable from the TV's analog audio output jack to ARCHT One's Auxiliary input then sit back and enjoy the rich, room-filling sound of ARCHT One. Please check that your TV has an analog audio output jack.
>Can I connect multiple ARCHT One to my home theater system?

>It is also possible to connect five ARCHT Ones and a subwoofer to a home theater preamp processor for the ultimate natural audio experience. This can be done by using the analog preamp outputs of the processor and the analog input of the five ARCHT Ones.
>Multi-zone works on WiFi via iTunes AirPlay. You can pair anywhere from 3 to 6 ARCHT Ones around your home, depending on the strength of your home network.
>Can I connect more than one ARCHT One to one device?
>Analog input - With ""Y"" cables, multiple ARCHT Ones can be connected (See Home Theater setup above)
>iOS USB input - Only one iOS device can connect to one ARCHT One
>Bluetooth - Only one ARCHT One per source device
>WiFi - Only one ARCHT One per iOS device
column5: With desktop operating systems, one source can connect to multiple ARCHT Ones (See Multi-Zone above)

column4: >What's the difference between WiFi and Bluetooth?

>WiFi has a much higher stream rate and range than Bluetooth. Bluetooth compresses audio files, hence reduces music quality. Therefore, you can enjoy higher quality music on WiFi, to accompany your high quality source files.

>AirPlay is Apple's proprietary WiFi platform and allows you to wirelessly stream content over a WiFi network from your iOS device or MAC to your ARCHT One. Learn more here: http://www.apple.com/airplay/
>How do I place my ARCHT One in the ideal position for my room?
>ARCHT One is crafted to be placed anywhere in at your convenience. However, for those who want the best overall experience, nothing beats the center of the room.
>For those who desire maximum bass impact, ARCHT One should be placed in a corner of the room.

>The Sound Array is ARCHT Audio's patented technology that modifies the dispersion pattern of a typical loudspeaker transducer to result in a much wider horizontal sound dispersion. This allows you to enjoy consistent, high-quality sound from ARCHT One.
>ARCHT One comes with 4 input modes, WiFi, Bluetooth, USB and Aux.
>What devices are compatible with the different input modes?
>WiFi works with AirPlay (iOS) and DLNA (others) but we recommend AirPlay because DLNA requires Android users to root their device, which may affect product warranty.
>USB charges all platforms but audio only works through iOS devices.
>The optimization app only works on iOS devices.
>What features are exclusive to iOS devices?
>Right now, multi-zone pairing and the optimization application are only available on AirPlay.
>For support enquiries, please visit our customer service site here or send them to

column1: ","In the past, speakers have been characterized as directional, large, boxy objects framing a home’s entertainment system and mounted to specific corners of a room. Connected through a twist of wires and controlled with a remote often misplaced or buried between couch cushions, home audio systems of the past proved rigid, cumbersome and crude to the eye. With ARCHT One, we have developed the solution.

ARCHT One transforms audio into something that listeners can seamlessly integrate into their lifestyle and home without compromising quality. Incorporating elegant design with innovative acoustics and simple-to-use features, ARCHT One is the first-of-its-kind wireless 360 speaker that listeners can control from their fingertips.
PATENTED ACOUSTIC INNOVATION: Consistent Multi-Directional Sound Dispersion that Adapts to its Environment

ARCHT One is designed to sound acoustically perfect, regardless of where you put it in the room. ARCHT One’s stunning design architecture incorporates years of acoustic research resulting in the creation of our groundbreaking Sound Array technology, a symbiotic relationship between function and design.
ARCHT One is a true omni-directional speaker with a built in sub-woofer

With its patented Sound Array technology, the ARCHT One is the only one of its kind. It only uses 3 speakers – a full range driver for the mids and highs, a sub-woofer and passive radiator for the bass. Each of these speakers are equipped with a Sound Array module, which transforms the speakers from directional to omnidirectional. The result is consistent, distortion free audio which redefines the meaning of surround sound - it’s truly amazing.
ARCHT One adapts to its surroundings with connectivity options for everyone

At the push of a button, you can control playback of music directly on the ARCHT One wirelessly from your laptop, tablet or mobile device. Choose from connections such as WiFi, AirPlay, DLNA, Bluetooth and direct USB or AUX and stream music straight from the Internet!
WiFi capabilities, in particular, allow you to stream and enjoy your music in high quality formats (24bit/192kHz) – turn the music up and enjoy each song as it was intended to be heard.
ARCHT One supports Multi- Zone over WiFi
Up to 6 ARCHT One speakers can also be connected over AirPlay, either in the same room or in multiple rooms, giving listeners a complete home audio experience.
ARCHT One can be connected in True Stereo with Bluetooth Pairing
For those who live by true stereo sound, 2 ARCHT Ones can be paired together in the same room over bluetooth for double the experience!
MODERN LIFESTYLE DESIGN:  A Complete Audio System in a Single Device that Fits Any Space

Use your ARCHT One as you deem fit! Be it as a table centerpiece, at the bar, in the corner of your dining area, by your TV or for your barbeque, ARCHT One works in every scenario.ARCHT One's unique all-in-one design comes fully equipped with full range drivers, a sub-woofer, a passive radiator, amplifier, digital signal processor (DSP), digital analog (DAC) converter, and a plethora of connectivity options, eliminating wire clutter. All this is efficiently assembled into a sleek package guaranteed to turn heads. SIMPLE-TO-USE FEATURES: An Audio System with all the Tech but without the Stress!

With ARCHT One, you can once again hear each beat and lyric the musician intended it as the speaker delivers the quality of live performances straight to your living room. We intentionally crafted ARCHT One to be aesthetically-appealing and produce sound quality that is all-encompassing. ARCHT One will provide a definitive home audio experience with high-resolution sound and modern design for a more immersive and personal audio experience.
OUR STORY: In Search of the Ultimate Audio Experience

To ensure we were creating an ultimate audio experience, we engaged a diverse group of award winning engineers and designers, who've developed and designed anything from Klipsch speakers to Sennheiser headphones. We wanted to craft a speaker that would look fantastic, sound awesome and be extremely easy for anyone to setup and use.

3 years in the making, we launched our first crowdfunding campaign and raised $242k from 500+ backers in Dec 2014. Not only did we deliver 80% of all units ordered within the first 3 months (Mar 2015). By Jul 2015, all backers received their ARCHT One.
ARCHT One can now be found here on Indiegogo Indemand, on our website and on Amazon. Check out our Amazon reviews to see what our backers think!

By purchasing an ARCHT One, you'll not only be buying a one-of-a-kind audio system, you will also be revolutionizing the audio industry, one speaker at a time. With your support, we develop our next product and take ARCHT into retail, launching in a city near you.
Will the USB port charge mobile devices?
Yes! The USB port charges any USB devices and is capable of charging up to 2.4A.What are the available adapters?Adapters are available in three versions: US, EU and UK only.
When more than one speaker unit is active in a room, does the optimization wizardry ensure that one doesn't interfere with the other?
Yes it does - just set up the speakers one at a time.
Do you have details of the wireless tech (which version of Bluetooth) for example?
We are using the Bluetooth 4.0 and WiFi is 802.11G.
Can you tell us a little more about the ""location-based optimization sensor"" which works with the companion App?

The sound optimizer sends out spatial test tones that measures your environment. This provides feedback to ARCHT One through your phone and balances the frequency response of ARCHT One for the best sound configuration in your space.
Does ARCHT One come with a battery?

ARCHT One does not come with a battery. It is a wall powered unit that comes with an in-built power supply. For its size, ARCHT One is portable around your home. To bring it outdoors, you will need an electric output.
Can ARCHT One be connected to my TV?

To get a fully immersive cinematic experience at home, a movie buff only needs an ARCHT One and an analog cable. Simply connect the cable from the TV's analog audio output jack to ARCHT One's Auxiliary input then sit back and enjoy the rich, room-filling sound of ARCHT One. Please check that your TV has an analog audio output jack.
Can I connect multiple ARCHT One to my home theater system?

It is also possible to connect five ARCHT Ones and a subwoofer to a home theater preamp processor for the ultimate natural audio experience. This can be done by using the analog preamp outputs of the processor and the analog input of the five ARCHT Ones.
Multi-zone works on WiFi via iTunes AirPlay. You can pair anywhere from 3 to 6 ARCHT Ones around your home, depending on the strength of your home network.
Can I connect more than one ARCHT One to one device?
Analog input - With ""Y"" cables, multiple ARCHT Ones can be connected (See Home Theater setup above)
iOS USB input - Only one iOS device can connect to one ARCHT One
Bluetooth - Only one ARCHT One per source device
WiFi - Only one ARCHT One per iOS device
column2: With desktop operating systems, one source can connect to multiple ARCHT Ones (See Multi-Zone above)

column1: What's the difference between WiFi and Bluetooth?

WiFi has a much higher stream rate and range than Bluetooth. Bluetooth compresses audio files, hence reduces music quality. Therefore, you can enjoy higher quality music on WiFi, to accompany your high quality source files.

AirPlay is Apple's proprietary WiFi platform and allows you to wirelessly stream content over a WiFi network from your iOS device or MAC to your ARCHT One. Learn more here: http://www.apple.com/airplay/
How do I place my ARCHT One in the ideal position for my room?
ARCHT One is crafted to be placed anywhere in at your convenience. However, for those who want the best overall experience, nothing beats the center of the room.
For those who desire maximum bass impact, ARCHT One should be placed in a corner of the room.

The Sound Array is ARCHT Audio's patented technology that modifies the dispersion pattern of a typical loudspeaker transducer to result in a much wider horizontal sound dispersion. This allows you to enjoy consistent, high-quality sound from ARCHT One.
What are the input modes available?
ARCHT One comes with 4 input modes, WiFi, Bluetooth, USB and Aux.
What devices are compatible with the different input modes?
WiFi works with AirPlay (iOS) and DLNA (others) but we recommend AirPlay because DLNA requires Android users to root their device, which may affect product warranty.
USB charges all platforms but audio only works through iOS devices.
The optimization app only works on iOS devices.
What features are exclusive to iOS devices?
Right now, multi-zone pairing and the optimization application are only available on AirPlay.
For support enquiries, please visit our customer service site here or send them to concierge@archtaudio.com.",16.0,0,"1 Campaign

Tango with TuneBox2
column4:
>Connect your home stereo to the Internet                 中文贊助教學 ｜ 中文專案翻譯

We all have some kind of audio loudspeaker system at home. Be it high-end Hi-Fi stereo, bedside stereo, iPhone speaker, or portable speaker. As streaming services like Spotify, Apple Music, or Google Play Music become part of our lives, however, we come home and find no simple way to connect the streaming music to the stereo, or connect the stereo to our online music data.

Annoying, isn't it? To solve the problem, and bring you a simpler way to enjoy music, we've created TuneBox2.


TuneBox2 is a wireless device that makes listening to music smarter. It advocates ""Smart Audio @ Home."" A brand new audio experience at home.

Whichever room you are at home, just push a TuneBox2 button, music follows you there through Smart Audio. And it's not only limited to CDs, but any online streaming music you love, and even vintage vinyls. Simply a push of a button, any music you're playing, regardless of the source, runs all over your place!

Just push that TuneBox2 button !

column1: Help you enjoy music between rooms more conveniently with world's only party mode

We've created the world's first app-free multi-room music playing system! When the world is inventing products that take apps to manage, we want you to have a more intuitive experience! TuneBox2 reinvents your home stereo environment with a hotkey. App-free. When you walk into a room while you're listening to music, push that hotkey, and the music will follow you there.
TuneBox2 supports Airplay, DLNA, and even Spotify Connect. It connects the stereo to the music online. Intuitive. Simple. Connects your phone to the stereo, too.
For iOS devices, TuneBox2 supports features compatible with Airplay. Any streaming service works with TuneBox2.
For Android devices, DLNA is supported. TuneBox2 supports services with the same standatd APK (QQ Music, BubbleUPNP, etc.)
For Spotify users, use Spotify Connect to easily connect with TuneBox2. Rock till you drop, baby!
For iOS devices, TuneBox2 supports features compatible with Airplay. Any streaming service works with TuneBox2.
TuneBox2 supports multi-room audio play with at most 10 devices. Push the ""party"" button and you're set. We believe you'll love this design.
Simply put, SRC improves the quality of streaming music like Airplay and Spotify from 16bit/48K to 24bit/192K. TuneBox2 makes your online streaming music even better!

TuneBox2's Wi-Fi connectivity saves you from the fuss of pairing for Bluetooth. Now anyone who's connected to the same Wi-Fi hotspot can play their favorite music! Meanwhile, there will be no more annoying notification sounds!

More than playing music, TuneBox2 can also be your home Wi-Fi Access Point. With a RJ45 connector and access to the Internet through a home router, TuneBox2 becomes a wireless Access Point! It not only enhances the stability of your Wi-Fi connection, but also plays high quality music. Smooth connection, smooth listening experience!

TB21 supports AUX input. Easy to use. With the multi-room playing feature, vinyl/CD lover like you can enjoy great music anywhere at home. To keep your traditional devices in line with Internet technology, we designed TB21 with an AUX input and a hi fidelity (24bit/96K) chip that guarantees the sound quality of the streaming music. Enjoy the music with ease.

Multi-player control TuneBox2's Wi-Fi connectivity saves you from the fuss of pairing for Bluetooth. Now anyone who's connected to the same Wi-Fi hotspot can play their favorite music! Meanwhile, there will be no more annoying notification sounds!
1. Connect your phone to home Wi-Fi

We love the idea of crowdfunding and appreciate both Kickstarter and Indiegogo as great platforms for us to communicate with supporters/users immediately. Backers' opinions always make NEXUM's products better. Our first product AQUA was well-loved by more than 3,400 Kickstarter supporters. As always, backers' suggestions are of great importance for us.

AQUA's delivery was delayed mainly due to Apple certification denials. We're very sorry for the delay. Still, supporters showed understanding, trusted us, and supported our cause. We're now delivering the rewards to all the backers. Once again, thank you very much!

The idea of TuneBox2 actually came earlier than that of AQUA. We've invested in a great deal of time, energy, and resources, just to bring the best product to the world! TuneBox2 presents a new way of listening to music. Many details together make listening to musci more enjoyable.

With our lessons learned with AQUA, we'll monitor the research, manufacturing, and delivery of TuneBox2 more carefully! We guarantee you this time that TuneBox2's delivery will only be early as opposed to delayed. Please support us to help bring it to the world!
If you need a DAC, choose TB20, which supports digital output/coaxial audio output. If you only play music with your phone, TB20 can keep you good company.
Playing music from analog sources like CD or vinyl players? Choose TB21, which supports
column2: > 3.5mm cable audio input. And you can play the music from other speakers with other TuneBox2s. TB21's designed with a built-in ADC to accommodate
column3: > analog input, but with no digital audio output.

column1: Currently, TuneBox2's functions have been verified. PCB and related design verifications have been through four adjustments. Meanwhile, product verification is about to be complete. We are confident we can have a punctual delivery. Should we receive some key components ahead of schedule, we may finish and ship the product to you even earlier.
From design to execution, TuneBox2 is a 100% NEXUM product. We've found suitable suppliers, and we'll be strict about quality control and productivity so as to deliver high qualuty products to you.

column2: >If there's really any uncontrollable factor contributing to delays, we'll keep you, all our awesome backers, up to date!

column1: 1. What's the difference between TB20 and TB21? Do I need both?

TB21 supports 3.5mm cable audio input, which can be from your CD, vinyl player, and so forth. And you can play the music from other speakers with other TuneBox2s. If you only play music with your phone, you're fine without a TB21.
2. Is audio input the only difference bewteen TB20 and TB21?
If you need a DAC, choose TB20, which supports digital output/coaxial audio output. TB21's designed with a built-in ADC to accomodate analog input, but with no digital audio output.
3. How does the Party Mode work exactly? I push the Party Hotkey/button, and what's already playing with TuneBox2 will be broadcast to other TuneBox2s in the same network?
Yes! Remember to push the Party Hotkey to enable the party mode (or control with app.)
5. Does TB20's optical aux output support cable 3.5mm to RCA to amplifiers?
6. Do all TuneBox2s sync under Party Mode?
8. Does digital output support only 24bit 192khz? If I connect it to 24bit 96khz, there will be no sound, right?
That's right! Definitely no sound to 24/96. We suggest you use TuneBox2's analog output.

Most of us live in a world of amazing, vivid sound. It envelops us. It soothes us. It excites us.

Yet, when we are ready for sound to entertain us, we’re left wanting. Details are missing. The natural sounds of instruments are lost. Dialog is compressed and unintelligible.

At the same time, it’s difficult to set up surround sound systems in large city apartments, homes, bedrooms, and dorm rooms.

XPUMP transforms any pair of stereo speakers into a virtual home theater sound system

Powered by Embrace Audio Lab’s patented XROUND™ digital signal processing algorithm, XPUMP is designed to unleash immersive sound for all.
column5:
>

XPUMP utilizes a patented digital signal processing algorithm called XROUND to transform flat stereo sound into an immersive three dimensional experience. XROUND works in real-time, extending the width and depth of the audio signal coming from your favorite game, movie, or music.
column6: >
column7: >
column10:
>

XPUMP is a gum-stick sized device that is amazing through speakers (home, desktop or portable) or headphones. You simply add XPUMP between your device (computer, television, gaming console, mobile) and the output (speakers or headphones) and press play.
column11:
>

Hey, Movie Lovers!

XPUMP works every micro-second to enhance every audio detail, bringing you an immersive sound experience without buying expensive new equipment or spending days running wires and installing speakers.

column1: • Pumps new life into your audio equipment for cinematic entertainment
• Expands the “sweet spot” of stereo listening into a “sweet area” for a more stunning experience

XPUMP immerses you in your favorite game by enhancing the detail of every sound effect and deepening every sound environment. XPUMP boosts the sound field from your stereo speakers up to 200 percent, giving you an entirely new experience.
• Breaks down and boosts individual element details like voices, footsteps, drum beats, and musical instruments
• Increases sound localization so you can hear your enemies before you see them

XPUMP on the Go!

Bring immersive sound with you wherever you go! 

The gum-stick sized XPUMP is easy to slip into any pocket, boosting details and adding depth to anything you’re listening to or watching on your mobile device.
• Is pocket-sized, light to carry and upgrades any set of headphones
Plug and play. That’s it!

column2: >

column1: Here’s the science behind XROUND™ and XPUMP:
Spherical Sound Field Expansion Technology multiplies the stereo sound field by 200 percent while enhancing signal depth, width, and detail.

column2:
>

Dynamic EQ that automatically adjusts according to audio detail and sound field for optimal audio presentation.

column1: Real-Time Detail Boosting happens because the XROUND algorithm runs on a dedicated dual core processor at the clock speed of 55.3 MHz, meaning it’s working every microsecond. The audio boosting processor unleashes directional cues and hidden audio elements to deliver a totally immersive experience.
Psychoacoustic Bass Enhancement increases the perception of bass frequencies, even on smaller speakers and headphones.
XPUMP has been in development for years. The team at Embrace Audio Lab have been constantly designing and refining the performance, look, and feel of this pocket-sized, light, portable device.
We’ve honed the product so that it’s easy to use, simple, and beautiful.
XPUMP has gone around the world this past year. Audio enthusiasts and industry pros have been overwhelmed. See it for yourself:

XPUMP was developed through Embrace Audio Lab Inc. The company was founded in 2015 by passionate audio experts, designers, engineers, and audiophiles who have deep acoustics, digital signal processing, firmware, and hardware design experience. Based in Taipei, the Embrace mission is to redefine the audio industry by improving the listening experience. For more information, please visit: xroundaudio.com
XPUMP has been a labor of love for these designers and engineers:
If you have any questions or feedback we would love to hear it, contact us at service@embracelab.com

Dynamic EQ that automatically adjusts according to audio detail and sound field for optimal audio presentation.

Psychoacoustic Bass Enhancement increases the perception of bass frequencies, even on smaller speakers and headphones.

I have been developing a social enterprise for economic development and healthcare in San Martin, Peru.  Last year I spent 6 months in San Martin as a volunteer for an economic development and poverty reduction non-profit.

Due to economic growth in the San Martin region over the last decade, motorcycle and mototaxi (or ""rickshaw"") usage has increased quickly but has become a serious problem in the San Martin city of Tarapoto, with the constant noise of motorcycle and mototaxi engines throughout the downtown area.  In fact, Tarapoto has been nicknamed ""Terre-moto"" in Peru.  I view the noise pollution in Tarapoto mainly as an impediment to sustainable development in the city and in the San Martin region, but also as a harborer of negative health effects.

In addition, the World Health Organization recently reported a very high need for hearing aid access and usage throughout the developing world.  In fact, Peru is one of a few countries in Latin America without one peer reviewed study on non-occupational hearing loss.

My idea is to combine a solution for noise abatement in Tarapoto with an increase in hearing aid access and management throughout the San Martin region, expanding to other locations that may be negatively affected by similarly high levels of noise pollution and that have significant under-served hearing-needy populations.

Motos (Spanish for ""Motorcycles"") For Fonos (""audífonos"" is Spanish for ""hearing aids"") is the name of this social enterprise that will launch in Tarapoto and expand to additional cities and regions as needed once the pilot site is operating.

Funds from this campaign will help the Motos For Fonos Launch in Peru where we will complete critical noise abatement design and develop a sustainable hearing aid supply chain and management plan.  It will also help create and set-up a small country committee that will be critical to making this a self-sustaining initiative, rather than one that continually relies on donations.  This initial work will be completed by the end of 2012.
For $100 donation, you will receive a quarterly and/or monthly Moto-In-Action 'Insta-Soundgram' related to our work-in-progress and the people we help to support in San Martin.

For a $200 donation, you will receive the perks of a $100 donation as well as a quarterly and/or monthly video that shows the people who Motos For Fonos helps and the work that Motos For Fonos is accomplishing.
The Motos For Fonos Founding Circle Membership is an exclusive opportunity to be a leader in this important initiative.
The Mission of Motos For Fonos is:

With the assistance of auditory health stakeholders and hearing specialists, Motos For Fonos will implement a sustainable business model solution for the enhanced distribution of assistive hearing devices and noise muffling infrastructure solution interventions in the developing world, aiding those who need auditory assistance and reducing acute and chronic noise pollution.
The Objectives of Motos For Fonos are:
In Year 1, we hope to establish a country committee in Peru and an additional country, and also deploy 100 hearing aids or noise muffling infrastructure interventions.
In Year 2, we hope to establish two more country committees and deploy an additional 300 hearing aids or muffling interventions.
Volunteer! If you are an auditory or sustainable hearing specialist, please contact me to learn more.

I have been developing a social enterprise for economic development and healthcare in San Martin, Peru.  Last year I spent 6 months in San Martin as a volunteer for an economic development and poverty reduction non-profit.

Due to economic growth in the San Martin region over the last decade, motorcycle and mototaxi (or ""rickshaw"") usage has increased quickly but has become a serious problem in the San Martin city of Tarapoto, with the constant noise of motorcycle and mototaxi engines throughout the downtown area.  In fact, Tarapoto has been nicknamed ""Terre-moto"" in Peru.  I view the noise pollution in Tarapoto mainly as an impediment to sustainable development in the city and in the San Martin region, but also as a harborer of negative health effects.

In addition, the World Health Organization recently reported a very high need for hearing aid access and usage throughout the developing world.  In fact, Peru is one of a few countries in Latin America without one peer reviewed study on non-occupational hearing loss.

My idea is to combine a solution for noise abatement in Tarapoto with an increase in hearing aid access and management throughout the San Martin region, expanding to other locations that may be negatively affected by similarly high levels of noise pollution and that have significant under-served hearing-needy populations.

Motos (Spanish for ""Motorcycles"") For Fonos (""audífonos"" is Spanish for ""hearing aids"") is the name of this social enterprise that will launch in Tarapoto and expand to additional cities and regions as needed once the pilot site is operating.
What We Need & What You Get

Funds from this campaign will help the Motos For Fonos Launch in Peru where we will complete critical noise abatement design and develop a sustainable hearing aid supply chain and management plan.  It will also help create and set-up a small country committee that will be critical to making this a self-sustaining initiative, rather than one that continually relies on donations.  This initial work will be completed by the end of 2012.
For $100 donation, you will receive a quarterly and/or monthly Moto-In-Action 'Insta-Soundgram' related to our work-in-progress and the people we help to support in San Martin.

For a $200 donation, you will receive the perks of a $100 donation as well as a quarterly and/or monthly video that shows the people who Motos For Fonos helps and the work that Motos For Fonos is accomplishing.
The Motos For Fonos Founding Circle Membership is an exclusive opportunity to be a leader in this important initiative.
The Mission of Motos For Fonos is:

With the assistance of auditory health stakeholders and hearing specialists, Motos For Fonos will implement a sustainable business model solution for the enhanced distribution of assistive hearing devices and noise muffling infrastructure solution interventions in the developing world, aiding those who need auditory assistance and reducing acute and chronic noise pollution.
The Objectives of Motos For Fonos are:
In Year 1, we hope to establish a country committee in Peru and an additional country, and also deploy 100 hearing aids or noise muffling infrastructure interventions.
In Year 2, we hope to establish two more country committees and deploy an additional 300 hearing aids or muffling interventions.
Volunteer! If you are an auditory or sustainable hearing specialist, please contact me to learn more.",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

We are a group of DJs and music lovers who wanted to create a new type of affordable audio technology. With so many expensive packs on the market, we are crowd-sourcing BASSpak to make it the best and most accessible option available for the everyday concert-goer, gamer, movie buff, or music enthusiast. 

The BASSpak's silent subwoofer will add a PUNCH to anything you’re listening to. By sending vibrations through your body that match the bass, the BASSpak creates an immersive and individualized bass experience no one else will hear or feel.

Every BASSpak comes equipped with an intuitive plug-and-play control module, so you can just plug in your headphones and JAM! It’s easy to use with your phone, iPod, tablet, laptop, or any other audio device.

The BASSpak has been in development since 2018.  Since then, there have been several prototypes with many important updates and improvements. Each BASSpak is adjustable and fits nearly all body types comfortably. Each BASSpak also has extra storage space big enough for your phone, music player, or wallet. With its sleek, compact, and portable design, you can wear our BASSpak without restricting your ability to dance or move!

Our expert engineers have been focusing on maximizing our components to make the most of every part of our system while saving you money. You’ll feel the bass pounding like in a club or in the pit of a concert. Anywhere you go, connect your BASSpak to a phone or MP3 player for a robust experience, or use the BASSpak to enhance a Silent Disco or your favorite video game or movie.
Everything is ready to do the first production run. We just need YOU! Please consider donating to help make BASSpak available everywhere!
We need to raise $5,000.00 to cover the cost of materials and production for a run of 25 BASSpaks.
All the funds raised through this campaign will be used to build the first production run of the BASSpak, regardless of the amount. The more money we raise, the more BASSpaks we will produce for you!
You can even pre-order one of our first 25 BASSpaks by donating $199 or more! Please see our Perks for details.
BASSpak brings the quality of other audio packs at an accessible price. We want this audio technology to be available to the masses, not just a select few who can afford a more expensive model.
In addition, if you are deaf or hard-of-hearing, but love to dance, this is an option for you to feel the rhythm wherever you go!

The BASSpak is a great tool for DJs to use while performing or producing music. Clubs and venues can have poor sub-bass monitoring in the DJ booth.  The BASSpak solves this problem and allows DJs to simply and easily monitor sub frequencies, regardless of the venue.

BASSpak technology pairs well with Silent Discos. A Silent Disco is a dance party where each attendee gets a set of headphones tuned to DJs, bands, or other entertainment. The BASSpak team has produced Silent Discos and underground dance parties in Northeastern Pennsylvania since the summer of 2014.

Help BASSpak by Sharing!


If you can't contribute financially, please help by sharing this campaign with your friends, family, and anyone else you can think of to let them know how excited you are for the Basspak! IndieGoGo makes it easy to share!

column1: Thanks for checking out Fireside Audiobox! I'm really proud of this creation, and it feels really good to finally set it loose. Read on for product info and campaign details, and please support and share!

The Fireside Audiobox adds flames to your favorite music. It's hand-crafted, one of a kind, beautifully-designed and show-stopping. Music and fire combine synergistically to provide a mesmerizing experience, with unique flame-signatures and patterns for each track on your playlist (it's all about the sound waves - keep reading for the techy details). Turn on your Fireside Audiobox, connect your music via Bluetooth, light the fire, and it's showtime.

Designed in Bend, Oregon, the Fireside Audiobox is a music player, a design showpiece, and a guaranteed conversation starter. And yes, if you had a cool physics teacher in high school, you'll recognize the Ruben's Tube display across the top. #science!

The Fireside Audiobox is more than dancing flames. Any object you place in your home should speak to you, and those you invite inside. My goal with the aesthetics of the audiobox was to ensure that it was a beautiful addition to your home as well as a conversation starter. It needs to look elegant and intriguing, while still looking like it belongs where you place it, even when not in use. It is a functional piece of art.
I use one of my prototypes as my everyday music player. In the evening, I fire it up and settle into a meditative-like state after a long day. A craft beer is a nice addition, too.

This is a true DIY experiment that's been refined for the design enthusiast that loves to get together with friends and turn some heads. I'd be thrilled and honored to know that the Fireside Audiobox has earned a spot in your home.

The idea for the Fireside Audiobox was born in 2013 while I was working in a maker-space in San Diego. Trying to educate myself in prototyping and fabrication, I needed a project that required the use of all areas and most machines in the shop. With a physics background and an interest in fire, I got to work. The response to my prototype was overwhelming

Hoping to eventually produce these at scale, I started diving into the design, functionality and user experience in great detail. After three years of refinements, I'm incredibly happy with the final results.

In opposition to more standard go-to-market strategies, I thought it would be more fun to bring the Fireside Audiobox directly to the people via crowdfunding. Due to its visual nature, the on-trend styling and the current popularity of unique, bespoke functional design pieces, I thought this was the most direct route to my audience. After a successful Kickstarter campaign in July/August 2016, we're now parking this project here for extended direct sales and promotion. Selling directly also allows me to offer a considerably lower price and gives me a personal connection to my backers (and vice versa). So, here we are, on Indiegogo!
• Dimensions: The lightweight, self-contained audio system stands 19.5 inches high, 14 inches wide and 4.5 inches deep.
• Bluetooth-Enabled: With its built-in Bluetooth technology, users are able pair the Fireside Audiobox with any Bluetooth-enabled device for easy music streaming.
• Battery-Powered: The onboard Li-po battery provides more than 8 hours of constant music on a single charge (power adapter).
• Propane Duration: The 16.4 oz canister typically lasts about 8 hours depending on pressure, environmental variables and the intensity of your music.
Science! I mapped the audio waves within the aluminum tube and identified the spots along its length that would produce the most responsive and dramatic flame effects.
Sound waves mapped within the aluminum tube.

You’ll get the Fireside Audiobox audio player base, the glass shield, a power charger for the internal battery, and instructions for very simple set-up and maintenance. The only thing I can’t send you in the mail is the propane canister (like what you’d use on a camping stove), so you’ll need to grab one of those at your local hardware or camping store. Usually just 3-4 bucks each.

Production is under way! This chart shows our medium-term production and assembly plans for our original campaign. Based on ongoing interest and sales, these development windows will adjust - as of right now, we're looking at faster timelines, which is great. Please get in touch with questions regarding the arrival time of your Fireside Audiobox.

You can now upgrade to BLACK or GUNMETAL GRAY anodized aluminum components! We're really excited about this one. ALL backers get this customization option for FREE! ALL CAPS BECAUSE IT'S AWESOME! We're also proud to offer a graphic customization option for those of you who'd like to dress up a custom Audiobox with your company's logo or a personal graphic. And of course we also have the Natural vs Dark finishes (already your choice upon fulfilment). Thanks for your support!
Anodized aluminum in BLACK or GUNMETAL GRAY. This customization option is offered to all backers once we hit our $40K stretch goal!
Your logo or personalized graphic on the front of your Fireside Audiobox! Work with our designer to customize a front speaker cutout graphic.
'Natural' bamboo finish on the left, 'Dark' finish on the right.
...and ask us about our branded Zippo lighters...!

Thanks for checking out the Fireside Audiobox - I know you’re going to love it. I deeply appreciate your help as I work to surpass my goal, and any pledge amount brings us one step closer to success. Help me produce and deliver this product and there will be many more interactive, hand-made art pieces to follow!
Click the ‘Back It’ button up top, and please spread the word by sharing this page. Thank you!

column7: >Hello, I'm Anthony Rumeo the founder and CEO of The Shower Speaker (TM). The shower speaker team and I started this project 2 years ago and have worked painstakingly at realizing its true potential. We have thousands of hours in research and development, and have personally invested tens of thousands to be able to sit here today with a product we're proud to bring to you and we know you'll be proud to own.

>We've gone through at least 6 fully functioning prototypes to bring you the final version of The Shower Speaker. We started with a problem and built/designed a solution. We wanted to listen to quality audio in the shower. We tried a host of different things, docks, bluetooth speakers, suction cup shower units and event the cheap shower heads presently available. Nothing worked to our standards or was aesthetically appealing to our standards. The resounding issue we had was a lack of clarity and quality. The Shower Speaker was born.

column1: Besides an incredible high note in the shower, Anthony, studied finance at Northeastern in Boston, MA where he realized his propensity toward entrepreneurship. He has built companies in varying industry segments from finance to healthcare to fitness. Never forgetting his initial goal to provide a product and or service that he could be proud to purvey always stressing quality and always putting the customers interests before margins.

As you can imagine there is a lot that goes into building a slim line rain shower with built in electronics such as a waterproof, bluetooth speaker and LED stimulus system. With that being said the cost of manufacturing is quite high as are the minimum production numbers to make this a product people can afford. That is why we chose indiegogo as our launchpad to help cover tooling expenses, injection mold forms, and to hit minimum production order numbers with our supply chain. Our initial goal does all that, and allows you to be some of the first to have The Shower Speaker in your home at a significant discount to MSRP.

column4: >○ Chargable wireless bluetooth speaker (removable for use anywhere)

column1: ○ LED lights change based on water temperature (see phases below)
○ Rainfall shower head, soothing water stream
○ no tools needed install in 2 minutes.
○ Wireless speaker delivers up to 15+ hours of music or talk.
○ Bluetooth 3.0 + EDR provides seamless integration for your devices.
○ Outstanding RF power amplifier performance, delivers crisp sound.
○ Dual microphone noise reduction make phone calls a breeze.
○ Pickup technology for background noise cancellation.
○ We've used the latest audio algorithms, for the best call and music sound!
When the water temperature goes to 90 deg F or 32 deg C the LED Lights will turn Blue.
When the water temperature is between 91 deg F and 106 deg F the LED Lights will turn Magenta.
When the water temperature is between 107 deg F and 113 deg F the LED Lights will turn Red.

Installation is a breeze there are no wires or batteries and most of the time no tools are necessary either. Its a true ""plug and play"" item. You simply remove (unscrew) your previous shower head and replace it with The Shower Speaker by screwing it on counter clockwise. They are universal and will fit basically any shower.

column2:
Challenges

When taking any product from prototype to mass market the risks and challenges along production are concerns for any business. However, to mitigate that risk and assure that we are going to deliver not only a high quality product, but deliver it on time we have sourced contingency manufacturers for each part of The Shower Speaker. This will assure our quality is where we need it to be and you as our clients expect it to be. It also assures we meet or beat our production time table. We didn't source the cheapest options. Again this entire project was built around the premise of quality and our manufacturing is no different. Our partners and manufacturing team are some of the most prominent in the world in their respective industries. You will be happy!

column2: >

column3:
> 

Available in 6 different colours, you can pick the one that fits best to your style and look !

Any other color you'd wish ? Don't hesitate to give us your suggestions in the comments !
column4: >
column6:
>

The EOZ Air provides a top-shelf sound experience characterised by powerful bass, and super clear and crispy mid-highs.

The custom made 8mm electro-dynamic drivers deliver a fine tuned High Resolution Audio for a natural sound signature. Combined with the latest aptX® technology, that significantly reduces the bit rate without affecting audio quality, you get a pure wireless CD-like quality sound.
column8:
>

Some brands decide to implement heart rate and fitness trackers, we don't ! We chose to emphasise on the sound quality and used the extra space to host two 8mm large custom made dynamic drivers. Yes, sound should always come first.
column10:
>

Our team of engineers and audio professionals spent countless hours refining the sound signature of the EOZ Air to make sure that you get an audio experience on par with the best wired earphones on the market.
column11: >
column12:
> 

The EOZ Air provides up to 4 hours of listening time on a single charge. The charging case gives you an additional 48 hours of listening time while on the go. 

The beat just goes on !
column13: >
column15:
>

We made sure that the EOZ Air will securely stay in place in your ears in every situation. Either you Run, Dance, Workout or even take a nap, you’ll forget that you are wearing earphones !
column17:
>

Every person has a different ear canal size and shape. To ensure a comfortable fit for everyone, the EOZ Air comes with 6 different set of ear tips:

column1: • 3 size of Memory Foam ear tips (S - M - L)
• 3 size of Silicone ear tips (S - M - L)

column3:
>

Thanks to an over the ear hook engineered to gently adapt to all ears, the EOZ Air offers an extra-secure fit with zero discomfort. No more falling down your ear !

column2:
>

The EOZ Air will quickly become your favorite fitness partner. No wires will ever get in your way when working out. Sweat resistant means that you won't have to worry for if you decide to go the extra mile !

column3:
>

 

The EOZ Air seamlessly connects the two earbuds, creating a flawless and uninterrupted audio experience.
column4:
>

The combination of the Bluetooth® 5.0 technology and a revolutionary double antenna system located outside the casing gives the EOZ Air a greater range and stronger signal than you've ever seen on a pair of truly wireless earphones.
column5:
>

Instead of packing a smaller antenna inside the casing of the earbuds, we developed a high end antenna that fits in the over the ear hooks and expends greatly the range of the EOZ Air.

No more connection loss or synchronisation problems !

column3:

column1: It all started in June 2016 with the EOZ One, our first bluetooth earphones. Thanks to a first successful Kickstarter campaign, we were able to launch a product that was delivered to our Kickstarter community and hit the shelves of retail stores in less than 5 months after being funded.
WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT THE EOZ One
