column1: ","Available in 6 different colours, you can pick the one that fits best to your style and look !Any other color you'd wish ? Don't hesitate to give us your suggestions in the comments ! The EOZ Air provides a top-shelf sound experience characterised by powerful bass, and super clear and crispy mid-highs.The custom made 8mm electro-dynamic drivers deliver a fine tuned High Resolution Audio for a natural sound signature. Combined with the latest aptX® technology, that significantly reduces the bit rate without affecting audio quality, you get a pure wireless CD-like quality sound.Some brands decide to implement heart rate and fitness trackers, we don't ! We chose to emphasise on the sound quality and used the extra space to host two 8mm large custom made dynamic drivers. Yes, sound should always come first.Our team of engineers and audio professionals spent countless hours refining the sound signature of the EOZ Air to make sure that you get an audio experience on par with the best wired earphones on the market. The EOZ Air provides up to 4 hours of listening time on a single charge. The charging case gives you an additional 48 hours of listening time while on the go. The beat just goes on !  We made sure that the EOZ Air will securely stay in place in your ears in every situation. Either you Run, Dance, Workout or even take a nap, you’ll forget that you are wearing earphones !Every person has a different ear canal size and shape. To ensure a comfortable fit for everyone, the EOZ Air comes with 6 different set of ear tips:
3 size of Memory Foam ear tips (S - M - L)
3 size of Silicone ear tips (S - M - L)
Thanks to an over the ear hook engineered to gently adapt to all ears, the EOZ Air offers an extra-secure fit with zero discomfort. No more falling down your ear !

The EOZ Air will quickly become your favorite fitness partner. No wires will ever get in your way when working out. Sweat resistant means that you won't have to worry for if you decide to go the extra mile !

The EOZ Air seamlessly connects the two earbuds, creating a flawless and uninterrupted audio experience.The combination of the Bluetooth® 5.0 technology and a revolutionary double antenna system located outside the casing gives the EOZ Air a greater range and stronger signal than you've ever seen on a pair of truly wireless earphones.Instead of packing a smaller antenna inside the casing of the earbuds, we developed a high end antenna that fits in the over the ear hooks and expends greatly the range of the EOZ Air.No more connection loss or synchronisation problems !

It has never been so easy to pair your earphones with all your favorite devices. Remove the EOZ Air from its charging case and it will automatically start pairing with the last device you used. CONNECT WITH ALL YOUR DEVICES The EOZ Air is compatible with all your devices that use the Bluetooth Technology:

The EOZ Air has two dual beamforming microphones that reduce the background noise when you make calls. This gives your voice an incredible clarity when talking on the phone.You can either use voice commands or a a long press on the button to automatically launch your favorite personal assistant.  ① - EOZ Air Wireless Earphones② - Charging Case③ - 6 Sets of Ear tips④ - Charging Cable⑤ - EOZ member card⑥ - EOZ user manual    Just make sure to share it with a public post so we can verify later on

column6:
>You don’t need to break the bank for amazing audio.


CKCOM presents Alien earbuds, the first pair of true wireless earbuds that offer premium features without the typical high-end price tag. One-time bluetooth pairing with your smartphone or laptop sets you up to savor your music, podcasts or TV shows without interruptions.

column3:
>Astonishing Graphene-Enhanced Audio

Alien audio drivers are coated with graphene acoustic membranes. Graphene is a thin yet sturdy material with excellent conductivity, that allows sound waves to oscillate at their precise frequency, no matter what kind of music you're listening to. The result: bass with low distortions, while mid and high tones are carried cleanly.
column4:
>

Other earbuds use bulky and low-cost conductors such as silicon, which result in audio quality loss. That's why Alien sounds better than the other wireless earbuds that don't use graphene. Graphene also conducts electricity better than Silicon, allowing it to elongate battery life.

Typically, graphene-enhanced audio products are sold at premium prices, yet we’re able to keep the costs low because we own and manage our supply chain.
column5: >
column7:
>

The sleek charging spaceship uses a powerful micro-lithium ion battery that can keep your earbuds charged for up to 30 hours. Earbuds can play music for 4.5 hours on a full charge.
column8:
>Tight Seal Blocks Out Noises

When you put Alien earbuds in, you'll give it a slight twist to seal it perfectly into your ear canal. With this tight seal, you can block out ambient background noises and prevent sound leaks during calls.
column9: >Comfortable Fit, Stays in Your Ear
column10:
>

Alien earbuds comes with three tip sizes so they fit comfortably into any sized ear canal. When you're active, whether you're commuting to work or jogging, you won't need to worry about these earbuds falling out.
column12: >Each Alien earbud comes with three interchangeable eartip sizes.
column15:
>

Our sweat-proof design prevents external moisture from affecting audio quality. Dust-proof encasing prevents dirt particles from building up and seeping into the equipment.
column16: >Clear Calls Anywhere

column1: Vertically-oriented mic picks up your voice only, so you can take important calls with clear audio. Take calls while on a crowded bus, outside at a coffee shop, or even on the streets while jogging.
column3:
>

Once paired to your phone, you can skip songs and answer calls without needing to look at your phone. Use the single button to control your music and calls:

column2: >
column3:
>A RedDot Design Award-Winning Team 


CKCOM is comprised of talent across design, hardware, and product. In the past few years, we've helped other companies manufacture over 10 different products. We have a vertically-integrated supply chain, allowing us to have unique lean manufacturing capabilities that other audio brands don’t have. Some of the products we’ve made and shipped in the past include Apple MFi-cables, bluetooth car headsets, and smartphones.

We’re excited to launch our first audio brand, Alien, through Indiegogo in order to fulfill our dream of becoming a global audio leader. We’re very experienced on the manufacturing side, but it's our first time building a brand, and we need your help to build better products.
column5:
>
Shipping-ready Alien earbuds in the process of being packaged.
column6:
>
Our quality assurance team working hard to test electronic components.
column7:
>
Black and white Alien charging cases, freshly hatched from the assembly line.

This is not our first time mass-manufacturing a product. We've already paid for fixed costs, including the molds, so there is little to no risk in manufacturing this product. The money you pay in crowdfunding will go toward the cost on each additional unit that we produce and ship to you.

column5:
exchanges policy?
If you receive a defective or broken unit, we will resend a unit or process a full refund to you. We will help process exchanges as long as we have inventory–if not, we’ll send you your money back.

When will I receive my product? What if I receive it past the listed date?
We have experience with production runs of up to 5,000 units at a time with other products we’ve made in the past, meaning that we’ll put in the order as soon as we finish the campaign. From that time, it will take 1 month until we can get it across the sea and to your door.

We will honor our timelines as best as we can and aim to ship to you by Christmas. December generally is a busy time to be shipping due to the holiday–if we hear of any delays on the shipper’s side, we’ll notify our backers immediately. We won’t be able to refund you for shipping delays, but if you decide to cancel your order before we put the order in for a product run, you’ll get 100% of your money back. 

What happens if I never receive the product?
We’ve already done a production run of 500 units to test for defect rates (we have photos and videos to prove this). Things are looking great so far. We do not foresee any challenges in scaling up the production quantity. If we aren’t able to ship to you, we’ll refund your money. 

How much is internationally shipping? Am I responsible for taxes and duties in my country?
We will cover shipping to US and Canada. For areas outside of this, we will charge a flat $15 shipping rate. This extra fee will help us cover some of the costs we incur in shipping it from our manufacturing facility to your door. Keep in mind that you are responsible for paying your own country’s taxes and duties. 

Can you ship to my country?
Right now, shipping is limited to regions where our shipping service provider operates. Since this is our first launch, we want to keep operations lean to ship the orders that we feel most confident about. In the future we may open up orders to new countries as it’s our goal to become a global audio brand. Thanks for bearing with us in the meantime!

When is the shipping date?
If you placed your order on or before November 9th 11:00PM PST, then your order will be shipping by December 2017. Orders placed after that (including now) will be shipping to you in January 2017, in order to accommodate for the busy Christmas logistics schedule and production lead times. For InDemand purchases, shipping will be in March 2018.
column7:
Product

What is ""graphene""–why is it important and where can I learn more about it?
In a nutshell, graphene is a material that can be used to enclose audio drivers in our headphone. It is more expensive than the enclosure materials typically used in traditional earbud products, and it is more commonly seen in higher-end headphones because of the high material cost. There are a lot of benefits of using graphene to enhance audio quality. We found these links on the web, if you want to read more about it:

column1:
You claim to have designed, manufactured, and shipped products before. How can I learn more about those?
CKCOM is an original electronics manufacturer, which means that we have helped other brands manufacture products before through our own factory resources. Because they are our customers, we cannot list all of the brands because of confidentiality agreements. However, we have some information that we can share selectively upon request. Email us if you want to learn more.

I’ve seen similar products on Amazon or other sites–are you a reseller?
This is our first time launching our own brand as a factory, and we would love your support to help us bring our pilot Alien brand to life. It’s our dream to create an audio brand that people around the world love.

We are not resellers. We are CKCOM, the original electronics manufacturer of the Alien earbuds brand and other audio brands. This means that we own the supply chain and factory, and help other companies manufacture products. Your Indiegogo order guarantees that you receive our best earbuds directly from our production line.

Why is the product so cheap on Indiegogo?
Compared to other crowdfunding teams, we own the supply chain. In most cases, crowdfunding teams will work with a 3rd-party, contract manufacturer. Since we own the factory, we control the costs, and source our own supplies. This means that there is no middle-man service fee for any components or services we use. This is how we can offer a premium product at a price lower than other competitors on the market. Being based in Shenzhen, China means that we live a 45-minute cab ride away from our own factory.

Do you have reviews of the product I can look at?

TechAeris https://techaeris.com/2017/10/27/alien-wire-fre...

COLORADIST http://coloradist.com/gear/audio/review-ckcom-a...

What Hi-Fi? https://www.whathifi.com/news/alien-earbuds-out...

Joshua Vergara (from Android Authority) https://youtu.be/oG9k5d1UhSo

How can I get in touch with your team?
We’d love to hear from you. Email us at ckcom@ickcom.com with your questions and ideas. We’re receiving a lot of emails lately due to our launch, but we’ll get back to you as soon as we possibly can!

column1: We have designed the Ayra Bluetooth Speaker to be the most powerful 'Tiny' speaker on the market today. With the Ayra, you can stream music wirelessly anywhere via bluetooth (Or wired with the included 3.5mm adapter). Experience a deeper and more resonant sound than you ever thought possible from such a small device.
We designed the Ayra to be as beautiful as it is powerful. With only 3 buttons (Play, Next &
column2: Back) it just seems to work
column3: Ayra is the pocket-sized speaker that will leave a room of guests wondering where the music is coming from! Its the home theatre in your pocket. The share anything anywhere speaker.

column1:
It Just Werks...

Ayra is compatible with any device that has bluetooth functionality. Pair it with your mac or PC to watch movies or play music wirelessly, Apple and Android, even Palms and gaming devices work too. Simplify your Sound!
Steve Jobs put 1,000 Songs in your Pocket. We're Giving you an Entire Concert
It won't call it a day until you do

Built with the end-user in mind, Ayra has been constructed with a lithium-ion battery that will provide it up to 7 hours of continuous playback. That’s enough music to last from your morning coffee until dinner time.

Ayra is made to Simplify your Sound... NOT to make you spend 20 min trying to get your devices to pair. We created the Ayra with HeadCase Sound's EasyPair system so that it goes into pairing mode the moment it's turned on.

You can now easily share your experiences with loved ones and fully immerse yourself in local culture by having the ability to communicate with over 2 billion people in 37+ languages. All whilst comfortably listening to your favourite music in HD sound for 30 hours.
column2:
>Our proud partners

 
 
 
 
Highest comfort and secure fit thanks to its different sizes of silicone and memory foam ear tips.

column1: With our intelligent translation system, there's no need to share your earbuds with strangers when talking to them. Just use your Mymanu CLIK S and your phone – simple!

These new earbuds are the result of more than 3 years of research and development, along with field testing with the world’s largest hospitality companies such as Marriott Hotels and The Louvre Hotel Group. Offering today and tomorrow’s hyper-connected travellers what they are looking for is crucial. Breaking down language barriers is a key element for the growth of the sector.

 

30 hours of freedom to enjoy their favourite music in HD or speak with friends in 37+ languages
column2:
>How translation works

Powered by our smart Translate software, you can speak face-to-face or with a group of people wherever they are in the world and in different languages.

SOLO TRANSLATION:

Translate conversations with people in 37+ languages in real-time* on the street, at a reception desk, or in a shop. A full transcript of the conversation will also be available on the phone.

GROUP CONFERENCE:

Whether you are at a board meeting, a conference, or communicating with a group of people based in other countries.

The app allows users to hear their translated conversation in real-time as well as being able to read the text on their phone.

 

Golden Tulip’s overall aim was to adapt to its guests’ changing technology needs to increase customer retention, boost brand loyalty, increase the number of returning overseas guests checking in at its properties and, ultimately, to meet new client expectations with regards to assistive technology.

","You can now easily share your experiences with loved ones and fully immerse yourself in local culture by having the ability to communicate with over 2 billion people in 37+ languages. All whilst comfortably listening to your favourite music in HD sound for 30 hours.    Our proud partners    Highest comfort and secure fit thanks to its different sizes of silicone and memory foam ear tips.

column1: With our intelligent translation system, there's no need to share your earbuds with strangers when talking to them. Just use your Mymanu CLIK S and your phone – simple!

These new earbuds are the result of more than 3 years of research and development, along with field testing with the world’s largest hospitality companies such as Marriott Hotels and The Louvre Hotel Group. Offering today and tomorrow’s hyper-connected travellers what they are looking for is crucial. Breaking down language barriers is a key element for the growth of the sector. 30 hours of freedom to enjoy their favourite music in HD or speak with friends in 37+ languagesHow translation worksPowered by our smart Translate software, you can speak face-to-face or with a group of people wherever they are in the world and in different languages.SOLO TRANSLATION:Translate conversations with people in 37+ languages in real-time* on the street, at a reception desk, or in a shop. A full transcript of the conversation will also be available on the phone.GROUP CONFERENCE:Whether you are at a board meeting, a conference, or communicating with a group of people based in other countries.The app allows users to hear their translated conversation in real-time as well as being able to read the text on their phone. Golden Tulip’s overall aim was to adapt to its guests’ changing technology needs to increase customer retention, boost brand loyalty, increase the number of returning overseas guests checking in at its properties and, ultimately, to meet new client expectations with regards to assistive technology. High sound quality is in our DNA. Balanced Armature drivers guarantee a superior crystal-clear sound, allowing you to enjoy your favourite music whilst working out.Hassan MushaidDirector at The Creative Composite

Ade MolajoCEO at Compare checker  . We will be shipping worldwide.  VAT and GST not included in perk pre-order price and will be determined by country on delivery..We have planed to start ship starting December 2019- JanBy backing now, you’ll be one of the first to own CLIK S at a discounted price, exclusive offers and access to provide valuable feedback that will shape the product and future generations of the product. Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product. Many thanks ❤️ What to write about our project?   Disclaimer: CEH TECH does not take any responsibility for the accuracy of translation, Mymanu CLIK S has not been approved for use in any medical setting, including emergency room, surgery or pharmaceutical advice",45.0,6,"1 Campaign

column3: Pavilion is a high-performance wireless speaker with an innovative modern design. We scrambled different materials with an existing speaker structure to redefine it to a beautiful piece of art. Pavilion sets a new paradigm in a speaker design, delivering amazing performance and fascinating experience.
column4: >

column1:
• DESIGNING PAVILION

We tried to disconnect ourselves from old clichés and make an original approach from different perspectives. Our team looked through some of the greatest modern architectures designed by Mies van der Rohe, Ando Tadao, and Frank Lloyd Wright. We studied how these architectures were constructed with modern materials and designs.

column7: >In the process of designing the speaker, we were captivated by the attractive curves and a glossy finish of brass instruments. We studied the instrument's curvature and integrated it to our spiral copper port design. The spiral inside the clear wall is breathtaking and makes it attractive from 360 degrees.

column2:
>

Speaker base is made with a high-density concrete used in modern architectures. The base firmly holds the speaker in place preventing acoustic loss from any vibration. The elegant surface finish goes smoothly with the surrounding flow.

>

The varnished oak top of the speaker is handcrafted with the finest oaks from North America. Subtle waves of the grain and the deep color translate to state of tranquility. Oak surface senses user’s touch for the speaker control. The touch is pleasing even during the short seconds of control.

column6: >

column19: >Spiral copper pipe inside the clear case is not just for the design. The pipe boosts the bass frequencies by the principles of acoustic resonance. We shaped it like no other to give Pavilion its unique look while improving the performance.

column2:
>

Playing music and pairing two Pavilions is simple. Pavilion is compatible with iPhone, Android, and any other devices with the Bluetooth function.

column1: We are using high quality 20W Peerless transducer for the best acoustic quality. We designed the cabinet to make the frequency response as flat as possible replicating unbiased sound. Boomy bass, bright treble might temporarily spice up the sound, but ears get tired after long listening with these alteration.

column2: The design of working sample is different from the final version of Pavilion&gt
column4:
>

Capacitive touch control is on top of the speaker. Simply touch the oak surface to pair a device, play/pause music, and adjust a volume. LED Indicator on the top shows you the current status of Pavilion.

  • POWER AND PORT
column5:
>

Three rounds are behind the back. A power button to turn-on the Pavilion
column6: Aux port for hooking up MP3 players, classic CD players, and other wired devices
column7: AC adapter port for charging.

column2:
>-PAVILION Q LIMITED-

Pavilion Q is the high-end version of Pavilion. The additional finish in the design takes the uniqueness of Pavilion a step further.

column1: There is a copper accent around the waist and the top control buttons. Its glossiness and light reflection makes the speaker luxurious. All these parts are hand carved and polished with precision. The quantity is limited because It takes much more time to build each parts.

Pavilion Q uses same technical parts that are used by Pavilion. It uses 20W Full-Range Peereless Transducer, D-Spiral Acoustic, Bluetooth Connection, Wireless Stereo Pairing, Rechargeable Battery, Touch Control on American White Oak and Aux Port.
Pavilion Q is another piece of architecture inside your home and the design is simple yet sophisticated. Innovative engineering makes the speaker even more beautiful.

column2: Parts built from Prototype Shop - <b>Silicon mold will be replaced with a metal mold for its precision&gt

>

Due to customs regulation by countries, we are able to ship Pavilions to following countries.

Please ask us if your country is not listed below. We will check to see if we can send Pavilion to you.

column1: Americas : Brazil, Mexico, Canada, Argentina, Chile, United States.

Europe and Middle East: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Spain, France, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Austria, Poland, Portugal,  Romania, Russia, Switzerland, Slovenia, Finland, Sweden, Turkey, United Kingdom, UAE.
Asia Pacific: , Australia, New Zealand, China, Korea, Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia.

Hult is a design startup based in Los Angeles, California. We have some of the best designers, engineers, and art specialists designing new extraordinary ideas. Our goal is to bring out new designs shifting paradigms.

column2: >Please support us and share Pavilion on Facebook and Twitter!

column1:
• Risk and Challenges
We went through a tough time in the last campaign. but it definitely made us stronger and more prepared. All of the manufacturing process has been setup. The work flow from raw materials to shipping has been organized and synced. 
Our main concern is the schedule. We have done both simulations and tried out some processes to predict the realistic timeline that is not too far. Setting up injection molds and PCB fabrication line was reviewed thoroughly, so there won't be an abrupt stop to this campaign. But, it's difficult to know the quality of some sub-parts until the actual pieces comes out. Therefore, we plan to make a quick delivery mold(QDM), which can be used as a test mold before going into a production. QDM will cost us extra, but It's a good insurance for both quality and schedule.
It reaches over 86dB @ 1W/0.5m. It will easily fill the space of a large living room.
How long Pavilion can play with fully charged batteries?
Pavilion provides 5 hours of playtime at medium volume and up to 7-8 hours of playtime at small volume.
Is Pavilion compatible with computers or an iPad?
Yes Pavilion can be connected to any device with a bluetooth H/W.
Does 2 Pavilions pledge come in single package?
They will be shipped together, but all the speakers are boxed in single units.
Regional converters are not included in the package.
Can you ship the product to the countries that are not listed above.
Please contact us, if you are living in the country that is not listed above. We will find the way to ship it to you.
Once the Pavilion is shipped, it should be delivered within a week without a customs problem.
Are VAT and taxes included in the price?
VAT and taxes are not included and it maybe added by each countries' regulations.

<Audio was recorded from 0.5m distance>Pavilion is a high-performance wireless speaker with an innovative modern design. We scrambled different materials with an existing speaker structure to redefine it to a beautiful piece of art. Pavilion sets a new paradigm in a speaker design, delivering amazing performance and fascinating experience.

DESIGNING PAVILIONWe tried to disconnect ourselves from old clichés and make an original approach from different perspectives. Our team looked through some of the greatest modern architectures designed by Mies van der Rohe, Ando Tadao, and Frank Lloyd Wright. We studied how these architectures were constructed with modern materials and designs.

In the process of designing the speaker, we were captivated by the attractive curves and a glossy finish of brass instruments. We studied the instrument's curvature and integrated it to our spiral copper port design. The spiral inside the clear wall is breathtaking and makes it attractive from 360 degrees.

Speaker base is made with a high-density concrete used in modern architectures. The base firmly holds the speaker in place preventing acoustic loss from any vibration. The elegant surface finish goes smoothly with the surrounding flow.

The varnished oak top of the speaker is handcrafted with the finest oaks from North America. Subtle waves of the grain and the deep color translate to state of tranquility. Oak surface senses user’s touch for the speaker control. The touch is pleasing even during the short seconds of control.

<Sound Velocity Simulation>Spiral copper pipe inside the clear case is not just for the design. The pipe boosts the bass frequencies by the principles of acoustic resonance. We shaped it like no other to give Pavilion its unique look while improving the performance.
Playing music and pairing two Pavilions is simple. Pavilion is compatible with iPhone, Android, and any other devices with the Bluetooth function.

We are using high quality 20W Peerless transducer for the best acoustic quality. We designed the cabinet to make the frequency response as flat as possible replicating unbiased sound. Boomy bass, bright treble might temporarily spice up the sound, but ears get tired after long listening with these alteration.

<The design of working sample is different from the final version of Pavilion>TOUCH CONTROLCapacitive touch control is on top of the speaker. Simply touch the oak surface to pair a device, play/pause music, and adjust a volume. LED Indicator on the top shows you the current status of Pavilion.POWER AND PORTThree rounds are behind the back. A power button to turn-on the Pavilion
column2: Aux port for hooking up MP3 players, classic CD players, and other wired devices

Pavilion Q is another piece of architecture inside your home and the design is simple yet sophisticated. Innovative engineering makes the speaker even more beautiful.

column2: >With its revolutionary technology, aiFi® introduces a new way of listening to music. Thanks to its smart stackability, you can stack virtually any number of aiFi speakers together and they will transform into one larger speaker with pristine sound – without cables or any cumbersome settings. No matter how many units you stack, you will immidiately notice the difference in sound quality and loudness.
>The aiFi speaker is rough and tough to go with you on the road but still looks good in your living room with its award winning design. Build your own Wall of Sound, alone or together with others.

column1: aiFi®, Artificial Intelligence Fidelity, is the first truly intelligent modular sound system. Stack the units together and build in any configuration you can imagine – with no given limitation.

Using their intelligence, the units calculate and decide how to best shape the total sound for you. One single unit is enough to fill your room with excellent sound that gets even better the more you stack.

As aiFi offers true modularity and scalable sound, the product does the job all the way from the bedside table to the party . It also works perfectly as a speaker for your multi-room solution. Three stacked units easily make a soundbar for your TV using the digital optical input. And a six-stack is way enough for a party in your patio.

Each unit is tuned to handle the deepest bass possible, with balanced and smooth mid- and high-frequency performance. One aiFi can definitely deliver firm punchy bass that is beyond what you would think was physically possible, but when you stack multiple units together – that is when the magic begins.

The surface of the speakers collectively adds up and pushes the actual bass performance deeper and deeper the larger stack you make. Stack them either sideways or on top of each other, and the result will give you not only louder sound – the overall sound quality also gets much better.

column2: >""There are no cables, no settings, just stack them and experience the magic""

column4: >The shape of each aiFi unit makes it easy to stack. Already 20 units make a full circle that is approximately 1.2 meters in diameter. This curved shape of each unit makes it easy to build a stable stack of a great number of units. On the top of the unit there are two grooves that make the rubber feet on the bottom fit securely.
column5: >On each side of the unit is the placeholder for our aiFi Coin. This coin is what enables the units to hook together sidewise with its unique magnetic system.

column2: >We provide the aiFi App that acts as a remote control of your stack and
column3: >can make all the settings that you can do on the touch pannel on the back of the speaker by using your smart phone. I
column4: >t also provides additional features. One of these features are the mood light function of your stack – it can be set to any color.

column1: At a click of a button the app enables you to instantly share the playback with your friends. Stack your aiFis together without any hustle sharing cables or messing around with Bluetooth pairing. This is really a social way of enjoying sound.

The modular sound system communicates using near field IR technology to transfer sound and the needed communication wirelessly between the aiFis at the speed of light. This ensures that the signal is distributed between the units without any losses and with high data integrity.

column2: >The approach of using many small speakers together makes the total performance raptor fast following every nuance of the music you are listening to or movie you are watching. This is quality you only find in true high-grade speaker systems like electrostatic loudspeakers. The aiFi Sound Dimension™ technology ensures perfect balance of the tonal, dynamic and spatial dimensions of sound. This gives you an incredible room-filling experience.

column1: ""The Dimensions of Sound Reproduced by Sound Dimension™ Technology""

With our professional background we surely do not go cheap on the analog line in function. There is a high-grade input stage that can handle any source with ease. Using that together with top-of-the-line ADC converters and a 192kHz/24bit digital sound processor, nothing gets in the way of the performance you are enjoying.

The input is also an optical SPDIF input that accepts PCM signals up to 96kHz/24bit. This is primarily to enable TVs that do not have any other sound output. But it also enables the aiFi speaker to double as a high-grade DAC to optimize the performance of your desktop sound.

To the right on the back, there are three touch sense control areas. From top down there is the power button that takes the unit into operational mode when pushed for 3 seconds. Next is the middle button that puts the speaker in BT pairing mode when you want to pair with a new phone. At the bottom is the line/BT select function. Sliding your finger from bottom to top increases volume, sliding from top to bottom decreases volume.

Housing: Aluminum
Dimensions: 184W x 65D x 64H (63H added for any stacked unit) mm.
Speaker Drivers: 15W 48 mm long throw custom-made.
Battery: Rechargeable Li-Ion cell.
Input: Pro grade analog Line in combined SPDIF optical input up to 96kHz/24bit. Bluetooth apt-X enabled.
Charger: 12V 1,5A DC 100-240 AC power adapter.
Security: Dual Kensington locks.

column2:
SHIPPING 
Where do you ship to?
column4: '>We use major courier companies and we will ship anywhere they deliver.

column1: Is there a warranty for the aiFi?
column3: '>Yes, aiFi comes with a one-year replacement warranty.

column1:
2. IN THE BOX
The aiFi speaker will arrive packaged with the following:

column9: '> 3.5mm plug to 2x RCA female adapter.
column13: '> Protective soft case for your aiFi and the included power adapter plus cables.
column17: '> Power supply with exchangeable power adapter plugs for US, Europe, UK

column1:
3. COMPATIBILITY
What kind of device do I need to stream my music?
column3: '>Any device that has Bluetooth, including your smart phone, tablet, laptop or PC. For best sound quality use a device with apt-X enabled.

column1: What kind of digital music sources can I play?
column3: '>aiFi can play any music you can access and listen to with your device. That means any online streaming sites or Internet radio (rdio, Youtube, Spotify, iTunes Radio, TuneIn, etc.), and any format of music stored on your device, on your home network, NAS server, or in the cloud.

column1: What kind of wired analog sources can I use with aiFi?
column3: '>A built-in analog input will accept a 2.5V RMS analog signal, allowing you to plug in any analog sound source using a standard 3.5mm audio connector.

column1: What kind of wired digital sources can I use with aiFi?
column3: '>The optical digital input is perfect for a home theater system, AppleTV, Roku or cable box, or the sound bar output on your TV.

column1:
4. STREAMING MUSIC TO AIFI
How easy is it to connect my device and start playing music?
column3: '>Very.  Simply power up your aiFi and pair your device by turning Bluetooth on and selecting “aiFi-Sam” in the menu. You only need to pair the device once
column4: it will remain stored in its memory for future use.

column1: How close does my device need to be to the aiFi?
Can I pair multiple devices to my aiFi?
column3: '>Yes, aiFi can pair multiple devices and the information will stay stored in your device for future listening.  However, aiFi can only be connected to and play from one source at a time.

column1:
5. PORTABILITY
Just how portable is aiFi?
column3: '>aiFi fits in your pocket, is lightweight, yet sturdy. It comes with a soft case that fits adaptor and optional cables if you want to travel with it.

column1: Does it have an internal battery?
column3: '>Yes, aiFi has an internal battery that recharges when plugged in. It lasts about 8 hours, and it takes three hours to recharge.

column1:
6. WHY BLUETOOTH?
In the past, Bluetooth was not optimized for audio and still holds some bad credit because of this history. But a lot of things have improved over the years. aptX™ audio decoding designed for better than full resolution CD quality streaming to bring out the best sound in your digital music.
aiFi’s Bluetooth solution is compatible with iOS, OSX, Android, and Windows.

7. PRODUCT FINISH 
Does aiFi come in any finish variants?

8. LOCKING SYSTEM
What are the two “lugs” with holes in them on the backside?
column3: '>These are the dual Kensington compatible locks to facilitate locking several units together either with security wires or with future custom-made attachments for various applications.

column1: Being involved in a great number of product developments over the years, the idea of modularity has always intrigued Fredrik Gunnarsson, the Sound Wizard behind aiFi. Several of his modular product concepts have been implemented in various products over the years.

After working in Asia for some time, the idea of aiFi matured. When moving back to Karlstad in Värmland, Sweden, it was natural to team up with Victor Isaksen. Victor has a great network all over the world in general and in Värmland in particular, which strengthened the team dramatically, making it possible to manage and carry out product development in Värmland.
It was Victor’s and Fredrik’s combined strengths that made them form a brand around this intelligent product concept.

“Victor called me just minutes after we parted from the meeting where we decided to move on with a brand. Enthusiastically he suggested the brand name aiFi, and I just immediately felt, ‘This is it!’” says Fredrik.

Analog Devices
Yamaha
Karlstad University
Assorted Nuts Animation Studios
Lasertech LSH
Autotech
Digital Mechanics
Harry Holms

With its revolutionary technology, aiFi® introduces a new way of listening to music. Thanks to its smart stackability, you can stack virtually any number of aiFi speakers together and they will transform into one larger speaker with pristine sound – without cables or any cumbersome settings. No matter how many units you stack, you will immidiately notice the difference in sound quality and loudness.
The aiFi speaker is rough and tough to go with you on the road but still looks good in your living room with its award winning design. Build your own Wall of Sound, alone or together with others.
aiFi®, Artificial Intelligence Fidelity, is the first truly intelligent modular sound system. Stack the units together and build in any configuration you can imagine – with no given limitation.

Using their intelligence, the units calculate and decide how to best shape the total sound for you. One single unit is enough to fill your room with excellent sound that gets even better the more you stack.

As aiFi offers true modularity and scalable sound, the product does the job all the way from the bedside table to the party . It also works perfectly as a speaker for your multi-room solution. Three stacked units easily make a soundbar for your TV using the digital optical input. And a six-stack is way enough for a party in your patio.

Each unit is tuned to handle the deepest bass possible, with balanced and smooth mid- and high-frequency performance. One aiFi can definitely deliver firm punchy bass that is beyond what you would think was physically possible, but when you stack multiple units together – that is when the magic begins.

The surface of the speakers collectively adds up and pushes the actual bass performance deeper and deeper the larger stack you make. Stack them either sideways or on top of each other, and the result will give you not only louder sound – the overall sound quality also gets much better.
There are no cables, no settings, just stack them and experience the magic""

The shape of each aiFi unit makes it easy to stack. Already 20 units make a full circle that is approximately 1.2 meters in diameter. This curved shape of each unit makes it easy to build a stable stack of a great number of units. On the top of the unit there are two grooves that make the rubber feet on the bottom fit securely. On each side of the unit is the placeholder for our aiFi Coin. This coin is what enables the units to hook together sidewise with its unique magnetic system.
Three aiFi speakers seen from top""

We provide the aiFi App that acts as a remote control of your stack and can make all the settings that you can do on the touch pannel on the back of the speaker by using your smart phone. It also provides additional features. One of these features are the mood light function of your stack – it can be set to any color.

At a click of a button the app enables you to instantly share the playback with your friends. Stack your aiFis together without any hustle sharing cables or messing around with Bluetooth pairing. This is really a social way of enjoying sound.

The modular sound system communicates using near field IR technology to transfer sound and the needed communication wirelessly between the aiFis at the speed of light. This ensures that the signal is distributed between the units without any losses and with high data integrity.

The approach of using many small speakers together makes the total performance raptor fast following every nuance of the music you are listening to or movie you are watching. This is quality you only find in true high-grade speaker systems like electrostatic loudspeakers. The aiFi Sound Dimension™ technology ensures perfect balance of the tonal, dynamic and spatial dimensions of sound. This gives you an incredible room-filling experience.
The Dimensions of Sound Reproduced by Sound Dimension™ Technology""

With our professional background we surely do not go cheap on the analog line in function. There is a high-grade input stage that can handle any source with ease. Using that together with top-of-the-line ADC converters and a 192kHz/24bit digital sound processor, nothing gets in the way of the performance you are enjoying.

The input is also an optical SPDIF input that accepts PCM signals up to 96kHz/24bit. This is primarily to enable TVs that do not have any other sound output. But it also enables the aiFi speaker to double as a high-grade DAC to optimize the performance of your desktop sound.

To the right on the back, there are three touch sense control areas. From top down there is the power button that takes the unit into operational mode when pushed for 3 seconds. Next is the middle button that puts the speaker in BT pairing mode when you want to pair with a new phone. At the bottom is the line/BT select function. Sliding your finger from bottom to top increases volume, sliding from top to bottom decreases volume.

Housing: AluminumDimensions: 184W x 65D x 64H (63H added for any stacked unit) mm.Speaker Drivers: 15W 48 mm long throw custom-made.Battery: Rechargeable Li-Ion cell.Input: Pro grade analog Line in combined SPDIF optical input up to 96kHz/24bit. Bluetooth apt-X enabled.Charger: 12V 1,5A DC 100-240 AC power adapter.Security: Dual Kensington locks.
1. PURCHASING & SHIPPING Where do you ship to?We use major courier companies and we will ship anywhere they deliver.
Is there a warranty for the aiFi?Yes, aiFi comes with a one-year replacement warranty.
2. IN THE BOXThe aiFi speaker will arrive packaged with the following:

Speaker units: One aiFi speakerAdapter cable: 3.5mm plug to 2x RCA female adapter. Case: Protective soft case for your aiFi and the included power adapter plus cables.Power Adapter: Power supply with exchangeable power adapter plugs for US, Europe, UK

3. COMPATIBILITYWhat kind of device do I need to stream my music?Any device that has Bluetooth, including your smart phone, tablet, laptop or PC. For best sound quality use a device with apt-X enabled.

What kind of digital music sources can I play?aiFi can play any music you can access and listen to with your device. That means any online streaming sites or Internet radio (rdio, Youtube, Spotify, iTunes Radio, TuneIn, etc.), and any format of music stored on your device, on your home network, NAS server, or in the cloud.

What kind of wired analog sources can I use with aiFi?A built-in analog input will accept a 2.5V RMS analog signal, allowing you to plug in any analog sound source using a standard 3.5mm audio connector.
What kind of wired digital sources can I use with aiFi?The optical digital input is perfect for a home theater system, AppleTV, Roku or cable box, or the sound bar output on your TV.

4. STREAMING MUSIC TO AIFIHow easy is it to connect my device and start playing music?Very.  Simply power up your aiFi and pair your device by turning Bluetooth on and selecting “aiFi-Sam” in the menu. You only need to pair the device once
column2: it will remain stored in its memory for future use.

column1: How close does my device need to be to the aiFi?Within 10 meters.

Can I pair multiple devices to my aiFi?Yes, aiFi can pair multiple devices and the information will stay stored in your device for future listening.  However, aiFi can only be connected to and play from one source at a time.
5. PORTABILITYJust how portable is aiFi?aiFi fits in your pocket, is lightweight, yet sturdy. It comes with a soft case that fits adaptor and optional cables if you want to travel with it.
Does it have an internal battery?Yes, aiFi has an internal battery that recharges when plugged in. It lasts about 8 hours, and it takes three hours to recharge.

6. WHY BLUETOOTH?In the past, Bluetooth was not optimized for audio and still holds some bad credit because of this history. But a lot of things have improved over the years. aptX™ audio decoding designed for better than full resolution CD quality streaming to bring out the best sound in your digital music.
aiFi’s Bluetooth solution is compatible with iOS, OSX, Android, and Windows.
7. PRODUCT FINISH Does aiFi come in any finish variants?The standard finish is brushed aluminum.

8. LOCKING SYSTEMWhat are the two “lugs” with holes in them on the backside?These are the dual Kensington compatible locks to facilitate locking several units together either with security wires or with future custom-made attachments for various applications.

After working in Asia for some time, the idea of aiFi matured. When moving back to Karlstad in Värmland, Sweden, it was natural to team up with Victor Isaksen. Victor has a great network all over the world in general and in Värmland in particular, which strengthened the team dramatically, making it possible to manage and carry out product development in Värmland.
It was Victor’s and Fredrik’s combined strengths that made them form a brand around this intelligent product concept.

“Victor called me just minutes after we parted from the meeting where we decided to move on with a brand. Enthusiastically he suggested the brand name aiFi, and I just immediately felt, ‘This is it!’” says Fredrik.

About Sharkk Team

Just like a record label represents artists, Sharkk proudly represents the most innovative technology that’ll change the very face of the music industry.

Our goal is to make our customers feel good about themselves by providing an unrivaled product experience through innovation, brand integrity, design, quality, and competitive price.

The Bravo Headphones are available for shipping worldwide. Please see the FAQ section for shipping costs.

<td>World’s first hybrid electrostatic headphones to make premium Hi-Fi audio both affordable &amp

The Bravo Headphones were developed utilizing hybrid electrostatic technology created by VeriSonix Corp. Electrostatic headphones are universally accepted as the best in the business, with only the most hardcore professionals using them - DJs, recording studios, and film executives. VeriSonix created a solution that removes the bulk of the amplifier while still preserving the quality of the sound. The team at VeriSonix tested various materials, resulting in the current version of the hybrid electrostatic technology. Working with VeriSonix, Sharkk has created a hybrid electrostatic headphone that produces beautiful sound in a sophisticated design.
The Bravo Headphones are available on Indiegogo starting at the super early bird price of $199.

column4: >What do we get when we order?

column1: Bravo by Sharkk branded packaging, Electrostatic Headphones, and one extra pair of ear cushions.

Our vision is to make our customers feel good about themselves by providing an unrivaled product experience through innovation, brand integrity, design, quality, and competitive pricing. Crowdfunding is the top channel to bring such technology to the masses and we look forward to having all of our fans test out these great headphones.
Beyond the breakthrough technology of hybrid electrostatic headphones, Bravos also feature Hi-Fi sound, powerful bass, comfortability and noise isolation, while remaining extremely lightweight.
One size, adjustable to fit anyone's ears.
Bravos are only 10.5 ounces, designed for a comfortable and effortless listening experience.

column2: >What is the uniqueness of the technology?

column1: Unlike electrodynamic (traditional headphones), Hybrid electrostatic technology combine the strengths of traditional cone drivers' powerful bass plus the electrostatic superior high-range sound.

All day, every day, we are bombarded by sound. Some sounds are desirable, but many are not because sound has no discretion. If it isn't what or who you want to hear, it is just noise - purely a distraction. Imagine if you could just focus on that slice of sound that you want to hear. With Stages, your ability to focus on what you want to hear, rather than fending off what you don't, just got a whole lot easier. 

 

Both the Hero and Sidekick contain Stages' patented technology to narrowly identify and capture desired incoming voices and sounds based on user preferences, virtually eliminating undesired ones in the process. Both products make it possible to keep your headphones/earbuds on while listening and talking. No more lip reading and no more removing devices.

 

Meant for mobile lifestyles, the Hero offers superior noise cancellation with wired or wireless capability. Audiophile-level sound quality with onboard low EMI Class H stereo amplifiers and integrated dual ultra-low power audio codecs. When combined with our audio array’s ambient+ and selective sound technology, it’s the last headphone you’ll need.

 

The Sidekick offers the same premium quality audio technology as the Hero and is meant for tabletop usage. It’s compatible with nearly all wired or wireless headphones/earbuds. Rechargeable and portable, the Sidekick is your ultimate office, coffee shop, and home companion.

 

 

   

​  ​   ​       ​
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

The center of our Audio Processing System is the Stages microphone array, which is responsible for processing all incoming sound. The array in both the Hero and Sidekick enhances your listening experience through selective sound admittance gating (when you hear) and ambient+ audio spatialization (the direction you choose to hear from). Our technology makes it possible to keep your headphones on while listening &
column4:
talking. No more lip reading and no more removing headphones/earbuds. Simply put, the Hero and Sidekick integrate with your lifestyle to remove isolation from immersive experiences.

 

From the moment we wake up, we’re faced with noise that impacts our ability to focus on what’s important at home, work - everywhere you go. Selective sound gives you the ability to specify precise admittance criteria (such as a keyword or specific speaker profile) that will allow incoming ambient sound in when these user-specified criteria are met. With selective sound, for the first time ever, you have the ability to control your soundscape to the fullest extent.

 

Provides users with the ability to specify the direction from which they want to hear ambient sound. Select which direction you want to hear from, for example your friend on a train while commuting, and then determine whether the beam will adjust with device movement.

 

The key to understanding how our technology works is focusing on how ambient sound is captured by our microphone array and then, through a series of steps, is processed and tracked based on user set criteria. The end result? We are able to track ambient sound at a full 360 degrees so you can customize direction and admittance criteria all while listening to your favorite music.

 

Featuring hybrid noise cancellation technology, four microphones capture unwanted noise and then produce an inverted phase of identical sound to cancel both of them out. The Hero's circumaural design, when combined with our noise cancellation processor, blocks 99.5% of ambient noise for a quiet listening experience at home, work, school, airport - wherever you go.

column1: • Onboard low EMI Class H stereo amplifiers
• 99 dB/102 dB dynamic range stereo ADC and DAC

We've developed the ultimate partner for the Hero and Sidekick: an intuitive, dynamic app that gives you superhero-like power over sound. After completing the guided setup, you'll have access to ambient+ and selective sound controls. When combined with our integrated user communication platform, this app is without a doubt home screen worthy.  

 

We tested our products with one of the toughest tech crowds our there: CES attendees. Here are their reactions!
We need your help to spread the word about the Hero and Sidekick! Share below and tag friends who deserve to #listenbetter!
Hear what John C. of Boston, MA has to say about his experience using the Hero and Sidekick!

With Stages, your ability to focus on what you want to hear, rather than fending off what you don't, just got a whole lot easier.  Both the Hero and Sidekick contain Stages' patented technology to narrowly identify and capture desired incoming voices and sounds based on user preferences, virtually eliminating undesired ones in the process. Both products make it possible to keep your headphones/earbuds on while listening and talking. No more lip reading and no more removing devices. Meant for mobile lifestyles, the Hero offers superior noise cancellation with wired or wireless capability. Audiophile-level sound quality with onboard low EMI Class H stereo amplifiers and integrated dual ultra-low power audio codecs. When combined with our audio array’s ambient+ and selective sound technology, it’s the last headphone you’ll need. The Sidekick offers the same premium quality audio technology as the Hero and is meant for tabletop usage. It’s compatible with nearly all wired or wireless headphones/earbuds. Rechargeable and portable, the Sidekick is your ultimate office, coffee shop, and home companion.     ​  ​   ​       ​                            The center of our Audio Processing System is the Stages microphone array, which is responsible for processing all incoming sound. The array in both the Hero and Sidekick enhances your listening experience through selective sound admittance gating (when you hear) and ambient+ audio spatialization (the direction you choose to hear from). Our technology makes it possible to keep your headphones on while listening & talking. No more lip reading and no more removing headphones/earbuds. Simply put, the Hero and Sidekick integrate with your lifestyle to remove isolation from immersive experiences. From the moment we wake up, we’re faced with noise that impacts our ability to focus on what’s important at home, work - everywhere you go. Selective sound gives you the ability to specify precise admittance criteria (such as a keyword or specific speaker profile) that will allow incoming ambient sound in when these user-specified criteria are met. With selective sound, for the first time ever, you have the ability to control your soundscape to the fullest extent. Provides users with the ability to specify the direction from which they want to hear ambient sound. Select which direction you want to hear from, for example your friend on a train while commuting, and then determine whether the beam will adjust with device movement. The key to understanding how our technology works is focusing on how ambient sound is captured by our microphone array and then, through a series of steps, is processed and tracked based on user set criteria. The end result? We are able to track ambient sound at a full 360 degrees so you can customize direction and admittance criteria all while listening to your favorite music. Featuring hybrid noise cancellation technology, four microphones capture unwanted noise and then produce an inverted phase of identical sound to cancel both of them out. The Hero's circumaural design, when combined with our noise cancellation processor, blocks 99.5% of ambient noise for a quiet listening experience at home, work, school, airport - wherever you go.
Onboard low EMI Class H stereo amplifiers
Integrated dual ultra-low power audio codecs
Dynamic range control and digital filtering
99 dB/102 dB dynamic range stereo ADC and DAC

We've developed the ultimate partner for the Hero and Sidekick: an intuitive, dynamic app that gives you superhero-like power over sound. After completing the guided setup, you'll have access to ambient+ and selective sound controls. When combined with our integrated user communication platform, this app is without a doubt home screen worthy.   We tested our products with one of the toughest tech crowds our there: CES attendees. Here are their reactions!
We need your help to spread the word about the Hero and Sidekick! Share below and tag friends who deserve to #listenbetter!
Hear what John C. of Boston, MA has to say about his experience using the Hero and Sidekick!",69.0,7,"1 Campaign
Inferno Music Presents the ATD Drum key
Long have us drummers awaited the arrival of a drum key that is both classy and practical, and that's why Inferno is proud to present The Anti Thirst Device.

• It's taken 3 years to perfect, but Tim Davy and the Team at Inferno have developed what they believe to be the worlds best drum key. The ATD Drum key is not only strong and practical, but also classy.
• Although it's already turning heads we need your help to get the Drum key off the ground.

• Operating for 8 years, as a independently owned business. Getting new products to market has it's challenges so we deiced to crowdfund the project and handsomely reward everyone who wants to support us with a great offer :)
• Read below for more details, or simply watch the video.
• Buy 3 keys, and get 20% plus get a free 3pk of Inferno Drumsticks
• Buy 10+ keys, and get 30% plus a brick of Inferno Drumsticks
• If your feeling generous feel free to donate and we will give you a digital high 5. Plus next time your on the Northern Beaches of Sydney hit Tim up for a 1 on 1 surf session!
• We would love to reach our target of 250 orders or 10K. If we do, then the funds will go toward production.

• If we don't reach our target we will go to production anyway!  However if we are under 25% or $2500 then there may be a small chance we can't make it happen :( If that's the case then you will have the option for a full refund, or an extended waiting time.
• Once the campaign is over we will need 2-3 months to manufacture and deliver the goods. I appreciate it's not super quick, so we thank you for the support and patience in advance.
• The development phase is over so no funding is needed for that :)
• Marketing collateral is done, and we are working with artists direct to help with the keys presence.
Here's the breakdown of why we think it's the worlds best drumkey:

• Milled with indestructible SU316 Stainless Steel, the loch ness of bottle openers is a CNC manufactured product. Stacked with more features than most drum keys on the market you will enjoy the following:
• Gear shaping to enhance the keys torque and eliminate any handle slippage.
• Enforced ball clip key ring that is both strong and practical for removal
Inferno has a solid track record in customer satisfaction.
The only risks here are that you may end up drinking and drumming to much :)
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
• We would love for you to share the campaign and help us get the word out to the drumming community about this unique product.
• You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

Kenwood's smart headset, integrates two of the world's most recognizable virtual assistant platforms. The WSA-1, features Amazon Alexa, while the WS-A1G is optimized for Google Assistant. These new headsets employ your mobile device's web connection, enabling continuous, hands free access to these cloud-based virtual-assistants. Whether home, or on the go, your assistant is always available.

The headset is equipped with three separate microphones that feature Kenwood's proprietary voice algorithm detection. This feature increases the device’s ability to accurately transmit the user’s normal speaking voice, even in noisy environments. This eliminates user stress by allowing the user the ability to simply communicate normally and still be easily identified by both the virtual assistant and callers. 

The headsets incorporate a touch sensitive side panel that controls volume, tracking, and features like active noise canceling, which eliminates ambient noise, to better experience music, videos, and calls.

Wearing a smart headset device all day, requires comfort, so the design of the earpiece was really important to our Kenwood creation team when designing the shape of the WSA1 earpiece. The soft ""ear pillow"" structure is uniquely shaped to promote comfort, but more importantly to provide a gentle, natural feeling surface connection with the user's ear. The double layered silicone structure provides the perfect balance of softness, but still firm enough to provide both stability, and long time wearing comfort.

WS-A1 makes this idea reality. This new smart headset makes having an anytime, anywhere, voice activated assistant possible while delivering these high tech features..

*The high performance microphone filters ambient noise through Kenwood's active cancelling technology, delivering crystal clear voice transmission for the user.

* This comfortable, ergonomic design promotes extended use and eliminates common ear fatigue users’ experience with other headsets.

* The ""Voice Focus Assist"" function promotes the virtual assistant's ability to clearly identify the user's voice. This allows your assistant increased focus and a clearer understanding of user commands in noisy environments.

In my daily life, my headphones, and smartphone are always with me. I enjoy having instant access to the latest news and weather. I use my device to message friends and family, manage calls, and schedule appointments. I record notes,and reminders throughout my day, and I always have my favorite music playing in the background. My handheld device has become an important part of almost everything I do. What could be better? I began to think how nice it would be to have my very own personal assistant, to do  these things for me, without ever having to reach for my handheld device! A virtual assistant that's accessible at home or away that would speak to me, help me on the go.

The Kenwood WSA1 smart headset allows complete hands free access to your mobile device, through use of a virtual assistant, without ever having to physically access your smart phone. Having our smart mic, and embedded active noise filtering technology features on board, means your voice will be clearly transmitted, and  easily identifiable to both callers, and your virtual assistant. 

Smart headsets like the WSA1, integrate cloud based assistant platforms that can be accessed at home or away to play your favorite music, provide you with important information, deliver news and sports scores, help with daily tasks, look up a recipe, and even control your smart home devices! These many uses and features are not possible with typical headsets, and the possibilities are endless.

A smart headset isn't just a voice-assistant-enabled device, it's a tool to enrich your life. Having a live voice-controlled assistant with you all the time to aid in daily tasks saves you time, increases efficiency, and allows you increased focus to do more. 

・How it started

At the outset, we knew the design we envisioned would be challenging to achieve. We didn’t know for certain whether we could incorporate the desired features and functionality in a compact, comfortable design. However, by carefully making minute adjustments  in 0.1 mm increments, we accomplished what we set out to do. The result is a sleek and attractive design that’s comfortable to wear and provides a satisfying tactile experience, from holding the charging case to taking the earphone out of the case and putting it on the ear.

・Perfecting the fit

To avoid discomfort even when worn for a long period of time,  attention was paid not only to the shape of the human ear canal, but also to the shape of the ear concha. Individuals’ ears were observed and analyzed using an ear-shaped mock. Finally, 53 different shaped mock products were made, and 86 out of 87 people who participated in the mounting questionnaire trial found that the fit was good.

・Superior voice input

The development of the smart microphone system was triggered by a frustrating experience with existing earphones that were unable to understand spoken words as expected in the crowded streets with normal levels of background sounds. By careful application of past research combined with newly developed technologies we were able to design a microphone system that provides superior voice recognition.

About KENWOOD Brand

JVCKENWOOD Corporation is a leading developer and manufacturer of consumer electronics and communications equipment. Founded in the United States in 1961, JVCKENWOOD USA is the largest sales subsidiary of JVCKENWOOD Corporation of Japan and is recognized by consumers and industry professionals for providing products known for quality, performance, and value.

JVCKENWOOD USA has a reputation for bringing important new products to the consumer electronics market. The company built the first audio/video amplifier for home theater back in 1981. JVCKENWOOD also created the first anti-theft car cassette deck that could be slid out of the dash
column2: the first with an automatic broadcast sensor system and automatic noise reduction
column4:
and the first polypropylene speaker cones. Over the years, JVCKENWOOD engineers have invented dozens of new technologies later copied by others.

We are expanding our modular headphone system with a HD wireless solution.
 

H05 is the first major update for the TMA-2 Modular Headphone System: A smart, wireless headband with an integrated Bluetooth module.

The headband was inspired by suggestions from our users. The TMA-2 modular system enables us to listen and react to their feedback, so that our product can last, even as our customers’ tastes change and develop to include new technologies.

Importantly, this headband means any TMA-2 configuration can be wireless for new users, and existing users can upgrade to wireless while keeping their original sound preferences.

We hope that our friends, both old and new, will back this project to help us make the TMA-2 wireless into a reality.

column2: >

column1: TMA-2 is the world’s most extensive modular headphone system – with more than 1000 possible configurations. This modularity means you can create your own unique, personalized AIAIAI product that fits your specific needs, while enabling a quick and easy change of individual parts along the way.
For music professionals, this means the opportunity to adapt and tailor the system to a creative context
column2: from studio production and audio editing to DJing or listening on the move.

column1: For everyone else, it means the subtle dissolution of categories
column2: a headphone that fits your own lifestyle and music taste. Life is rarely static, so TMA-2 is suitable for use whether you’re at home, in the office or on the go. The range of parts let you find the configuration that’s right for you, and alter that configuration easily when you feel like it.

column1: We are now developing the first major upgrade to the TMA-2 Modular Headphone System – a smart headband that adds new functionalities. The first is an integrated Bluetooth module, meaning the headphones can go wireless.
By integrating the wireless functionality into the headband only, we enable any configuration of the TMA-2 to be wireless, and thereby retain full modularity in the system.
This gives new users the full freedom to choose, while allowing existing customers to take their TMA-2 headphones wireless simply by upgrading the headband.

Christian B. Lorentzen, Head of New Product Development, AIAIA:
 
""At first, we explored whether creating a new speaker unit could be a way to introduce wireless technology to the system. But that felt wrong somehow, as it would be limiting to have only a few wireless sound configurations. That’s why we came up with this idea of integrating the bluetooth module into the headband, to maintain that 100% modularity.”
The H05 headband works simply when you plug it into any TMA-2 speaker unit, enabling high quality Bluetooth audio transmission.
The headband has the following controls: Play, Pause, Skip, Volume, and Answer Call.
Any cable from the TMA-2 Modular Headphone System can be inserted into the speaker unit for cabled audio, bypassing the Bluetooth in the H05 headband when required - e.g. if battery is dead.
<div>Our long-standing design partner Kilo is the industrial design studio behind the TMA-2 and the H05 project. Lars Larsen, Founder &amp
column2: Head of Design at Kilo, explains the design direction of the H05:

column1: “The H05 smart headband is designed to bridge performance and aesthetics in a simple, integrated design language. On one hand, echoing the original DNA of the existing collection, and yet still introducing a new, individual and strong character to the TMA-2 family.""
A central part of the system’s modularity is the enhanced opportunity for us to be continuously developing new parts.

This is especially important for us as a small company. It means we can make our development more specific, more incremental, and financially easier at the same time. Reacting to input and feedback from our customers at a completely different level and pace than with conventional headphone design. We have a fantastic network of professional partners and a very engaging user group, so our ability to interact and respond to them is invaluable to our development.

The modularity also means that users can buy into the system without having to displace and replace complete fully functional products. Obsolescence is wasteful: If our customers decide they want to try a different configuration, or if we release a new part, it’s easy to upgrade to the desired configuration without having to spend money on a whole new headphone. The result is less investment from the consumer, and much less waste for the environment.

The H05 headband is a great example of this in action. The modular system has made it possible for us to listen to our customers and go on to further develop the TMA-2 to reflect their input with a simple upgrade.

Frederik Jorgensen, Co-Founder, AIAIAI:
 
“The Modular system creates the ultimate flexibility for our business and our customers as well as a more creative way of interacting with our products. This adaptable, versatile approach to our headphones offers radical new opportunities for future product development, enabling us to expand the system to create better options for our users.""

AIAIAI is a Danish audio design company based in Copenhagen. We are dedicated to developing high quality audio products for our users, and we’re proud to contribute to Denmark’s worldwide reputation as a leader in acoustic and electro-acoustic design and engineering.

We have an expansive network of audio technicians and DJs as part of our unique and highly collaborative development process, but most importantly, we work closely with Danish design studio Kilo. Founded and headed by Lars Larsen, Kilo is an award-winning, idea-driven industrial design studio positioned among Scandinavia’s most influential design companies. Kilo has been our design partner since 2006, when we founded our companies in neighboring offices.
We might not share an office any more, but we still build upon a set of shared values, aesthetics and design thinking, making our ongoing relationship very intuitive. We know how to work together
column2: the expertise of both entities, our joint and thorough ideation processes and our well-tested manufacturing know-how make us confident in our collaborations and their arrival at a great outcome

column1: We offer free international shipping, but EU customers please note there is a “shipping charge” added. This is because we are a Danish company and are required to charge VAT by the EU VAT system. But as VAT will also be applied on the final EU retail price (resulting in a higher price level), EU customers are still getting the discount listed in the Rewards - the same discount for all backers worldwide.

Duty/VAT charges: Our headphones will be shipped from Denmark, so please note that you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. Unfortunately we can't display all possible Duty/VAT terms for international shipping, so we recommend you check with your local customs to learn more about the procedure in your country. And we will of course try to help as much as we can.

column3: Motivational podcasts as well as Audios and Endless Music Hours during our every day activity… brought us to look for the most perfectly designed, simple and functional Earbuds…

column2: >And we have finally achieved everything in one pair of perfect Earbuds.
>Meet ATTO X - World's Most Professional Wireless Earbuds.
>She uses on a daily basis and sent us this thank you video to be shared with everyone!

column1: We have decided to put our efforts where it counts.
Leaving things for luck isn’t our way of doing things, thus we have approached you – earbuds users and asked for the most Important elements when it comes to earbuds…
One of the most annoying tasks is keeping our digital assets charged and ready for action...

So we have decided you deserve more and created 10 hours play time earbuds with additional 100 Hours Play Time withing its case so that it will allow average usage of 3.3 Hours a day for an entire Month!!!
Your number 2 is:  Have the ability to perform a decent conversation or listening to music while in loud place.
Well just for that we've designed our earbuds to have both active and passive  noise cancellation, so you could hear exactly what you want.
We need it comfortable to hang out with...

And you are right, and that's how we made ATTO X, we've tested them for months now and used it in so many opportunities for both long and extreme situations. ATTO X stayed put and in  many cases we nearly forgot they are on...
Isn't this why earphones are all about? a great sound?

Well turns out many earbuds fail to deliver, while the ATTO X succeed. We don't just get our ears exploding of fun with those earbuds, we can't find a better experience for either, Music, Conversation of podcasts. The Sound makes us not leaving the house with them, and in many cases even indoors :)
Well, yes surprise surprise. many users tend to agree on this one too, if your earbuds gets wet it's better it'll keep functioning.

And so we did, IPX-6 waterproof will allow you go for a run in the rain, shower or even accidentally drop the earbuds in water, yet ATTO X will keep functioning in full, allowing you to keep your worries for things that matter most, like the taste of your coffee or that extra mile you're after.
Now focusing the above elements, the road map was set and we embraced the challenge of hitting target on each and every one them!

Power! or if you more like it Juice!
And since we all have so many devices with so many socket types we came up with this amazing 3 in 1 Magnetic USB cable set.

1 high quality cable for all your devices, simply attach the adapters to your devices and move the cable from one device to another, the magnet will do its magic and easily attach to each one to charge your device.
