Making video, Do you want to complete it more effectively?

Recently we can easily become a solo creator with the high quality smartphone or camera, Anybody can make a video and broadcast the video contents without the high price equipment but the device that captures the sound is still uncomfortable

In particular, one-person media producers who shoot, talk, and move themselves need a shotgun-type microphone capable of receiving the desired direction, but the existing shotgun microphones were only facing the subject and were unable to capture sound from the rear.

 

What is the shotgun microphone?

This is a front-facing microphone, which is a basic microphone for cameras, camcorders, and smartphones, and is useful for recording conversations in the front of camera

 

In such a shooting situation, seeing an photographer installing two microphones or turning the microphone direction uncomfortably while shooting, We considered B6 which can freely change the direction of capturing sound
column2: >B6 which is shotgun microphone
column3:
>that has 3 microphones inside

 

B6 can capture sound from any direction you want, as shown below.
 

1. Capturing the sound of the subject in the forward direction

 

2. Capturing my voice in the backward direction

 

3. Hidden microphone that captures the sound of all spaces

 

4. Essential ASMR mode these days

 

 

Explain once again

B6 shotgun microphone, which are mounted on devices that can input external microphones such as smartphones, DSLRs, cameras, camcorders, etc., have three microphones arranged in the front, center, and rear, and are converted into switches to suit various shooting situations and purposes. no need to turn or remove and reinsert it while shooting.
column8: >First of all! Let's see the difference

column1: Do you have dreams of becoming a Youtuber, TikToker or Social media influencer but don’t know how to start? Besides your camera, we’d like to suggest that you begin with the ultra versatile Balsang B6 microphone.

The sound quality of video is very important, but the existing microphones in the professional market are expensive, and you may have to purchase several different kinds of microphones for the various types of videos you want to shoot. Maybe your budget is limited. 

 

     B6 consists of 3 microphones. Two directional microphones – one in front, one back side, and also one internal omni-directional microphone. These microphones, when combined, allow the B6 to offer 5 different capturing modes.

     Using a smartphone is the new trend in making videos because smartphone cameras are high quality, and the creator can apply various filter effect with applications.

     However, the microphone in smartphones aren’t as good, and it is impossible to change the direction. If you want better sound, you should use additional microphone.

 Balsang B6 is a great add-on microphone. Capture sound using 5 different modes, between which you can switch in the middle of shooting. Save time editing sound after shooting.

 

Case 1. Forward mode

     Ex>
column2:
This function is the same as an ordinary shotgun microphone

Case 2. Backward mode 

     Ex>
column3:
Captures your voice when you’re behind the camera 

Case 3. Bi-directional mode

     Ex>
column4:
Captures the conversation between reporter and speaker

Case 4. ASMR mode

     Ex>
column5:
Captures narrow area sound while cutting out wide area sound

Case 5. 360 degree mode

     Ex>
column6:
Useful for online group conferences

 

 

How to select mode

* ANC : Ambient noise cancellation

* ASMR : Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response

 

Separate audio to left &
column7:
right channels 

     You can separate front and rear sound as left and right channels with a 3-pole cable, or you can mix with a 4-pole cable. This makes sound editing easier because voice volume is different from person to person. 

Voice can be focused

     The ANC function significantly reduces ambient sound, allowing you to capture a clear voice

 

ASMR(Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response)

     Capture microscopic sounds with this highly sensitive microphone.

column1:
Compact size, Easy to carry

     No battery required 

 

Easy to install on smartphone or camera
• The bottom has a hot-shoe with ¼ inch screw hole. Both are commonly used in the world market
• The top has a cold-shoe for installing a compact light or wireless audio transmitter.
• You can install on top the “Balsang BSM200” or “Rode wireless Go”, transforming the wired B6 shotgun microphone into a wireless mic.
• The B6 has a radio frequency noise reducer.
• Balsang BSM200 is a 2 channel wireless microphone.
Includes wind shields and a shock-mount on the bottom
• The Shock-mount reduces the noise that comes from the bottom like foot-steps

column7: >But the sound is clear
column8: >If there is a distance between the camera's shooting location and the subject, you can freely change the location of the microphone by extending it with an extension cable (3m) provided
column9:
>The story of development

 

This is the story why Balsang who are a creative company in Korea want to make B6

In the spring of 2019, We found out the steadily growing number of solo creators will find that the first thing they need is a microphone, but there is no suitable microphone.

Because the existing professional microphones are too expensive so we decided to make BSM200 that is 2 channels wireless microphone

 

Check the possibilities of the microphone through crowd funding in Korea!

At that time, there was a moment to give up due to insufficient capital and uncertainty about sales, but after that, by successfully completing the Korean crowd funding twice in October 2019 and February 2020, We could finally launch the wireless microphone BSM200. 

 

Since then, the number of users of the BSM200 has begun to increase steadily, and the Idea Corporation will communicate closely with actual users to confirm the needs of the shotgun-type microphone used with the wireless microphone.

However, since most of the shotgun microphones on the market are not compatible with wireless microphones and generate noise, We decided to develop a shotgun microphone ourselves.

 

 

Present status for massive production

As you can see below pictures, We are fully ready to produce B6 and can manage the defective rate lesser than 0.5% with high-level inspection system

 

Perks

You can select color Black or White with Single or Double pack 

 

 

What's in the box 

 

Using audio adapter for smartphone

     Basically B6 can be compatible to any kind of smartphone but when the phone doesn’t have an 3.5mm headphone jack You have to have the converting adapter as below

Please click below image when you want to see where you can buy the adapter

Audio kits only work while you are wearing your helmet..so they are useless when the helmet comes off.
• Dealing with a fiddly interface (or no interface at all) to control your music is awful.
• You can't wear your everyday headphones with your helmet and that`s even worse.
Simply dock the headphones into the helmet when you need protection, and click them out when you just want audio.
Docking the headphones: Our patented docking system secures the headphones inside the helmet using four anchor points. They’re not going anywhere while you are shredding.
And when you are done, a quick release tab will detach the headphones.
One button pairing: Hold down the button and it’s done! No apps, no wires, no hassle.
Specially Designed Interface: This is a big deal since you obviously can’t look at the headphones while using them, and if you’re on the mountain, gloves make buttons a nightmare.
SOUNDSHIELD has you covered - even with your thickest mittens, our single button control and volume dial make music mastery a breeze.
Rotate the dial to change volume, crank it up or take down with ease.
Take calls with a tap of the button, no need to take your phone out. A built in mic will do the rest for you.
One tap of the button pauses your music so you can talk to your friends. Be it the chairlift or just a quiet moment, pausing is quick and easy.
With waterproof headphones rated IPX-4  you can con chest deep in pow without a worry in the world
Detachable headphones mean you don’t leave your music  behind when you take off your helmet.

Shortly after pledging you’ll be prompted to choose the color scheme for your SOUNDSHIELD. We’d love to offer our backers every color scheme we have tried out, sadly the cost for that is too high, so we must start small. These are the options available for now.  We will add new ones as we move forward.

We went ALL IN with sound quality: 40 mm speakers backed up with hand picked electrical components to deliver uncompromised quality. You’ll get crisp highs and deep lows. Wirelessly. For  16 hours straight between charges.

The SOUNDSHIELD Helmet was designed to comply with the 3 major Safety Certifications:  ASTM 2040, EN1077 and EN 1078. That makes it legally usable for snow and action sports in USA, Canada and Europe. We will go through certification once we have the first full scale manufacturing sample.
The SOUNDSHIELD Helmet has a built in ventilation system with 2 low profile air inlets and 6 outlets.  Cool air is pushed in as you move forward, keeping your head cool.

As a fully rider owned and operated startup, we are a combination of people devoted to creating awesome products for awesome lifestyles. We got together as a team 18 months ago to apply our design background to our riding experience and create an unusual blend of innovative products: The SOUNDSHIELD is the first one.

THIS IS US:

 

 Juan Garcia Mansilla - Founder / CEO

Juan is an Industrial Designer and Entrepreneur. When he’s not on the slopes he is designing innovative real-world products for work and crazy concepts for fun. Up here we see him hauling filming equipment up top for the Campaign video shoot. Yep, that is real sweat right there.

Javier is an Industrial Designer with more than 15 years of experience in the field of Product Design and an avid Skater as well. He has extensive experience in bringing products to market. There he is, soaking up some California sun.

Francisco’s  keen eye for business and passion for building brands has ultimately led him into UNIT 1, where he is responsible for everything that transpires on the business side of things.  He has an International Business degree and an MBA in from IAE + London Business School. He has run a company-wide Product Launch Division at GSK for the past five years. So don’t be fooled for that photo chilling on the beach..this guy means business.
John  Buckley - Online Marketing Specialist
Marcos Mavric - Team Rider
Marko Magister - Visual Production
Sebastian Vereertbrugghen - Visual Production
For over 18 months the team worked hard on SOUNDSHIELD, building an awesome experience from the ground up. Here's what we've been up to this far (and what's ahead):

We created SOUNDSHIELD from scratch. All we started with was an experience begging to be improved. We ended up redifining it completely. After countless sketches, 3D prints, product iterations and prototypes, SOUNDSHIELD is finally here.
These images depict the ‘behind the scenes’ aspect of this process:
We've come a long way with SOUNDSHIELD. We have the necessary expertise in product design &
And that's where you come in:  we need your help to move forward and make the jump to mass production.

We are aware there will be risks and challenges along the way. But we are confident our amazing  team will overcome them to ensure our backers get their SOUNDSHIELD. We will keep you guys updated every step of the way, once you back this project you become a part of this family. This truly means a lot to us. So buckle up, this is happening!
If you pledge now, you’ll get the SOUNDSHIELD combo with all this in it: Helmet, Headphones, Removable goggle clip, 2 sets of inner pads (thick &
column2: thin), Ear pads (if you want to shred without headphones), Charging cable, Back up jack, Decals &amp

Please contact support@unit1gear.com with any questions or requests.

 

General
Q: Can I use the helmet without the headphones?
A: Sure you can. You even have a set of ear pads to cover the holes on the side in case you get chilly. Or you can leave them uncovered too, if you want.

Q: Are SOUNDSHIELD Headphones On-Ear of Over-Ear?
A: Our headphones are On-Ear but they’re pretty big and will cover your ear entirely.

A: Right now we are starting out with 3 color schemes (Original, Snow Patrol and Boreal). But we will add more  as we move forward! So stay tuned!

 

Q: Can I change my color scheme once I made my order?

A: Once a perk is claimed and the payment done, the order is final. Please take the time to choose your color scheme well!

 

Q: What are the helmet sizes?

A: SOUNDSHIELD comes in 3 sizes: XS-S, M-L, and XL-XXL. But on top of that you’ll have 2 sets of inner pads for the helmet. It includes 5 individual pads you can customize to achieve a perfect fit. Please use our sizing chart to determine your size correctly.

 

Q: How does the customizable fit work?

A: Each SOUNDSHIELD has 5 inner pads. But it comes with an extra set of thicker pads. You can create your own custom fit by mixing pads from both sets. For reference, an M-L Size with thin pads would be closer to a L, but with thick pads, closer to a M.

 

Q: Can I wear a beanie and goggles under the helmet?
A: Totally, just remove the pads so you don’t add unnecessary bulkiness and you’re all set.
Q: I am a journalist, who do I contact for more information?
A: Yeah it is. We designed it comply with ASTM 2040, EN1077 and EN 1078. It has a 3 mm thick ABS shell and a 15-35 mm thick EPP Liner..that’s a lot of protection, we got you covered.

A: Action sports and music play well together. There's nothing like the right tune to shred some powder or hit the park. Most helmets today are audio kit compatible, but none of them have an interface that will let you pause or lower the volume as easily and as quickly. This means you'll be more accessible and less isolated. People that ride without helmets because they can't fit their everyday headphones in there, well, now they can. So we are for safety, not against :)
A: The headphones are designed to be IP-X4 sweat proof. They can take sweat and snow without problem. Just don’t use them under heavy rain..(and don’t take them for a swim)

A: We built them to last. They can take on your active lifestyle without problem.

 

Q:Does this meet helmet safety in Australia
A: We aim for the 3 major certifications worldwide. We won’t however, have Australian specific certifications.

","Audio kits only work while you are wearing your helmet..so they are useless when the helmet comes off.
Dealing with a fiddly interface (or no interface at all) to control your music is awful.
You can't wear your everyday headphones with your helmet and that`s even worse.
Simply dock the headphones into the helmet when you need protection, and click them out when you just want audio.
Docking the headphones: Our patented docking system secures the headphones inside the helmet using four anchor points. They’re not going anywhere while you are shredding.
And when you are done, a quick release tab will detach the headphones.
One button pairing: Hold down the button and it’s done! No apps, no wires, no hassle.
Specially Designed Interface: This is a big deal since you obviously can’t look at the headphones while using them, and if you’re on the mountain, gloves make buttons a nightmare.
SOUNDSHIELD has you covered - even with your thickest mittens, our single button control and volume dial make music mastery a breeze.
Rotate the dial to change volume, crank it up or take down with ease.
Take calls with a tap of the button, no need to take your phone out. A built in mic will do the rest for you.
One tap of the button pauses your music so you can talk to your friends. Be it the chairlift or just a quiet moment, pausing is quick and easy.
With waterproof headphones rated IPX-4  you can con chest deep in pow without a worry in the world
Detachable headphones mean you don’t leave your music  behind when you take off your helmet.

Shortly after pledging you’ll be prompted to choose the color scheme for your SOUNDSHIELD. We’d love to offer our backers every color scheme we have tried out, sadly the cost for that is too high, so we must start small. These are the options available for now.  We will add new ones as we move forward.

We went ALL IN with sound quality: 40 mm speakers backed up with hand picked electrical components to deliver uncompromised quality. You’ll get crisp highs and deep lows. Wirelessly. For  16 hours straight between charges.

The SOUNDSHIELD Helmet was designed to comply with the 3 major Safety Certifications:  ASTM 2040, EN1077 and EN 1078. That makes it legally usable for snow and action sports in USA, Canada and Europe. We will go through certification once we have the first full scale manufacturing sample.
The SOUNDSHIELD Helmet has a built in ventilation system with 2 low profile air inlets and 6 outlets.  Cool air is pushed in as you move forward, keeping your head cool.

As a fully rider owned and operated startup, we are a combination of people devoted to creating awesome products for awesome lifestyles. We got together as a team 18 months ago to apply our design background to our riding experience and create an unusual blend of innovative products: The SOUNDSHIELD is the first one.
THIS IS US:  Juan Garcia Mansilla - Founder / CEO

Juan is an Industrial Designer and Entrepreneur. When he’s not on the slopes he is designing innovative real-world products for work and crazy concepts for fun. Up here we see him hauling filming equipment up top for the Campaign video shoot. Yep, that is real sweat right there.

Javier is an Industrial Designer with more than 15 years of experience in the field of Product Design and an avid Skater as well. He has extensive experience in bringing products to market. There he is, soaking up some California sun.
Francisco Abelleira - Director of Operations /  COO

Francisco’s  keen eye for business and passion for building brands has ultimately led him into UNIT 1, where he is responsible for everything that transpires on the business side of things.  He has an International Business degree and an MBA in from IAE + London Business School. He has run a company-wide Product Launch Division at GSK for the past five years. So don’t be fooled for that photo chilling on the beach..this guy means business.
For over 18 months the team worked hard on SOUNDSHIELD, building an awesome experience from the ground up. Here's what we've been up to this far (and what's ahead):

We created SOUNDSHIELD from scratch. All we started with was an experience begging to be improved. We ended up redifining it completely. After countless sketches, 3D prints, product iterations and prototypes, SOUNDSHIELD is finally here.
These images depict the ‘behind the scenes’ aspect of this process:
We've come a long way with SOUNDSHIELD. We have the necessary expertise in product design & manufacturing to make it happen.
And that's where you come in:  we need your help to move forward and make the jump to mass production.

We are aware there will be risks and challenges along the way. But we are confident our amazing  team will overcome them to ensure our backers get their SOUNDSHIELD. We will keep you guys updated every step of the way, once you back this project you become a part of this family. This truly means a lot to us. So buckle up, this is happening!

If you pledge now, you’ll get the SOUNDSHIELD combo with all this in it: Helmet, Headphones, Removable goggle clip, 2 sets of inner pads (thick & thin), Ear pads (if you want to shred without headphones), Charging cable, Back up jack, Decals & User Manual.
Say you wanted Protection, Music inside a helmet, Bluetooth Connectivity, HI FI Audio and Music for the rest of your day. Well, this is what you’d be looking at.
And you’ll get that and more with SOUNDSHIELD..with an epic Indiegogo Special discount.
Help us achieve this and get a Beanie and Decals, exclusive to Indiegogo.Choose your shipping costs upon checkout!
Claim this perk and be the first to ride with SOUNDSHIELD! Over 50% off the retail price of 299 usd (that's 170 bucks you save) and FREE SHIPPING! Choose your color scheme & size upon checkout!
Claim this perk to be among the first! Over 40% discount off the retail price of 299 usd (that's 130 bucks off!) and FREE SHIPPING! Choose your color scheme & size upon checkout!

If you didn't get on time for the Early Birds, don't fret! Grab a SOUNDSHIELD Helmet with 110 bucks knocked off the full retail price! Only on Indiegogo. Ships for free to the USA (for a limited quantity). Choose your size, color scheme & shipping cost upon checkout!

Team up with someone and get 2 SOUNDSHIELD Helmets, one for you and one for your SO, bro, sibling, you name it! You'll get your SOUNDSHIELD at 170usd. Be a team player! Choose a color scheme and size for each one. Shipping menu upon checkout!

Get 10 SOUNDSHIELD Helmets  for your shop at the Super Early Bird price! Be the first to offer SOUNDSHIELD. Choose your color scheme and special shipping cost upon checkout! One color scheme per order. Sizes: 3 XS-S / 4 M-L / 3 XL-XXL.
Please contact support@unit1gear.com with any questions or requests. General
Q: Can I use the helmet without the headphones?
A: Sure you can. You even have a set of ear pads to cover the holes on the side in case you get chilly. Or you can leave them uncovered too, if you want.
Q: Are SOUNDSHIELD Headphones On-Ear of Over-Ear?A: Our headphones are On-Ear but they’re pretty big and will cover your ear entirely.

A: Right now we are starting out with 3 color schemes (Original, Snow Patrol and Boreal). But we will add more  as we move forward! So stay tuned! Q: Can I change my color scheme once I made my order?
A: Once a perk is claimed and the payment done, the order is final. Please take the time to choose your color scheme well! Q: What are the helmet sizes?

A: SOUNDSHIELD comes in 3 sizes: XS-S, M-L, and XL-XXL. But on top of that you’ll have 2 sets of inner pads for the helmet. It includes 5 individual pads you can customize to achieve a perfect fit. Please use our sizing chart to determine your size correctly. Q: How does the customizable fit work?

A: Each SOUNDSHIELD has 5 inner pads. But it comes with an extra set of thicker pads. You can create your own custom fit by mixing pads from both sets. For reference, an M-L Size with thin pads would be closer to a L, but with thick pads, closer to a M. Q: Can I wear a beanie and goggles under the helmet?
A: Totally, just remove the pads so you don’t add unnecessary bulkiness and you’re all set.
Q: I am a journalist, who do I contact for more information?
A: Yeah it is. We designed it comply with ASTM 2040, EN1077 and EN 1078. It has a 3 mm thick ABS shell and a 15-35 mm thick EPP Liner..that’s a lot of protection, we got you covered.
Q: How does music affect safety?

A: Action sports and music play well together. There's nothing like the right tune to shred some powder or hit the park. Most helmets today are audio kit compatible, but none of them have an interface that will let you pause or lower the volume as easily and as quickly. This means you'll be more accessible and less isolated. People that ride without helmets because they can't fit their everyday headphones in there, well, now they can. So we are for safety, not against :)
A: The headphones are designed to be IP-X4 sweat proof. They can take sweat and snow without problem. Just don’t use them under heavy rain..(and don’t take them for a swim)

SAMSYTEMS is a small, but perfectly formed company  with the specific aim of resolving an age old problem with guitar amplification.  The team, who do this for a living, had wrestled for years with the significant shortfalls of traditional ""close miking"".
The problem, in a nutshell, is that ""close miking"" ... isn't. It's not close enough.

Conventional external microphones are very exposed to physical and sound interference on stage, hence the need for long sound checks, not to mention the terrors of overspill, feedback, wandering mikes, and  ""riding the desk"".
So, we have developed the internally mounted INTEGRAL series which overcomes all of these problems, and greatly improves the purity &
column2: accuracy of the sound that reaches your audience. And the professionals say:

column1: As INTEGRAL has been awarded 4.5/5 star rating in the prestigious iGuitar reviews. For the full story, go to: https://www.guitarinteractivemagazine.com/issue46  and turn to PAGE 82
The campaign offers INTEGRAL, sized to match the two most common speakers diameters of 10"" &
column2: 12"", at significantly discounted prices.  Having read more, and seen the lengthening list of expert testimonials,  we hope you will take the special opportunity to move onto the next big thing for guitar amplification, and ""go INTEGRAL"".

column1: If you pledge for a unit, you add to the fund that will allow us to complete manufacturing of the fully tested design, and make your model for you to become one of the earliest to adopt this new approach.  You are already in good company, but we'd like to make things easier for many more fellow players and engineers serious about getting the best to their audience.

Going INTEGRAL just needs the final manufacturing and packaging steps to be completed.  It's all ready to go.  With $100,000 we can finalise the tooling and production with our selected manufacturers and distributors.

To help establish this new approach, we reduced the prices of INTEGRAL for the duration of the campaign, thankful that you are willing to invest in a new technology. We are sure you will not be disappointed, as our expert testimonials show.   Please see our websites for more information. www.samsystems-uk.com, and https://www.facebook.com/samsysmicrophone/.  Also please see our worldwide media announcements in the ""Updates"" section. The press are picking up this story
column2: can you help take it forward?

column1: The 10"" INTEGRAL (IM10) is offered at only $60 (normal RRP $99), and the 12"" IM12 is priced at $70 (normal RRP $109). This also makes INTEGRAL much less expensive than a traditional mike and stand, but it does things much better by virtue of its precise design and position within the speaker cab or combo.

Your initial purchase will be shipped in February 2017 as part of the first manufacturing run you are helping to fund.  It will come to you in bespoke packaging, stickers saying you have ""INTEGRAL INSIDE"" so the sound team knows they can sigh with relief, and clear instructions for the simple retro-fit.

Actually it's astonishing that this method has not been developed before. We have patents pending and the ""prior art"" for the concept.  But, it did take us three years of design and testing to perfect the carefully shaped housings, and the strategic off-centre ""aim"" of the super cardioid dynamic microphone, with its unique and exceptionally high/low full range frequency response, pressure tested at extreme volumes.
There are many ways INTEGRAL has a positive impact for players, engineers and audiences:
* No power supplies, or batteries required.
* Helps prevent overspill and feedback issues.

While these are great advantages for owners, INTEGRAL also has the potential to boost the industry more widely, by creating a new and unique market, but also adding value to existing stocks, models, and older amplifiers. And its priced to give it accessible appeal. Success of the campaign would mean we can also manufacture for other speaker sizes.
By supporting our campaign you will be one of the first to ""raise the bar"", by using improved technique,  and adding something new to the music industry tool box.
Thankfully we cannot see any major risks.  Even if our fund is not fully reached, we have some private investment to help bridge the gap.

The big challenge is to make enough players and engineers aware that INTEGRAL exists, and works so well.  We have press and reviews coming out in several big journals, but we'd also be truly grateful if you could spread the word via our connected social media, website and YouTube.
Even if you can't pledge, we'd be so grateful if you could help spread the word, and tell your peers about the technology, SAMSYSTEMS, and this campaign.
And for only a $5 pledge you might be quick enough to get a limited edition T-shirt signed by Grammy awarded producer Gil Norton, who uses INTEGRAL, and has advised us in so many great ways.
Thank you for coming to see our campaign. We'd be delighted if you would like to contact us via here, or our website for more details, or a chat. enquiries@samsystems-uk.com

""The Site:1 speakers by Princeton Audio are individually crafted American-made tone-wood loudspeakers for those that value sound quality and pride of ownership.  The sound quality is pristine, unlike plastic boxes that confuses booming bass for quality musical enjoyment.  As perhaps the only rear-ported wooden Bluetooth-enabled speakers, a touch of comforting warmth invokes the acoustical quality of a musician's instruments.  With strategic placement of these speakers, the sound emanates from both a larger space than implied by the size of the drivers.  The cabinet's size, wood selection, and geometry create a sense of depth of the soundstage, unlike black boxes that rely upon bass diaphragms.  Princeton Audio has brought to life our American heritage of craftsmanship deployed with the modern convenience of Bluetooth technology.  Again, the sound quality is balanced across the frequency imbued with the warmth that your home deserves.""
